host.host_about:
I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day! 

I love traveling, playing guitar and drums, playing all kinds of sports, cooking, going to the beach, learning about everything I can, and pursuing new business ideas! And traveling! 

Let me know when you are coming to Hong Kong and I will do my best to help make arrangements for you! This an amazing city, and whether you are coming for the first time or the fiftieth, you can always find something new! 

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

name: Ocean View 1Bdrm at Luana Waikiki w/Free Parking
summary: Alohana at Luana Waikiki 1206. This ocean view 1-bedroom suite is a privately-owned unit inside the Luana at Waikiki, with one free dedicated parking stall.   This suite has 700 square feet of living space and comes with everything you need to enjoy your vacation. Why stay in a small hotel room when you can have ample space to relax and have the comforts of home?
space: The bedroom has a 2 queen-sized beds plus a sofa bed in the living room, so this suite can comfortably accommodate up to 6 guests (2 people per bed). The condo is equipped with a full kitchen and washer/dryer inside the unit. The property features a pool where you can cool off, relax and sunbathe on one of the many lounge chairs. If you prefer swimming in the ocean, Waikiki beach is a short 5-minute walk across Fort DeRussy Park. Next to the swimming pool, there is a work-out room with the latest exercise equipment and a BBQ area with gas BBQ grills and tables where you can dine outside. Inside Luana Waikiki is a beautiful lobby. There are 3 elevators to take you up to your room. The second floor has a lounge area with a big screen television, seating, and tables to relax and socialize. Also on the second floor is a community laundry room with coin-operated washers and dryers. Wake up and cook breakfast in the kitchen or savor a delicious breakfast at one of the many restaurants close

name: Soho chilling apartment in Mid-levels, Central
summary: The apartment is on Caine road, mid levels - just few mins walk you can arrive Soho area where the coolest Restaurants and Bars are located! In the morning, you can do hiking from the hiking trail up to the Peak. At noon, you can have a affordable lunch on a balcony Resturant enjoying the sunshine and seeing many arts on the wall at the soho area. There are museums on Caine road which are also very cool! Just so many things you can do in this area!

I am in love with colonial design and antique furnitures. Enjoy making my home warm yet stylish so that I will always wanna return home whenever I can and do hope anyone who has been here has the same feeling as I do.   

Hope seeing you next time! :)

name: POIPU TURTLE SUITE STEPS TO THE BEACH W/ AC!
summary: Pane Makai "The Turtle Suite" Steps to famous Poipu Beach, very spacious, A/C, new and truly a Beach House feel! This 3000 square foot  1/2 of a duplex, the Turtle suite has 3 bedrooms plus a bonus room,  ONE king, TWO double/fulls and TWO twins. Easily sleeping 7, also has 2 living areas, a kitchen that can seat 12 and a enclosed garage. Surrounded by 100 year old Monkey Pod trees. INCLUDES Poipu Beach Athletic Club use (pool, tennis courts & fitness center), a mile down the road.

host.host_about: Born on Kauai, the owner of our company Joshua Rudinoff started Kauai Exclusive Management in 2008. Since managing a single property Kauai Exclusive has grown to well over 100 properties island wide and we now have a full time team dedicated to Airbnb.  We love to host our Kauai Exclusive guests with professionalism and aloha. We are always available at 877GOKAUAI (someone is in the office 24/7) and happy to help in any way we can.

reviews.comments: Wondeful place, no complaints at all
Great space open and easy walk to the beach boogie boards and beach chairs...

This was my first experience with Airbnb, and what an experience. The Poipu Turtle Suite was beyond my expectation. Everything you need for a great time is provided. We had everything from boogie- boards and snorkel gear to insulated shopping bags and a garlic press! This 3000sqft home was immaculate and comfortable. It more than accommodated our party of 5 and the occasional visitors. All of the pictures accurately depict the home and views.  Turtle Suite is perfectly located adjacent to shopping, beaches, and points of interested. We used the garage at night, but the location is in a quiet safe neighborhood, so security was of no concern to us.
Joshua went above his call of duty for us. He was easy to get a hold of and he answered all of my questions immediately and with the utmost of care (I asked A LOT of questions).  We ended up needing the house for a few hours longer on our departure date. Without hesitation, Joshua was able to grant our request. It really made our departure that much more convenient for us.
I had a wonderful time on Kauai and at the Turtle Suite. I would love to visit more of Joshua's listings, I am sure they are as described.
Kauai is simply amazing and the Turtle Suite is stunning. Great location, lots of room and pretty clean. Sonja and the whole team are also very helpful to book activities and excursions.

The Poipu Turtle Suite was awesome! The management group was very responsive to questions and pleasant to work with. The beds are super comfortable and the supplied amenities were appreciated. We enjoyed our stay in this spacious house at Poipu Beach and would definitely like to return!  Mahalo!!
Great location,  amazing views from upper deck.  Much bigger than the pictures had me think.  Would stay again

Josh and his team made us feel very welcome -- offering to schedule activities, checking in on day one to make sure the rental was in line with our expectations, and even switching out the BBQ on the property with a new one after we realized the old one hadn't been cleaned in a while.

Overall a great place to stay and a great location, if a little pricey for the stated maximum of guests (the unit could easily fit 10-12 folks with all the convertible sofas around).

My family and I had a wonderful time staying at the Turtle suite on Kauai in Poipu. The house had all the basics we needed to feel at home. The house was way bigger than I anticipated, which was nice because it gave all five of us extra room. Any question or issue we had was quickly answered and resolved. On the day of departure our flight was delayed by a few hours. We immediately contacted Joshua asking if we could have a later check out time and he referred us to the right person to make it happen.
It was perfect experience, very very good

We arrived to Kaua'i in the afternoon on 11/19/15. The directions provided were spot on, though we did take a wrong turn (our error), but we ended up at the house without difficulty. 
We really liked the area the house was located in...just a block walk to the Poipu Beach area, on a quiet street, but next to a bar/restaurant with a great breakfast! 
The home itself was VERY spacious and comfortable. It can certainly sleep a large family, an extended family group, or a group of adults easily. The kitchen was fully equipped for cooking and baking, and we could not find any piece of kitchen equipment that was not included. The beds and bedding in each room were very comfortable, and all in our party slept well each night. The towels provided were clean, soft and numerous enough to cover 3 adults & 2 kids. Large beach towels were provided as well. WiFi and cable were provided, as was a Blu-Ray player with surround sound system. 
A pleasant surprise was that Poipu Beach is a great area for amateur snorkeling, without paying for an organized tour! Easy access to many local shops, restaurants, activities. 
A perfect fit for 3 adults & 2 kids for a week. We will specifically look for the property for future bookings.
We were given good directions to the unit and to get in.   Ocean view 1 block from the beach

Nejhezčí ubytování během našeho třítýdenního putování po havajských ostrovech. Nádherná vila, vkusně vybavená. Blízko skvělé pláže Poipu, kde se můžete přihlásit do surfařské školy. S ubytovatelem jsme se bohužel neviděli, ale vše bylo pro nás připravené do posledního detailu. Jen je škoda, že jsme mu nemohli poděkovat osobně. Pobyt v této vile všem vřele doporučuji, je to špička!

What a great place! Short walk to Poipu beach and several great restaurants. Spacious, comfortable and a very well supplied kitchen. We were there to celebrate my other half's 60th birthday and this place was perfect. There were enough beds for 8 and with all the futons that made cozy couches, you could sleep another 8 with ease. 

We were a bit low on propane before the big BBQ party so I called Joshua and he sent somebody right out to fill the tanks. We also had a small issue with one of the toilets running and I was able to text him and again, instantly fixed. I would not hesitate to stay there again and will recommend it to all my family and friends.

Mahalo Joshua!

Bad experience in this place. The mattress's had vinyl bags around them under the sheets. Upstairs bathroom had mold and caused breathing issues for me. The view wasn't as shown online unless you are standing in one exact place and tall enough to see over the trees. The upstairs door to outside didn't close unless the deadbolt was locked. There is a noisy bar next door full of drunks.

We loved Poipu Turtle Suite. The home is much bigger on the inside than it appears in the pics on Airbnb. The view from the master deck was great (you can see the ocean and palm trees, but not the beach). You also have use of a garage in the event you rent a convertible or want to take the top off a Jeep.

The kitchen is well appointed and you also have access to both gas and charcoal grills.

The beach is a short walk (2 minutes) to Brenneke Beach, and a couple more minutes to Poipu Beach. Very convenient if you don't want to deal with parking at either (the public parking lot gets  busy during the day).

Josh and his team were very helpful and called back when I had a question almost immediately. Thanks!

I will definitely try to stay at Turtle Suite when I next visit Kauai.

Joshua was very easy to communicate with. The home is larger than it looks from the pictures, and the kitchen is well appointed making it easy to cook for ourselves during our stay. There all lots of beach towels, chairs and snorkeling equipment too. There's a beautiful beach just a the end of the road. It was a great place for our family vacation of 7 (including a toddler) and we would happily return.

Wow! This place was everything and more we had hoped for. In fact I do not think the photo's or descriptions do it justice. It is perfectly positioned in a quite spot right near the beach. The house is so large and spacious, and everything is done well - the comfortable and large beds, the tasteful traditional yet modern furnishings, the huge bathrooms, the wireless/entertainment options etc etc etc.  For a family of 7 it made everything so easy and helped make this an unforgettable stay on a truly magnificent island paradise

We totally enjoyed our stay and everything about the house was great.  Very clean, plenty of beds for our entire family, and an excellent location. The location is amazing as it is next to great beaches to body surf and just play in the waves. When I had trouble checking in, Joshua and his staff worked diligently after hours to ensure I was able to get in to the house late at night when we arrived.

Turtle Suite blew our socks off! It was an incredible location-just a 5 minute walk to the perfect 'kid friendly' beaches. There also appeared to be great surf spots at the bottom of the street as well. There are also stores and a couple of restaurants nearby as well.  We loved Breneckies Beach House and the local surf store for food and shopping. The house itself was incredibly spacious, very clean and comfortable.  It had all the amenities needed, such as soap and laundry liquid. We loved that there was a huge washer and dryer, as well as air conditioning. 4 adults and 2 kids stayed, but definitely plenty of room for another couple and child. Josh was a fast and friendly communicator. I am so glad we chose this place to stay for our family holiday. Honestly, we could not fault it on ANYTHING. A MUST STAY  for families or a large group!

This place is huge! It was just my fiancee and me staying here but it was more suited for a large family vacation.  The location was excellent as you could walk to the beach in less than 5 minutes.  The kitchen had everything you could want to make a home cooked meal and there was a bar/restaurant right around the corner. We really enjoyed our stay there and would highly recommend it!
Great location with close access to the beach!  Joshua was extremely helpful!
Great place that is perfect for families.  I couldn't get over how big the condo was!  Comfortable beds and easy access with keyless entry.  Easy walk to the beach
The house is wonderful, very close to the Ocean, and Joshua is very helpful.
Joshua's place was perfect for our group - super close to the beach, plenty of rooms, and close to stores/restaurants. We really enjoyed our trip!

Really is a great place. Acces to the beach is perfect. Generously sized unit gave our party of 5 space to spread out. Kitchen stocked very well. Full size washer and dryer came in handy. Gas grill worked well. There was even a crockpot which I could have used had I planned my menus around it! And, wifi worked beautifully. Great vacation unit for our family and Josh was on top of everything!

The view is from the upstairs master bedroom lanai, there is a small view from the downstairs lanai, but that is not a problem as you are literally steps away from Brenneke's Beach. The house was very comfortable and there was enough room for privacy for everyone.  The management was very helpful and responded quickly when contacted by message and phone call. We enjoyed our stay.
We had a fabulous stay at Turtle- the place is perfectly placed to enjoy Poipu. The house itself is lovely, very roomy and well set up. We travelled as a family of 5 but there was room for more!

The accommodation is very spacious, the area is quite and peaceful. 
The beach is gorgeous and we loved the turtles and seals.
Would love to return some day!
Great location! Superb for large families and groups. This place is clean and organized. Views are stunning. I hope to stay here next year at this time.

This is quite a nice house. The view from upstairs is lovely. Short walk to the beach, where sea turtles and monk seals hang out and don't seem to be bothered by people. The house is huge! There were 7 of us total and the house had more than enough space and beds. Two families could easily share this rental and be happy and comfortable. The upstairs and downstairs of the house are almost separate 2bd/1ba units. It had been professionally cleaned prior to our arrival. There are boogie boards, snorkel gear and beach chairs in the garage, which was very useful for us. The kitchen is stocked with some basics and you're set up to run to the grocery store and make meals at the house, if you want. There are even gas and charcoal grills and outdoor picnic tables for your use, if you want them. We chose to do breakfast at home, then eat out for all lunches and dinners, since there's a lot to try on the island. The only downside is that the rental was fairly expensive, but since my family and I had a great time, in the end I think it was worth the cost.
The place was as described by all the previous reviews. Had a great time and would highly recommend to others!

Location is great and the layout of the home is good for multiple families and schedules. There is just one working shower. The view from the upstairs master is very nice but that is the only view of the ocean. Management was very nice and very responsive.

Just returned from a week at TURTLE SUITES and it is a great place to stay. Six adults stayed and there was easily room for two more. The location is GREAT. Short walk to beAch where we saw monk seals, turtles and snorkelling was wonderful. The extra of the fitness club was a great touch for our adult children. Lots of good restaurNts nearby some within walking distance. Suites were clean, well stocked, with lots of extras - beach chairs, boogie boards. We would all highly recommend staying here
Great location close to Poipu beach. Large house with good layout for a larger group or two families. Enjoyed our stay!
Beautiful place much larger than we expected great view and really close to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) block. Nice central location for food and shops.

Great, spacious apartment that felt quite private from the neighboring unit despite sharing walls. Huge bedrooms and bathrooms, everything was really clean and the kitchen was well stocked with utensils etc. Booking and arrangements were really easy and we loved having the short, quiet walk to Poipu Beach Park. Great for our 3.5 year old and easy on us! Would def stay here again.

If you want to enjoy the best beach on the island (Poipu) and a place with an ocean view, this is it! We could easily walk to the beach every day, and if you want to grab a beer or a bite to eat, you're right by Kalapaki Joe's and Brennecke's. The availability of an AC was a bonus! The place is managed by top-notch professionals. HIGHLY recommend staying here. We had six (four adults, two kids) and everyone was happy!

The Turtle Suites is a massive condo/home in an amazing location in Poipu.  It is literally across the street from Brenneke's beach and up a small short lane.  Poipu Beach and Brennekes were within walking distance and we walked to them everyday multiple times.  Other guests left chairs, umbrella, boogie boards and sand toys in the garage so we were able to use them at the beach.  There was so much space to spread out in the unit and relax.  There are actually three official bedrooms as listed but a fourth sleeping area/room with a double bed and a twin trundle underneath that can be partitioned off by an accordian (Website hidden by Airbnb) there are actual beds for ten with at least six futons that can be slept on as well.  There are two 'family rooms' with large HD televisions and a great kitchen space.  We had views of the ocean from both bedrooms upstairs as well as the upstairs and downstairs lanais.  Another review said that there was only one working shower downstairs but the upstairs shower works fine it just has a different way of turning the water from the faucet to the shower.  There is a ring around the opening of the faucet where the water comes out that you have to pull down to transfer water from tub to shower.  :)  There are two grills outside the garages with picnic tables on the grass.  We used the grill that was basically brand new (garages are a separate building from the home)  Be aware that the pool, hot tub, bball courts, workout space, pickleball courts are not right next to the property but down the road a mile...and it closes at 7.  That was a bit disappointing but the home was not.  Before you go to the store to buy seasonings and sauces check out the cupboard and drawer between the fridge and microwave...there are tons of them in the home to use.  There were tons of pots and pans, two toasters, a blender and coffee maker (we did not use this tho).  There was not any big bowl or glass baking dishes to use.  We have been burned several times by airbnb's before so were so pleased with this location.  You will be amazed at how large it is and the location is awesome.  I am very impressed by the speed of communication each time I had a question.  Check in and out were a breeze.

We were very happy with the Turtle Suite. The house was well-appointed, well-stocked, clean, and spacious - it could easily accommodate far more than our group of 7. The on-island property management was very responsive - when we had a broken ceiling fan, they sent someone to fix it within a couple of hours. The location is fantastic, just 5 minutes' walk from Brennecke's Beach and Poipu Beach Park. Overall, our stay was wonderful and we would certainly stay there again.

We enjoyed our stay so much we plan to book again for next year. The unit is huge. Perfect for families. A bit further from the beach than we expected but still an easy walk. We really enjoyed the Athletic club. Great cardio equipment and the pool is wonderful but a bit shallow. 2 restaurants within an easy walk. It’s in a nice neighborhood that’s very safe to walk around at any time of day or night.
Nice and close to the beach. Beach chairs, were available for use too!! Lots of room for our family.
This is a lovely, spacious place. Great for families with kids!  Five minute walk to beautiful beach-again great for people with kids.  We loved staying here!!

name: Olímpics Rio 2016 - Penthouse
summary: Suite penthouse, air conditioning, full kitchen, barbecue, swimming poll, Wi-Fi, 24hs door bell, close to bars/ restaurants/ groceries; hospital; banks and drugstores. Public Transportation: Maracanã, Beach, Lapa/ History Downtown, Shopping, Airport.
space: Ampla cobertura (110m2) arejada e iluminada, com piscina e churrasqueira particulares, vista livre, sol da manhã em condomínio de prédio único com portaria 24hs. Dispõe de internet wi-fi, som, suíte com ar condicionado sofá cama, roupa de cama, travesseiros, roupa de banho, lavabo, cozinha equipada com fogão/ forno, geladeira, cafeteira, liquidificador, torradeira, utensílios, mesas e cadeiras, ferro de passar roupas.
description: Suite penthouse, air conditioning, full kitchen, barbecue, swimming poll, Wi-Fi, 24hs door bell, close to bars/ restaurants/ groceries; hospital; banks and drugstores. Public Transportation: Maracanã, Beach, Lapa/ History Downtown, Shopping, Airport.
neighborhood_overview: A poucos metros, na mesma quadra, estão disponíveis bares, restaurantes, padaria, hospital; além de bancos, minimercados e farmácias.
notes: !!!Sejam muito bem vindos!!!
transit: E na esquina encontram-se pontos de ônibus com destino também ao 10,9km Maracanã, 16km Lapa e Centro Histórico, à 8km Praia da Barra da Tijuca e aos shoppings com variedade de lojas, cinemas, boliches, patinação no gelo, dentre outras formas de entretenimento e serviços.
access: Entre a Estrada Grajaú- Jacarepaguá e a Linha Amarela, a cobertura está tem distância de 16,2km do aeroporto internacional Tom Jobim, 17,5km do aeroporto Santos Dumond, e 13,4km da rodoviária intermunicipal.
interaction: Cobertura duplex, o primeiro andar será normalmente utilizada pelos proprietários, enquanto o andar superior garante privacidade TOTAL aos hóspedes e ao mesmo tempo todo o suporte necessário no período de sua estadia.

name: Quiet house with parking near downtown Montreal
summary: The Mapmaker's House, where you will be staying on the 2nd floor reserved for guests, is a hundred-year-old house located within the historic neighbourhoods of Westmount and Notre-Dame-de-Grâce. Close to the downtown area but also in a quiet neighbourhood with a host of green spaces, it is a minute's walk away from Sherbrooke Street West, with its restaurants and shops, a 5 min walk from Vendôme metro station and a 10 min walk from the Glen site of the MUHC . There are two free parking spaces.
space: An entire floor of this hundred-year-old house is reserved for guests. The space is made up of two bedrooms, a bathroom, a fitted kitchen, a lounge and two balconies. Wi-Fi, washer-dryer, bedding, towels and some handy equipment are also provided. In addition, two secure parking spaces are provided free of charge on the private property of the house - very useful, since parking spaces are at a premium in the area. Breakfast is included. Grocery stores, restaurants and shops are a couple of minutes away on foot. Facilities nearby also include: bus stops, Vendôme metro and rail station, Bixi bike rental dock, green spaces, Glen site of the McGill University Health Centre (MUHC), Shriners Hospital for Children, Décarie Highway. Downtown Montreal, Museum of Fine Arts, McCord Museum, Saint Joseph's Oratory, Montreal and Concordia universities, Champlain Bridge are under 15 minutes away.

Close to the downtown area but also in a quiet neighbourhood with a host of green spaces, it is a minute's walk away from Sherbrooke Street West, with its restaurants and shops, a 5 min walk from Vendôme metro station and a 10 min walk from the Glen site of the MUHC . Grocery stores, restaurants and shops are a couple of minute
neighborhood_overview: The Mapmaker’s House is a hundred-year-old house located within the historic neighbourhoods of Westmount and Notre-Dame-de-Grâce. The house, which is close to the downtown area but also in a quiet neighbourhood with a host of pleasant, relaxing green spaces, is a minute’s walk away from Sherbrooke Street West, with its restaurants and interesting shops to discover. Among others, the Museum of Fine Arts, McCord Museum, downtown, business district, Palais des congress convention centre, Old Montreal, Saint Joseph’s Oratory of Mount Royal and the Atwater Market are easily accessible in under 15 minutes by car or just a few stops away on the metro or bus. Ideal for professionals or guests to the McGill University Health Centre and Shriners Children’s Hospital, both a 10-minute walk away
notes: You can contact me by text or by writing me a note using the notepad and pencil provided in the entry hall.
transit: The Mapmaker’s House is in a great location for transport links. • Two secure parking spaces are provided free of charge on the private property of the house. • The house is close to freeways 10, 15 and 20, Champlain Bridge. • Downtown Montreal is under 15 minutes away by car or metro and under 25 minutes away on foot. • The Glen site of the McGill University Health Centre (MUHC) is less than 10 minutes away on foot. • Vendôme metro and rail station, which connects with three suburban lines - Saint-Jérôme, Candiac and Vaudreuil-Hudson  - is 5 minutes away on foot. • The nearest docking point of the Montreal bike rental scheme - BIXI Montréal – is an 8-minute walk away. • P.-E.-Trudeau international airport is 17 minutes away by car in normal traffic. You should allow about 25 minutes if travelling there by train or taxi; if you are taking the train and the bus, possibly allow an extra 12 minutes, not including bus waiting time.
access: The common areas reserved entirely for guests are: two bedrooms, a bathroom with twin basins, a fitted kitchen with essentials and breakfast included, a lounge with a reading corner, TV, computer desk and sofa bed, Wi-Fi, two balconies with Adirondack chairs and patio furniture, parking spaces . We are happy for you to use these areas during your stay.
interaction: I am a mapmaker by profession, so I am very happy to provide you with practical information about the area to make your stay pleasant and to help you travel around our beautiful city of Montreal.  We can arrange your arrival time to be the most convenient for you.  The Wi-Fi code and other useful information are posted in the area reserved for your use. You can return the keys on departure in the most convenient way for you.

host.host_about: J'ai toujours aimé faciliter la vie des voyageurs. Je suis cartographe de profession. Montréalais et visiteurs de notre belle métropole utilisent dans leurs déplacements quotidiens, d'affaires ou de vacanciers, des cartes que j'ai dessinées, sans s'imaginer que j'en sois l'auteure. Je vous souhaite un beau séjour à Montréal, si unique et invitante. Au plaisir de vous accueillir dans ma paisible maison centenaire tellement bien située!

name: My house is your house - goodvibes only (balcony)
summary: Hello! my apartment is clean, young, cool, spacious and well situated. I offer a  lovely and clean private bedroom with bed sheets, pillows, blankets, towels and 200MB Wi-Fi. We are walking distance to Sagrada Familia, Encants Market, Hospital Sant Pau and Agbar Tower. Has many supermarkets and 24 hours markets very near. The main metro lines L1-L2 are just on the corner (El Clot station), also many bus and night bus lines. The neighborhood is very safe, full of every kind of comercies around.
space: I offer a comfortable bedroom for 2 people, with double bed, wardrobe, desk and chair. It is possible to add a spare mattress on the floor to accommodate an third person, but this make the bedroom become small! The living room, kitchen and bathroom are common areas, WE DO THE CLEANING EVERY SINGLE DAY to make it comfortable for the guests. Guests are free to come and go as they please. This bedroom in special is to front of the street, so can be a kind noisy, not so recommendable for who have a sensitive sleep. I have another bedroom on the same flat, look on my profile.

neighborhood_overview: My neighborhood is very nice, there are every kind of comercies around, several parks and you can walk to as well as attractions like the Sagrada Familia, Hospital Sant Pau, Encants Market and Agbar Tower. There are many supermarkets very nearby such as Dia, Mercadona, Carrefour, Consum as well as a number of 24hr shops.
notes: Hello, we are Dany and Lee, very nice friends from Brazil, living in Barcelona and sharing the same apartment since 2012. We are DJs, music producer, and party organizers, love sports, eating healthily, work, party, learn, friends, arts, movies, cook, dance, photography, cinema but most of all we love music. We like to talk and we can do in English, Spanish and Portuguese! We think that we are open minded, and funny sometimes. :) We are very responsible and conscious, for us it is very important to keep the apartment clean and organized, respect the common areas and the guests.  We are sure that you will like your stay here. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to message us. Welcome. :]
transit: The neighborhood is very safe, easily accessible by public transport and is just 10 minutes from Plaza Catalunya (center). >>>TRANSPORT NEARBY - El Clot METRO STATION at 60 meters, lines L1 red and L2 purple. - Several BUS lines. - TRAN VÍA Glories at 600 Meters - NITBUS N9 to go or return to the center at night, the point is front of my door. - RAILWAY/RENFE El Clot-Arago station to go out of Barcelona at 150 meters. >>> TO GET HERE FROM THE EL PRAT AIRPORT - Take the RAILWAY/RENFE to El Clot-Aragó station and come walking. - (Alternative) Aerobus to Plaza Catalunya and METRO L1 direction Fondo, get off at El Clot station, exit Valencia. >>>TO GET HERE FROM SANTS  - METRO L5 to Sagrada Familia, change to METRO L2 direction Badalona, get off at El Clot station, exit Valencia. - (Alternative) BUS H10, get off at Carrer de Valencia, last stop before Meridiana. >>>TO GET HERE FROM BUS STATION NORD - METRO L1 at Arc de Triomf direction Fondo, get off at El Clot, exit Valencia.
access: Guests can take some space on the fridge and cupboard for food. There are also central heater for really cold days and fan for the summertime.  The apartment has a large bathroom with, hairdryer, large mirror and bidet, the living room is comfortable and bright, and the kitchen is well equipped with refrigerator, cooker, blender, juicer, and utensils. Washing machine service at Carrer de Sibelius, 11. (just on the corner)
interaction: We are almost time working outside, so sometimes we don't spend too much time with the guests but we are always available if they need something =)
house_rules: Please help to keep everything neat and tidy from the kitchen to the living room and the bathroom.      KITCHEN – Take care especially with the kitchen! Clean the table after eating, the cooker and the area around after cook. Wash, dry and turn back everything that you use, clean inside the dishwasher/sink and dry the area around, clean the ground if you drop something. Please make use of the recycling bins provided.      BATHROOM – Please don´t leave the bathroom floor wet, and leave the sink tidy.      LIVING ROOM – Please don´t leave any plates or glasses in the living room and keep everything organized.      SMOKERS – You may smoke on the balcony with the windows closed, please do not throw the cigarette out the window.

host.host_about:
Hello, we are Ash and Nanni, we are very nice friends, Brazilians, we are living in Barcelona since 2012 sharing the same apartment.
Nanni is a massage therapist, vegetarian, yogi and very into of meditation, good vibes, peace and love. She is dedicated to her music and piano studies and usually she spends much more time at home.
We are DJ and music producer, we love sports, eating healthily, work, party, learn, friends, arts, movies, cooking, dance, photography, cinema but most of all we love music. We like to talk and we can do in English, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese! We think that we are receptive, open minded and funny. =)

We are very responsible and conscious, for us it is very important to keep the apartment clean and organized, respect the common areas and the guests space. 

***I'm sure that you will like your stay here. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to message us.***

Welcome. :]

neighborhood_overview: ❤ Right at the center of Mong Kok town and in Nathan Road ❤ Ladies market, Temple Street, famous shopping streets etc. are all within walkable distance ❤ Exploring either Hong Kong island or Kowloon is pretty easy, thanks to the MTR nearby (1 min by walk) and many number of bus stops around ❤ Close to Mong Kok night life and shopping streets ❤ Langham place shopping mall is right behind ❤ Plenty of food choices around ❤ Rather than taking MTR, I would strongly suggest you to walk from Mong Kok until Tsim Sha Tsui to get the feel of real Hong Kong !! You will never regret! ❤ Disneyland, Ocean park etc. are within 30 minutes distance!
notes: ❤ Late checkout / early check-in : subject to the availability, I can definitely assist you on it. But this is something I can confirm only one day before your arrival / departure. Also, please note that early check in is only to drop your suitcases. Cleaning will happen only according to the cleaner’s schedule ❤ Baggage storage:  If your flight is late after check out, you can go to Hong Kong Metro Station or Kowloon Metro station to leave your suitcases, they have special service. You can refer to the Housing Manual kept in the apartment for more details.  ❤ Housing Manual also have some place you must see in Hong Kong. They are my favorite places. ❤ Self check-in is very easy. You will receive entire direction details after your booking. ❤ You can reach at the property anytime. There are transportation options 24x7. I will send you details after the booking is confirmed.
transit: ❤The easiest public transportation is MTR / Subway. Nearest subway station is just 200-300 meters away ❤ There are many bus stops just infront of the building. The buses / minibuses service is available 24x7 ❤ Getting a taxi is extremely easy. Taxi stand is just downstairs ❤ If you are coming from China, nearest stop is Mong Kok East station. It is walkable from the station to my property ❤ Macau Ferry Terminal is within 5 minutes by taxi / bus ❤ To / from airport : Day time, use bus A21 (35 minutes, 37 HKD). At night time, use NA21
access: ❤ My sweet apartment is a private apartment, it's only for you.  ❤ You will be alone in the apartment, with private bathroom and private toilet. You don’t need to share any such amenities with any stranger. **Better than hotel and cheaper**
interaction: ❤ Once the booking is done, you will receive detailed instructions and a useful video for the check-in process. If any concerns, I am always available on Whatsap / We-Chat / Airbnb chat. ❤ I will be more than happy to give you recommendations for the places to visit and local restaurants. ❤ You can enjoy the airbnb superhost experience with me :-) All my apartments are 5* rated by previous guests. 90% of the reviews are really positive. ❤ Self check-in. Everything is automated. But if you struggle, just give me a call, I will be there to help you
house_rules: Quiet time after 10 PM. If you need any helps, please approach me. Please don't approach neighbors or strangers.  Please keep the place clean. Please don't leave the empty shopping bags, used diapers, women's diapers etc. inside the property. Please dump then in the waste bin outside. If only two guests, only a double sized large quilt will be provided. You should not use extra quilts unless more than two guests. Extra charges of 100 HKD will be taken if you don't follow it.

host.host_about:
A world traveller. Investment banker by profession, an Airbnb host by passion :-)

Welcome to Hong Kong, such an amazing city! But please be aware of the size of apartments here, thanks to the space constraints and population density. The apartments are way smaller compared with Western standards. It is very common that a family of 4 lives in 250-300 sqft apartments here in HK. 

Once again, thank you for the interest and looking forward to host you soon!   :)

summary: Luminoso apartamento totalmente equipado y reformado ideal para familias, grupos de amigos y viajes de negocios con capacidad máxima de 6 personas. Ubicado cerca de la Fira Congres Gran Vía 2, Estadio de Fútbol del Barcelona, Hospital de Sant Joan De Deu, entre el aeropuerto y centro de Barcelona.

neighborhood_overview: El apartamento está situado en Hospitalet de Llobregat, cerca de la Fira, entre el centro de Barcelona y el aeropuerto. Es una localidad ideal para visitas profesionales a algunas de las ferias que se instalan a lo largo de la Gran Vía. Esta zona está rodeada de tiendas locales, cafés, panaderías, restaurantes y supermercados. Hay paradas de metro cerca del piso y varios autobuses que conectan con el centro de Barcelona regularmente de día y noche.
notes: El check-in se realizará entre las 14:00pm y 22:00 pm.  En caso de que llegues después de las 22:00pm. Y hasta las 06:00 am. Se aplicará una tasa extra de entrada tardía ( porque por lo general a ese horario nos encontramos lejos del apartamento y tenemos que tomar un taxi hasta llegar al apartamento:( De 22:00 a 00:00 ..................... 30€ De 00:00 a 06:00......................50€
transit: Sólo a20 minutos en autobús del Hospital Sant Joan de Deu. A 8 minutos del apartamento está la estación de metro de Santa Eulàlia, línea roja (L1), que te llevará al centro de Barcelona ( Plaza Cataluña) en 10 minutos, así como a muchas atracciones turísticas. A 10 minutos del apartamento está también la metro de Collblanc con acceso a dos líneas: línea azul (L5), que conduce directamente al Passeig de Gracia ( Casa Batlló y La Pedrera). También te lleva directamente a la Sagrada Familia y a la Estación de Sants (principal estación de trenes de Barcelona y con paradas de autobuses y metro L3). Línea naranja (L9) que conduce directamente al aeropuerto.
access: El huésped puede acceder a todo el apartamento. Incluye ropa de cama y utensilios de cocina.
interaction: Dejamos un número de teléfono de contacto para cualquier eventualidad y necesidad en tu estancia. Para estancias largas de temporada podrás pedir servicio de limpieza durante la estancia. Si te interesa pídenos precio. Si vienes en coche disponemos de plaza de parking cerca del apartamento a 5€ eldía reservando con previa antelación.

name: 1BD Ocean Front at Mana Kai Maui
summary: Swim, lounge, and snorkel at FABULOUS Mana Kai Maui Resort—the jewel at the end of one of Maui's BEST beaches. The Mana Kai Maui Resort uniquely offers all the advantages of a condo vacation, but with the added amenities of a resort hotel.
space: The Mana Kai Maui Resort has been a guest favorite condo property in South Maui for decades. The property is so highly praised because of its superb location at the start of Keawakapu Beach. The white sand beach stretches for over a mile, right into Wailea, ending in front of the high-end Andaz Resort. Guests can choose to walk along the great beach, catch some rays, or snorkel right in front of the property (where turtles are often spotted). Besides the beachfront location, guests will enjoy a slew of on-site amenities. For starters, the private beachfront pool is a great option for taking a refreshing dip while you still enjoy views of ocean and beachgoers. The ground floor open-air restaurant overlooking Keawakapu Beach enjoys views that are just as amazing as the food. The Five Palms Restaurant is famous for having one of the most popular happy hours on Maui. Pull up a chair at the bar for a tropical cocktail! Other onsite amenities include a deli/general store where you can pick u

host.host_about:
Aloha, 
We are Condominium Rentals Hawaii. We have been managing condo rentals in Hawaii for 35 years now and love welcoming our guests to the islands. We manage over 375 vacation rentals on Maui and Kauai and have been serving AirBNB guests for over 5 years now.

We encourage you to read our 300+ reviews left by AirBNB guests to learn more about our service and condos! 

If you have any questions about surf breaks, golf courses, restaurants, or tours on Maui, we can absolutely help you out. Maui no ka oi!

name: Cozy & central apartment in the heart of Barcelona
summary: The nice and cozy 2 bedrooms. A few minutes walk from the main places of Barcelona: The Gothic Quarter (Barrio Gótico) with the heart – La Rambla, multicultural Raval, a famous Magic Fountain of Montjuïc and Plaza de España and many others! In 5 minutes from the apartment are located the metro stations: Sant Antoni (L2), Urgell (L1) and a lot of transport stops. And after 15 minutes from the apartment, You can instantly get to Barcelona’s wonderful beaches.
space: The apartment is fully furnished and stylized for Your comfortable staying in Barcelona. It is suitable for family vacations and business travel. Nearby are located parks, shops, cafes, restaurants and bars. Cozy and sunny apartment consisting of two bedrooms and living room.   It's located in close proximity to the historic part of Barcelona and the Gothic Quarter (Barrio Gótico). There are also within 10 minutes: La Rambla, the Cathedral, Plaza España with Magic Fountain of Montjuïc and Plaza Catalunya. From the apartment You can easily reach by direct metro line to the architectural masterpieces of Gaudi, including Basilica and Expiatory Church of the Holy Family (Sagrada Familia). The district has many museums, shops and restaurants.

name: Prime Location Studio Plateau/Mcgill/DT
summary: This property is perfect for travellers who want to discover Montreal like the locals. From sound-sound-proof ventilated units to marble floors, we’ve created an intuitive space where guests can expect a good night’s sleep and also where they can feel comfortable kicking off their shoes and hanging out during the Day. There is also a balcony accessible directly from the unit. Nesting in the heart of the action, This unit is located in a vibrant and trendy neighbourhood, the plateau Mont-Royal.
space: This building has just been renovated offering elegance and comfort. This unit has a queen bed, night lights, appliances, curtains that allows you to close off your unit space completely, and storage for your luggage. There is coffee, tea, sugar, oil, salt and pepper. Also body wash, shampoo and other cleaning products. All you need to feel right at home.

You’ll also have access to WIFI & TV. There is also a balcony accessi
neighborhood_overview: The Must-Sees near The Plateau Mont-Royal The Maine street Saint Laurent is filled with boutiques and iconic restaurants such as Shwartz and Moishes.  - The Old-Montreal with its many different architectural styles dates way back to 1685, so visitors will have the chance to see with their own eyes how the city developed. Stop at the Basilique Notre-Dame to admire its splendid stain-glass window (and for a moment of peace and quiet). Then head off to the historic Place Jacques-Cartier and settle down at one of its terraces, where you’ll get a great view street artists and portrait painters and where the sangria flows like water. - The Little-Italy, which is more steeped in tradition. You’ll always feel warmly welcomed. And the Jean-Talon market, one of the gems of the city, making it one of the city’s most valued areas. - The Village, a neighbourhood where you’ll never be bored. Constantly lively and festive, with more than enough atmosphere to spare.
notes: Full access to shared washing machine and dryer ($). around 4 $ for washing and drying.
transit: 2-minute walk from the Saint-Laurent boulevard, nearby Bixi and Taxi sharing stand and Uber with less than a 5 minute wait time.
access: Guests can access their units 24 Hours a Day with a keyless entry system. You’ll also have access to WIFI & TV. There is also a balcony accessible directly from the unit.
interaction: You can always text me at the number provided.
house_rules: - No Parties - No smoking - 100$ charge for smoking

host.host_about: I used to be a software engineer and now I plan events and organize bachelor party trips full time. When I'm not "working" I'm raising my two crazy kids with my life partner Rebecca. Love Montreal and have had plenty of good times all over the city. We have amazing food, amazing shows, amazing things to see...all around I can just say I am super lucky to live here and am happy to share it with people from all over the world. If you're planning a trip feel free to reach out with any questions you may have. I am happy to help. A bientot!

name: Alii Estate- Luxury 4 Acres- Walk to Beach
summary: Private Luxury Estate with Tennis Courts and Private Pool. Gated 5 bedroom home on 4 acres.
space: Alii Estate is one of the finest Big Island Vacation homes available. Featuring ten thousand square feet under roof, private tennis court and detached Ohana guest house this custom designed estate home sits on 4 gated acres right off of Alii Drive in the heart of Kona. You will love the magnificent pool area, with its private resort-style saltwater pool, meandering under a glass wall into the great room where ten foot pocket doors open up creating the coveted indoor/outdoor Hawaiian living experience. The upscale décor and luxurious features continue throughout the spacious interior. The main house features four spacious bedrooms with 4 en suite baths. Additionally there is a detached one bed

reviews.comments: This place is wonderful! We had everything we needed and the host answered all our questions. The checkin process was very simple. I asked the host for restaurant recommendations and he gave me a bunch in the area. Everything we needed was in walking distance. St Catherine Street is only a block away and it is full of bars, restaurants, shops and so much more! Having such a big place in downtown is rare. It was perfect for our large group. The host is very accommodating with check-in and check-out. The place is super clean and beautiful. I would definitely stay here again! If you are reading this review, I would definitely recommend that you book this place!!

name: 【hiii】简约一室@油麻地站/天后庙/百老汇电影中心-HKG_0018
summary: 一说起香港,人们就会想起国际大都市,购物天堂,各种国际大牌,应有尽有｡美食天堂,上到米其林三星餐馆,下至街边地道大排档,都能让你回味无穷｡公寓就位于香港油麻地,开启时尚与味蕾碰撞的香港假期｡ ￮步行约2分钟到达百老汇电影中心 ￮步行约2分钟到达天后庙 ￮步行约3分钟到达油麻地站(荃湾线) ￮乘车约10分钟到达天际100香港观景台 ￮乘车约15分钟到达太平山 ￮乘车约20分钟到达香港海洋公园 ￮乘车约25分钟到达香港迪士尼乐园 ￮乘坐1站港铁到达旺角,附近有奥海城､Ladies Market､朗豪坊等 ￮乘坐2站港铁到达尖沙咀站,附近有星光大道､尖沙咀天星码头､崇光百货､K11､海港城 ￮乘坐3站港铁到达金钟站,附近有维多利亚港､香港艺术中心 ￮乘坐4站到达中环站,附近有国际金融中心､皇后像广场､香港摩天轮､兰桂坊 ★☆我在韩国首尔､泰国曼谷和芭提雅､越南胡志明市､芽庄､柬埔寨暹粒以及中国广州还有其他的公寓,详情可点进我个人页面查看其他房源｡如果您想再次踏上旅途,欢迎再次选择我们☆★
space: 我的公寓位于香港油尖旺闹市区之中,商店､药房､食肆林立,交通便捷｡房间配有一张1.2米单人床,最多可容纳2人,请根据需求预订~ (Website hidden by Airbnb)  ☆本地风情☆ 让您在香港这个繁华的现代化城市感受到原始原味的本土生活气息｡这里是香港最有生活气息的地方,是众多经典港剧和电影的取景地点｡如果您正在寻找一个独特,美丽,舒适的住宿地点,体验当地生活方式,探寻香港旧日生活,这里是您的理想之选｡ ☆位置优越☆ 公寓位于香港油麻地,附近景点繁多,吃喝玩乐齐全,附近有本土风情的庙街夜市,全世界的美食汇聚在此,泰国菜,中餐,茶楼,西餐厅应有尽有,知名的如澳洲牛奶公司,泰城,翠华餐厅｡到达天后庙,百老汇电影中心,购物中心等知名景点都非常便捷｡还有众多文艺青年必去的小众咖啡厅､彩虹邨､重庆大厦等打卡地点｡ ☆贴心服务☆ 我的公寓设施设备齐全,楼下商铺林立,交通方便｡让你住得舒心､安心､放心,随时随地即可拎包入住,是个人出游的首选｡ 我们提供中英文24小时双语管家服务,除此之外还提供相关的旅游小贴士,希望能带给您一个无忧的旅途｡ *****谢绝任何形式的派对,否则将从押金收取额外的清洁费,谢谢您的支持和理解*****

neighborhood_overview: 我的房子位于香港油麻地,交通便捷､食肆林立､商店集中｡零距离感受香港本土气息｡    周边银行及ATM:距离中国银行(香港)油麻地分行 ATM步行1分钟 周边便利店:7-11便利店及OK便利店步行1分钟 周边货币兑换服务点:Tung Hoi Renminbi Exchange Co.  周边餐厅:华康茶餐厅､适相园茶餐厅､维多利茶餐厅 周边商店:莎莎､卓悦 周边药房:华润堂､金华中西药房
notes: 谢绝任何形式的派对,否则将从押金中收取相应的费用 ▲入住前我们根据相关规定需要登记保存您的个人护照信息, 我们保证会严格保密您的个人隐私,平台也会进行监管,请不要担心,配合我们做好登记工作即可｡非常感谢您的支持与理解｡ 1.我们理解并非常感谢您对我们家的喜爱与热切的心情!我们最早入住时间为下午15:00,最晚退房时间为12:00｡如有特殊情况需要提早入住或延迟退房,请提前联系我们,我们会根据当天预定进行答复｡ 2.接待入住最晚时间为晚上22:00,如超过接待时间,我们的管家将会收取相应的小费100港币报销车费,用作买咖啡提神｡(请在规定的入住时间15:00 ~ 22:00内入住) 3.公寓大楼内的其他工作人员并不是我们的成员,如果有任何情况发生,请直接在预定平台或使用即时通讯工具联系我们,我们会尽快回复并竭尽全力帮助您｡ 4.由于各地政策不同,为了避免您旅途不必要的麻烦,如果有人问起请解释您是屋主的朋友在这里免费借住,请避免提起预定平台等信息｡ 5.为保持室内空气质量,请勿在房间内吸烟｡房间烟雾可能会触发警报,情节严重者可能会被罚款甚至被遣返｡请到相应的吸烟区吞云吐雾｡ 6.    垃圾请放到指定的位置,感谢您为保护地球出一份力｡ 7.进门后请拖鞋并使用我们提供的一次性脱鞋,淋浴室请使用我们提供的塑胶拖鞋,避免滑到受伤,影响您美丽的旅程｡ 8.我们是一客一清,在您入住前房间已经是打扫好的状态,如入住期间有清洁需要,我们可以提供收费的清洁服务｡ 9.为了您能有更好的体验和更舒适的空间,请勿超过最大入住人数入住｡ 请注意遵守相关规定,放松身心也要按照基本法 请勿在公共区域大声喧哗或饮食｡请您理解,由于我们的房卡数量有限,我们只能提供一个房卡,对您造成的不便我们深表歉意｡ 请注意保管｡朋友,我们非常不愿意收取您遗失房卡的罚金 *请您理解民宿并不是酒店,并没有前台和工作人员,非常感谢您的支持与理解*
transit: ▷如何回家:  1.从香港国际机场回家:  乘车约30分钟 2.从西九龙高铁站回家: 乘车约10分钟 3.从红磡站回家: -乘车约10分钟 -乘坐港铁约20分钟 2.从香港市内回家: 对于目的地较近的游客,的士和港铁都是十分快捷的选择｡ • 乘坐的士:Uber､Easy Taxi以及HK Taxi等都是较好用的打车APP｡ • 乘坐港铁:香港地铁非常方便,市区景点及购物广场都集中在地铁站附近｡ ▷从家出游: ￮步行约2分钟到达百老汇电影中心 ￮步行约2分钟到达天后庙 ￮步行约3分钟到达油麻地站(荃湾线) ￮乘坐1站港铁到达旺角,附近有奥海城､Ladies  ￮乘坐2站港铁到达尖沙咀站,附近有星光大道､尖沙咀天星码头､崇光百货､K11､海港城 Market､朗豪坊等 ￮乘坐3站港铁到达金钟站,附近有维多利亚港､香港艺术中心 ￮乘坐4站到达中环站,附近有国际金融中心､皇后像广场､香港摩天轮､兰桂坊 ￮乘车约10分钟到达天际100香港观景台 ￮乘车约15分钟到达太平山 ￮乘车约20分钟到达香港海洋公园 ￮乘车约25分钟到达香港迪士尼乐园
access: 所见即所得,希望能让你住得舒心､安心､放心｡ 入住之后您就是这里的主人,您拥有整间公寓,您拥有以下所有设施用品,供您免费使用,旅途无忧:    基本设施:  卧室:电视､空调 厨房:热水壶､冰箱､碗碟､炉､电吹风 浴室&卫生间:热水器

summary: This is a 2 bedroom apartment with big bathroom and kitchen. 这是一套两房一厅民宿,带有卫生间和厨房｡ 2 double beds, and one sofa beds can comfortably suit max. 6 people.  房间里有两张双人床和一张沙发床,最多可住6人｡ The dining area still have enough moving space after putting many luggage 客厅还有很大的空间可以放行李物品｡ Exceptionally clean and quiet area but still very convenient location 大楼里干净整洁,环境相对安静但交通仍然非常方便｡

name: Cosy one bed studio apartment
summary: The is a great little one bed studio apartment in Happy Valley. It has a cute little rooftop for summer night cocktails, is very handy to all local amenities and some great restaurants! Highlight is Happy Valley Racecourse situated just 5 mins away!
space: A very lovely cosy 7th Floor studio flat located in Happy Valley, near fantastic little restaurants and shops and just a couple of minutes walk from the Tram Stop and Happy Valley Race (URL HIDDEN) is fully furnished with a separate bedroom from the living area. Very comfortable for those who are looking for a small base whilst visiting this great city!
description: The is a great little one bed studio apartment in Happy Valley. It has a cute little rooftop for summer night cocktails, is very handy to all local amenities and some great restaurants! Highlight is Happy Valley Racecourse situated just 5 mins away! A very lovely cosy 7th Floor studio flat located in Happy Valley, near fantastic little restaurants and shops and just a couple of minutes walk from the Tram Stop and Happy Valley Race (URL HIDDEN) is fully furnished with a separate bedroom from the living area. Very comfortable for those who are looking for a small base whilst visiting this great city! Guests have access to:  - Wifi - Air Conditioning  - Hairdryer  - Iron/Ironing board  - Small but diverse selection of books for your reading pleasure  - Speakers for plugging in iPods/Laptops  - Clean Towels, Bedsheets, Pillows, Toilet Paper, Soap, Shampoo etc - Rooftop I will try to meet you when you arrive to hand over keys but will probably be out of town during your stay. However, we ar
notes: There is a cleaner who comes in regularly and is happy to help at an extra cost. Details can be provided on request.
transit: Getting around is very convenient. The flat is 2 mins from the HV Tram Stop and there are also a number of buses to take you all over Hong Kong Island and Kowloon. A leisurely walk to Causeway Bay and to the MTR station, past the Happy Valley Race Course, would take about 15 minutes. If you are feeling energetic you could take a long walk (or run) to Bowen Road which can lead you up Hong Kong Peak. The highlight is however Happy Valley Races which is a 5 min walk away!
access: Guests have access to:  - Wifi - Air Conditioning  - Hairdryer  - Iron/Ironing board  - Small but diverse selection of books for your reading pleasure  - Speakers for plugging in iPods/Laptops  - Clean Towels, Bedsheets, Pillows, Toilet Paper, Soap, Shampoo etc - Rooftop
interaction: I will try to meet you when you arrive to hand over keys but will probably be out of town during your stay. However, we are very easily reachable online and will generally respond immediately to any questions. There will be a contact person available in HK should there be any concerns!
house_rules: This is my home and although you are very welcome, I would appreciate that guests respect this and try to ensure that it is well looked during your stay.  The cleaner comes 1-2 times a week at a small charge. Unfortunately, smoking, pets & house parties are not welcome!

host.host_about: I am working in Hong Kong in Education. I have been here for 5 years and LOVE this place. It's an amazing place to live and work for somebody who is very active. I find myself being constantly busy either working, playing sport, hiking, brunching & traveling. I am pleased to be able to offer my home and I will do my best to offer you some guidance to some of the very cool sights here in HK.

name: Stylish Floral Studio Room - 5mins to MTR for 3ppl
summary: Relax in this contemporary and cosy studio room for 3! You will have your own private bathroom and an area to make tea & coffee. Located next to Langham Place in busy Mong Kok, you are only a 2 minute walk away from the Mong Kok MTR station and the airport bus is just across the street.  Dozens of restaurants and shopping just downstairs of the apartment. Ladies Market, Sneaker Street, Temple Street and many more are all just minutes away. This is a very convenient location!
space: The studio is perfect for couples, 3 friends or even the solo traveller.  The bed is a double bed with a thick comfy mattress, it can also transform into a sitting sofa. We also have a 2nd sofa- mattress bed for the 3rd guest, with extra blankets and pillows provided.  We have a window in the room to allow plenty of natural light during the day.  There is a good sized private bathroom in the studio room with shower. ( No sharing with others) Stocked with body wash & shampoo for all guests. We also provide bath towels, toothbrushes & new slippers for all guests.  Free Wi-fi is included in the room.

neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood includes one of Hong Kong’s most popular markets, the Ladies' Market, and also has a ton of shopping streets, which are a common feature in southern China. Conveniently, these are where a cluster of merchants sell one type of product on a single street. Mong Kok has entire streets and street sections dedicated to the sale of goldfish, flowers, birds, sneakers, and kitchenware. Just about everything from bargain household objects to luxury jewellery is bought, sold and haggled over in Mong Kok. Sai Yeung Choi Street sells electronics, cosmetics and clothes; Shantung Street and Dundas Street are where you can pick up the latest Japanese and Western fashion and accessories; while Langham Place is one of the many malls where you can do your Mong Kok shopping in air-conditioned comfort.
transit: Mong Kok MTR station Exit C & E
interaction: Message me through the airbnb app or phone

summary: Appartement bien ensoleillé, au 3e étage, sur une rue tranquille, partagé avec deux étudiants (arts visuels et acuponcture). Très bien situé: à 5 minutes de marche du parc Jeanne-Mance, du Mont-Royal, des grandes rues St-Laurent, Mont-Royal et avenue du Parc. Épiceries, restaurants, pharmacies à distance de marche. name: Quarto Aconchegante/Welcoming Room
summary: Our home is complete and basic, plus good location . The room  is very simple and homely .
space: We are a young couple just married. we live a short time in this house and we are still packing up, but the house is complete and functional.  Nós somos um jovem casal . Na maior parte do dia a casa ficará livre, pois eu e meu esposo trabalhamos, regressando somente a noite. A casa é simples, porém funcional .
description: Our home is complete and basic, plus good location . The room  is very simple and homely . We are a young couple just married. we live a short time in this house and we are still packing up, but the house is complete and functional.  Nós somos um jovem casal . Na maior parte do dia a casa ficará livre, pois eu e meu esposo trabalhamos, regressando somente a noite. A casa é simples, porém funcional . The room that we provide to you is clean and agreeable, we only we use this room to store our clothes. We provide bed linen and towels. O quarto que disponibilizamos para os hospedes, é limpo e privativo, temos a disposição um confortável colchão de casal, disponibilizamos roupas de cama e toalha . We worked hard, we spent the day away from home, just returning at night. If possible we can go for a walk. We will go make a delicious and typical Brazilian breakfast for you. We would love to talk, share experiences and making new friends. Trabalhamos em horário comercial, a maior parte do dia
neighborhood_overview: There is market , bank , bakery , bus stop . Near there is one subway station , many typical houses and security . The central policia of Rio de Janeiro City  are there in my neighborhood . Bairro típico do RJ , a vizinhança na sua maioria é composta por casas residenciais, porém o comércio é farto, contando com mais de 3 mercados, várias padarias e farmácias, pontos de ônibus, a estação do metrô é muito próxima. A Cidade da Policia ( o QI da policia do RJ) esta localizada no nosso bairro, assim como uma delegacia de policia.

name: Light filled Williamsburg Apartment
summary: Your own private beautiful apartment in Williamsburg Brooklyn, bordering Greenpoint and Bushwick. Beautifully decorated artists home! Cotton sheets and down comforters... We only have completely happy 100% positive reviews for a reason, you will love it here.
space: APARTMENT: You will be staying in a sunny private one bedroom apartment, 2nd floor rear of building off of Metropolitan Ave. Perfect for a single or a couple or close friends, kids are accepted (but you wouldn't want to stay here with more than one child, since the bedroom and bathroom have the only doors in the apartment).   Apartment featuring all original wood floors and molding and Pre-war building details. Many beautiful house plants. Mid century modern wood furniture and beautiful antique style.  Bedroom has very comfortable queens sized bed. Bed has all cotton sheets and down comforter (or lighter cotton comforter in summer) and down pillows.  Windows illuminating every room. Fully furnished with all basic amenities & a well stocked Kitchen great for those who love to cook. Wireless internet and utilities included. Air conditioner in bedroom and fans available to cool the other rooms in summer. Projector in living room with sound system to hook your computer to, to watch TV. TON

neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg is well known as the most hip Brooklyn neighborhood. There are breweries, bowling, music venues, tons or bars restaurants, vintage stores and many local markets and food shops with gourmet specialties.
transit: The L train, graham ave stop, is located within a 5 minute walk from the apartment. The train is a 15 minute commute to Union Square, central Manhattan.
access: Full apartment and court yard outside.
interaction: My wife and I are available as needed. We will be upstate but easily reachable by phone and email. We have a reliable person who will handle any necessary in person interactions. We communicate thoroughly prior to your trip and then generally leave you be, unless you have questions.
house_rules: Please water the plants if anyone looks sad. No smoking indoors. No pets.  Please be respectful of our neighbors.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
My Wife and I are both artists and college professors. My primary medium is photography but I also am a writer and performer. I have lived in NY for nearly 20 years and I relish the moments when I can get away from the frenzy. 

I am not on any social media because I am pretty old fashioned. I still call people on the phone. 

My wife and I have been together for 11 years and are both quiet respectful and clean. We are very self sufficient and more then anything love to cook and enjoy a glass of wine. 

We keep an immaculate apartment with only the most beautiful objects and furniture we can find. We have an amazing art book collection and welcome our guests to enjoy them while they stay.

reviews.comments:
L'appartement de Katie et Aisha est tout simplement charmant! On s'y sent bien, on s'y sent chez soi. De la lumière partout, un lit confortable, une petite cuisine toute équipée, bref, un bel endroit où commencer ses journées avant de partir à la découverte de la métropole new yorkaise. D'ailleurs, l'appartement se trouve à quelques pas seulement d'une station de métro. Très pratique! Et puis, les environs sont à découvrir si vous aimez les petites places sympathiques (et les micro-brasseries!)

Katherine est une hôte accueillante, ouverte et attentive. Elle a à coeur que ses invités soient bien et que leur séjour soit agréable. Tout s'est fait naturellement et simplement.  

Enfin, je vous le dis, allez-y les yeux fermés!

We had a great experience staying in Katherine's apartment in Williamsburg. We never met her and her partner in person because they were travelling while we rented the apartment, but they were very thorough in giving us all the information we needed beforehand, plus lots of extra tips for things to do in the area. The apartment itself is lovely, an ideal size for one person or a couple to stay, though we were able to fit a third person on a blow-up mattress in the living room without it feeling too crowded. Friendly neighbours, great cooking facilities, internet, etc. - we felt at home. Great location too, within an easy walking distance from a lot of the most fun parts of Brooklyn, and a quick ride on the L train into the heart of Manhattan. Next time I'm in New York I'll definitely be checking to see if the apartment is free again!

I had a wonderful stay at Katherine's apartment. The place is very spacious and quiet, and the bed is incredibly comfortable. No noisy neighbors or street traffic, and the apartment is very close to some great restaurants, bars and coffee shops. Katherine was an excellent host and made the key drop-off hassle free. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone looking to spend a few days in the New York or Brooklyn area.

Katie's apartment was perfect for our 5 night stay in Brooklyn.

It is located right in the middle of many great bars, restaurants, flea markets and boutiques in East Williamsburg.

We loved every minute of our stay, and being able to use Katie's great apartment made things even better. The place was very clean, with everything you could ask for and communication with Katie was great when finalising details.

Many thanks Katie

Katherine's apartment was just what we needed for our guest's visit. The huge wall of books and artwork together created quite the artistic ambience - definitely a lot to look at it. Loved the crazy plants too! To me it seemed like a typical Williamsburg apartment. I'd definitely recommend the place to any art or book lover.

We had a great stay at Katie's apartment. She was super easy to coordinate with before we arrived. The apartment was lovely - great interior design taste which really shows off their personalities while still minimal. The bed was really comfortable, and there was a huge wall of books in the living room, which unfortunately we didn't have any time to read. We would like to stay there again!

My parents stayed in Katie's home for a week and raved about the incredibly comfortable mattress, beautiful neighborhood, and stylish decor. I appreciated the thorough house instructions, timely communication, and easy check in/out process. The apartment was immaculate, well-stocked, and thoughtfully arranged for guests. Thanks for the wonderful space and amazing experience! I will definitely be thinking of this apartment the next time I have friends or family come into town.

host.host_about: I live in Istanbul.I have been working upon tourism for six years.I like to visiting other countries which has historical backgrounds. This is the reason behind living in Istanbul. Also I have been to many places in Europe such as London, Italy, Serbian, Croatia, Austria. I like to discovering new places in the world, particularly on the top of nice places for accomodation.

reviews.comments:
Apartments are very very nice! When we've came in the midnight the staff met us and offer us to move to another house, which is absolutely new. We were very surprised when we've entered the room. It was very big and looked almost the same as on photos with king size bed, air condition, small kitchen, dining table, sofa and chairs. Location is another great value of this place because apartments are located from 1 km from ferrys to east side of Istanbul and from 500m (uphill) to the bar street. And staff was very nice and friendly!

In short I'm strongly recommend this place to stay!

Bugra was an awesome host.

Some of the things that made this a perfect place to stay.
1. 24/7 concierge
2. Two blocks from the Galata tower,  istiklal Avenue, and Galata walking bridge.
3. The rooms were clean and the space was adequate.
4. There was a nice little family owned grocery store right across from the apartments to get anything you may need.
5. Much cheaper that a hotel.
6. A taxi only cost 52.38 TL from the airport to the apartment.
7. A shuttle back to the airport is $55 TL

After doing lots of research, this place turned out to be the best place to stay. I would recommend this place to anyone and would stay there again.

We can recommend staying at Palin Suites to everybody who plans to come to Istanbul. Not only is the location ideal for discovering the city but also the hosts who take care will be there for your every need (advice, additional amenities for the rooms, luggage storage, food suggestions, taxi arrangements). They always greet you with a smile and go out of their way to fulfil all requirements. There is a bakery just around the corner and a daily needs shop just opposite the house - very convenient. 
We would definetely stay there again - thanks Palin Suites Team!!
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The location near the galata tower was great. All the other historical monuments are not far.
I recommand the place to any airbnb guests. The place was clean and looks like the pictures.

This is the second time I stay at this place. It's clean and and the area is nearby many attractions, in addition, it's located close to Topehane tram station. There is a grocery store in front of the building and a cafe downstairs for a good Turkish breakfast. The only thing I believe is missing is a washing machine in the building.
I enjoyed my stay at this place. Apartments are clean. The location is good.  Staff is friendly. So I recommend this place.

It is a really nice, hotel-like apartment. I was stuck in Turkey for a few days due to flight changes, and I first stayed in a local five-star hotel provided by the airline company. It turned out that this apartment is even better than the hotel, with similar facilities and a more cozy atmosphere. The location is very good, and the host is very helpful. This is probably my best Airbnb experience.

Very nice too room apartment close to the Galata Tower and the tram to go to the Bue Mosque and the Palace. 
With the lady in the building, it was very easy to get the keys and our beds were done everyday! Moreover, though we never saw Bugra, he was always reachable and the phone.
Çok rahat bir yer tavsiye ederim..
very good location and good serivice
下车很快就找到地方了｡位置很好,走着去Galata和独立大街都很方便｡附近也有很多餐馆和小超市｡去电车站地铁站都可以走过去｡房间也很干净,打扫也及时｡前台工作人员的态度也很好｡性价比较高,极力推荐｡
相应的服务还是挺周全的

name: Oceanside in Poipu on South Shore
summary: Our condo has unobstructed ocean views through Prince Kuhio memorial Park located on the sunny south shore of Poipu Beach for best snorkeling, surfing, and sunsets! The beach is so close you can hear the ocean waves at night while you sleep!
space: Our condo is very nicely furnished, has beautiful views from large windows in the living room of garden and pool and awesome views of ocean, park, and mountains from wall-to-wall windows in the back.  You can hear, see, and walk to a nice beach from the condo.
description: Our condo has unobstructed ocean views through Prince Kuhio memorial Park located on the sunny south shore of Poipu Beach for best snorkeling, surfing, and sunsets! The beach is so close you can hear the ocean waves at night while you sleep! Our condo is very nicely furnished, has beautiful views from large windows in the living room of garden and pool and awesome views of ocean, park, and mountains from wall-to-wall windows in the back.  You can hear, see, and walk to a nice beach from the condo. Free parking, free phone, free cable TV, free high speed internet, pool, BBQ, laundry room and great beaches out front. We are available by email and phone at all times. Beautiful walks up to the harbor, spouting horn, and the botanical tropical garden where they filmed Jurassic Park.  Or go the other way along the beach up to Poipu Beach Park.  Or walk short distance up to the Shopping Center with great shops and restaurants.  But you must spend time at the beautiful beaches right out front!
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful walks up to the harbor, spouting horn, and the botanical tropical garden where they filmed Jurassic Park.  Or go the other way along the beach up to Poipu Beach Park.  Or walk short distance up to the Shopping Center with great shops and restaurants.  But you must spend time at the beautiful beaches right out front!
transit: In Kauai we recommend renting a car to see everything.  Kauai is still fairly rural by comparison to the other islands.
access: Free parking, free phone, free cable TV, free high speed internet, pool, BBQ, laundry room and great beaches out front.
interaction: We are available by email and phone at all times.

host.host_about: I am retired from Bell Laboratories as Software Engineer and Dorinda is a retired Electrical Engineer.  We love spending time in Kauai in the winter and Colorado in the Summer splitting our time between the two locations.  We bought our first condo in Kauai in 1999 and our second condo in 2005. We enjoy the hiking, water sports, music events and markets on Kauai but most of all we like the people and enjoy meeting up here with our friends.

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 110 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Communication was perfect, Instructions clear and the appartment was very clean when we got there. Neighborhood is fine and there is a great choice of restaurants and shops in walking distance. We enjoyed a perfect stay.
Place was very clean!  Quiet, and get that nice Ocean Breeze while you sleep!  Jack was very nice when I met him while I was checking in.  Place was as described and I had zero issues. Thanks!

This place was so great. The balcony was such a nice element to the condo and was great for sunrises. It was convenient to walk to many dinner locations and a very short walk to Lawai beach. We had a great time. Thanks Jack and Dorinda!

This was the perfect place to stay for our week on Kauai.
The apartment itself is lovely. Great views, well appointed and very well designed. Particularly liked the vents front and back which allow a lovely cooling flow of air.
The area is great. Good snorkel beach right across the road at Beach House. The shopping/restaurant complex at the end of the road has excellent places to eat and is an easy 10-15 minute walk if you wish to indulge in a cocktail or 2
Great place. Super nice hosts. Exactly as pictures. Comfortable bed.

Jack and Dorinda's place was great, very clean and cozy, just as the pictures showed. Great location, close to stores and beaches, and a great location to explore Kauai. I would definitely stay here again.

Best,

RZ

We loved our stay at Jack and Dorinda's condo. It's absolutely beautiful and is very conveniently located. We loved the trade winds breeze that flowed through the condo from the shutters at either end. We also loved listening to the Hawaiian music CDs as well, was a lovely touch. We felt so at home and definitely recommend a stay at Jack and Dorinda's condo.

Heading to Kauai was a last minute detour from Oahu and we lucked out with this place. Not only was it the right price for our budget but we loved the privacy, location, and convenience. If we weren't out and about, we were on the balcony enjoying the ocean view, Hawaiian breeze, and relishing the sun over a glass of wine. It was wonderful to have a functioning kitchen and goodies in the closet to take the beach. The general market was only a short drive away... We didn't even hit the pool because the beach was literally that close. But, note if you are looking for a beach to layout at - you might struggle as this is more a jump in over the rocks and snorkel. Only a small patch of sand. Otherwise within a few minutes drive you are at sandy beaches! Overall it was a wonderful experience! We would book again with Jack and Dorinda - no hesitation. Aloha!

Jack and Dorinda's condo is equipped with the basics and fabulous for a single or 2 people.  The location in Poipu is AWESOME and easy to find. The walk to the beach is less than 5 minutes, walk to restaurants, shops and convenience store (Long Drug) is 10-15 mins. My fiancee and I enjoyed eating breakfast on the lanai every morning watching the wild chickens in the park. I highly recommend Jack and Dorinda's place for the price!

An amazing place on an amazing island. We immediately felt like home. The flat has an perfectly equipped kitchen and an awesome ocean view balcony. The beach is just a few meters away. Highly recommended!

Location was great to nearby snorkeling, beach and restaurants, could not have been better!  It was very windy and a bit noisy with the patio door open due to the crashing waves and wind so if you have a hard time sleeping, I'd suggest keeping the door shut.  We didn't spend much time in the apartment but it seemed fully equipped and it was nice to have beach towels to use.  Thank you.

Great place - very clean, nice pool. We didn't use the BBQ area but other guests did. Beach equipment is a bonus as we're the beach towels. The apartment was fully equipped with everything you could need for eating in. Great location for the south coast with the beach house a great spot for sunsets and dinner just across the street.

Jack and Dorinda's place was well-equipped with anything you would need to cook at home, enjoy the pool, or go out to the beach.  Their condo was so comfortable, neat, homey, and in a great location.  Jack and Dorinda are truly gracious hosts.  We had a great time.  Hope to be back soon!
Nice flat, not really facing the ocean as it could look like in some of the pictures
Everything about the place was exactly how it was communicated by Jack and Dorinda. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends and family!
Perfect stay in a beautiful place directly to Poipu Beach.
A nice place to stay that is very well equipped with beach chairs, cooler, towels, etc to explore Kauai. Overall very clean, nice sized unit for 2 people. Quiet and relaxing

Great place for a couple to stay. Location is fantastic with beach across the street for snorkeling and centrally located in south side of island for site seeing. Fully equipped kitchen and beach supplies were very helpful.
Easy access, well-stocked condo. On sunny south side, so weather was great. An easy and relaxing place to stay.

Es hat uns gut gefallen. Die Wohnung befindet sich in einer schön gepflegten Grünanlage. Der Check-In hat gut funktioniert. Die Wohnung ist gross und hat eine gute Küchenausstattung. Super waren die Beachsstühle, der Sonnenschirm und die Kühltasche. Einige Sehenswürdigkeiten und ein paar schöne Strände sind mit dem Auto in kürze erreichbar. Wir würden uns wieder für diese Unterkunft entscheiden.

Beautiful location and very roomy accommodations. My husband an I were so comfortable an we were impressed with the spacious unit.  This location is close to the best snorkeling in the island. We went all over the island searching for snorkeling spots and  the best one is 5 minutes walk from your room.  Hope to visit again!
Good location. The style was Golden Girls Hawaii meets college dorm. Appreciated the mixed CD and clean kitchen and comfy living room space.
