neighborhood_overview: El Raval is a  neighbourhood in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Spain. The area, especially the part closest to the port, was also informally known as Barri Xinès or Barrio Chino, meaning "Chinatown". El Raval is one of the two historical neighborhoods that border La Rambla, the other being the Barri Gòtic, and contains some 50,000 people. An area historically infamous for its nightlife and cabarets, as well as prostitution and crime, El Raval has changed significantly in recent years and due to its central location has become a minor attraction of Barcelona. It is home to many bars, restaurants, and night spots.
notes: You will deliver the keys to the property, you have to be careful not to lose them, otherwise you have to pay ten euros per key.
transit: Drassanes (L3) Liceu (L3) Paral·lel (L2, L3) Sant Antoni (L2) are five and ten minutes from home.
access: You can make use of the kitchen, courtyard, dining room and bathroom, no problem, leaving the place clean and tidy. My idea is to make you feel at home, my house is your house. The relationship must be based on trust.
interaction: Once the reservation is made I will give you all the information so you can get accommodation without any problem. During the stay do not hesitate to communicate any point where you're not satisfied, I will do my best to improve it. I'll give you the best choices of places to go to eat economically. I will be at your disposal.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed inside the house, if you need to do it you will have to go to our garden. The apartment is located in a residential area,do not make noise after ten o'clock. The bathroom is adapted for people with disabilities, two people can shower together in the case of couples, when the lights are on means you can not enter. It is not allowed to eat on beds, please do it on tables. close the aircoinditioner when leaving the room. the keys will be given in your check in if lost you will have to pay ten euros per key. Most importantly, have good behavior with neighbors, as indicated not disturb the set times.

host.host_about: Soy un chico sociable, agradable y con don de gentes.

reviews.comments: Alexis is nice and easy-going. Everything was okay, but be aware, that room without window.

Alexis is the best host: laid back, yet attentive to details. The room is clean, with everything you may need for a comfortable living. Bathroom and kitchen are the most fancy I ever been to in BCN. Location is great.
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Séjour s'est très bien passé.
Points positifs : emplacement, calme, Alexis arrangeant et flexible sur les horaires (check in, check out).
Points négatifs : pas de fenêtre.

We had a nice stay with Alexis he and his housemate. They were friendly.  A nice clean place in a convenient location in Barcelona, however, it is an area that you need to be careful as someone tried to pickpocket us in a nearby square - in broad daylight. But this is what Barcelona is known for these days. The aircon was certainly appreciated. All in all a nice stay.
Good)

Alexis and his roommate were friendly and the bed was good.
I had a great time.

Alexis is very open person. Although he speaks only few words in English he makes you feel very welcome.
Area is a little bit scary at first, but you get used to it. I didn't find it dangerous at all.
Flat is small (one room is even without windows) but everything is clean and quite modern (espiecially bathroom and kitchen). AC is working.
The only problem we had was noise from the pipes but Alexis propably fixed that already.

As wheelchair-user: I was able to sleep in the flat but there is one big step at the front door where I needed help of my brother. Since all the beds are upstairs Alexis let me sleep in the living room/kitchen on the camp bed. The problem was that my head was beside the fridge that makes a lot of noise but I somehow managed. Everything else was great. I can totally recommend.

Alexis is very helpful. Everything is clean and tidy. He really treated us like we are family. The location is great, close to the old city with many restaurants nearby. At night, it's very quiet so we had good sleep.

그는 매우 친절한 호스트이다.
그의 집은 람블라스거리 근처에 위치하여 있으며
주요 관광지나 해변에 걸어서 다니기 좋다.
전체적으로 집은 깔끔하고
방도 에어컨이 있어서 시원하게 지내기에 정말 좋았었다.

Nice small room with air conditioning. The handy location in the downtown - close to the main attractions.
The friendly owner of Alexis.
A great option to stay for a few nights.
My first AirBnb experience with Alexi. Would recommend, extremely welcoming and helpfull. Good bloke.
Great location and Alexis was very friendly!

We spent 7 nights in Barcelona. Alexis is friendly and positive person, with good sense of humor. He is always ready to help, give an advice or just talk. We had no conflicts. The house is situated in the center of the сity, in a very picturesque and peculiar district, which narrow streets make a romantic atmosphere. There are a lot of stores and snack-bars in the neighbourhood. The location is very convenient. It is near merto and it is easy to get to any point of the city. It takes a few minutes to walk to La Rambla. The flat is good and modern. We could spend time in our room or in the dining room. There are 2 funny cats in the flat! There is a nice cozy yard with benches... In one word, we had a great time!
The house is in a perfect location for Barcelona, about 5-10 mins walk from las ramblas. Alexis was extremely helpful and a fantastic host. I would highly recommend staying with him to anyone

El alojamiento estaba muy centrico, la habitacion muy limpia y despejada y el aire acondicionado funciono perfecto no notamos para nada calor o incomodidad al dormir. Conseguimos muy buen precio y el trato fue impecable, alexis estuvo muy atento e incluso nos prestó una sombrilla para la playa, es un anfitrión genial y una persona muy abierta, comunicativa y dispuesta a hacer de la estancia en barcelona una agradable experiencia.

알렉시스는 정말 최고의 호스트였습니다. 물론 그의 메이트도 최고였어요. 그들은 우리에게 오믈렛과 후식들을 대접했고 스페인에서 먹어본 최고의 맛이였습니다. 숙소 주변이 조금 무서운 환경인것같지만 깨끗하고 친절한 호스트덕에 바르셀로나를 잘 보냈네요! 친구집에 온 느낌이였고 가격도 저렴해서 추천하지 않을수 없습니다.
개인방 잠금장치와 화장실 잠금장치는 없지만 크게 불편한것 없이 잘 지냈네요!

Alexis es muy profesional a la hora de alquilar su habitación. Además es muy agradable y siempre esta dispuesto a ayudarte con información turística y lo que necesites. En mi caso particular sólo estuvimos una noche y la experiencia fue muy agradable!

Алексис - отличный хозяин, очень дружелюбный. 
Мы провели в его доме один день - было здорово. Комната чистенькая, уютная, мягкая кровать, здоровенная подуха и полотенца, кондиционер работал как надо. 
Только вот посреди ночи нас заставил подпрыгнуть какой-то жуткий звук откуда-то рядом со стеной. Он длился несколько секунд и дико нас напугал. Не знаю, что это было =)
А так, в целом, воспоминания у нас остались очень хорошие. Алексис с радостью показал нам куда сходить пошопиться и был готов отвечать на все наши вопросы. 
А еще в доме живет котейка, который очень любит лежать на коленках и балдеет, когда его гладят! =D

We had a great weekend in Barcelona staying at Alexis, he was very friendly, helpful and flexible. The appartment is in the middle of everything, quiet with the presence of a few happy cats. The air conditionning was also a real nice touch in this hot Catalan summer.
Thanks Alexis!
알렉시스와 클라우디우스는 아주좋은 호스트였다. 숙소위치도 바르셀로나에서 여행다니기에 최고의 위치였다. 떠나는날 소매치기를 만나서 조금 찜찜하기는했지만 그와 그의 메이트는 우리를 최대한 친절히 대해주었다. 바르셀로나에 다시온다면 그의집에서 다시 있고싶다.

Highly recommended host!!
Alexis was a great host and made me feel very welcome in his house. The room matches the description with air conditioning which came in very handy during the hot and humid times. The house itself is very clean and tidy. He is very helpful when it comes to help with getting around Barcelona and suggestions of sites to see. 

Thank you very much for a pleasant stay Alexis !!
Nice place to stay. The apartment matched the description and photos and Alexis was very welcoming. Very central however the area is still up and coming with some cheap great cheap places to eat.
Nos gusta mucho quedar con Alexis. La casa esta muy limpia, buen arreglada y muy cerca a La Rambla. Fue una Buena experiencia quedar en su casa y lo recomendamos a otros!

I would like to reccomend Alexis as a host. He is so kind and helpful. The room is comfortable and everything is so clean. He let us to use everything in his home. The neighbourhood is safe and very well situated. 

p.s. Alexis is a very good cook :)

See you again Alexis:)

Alexis is such a lovely host who take extra care of guest. He is always smiling and was very helpful. He allowed us to keep our luggage at 7.30 am. Room was having AC which was good for barcelona climate. Location is really great right in happening market place & close to parallel station. Some decoration and painting is recommended in room. There are 2 lovely cats in the house. I would recommend this place to guest.

Alexis is very kind host. He was available all the time. Nevertheless he is not good with English he is very helpful. The neighborhood is well placed, full with different people. We enjoy our stay. :)

Our stay with Alexis is great. Alexis is a very nice guy , We arrievd at mid night and he welcome us really friendly.The flat is clean,the location is also great. Near to the metro and La Rambla .We would highly recommend staying at his flat if you are ever in Barcelona.
Un très bon séjour chez Alexis, un hôte agréable et très arrangeant !

Alexis made us feel welcome and he often stated that this was our house and for us to feel at home.  He was eager to help us with directions, sight seeing and restaurants. The apartment was as described and the individually controlled temperature in our room was a bonus. The neighborhood was good, 5 minute walk to the metro, 10 minute walk to Las Ramblas and to the port.  We would definitely stay with Alexis again, it was a great experience!

Alexis was really nice and polite. The apartment is central and in an interesting area full of bars, nice cafés and shops. 

But I have to add, that the room was quite dirty. Especially, the bedding seems to be not washed. 

Nevertheless, the room was furnished with the most  important stuff, the location is great and the room is cheap.

It was the one of the cleanest place I ever visited.   The hosts were helpful. They tried to help much as possible. The room was not huge but manageable.  The neighbor was not what I expected but they were fine. I did not have any problem. It was an interesting mixture of cultures. I would recommend to all except those who expects America hot long showers. You need to take a short shower

Para ser la primera vez que hacemos esto nos salió genial. Alexis nos hizo sentir como en casa en todo momento, un anfitrión perfecto. Hemos cocinado cuando quisimos, no tuvimos ningún problema. La casa esta en el Raval, donde hay muchos bares y está muy bien situada. Gracias por esta semana! Y no hace falta decir que ya tenemos casa en Barcelona. :)
Great location, close to the Rambla street. Thanks Alexis for being nice and helpful for any questions we had. The room and bathroom were clean.

Nous avons loué la chambre chez Alexis pour 3 nuits. 
Son appartement sur 2 niveaux est idéalement situé dans la vieille ville,  à 7-8 minutes à pied de La Rambla et de l'animation légendaire de Barcelone. 
L'accueil fut chaleureux malgré la barrière de la langue. Mais Alexis est un hôte prévoyant: " (Hidden by Airbnb) translation"!!! :)
L'appartement est confortable, propre et au calme. 
La climatisation dans la chambre est définitivement un plus.
Alexis a été très sympa et nous a donné de précieux conseils pour les déplacements et les lieux à visiter. Et tout ça avec le sourire...
Muchas Gracias Alexis! ;o)

우리가 어디서 어떻게 오는지 미리 파악하여 숙소까지 오는 방법을 정말 자세하게 알려주었고 숙소를 찾는대는 전혀 문제가 없었다. 방과 화장실에 잠금장치는 없지만 안전하게 생활할 수 있었다. 숙소 주변은 조금 위험해보이지만 위험한 일이 없었고 불편함은 없었다. Alexis는 매우 친절했고 우리의 요청을 최대한 들어주려했다. 대화가  원할하게 이루어지기 위해 노력했고 숙소에서 관광지까지 교통수단은 풀편함이없었다.
Alexis is a nice host. His flat is very central and he made everything to make us feel confortable.

It was a really great time at alexis' flat. 
He and Claudia where really helpful to give us some tips to go out or to eat typical Spain tapas. 
The room was okay, it was not that kind of huge, but clean! And never mind you stay there only for the night ;-) you can feel like you are home: you can use the kitchen for cooking or making breakfast. 
Alexis made everything to make us feel comfortable! 
The flat is very central, you just need a 10 minutes walk to the la rambla street and although the metro station is 3 minutes away . 
Thank you very much for a pleasant stay Alexis!

Alexis is one of the most welcoming spanish people I have met. The room was comfortable and cosey (Website hidden by Airbnb) Alexis nos hizo sentir en casa. Cuando tuvimos que esperar el taxi que llegaba a las 1 am el no tuvo inconveniente. Gracias alexis

From the minute we arrived, Alexis was so accommodating & made us feel immediately at home. He was more than happy to give advice & help us out with anything, whenever we needed it. The room was cozy & quiet ~ the location was close-in to most everything. We walked nearly everywhere we went. We are so glad we got to stay at Alexis' place ~ he is a wonderful host who made our first week in Barcelona comfortable & we couldn't have asked for more from him! Thank you so much for everything, Alexis! :)

Alexis and his housemate were wonderful, friendly and hospitable hosts. They made us feel completely at home in our short stay, giving their time and patience to make recommendations and suggestions for our visit. We couldn’t ask for more courteous and lovely people to stay with! 

The apartment was lovely and very homely, and the room was well priced, clean and comfortable; it also has very quick wifi. The bathroom is modern, and extra towels and bedding were provided by Alexis. It is in a wonderful location in El Raval, only 5-10 minutes from La Rambla and the nearest metro station. Also, there is a lovely bakery on the same street. 

We also loved Alexis’ cats, who made the trip extra happy. Also the restaurant Cera23, only a 3 minute walk away, was delicious and super friendly. 

All round, we’ve had the best holiday, and were made to feel very at ease in a new environment! Thank you for your superb hospitality and warmth.

Alexis est un hôte très avenant qui aiment que les voyageurs se sentent au maximum à l'aise. La chambre est fidèle a la description, c'est vrai que c'est dommage qu'il n'y ai pas de fenêtre mais après tout, dans une ville comme Barcelone l'intérêt n'est pas de rester enfermé toute la journée !
Les sanitaires sont très propres.

This was my first Airbnb experience and it was great! Alex is an awesome host, he really made us feel at home. The location is just perfect and the house is very clean. The room is quiet and the bed comfortable. Would go back there again! :)
Alexis es un excelente Host. Muy atento y von muchas buenas recomendaciones para nuestra estadía en Barcelona!
Alexis is really friendly and helpful. Very funny and can give great advice on the most cool places ;). Very convenient location, you can go comfortably walk to the Rambla.
Alexis is a great host. He provides information since the Day one and helped us on everything. We recommend!! :)
Alexis was so lind and helpful. The room was very pleasant and clean. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
Alexis a été très serviable et flexible sur l'heure d'arrivée et de départ. L'appartement est très bien situé et propre.  Il manquerait juste une fenêtre à la chambre. Merci Alexis.

Mooie locatie in El Raval. Zeer welkom gevoeld en Alexis is zeer behulpzaam. Bed sliep heerlijk en is geschikt voor langere mensen. Huis is keurig schoon geweest de gehele week dat wij hier verbleven.
Nice guy! Very friendly.  The room was quiet small. But stayed there for one night so it's fine. Very hot. But had air con. It's alright, should be cheaper.

Alexis is a nice host, ready to help with information and directions at any time. He were so helpful, I'm not good with directions and he spent some time explaining and also making an easy map to me. He also let us do the check in before the time and welcomed us with coffee. 

The apartment has some positive and negative points.

Positive: it's clean and well equipped, a walk distance to La Hambla, metro station, supermarkets and restaurants. I like to walk so I didn't need to use the public transportation for most things. 

Negative: I didn't like the neighborhood (got used to it in the second day tho), the room is musty, and there was a smoke odor. I'm a kind of person who avoids using AC, but it was necessary. The bathroom is the big problem to me because you can see through it and that made me feel so uncomfortable that I had to avoid using it as much as I could. 

In general I had a great experience.
Hosts were very kind and helpful in providing suggestions on most fancy trips around the city.  We also spent some time toghether chatting about our countries.

חדר בתוך דירה בשכונה מעניינת. הדירה שקטה. אלכסיס מארח נפלא דואג לתת פרטים על כל דבר ומנסה לעזור ככול הניתן. המקום נקי ומסודר. יש מזגן והמיטה די נוחה. קרוב מאוד למרכז. 2 דקות הליכה משוק סנט אנטוני. 10 דקות הליכה מהרמבלס ושוק בוקרייה.הארוח זול ושווה את ההשקעה.

Alexis est un hôte très accueillant et serviable. Habiter chez lui pendant notre séjour a été très agréable. Le logement correspond bien aux informations données dans l'annonce et sa situation est parfaite pour visiter Barcelone. Muchas Gracias !

Alexis è un padrone di casa molto disponibile. Ci ha accolti con un caffè e fatto vedere la casa. Ci ha dato buone indicazioni su dove mangiare, e ci ha permesso di lasciare le valigie anche oltre il Check out. 
La casa è in una posizione ottimale per visitare la città. A tre minuti a piedi dalla fermata parlal.lel e a due passi dalla Rambla. Camera e bagno erano puliti ed ordinati.
Unico neo il quartiere che non era proprio come ce lo aspettavamo. Ma la nostra esperienza è stata sicuramente positiva. 
Host consigliato.

Alexis was a wonderful and helpful host, who kindly shared some fantastic advice on tapas restaurants and local sights.
Alexis's place is in a fantastic location, close to supermarkets, restaurants and easy walking distance to the metro stations. The apartment was clean and tidy, with a great kitchen and large bathroom.
The bedroom was well furnished and the bed was comfortable. However we found the room quite musty and airless, with only a small window opening to the staircase which had no air flow. The airconditioning was useful for keeping the room cool but otherwise it was a little unpleasant. We also found the bathroom a little uncomfortable to use as the walls are predominantly textured glass and highly see-through, making it awkward to use when others were in the kitchen or living area, despite Alexis's assurance that you couldn't see through it.
Overall, though, we are very grateful for Alexis's kind hospitality and enjoyed staying in such a fantastic location in Barcelona.

The room and apartment were both really nice, Alexis was so friendly and helpful and the area was in a great location, not far from any of the main sights or the beach. 
Thanks a lot!

Stayed here for four nights and it was a good experience.
The room was tidy and clean and the air conditioner worked well.
The location is great with only a few minutes walk from the metro station and la Rambla. Good restaurants nearby so u can find them at anytime. 
Alexis is good that he is responsive to my questions throughout the trip. He even tried to provide me medicine for my sickness. 
Recommend it if u consider to stay at Barcelona.

Alexis es un muy buen anfitrión, siempre al pendiente de sus visitas, dispuesto a ayudar con cualquier duda que surga acerca de Barcelona y hasta te ayuda a planear tu día para usar mejor tu tiempo y dinero. Excelente opción para pasar unos días en Barcelona, una ubicación perfectamente comunicada con todo y aunque el espacio es muy pequeño no te hace falta nada.


Alexis is a very good host, always aware of his visits, ready to help with any questions you have about Barcelona and even helps you to plan your day to best use your time and money. Excellent choice for a few days in Barcelona, a location perfectly connected to all the interesting sites, and although space is very small you do not need anything more.
Alexis was a very good host. He had a lot of good recommendations for our visit to Barcelona and was very accommodating.

Alexis is a great host. He was very responsive before arrival and made sure we wouldn't have any difficulties when finding his place (even sent pictures of the way that we had to go from metro stop to his place). The apartment in general is really cosy and the conditioner in the room was a huge bonus. Even though the fact that the room does not have windows seemed to be a turn off at first, it ensured us a calm night's sleep and isolation from all the noise coming from the street. Alexis himself is very friendly and helpful. Even when he could not explain something in English he used (Hidden by Airbnb) translator so that we would get all the info we needed. His recommendations were very good and useful. As for the location, it's within walking distance from Catalunya square (night bus to airport stops there), las Ramblas and old town in general. I really enjoyed my stay at Alexis place.

Alexis ci ha accolto con un sorriso e offrendoci una birra, ci ha chiesto se avevamo bisogno di qualcosa e poi ci ha consigliato posti in cui andare a mangiare a poco e dove ballere. La zona a pochi minuti dal centro.

The listing was accurate and the building where we stayed was quiet. The A/C worked well and the vanity in the room was a huge plus. Alexis was always willing to show us how to get to all the places we visited like Barceloneta beach and La Sagrada Familia. It was really nice of him to also hold our bags for safekeeping after we had checked out and he even let us borrow an umbrella and mini cooler for the beach which definitely made the beach day even better! We loved Barcelona and were grateful to stay with Alexis.

Alexis is a very organized person. The room is great,comfy and tidy as he promised. 
However, he didn't clearly mentioned that he lives in the house as well, which is not a problem, but I would have liked to have known it before. He has two cats as well.
He is a very warm person, wants to make friends and even go out if you are up to. 
He is still improving his English, so if you don't understand spanish, that might be a problem.
Also, he is absolutely obsessed about with cleanliness, and due to the fact that he lives in the house, he will be constantly advising you to keep your room clean and kitchen, etc, which is a bit uncomfortable. So if you are in a hurry to get to know Barcelona and wants to wash the dishes later, you may have some trouble with him.
The neighbourhood is touristic and bohemian and very close to everything, I do recommend staying there.

we really enjoyed our stay with alexis. it was a very clean apartment and because it was not located on the main street there was no noise at all. Alexis was very helpfull and always had suggestions on where to go.

Alexis was a very welcoming, helpful and thoughtful host (and his cats are really cute too). The room was small but still comfortable (as long as you know how to use the air conditioning) and the rest of the house has everything you need. It is in a fairly central location and is easy to reach by metro and the surrounding area is a safe neighbourhood with many supermarkets, restaurants and bars nearby. We really enjoyed our stay in Barcelona and Alexis helped to make it as easy and comfortable as possible.
Host was nice and offered help and even researched options for places to go one night. The place is ok.

Alexis est vraiment vraiment quelqu'un de génial, la maison est superbe trop proche de la Rambla juste à côté de lui il a des magasins: une superbe boulangerie pas chère, épicerie qui ferme jusqu'à minuit....
La chambre est très propre la salle de bain est superbe et grande la cuisine est vraiment équipée de TOUT.
Pour Alexis c'est quelqu'un d'acceuillant même si vous ne parlez pas Espagnol ou Anglais il essaiera avec tout les moyens de vous expliquer les choses, il est sympa et très gentil, aussi j'ai lu dans les commentaires précédents qu'il avait un problème avec la propreté.... c'est faux il vous mettera le plus à l'aise possible, c'est normal de nettoyer après avoir manger.

Ps: pensez à louer un vélo Barcelone en vélo c'est juste extra, pas loin de la maison il y a un magasin de location de vélo et scooter qui s'appelle "Mattia" pour vraiment pas cher comparant avec les autres.

Soggiorno piacevole, camera pulita ma senza finestra. La casa è situata in una zona abbastanza pericolosa ma centrale.
Abbiamo avuto alcune situazioni alquanto imbarazzanti per l'host e scomode per noi. Preferiamo non citarle per non rovinare la reputazione dell'host stessa. Alexis è comunque stato gentile e disponibile prestandoci anche l'ombrellone e il frighetto i giorni in cui ci siamo recati al mare. Una delle regole che ci ha imposto, però, è quella di non fare casino dopo le 10 di sera. Regola che lui stesso ha infranto più volte durante il nostro soggiorno.

La pasamos muy bien en casa de Alexis. Estuvimos poco días pero fue muy atento todo el tiempo, fue tan lindo que despertó a hacernos un café sabiendo que saliamos a las 5.00am para tomar un vuelo!
Gracias Alexis! Todo lo mejor!
He is really nice!the place is near by metro station and tourist spot!!!My favorite place is the kitchen,and it hlep us some many  things!In a word, it's a really nice place!
Big and clean house with very friendly owner and beautiful cats)

Alexis was very friendly and he gave us many tips about the city..
The house was great, very clean and comfortable..
The room was perfect, clean, comfortable  and the best point was the ar conditioner..
We high recommend Alexis.. and we hope come back here soon..
Thanks for everything

Vinicius and Yasmin.

Alexis is heel vriendelijk en doet erg zijn best je te helpen met je Barcelonatrip. De kamer is niet heel groot en heeft geen buitenramen, dus dat is wel jammer, maar de airco is heel erg fijn! De kamer en het huis zijn in goede staat en goed schoon. Het is 5 minuten lopen naar metrostation Paral.lel, wat fijn was. Met de check-in en check-out was Alexis erg flexibel. Dus goede ervaring gehad!

Alexis was a great host! He sent tons of great information before we even came, and sent exact photos on how to get to his place which made it very easy to find! It's really easy to get to via public transport and in a really awesome location. Alexis and his two cats were very welcoming, and the place was spotless. We had a wonderful stay!

Alexis is a very nice person, his apartment is very well organized, clean. The kitchen provides everything you need for a cooked meal, as well as the bathroom. The neighbourhood is "little bit alternative, not typical" with local shops and restaurants for Spanish, Arab, Indian people but its quite and safe. It is in a walking distance to La Rambla.

The host is very knowledgeable about the area and very helpful. This would make your visit much easier and enjoyable, just like a local guide. 
The room is a great bargain, simple, clean and value for money!
Alexis was very helpful and his place was clean and very cosy. Great location, quiet neighborhood. I would recommend this place if you're visiting Barcelona on the budget !
Wszystko zgodnie z opisem, nie było problemu kiedy mój samolot spóźnił się o 1h. Z mieszkania jest bardzo blisko do centrum, Alexis poleci Wam miejsca gdzie zjeść, gdzie iść na piwko/winko itp.
Alexis is a sweetheart of a guy and I enjoyed my stay immensely. He immediately made me welcome and gave me the lay of the land.
Staying with Alexis was lovely. He was a great host. The neighbourhood was nice, close to the city. Cute cats.

Our stay was great. Nice place close to everything and just minutes from the metro. We felt safe since there are many shops and restaurants around. Alexis is a thorough host who provided detailed information about the place, the neighborhood and directions on how to get to him from the airport. The house had everything we could want. Alexis does what he can to help you out and tries to be accommodating as much as possible. We did had a slight miscommunication regarding cost of use of his printer to print our train tickets but were able to resolve it using (Hidden by Airbnb) translate. 
Overall a great stay, we would do it again in a heartbeat!

Очень понравилось! Алексис очень внимательный и не навязчивый. В доме очень уютно и чисто. Полностью оборудована кухня, современно. Кровать очень удобная. есть возможность выйти сразу в сад. Метро рядом, есть много магазинов и кафе. Центр очень близко. Мы практически все время ходили пешком.

Alexis is a person really helpful and attentive to guests'needs. A friendly host, funny and approachable. He gave us lots of useful tips for restaurants and places to visit. truly exceptional! The house is clean, cozy and with an elegant style: it feels like home. The neighborhood is quaint and not as dangerous as often described. A bit of attention and many beautiful views!
We will be happy to return.

We spend great time in Barcelona and Alexis' place was a perfect accomodation. Close to the city center, close to public transport. The apartment is realy good, modern, well-equipped and his cats are very friendly too. Thank you for everything.
정말 친절하고 숙소 위치도 타파스거리와 가까워서 좋았어요

Nuestra experiencia en Barcelona ha sido inmejorable en gran parte por haber descubierto este hermoso lugare que Alexis nos ha alquilado. La limpieza y la pulcritud del alojamiento, sumado a (Website hidden by Airbnb) de excelente persona nos han hecho sentir en todo momento que estabamos como en casa. 
Estamos realmente agradecidos y felices. Lo recomendamos ya que alli se puede sentir la vida de un barrio multicultural y fascinante muy cerca de todo. Si alguna vez volvieramos a ésta ciudad sin duda iriamos nuevamente a lo de Alex.

 We are very happy and grateful because this has exceeded our expectations.
Alex is an excellent person and friend.
The neighborhood is very homely and located very close to all the important places of the city.
We will definitely return to Alex's house.

Our stay at Alexis' apartment was great. The apartment was clean and our room had everything we needed for our stay. Alexis gave us several advices about sightseeing, bars, supermarkets etc. and was open for a talk everytime.
The location of the apartment is good, about 10-15 min and you are at the "La Rambla". 
The neighbourhood Raval is very multicultural and there is a lot going on. 

I really recommend staying at Alexis' apartment!

The whole experience with Alexis was great even before we came to Barcelona. He sent us exact location and pictures of his house and it was easy to find his place. Alexis was friendly and answered every question we had, suggested places we should go to. He made our stay in Barcelona much easier. His house itself was cozy, extremely clean and just a few minutes walk from the city centre and La Rambla street - simply great. House offers all what travelers needed. Made us feel like at home. Thank you Alexis and best wishes! :)
Had a good time! Thanks!

Alexis treated us like a friendly and comfortable friend. I was impressed by the careful attention to detail for us. It was also nice to see him try to talk. It is very close to the station and well-equipped. If I go on a trip again later, I would like to stay at Alexis home.

Airbnb has many options for Barcelona and I am happy I picked this one. Alexis was a wonderful host. From the beginning he was very clear with directions on how to get to his place. Check in was easy and the place is as described. Would recommend to friends traveling together or solo travelers! There are two friendly cats there as well.
Thank you Alexis for hosting us in Barcelona!  Room was nice and clean. Perfect for two

Alexis was a brilliant host, incredibly warm and welcoming. We arrived very late our first night and he was awake waiting for us and stated from the outset that 'this was our house too' which made it very easy for us to feel comfortable and at home which was lovely. 
The area was buzzy and lively, a nice contrast to the overly busy Ramblas,  which was nice as we saw two seperate sides of Barcelona and felt less like tourists. It was also only a 10-15 minute walk to the Rambla so if you prefer the more touristy areas you are not far at all. 
We would come and go from the house as we pleased and Alexis was very helpful giving tips on tapas bars and museums to go and see. He was very accommodating and even gave us clean fresh towels when we walked through the door one night soaked from the rain. 

Overall a really lovely guy and a really beautiful, modern, lovely house. 
Thank you so much!
Alexis was very helpful and friendly, he made us feel very welcome in his home! The apartment is in a very good location and Alexis gives great tips on where to go!
Alexis is very nice and helpful. He recommended us the best place for tapas and paella :) The place was very clean and we felt at home.

Alexis is a great host, he helps you with al your questions. The location is great and i loved El Raval. The bed  could be beter but what do you expect for this awesome price. It was a nice stay and i would go back next time and also recommand it to my friends.

Initially by seeing the path from metro station to Alexis's place I was worried of safety during the night times. but even we arrived to home by mid night without any issues. It's very well located for all the restaurants and super markets which we found within few mins walk. There are two near by metro stations which connects to all top places in Barcelona. Around 5-7 mins walk from metro stations.
Its Alexis who made our stay very comfortable and took care of us. He helped us in finding nice restaurants, top destinations and on top of everything a nice place to watch Flaminco dance. :)  Thanks for everything Alexis. We hope to meet you again.

Alexis's apartment is well located in Barcelona, close to Las Ramblas and within walking distance of the waterfront and the Arc de Triomphe. It is also close to buses and subways. The room was small, but perfect for our stay. Alexis was very kind and helpful. Thanks Alexis!
Alexis est un hôte très accueillant, a l'écoute toujours de bon conseil, on se sent comme à la maison !! Je reviendrai sans hésitation

Veoma smo zadovoljni smeštajem i domaćinom koji se u svakom trenutku trudio da nam da sve korisne informacije vezane za boravak u Barseloni. Smeštaj je na odličnoj lokaciji tako da se mnogo toga može obići pešice (Gotska četvrt, La Rambla, Trg Katalunja, Raval, itd...), a isto tako je i odlično povezan javnim prevozom sa ostalim delovima grada. Smeštaj je veoma čist i uredan i možda je jedina mana ta što soba u kojoj smo bili smešteni nema prozore, ali kako smo ceo dan bili napolju, to nam nije smetalo. Sve u svemu svaka preporuka za smeštaj kod Alexisa!
The room is in an amazing location in a very central part of Barcelona. It is near numerous restaurants, bars, and 24 hour stores. The room was very comfortable and Alexis was a very amazing host.

He was really nice and approachable - he had no issue with waiting us arrive in the middle of the night. Everything was clean and quiet. He also reccommended some popular places to us since we hadn't been to Barcelona before.
Alexis was very punctual and helpful. He was kind enough to come with me to find parking, on a long drive  from Tarifa

The location of the appartment is great! We felt all the time safe and its very central located. Alexis welcomed us very friendly and tried to help us with any problems or questions we had. The room is clean, quiet, but a little bit humid and for two people in a small room without a window, it was for 4 nights a bit stressfull and to long. But for a short trip we would recommend it.

Alexis was a fantastic host. He went above and beyond of what host duties are. His room was exactly as described and it was in a great lively part of town. I would definitely return back and stay at his home.
The room is the same as the photo shown. It's very cosy, clean and centrally situated. The host is very friendly and helpful. There are two cats in the house and they are very cute!

Alexis is a nice person always available to help us. We arrived late and he took time to welcome us. He gave us good advices about local restaurants/places to visit. We had a good moments in Barcelona. The room was clean, and we have air conditioner. if you just need a place to let your luggages and going out in Barcelona it is perfect.
Lovely, clean room in a very good location. Alexis was very helpful and welcoming to us. Would definitely recommend!

Alexis was very friendly and helpful. He gave us good tips for places to eat, and helped also to find some specific shops. The house was in interesting and very lively neighbourhood on walking distance to a metro station and to the city centre, and it was furnished nicely. There was also another room to let in the same flat.

Le logement est conforme aux photos, très bien situé (proche de deux stations de métro) dans une résidence sécurisée et propre. Alexis est super sympa, il sait conseiller les bons endroits à visiter en fonction des goûts de chacun. Je recommande totalement !
일단 집주인 아저씨가 엄청 친절하고 좋습니다. 맛있는 현지 식당이랑 관광지도 추천해주시고 청소도 빨래도 하고싶은대로 도와주심. 집도 넓고 깔끔해서 좋은데 에어컨도 맘대로 틀고 집주인이랑 같이 지내는데도 별다른 제약없어서 좋았습니다. 위치도 관광지랑 가까워서 놀러다니기 괜찮습니다.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Alexis, appartement nikel et hôte à l'écoute. 
Idéalement situé à 10 min des ramblas
Vous pouvez venir sans hésitation ;)

람브라스 거리중에서도 보케리아 시장과 가까운 편입니다.
대략 10~15분 정도 거리구요 2층에 있는 방이며 얌전한 고양이가 한마리 살고 있습니다.Alexis 와의 연락은 무척 빠르게 이루어 졌으며 집에 있는 시간이많으셔서 
요청 한 부분에 대해 빠르게 처리해줍니다.성인 남자 2명이 이용하기엔 좁은 편이고 
여성분들이나 혼자 이용하기에 적당한 크기입니다.바르셀로나는 어차피 집에 있는시간이 적어 별다른 문제없이 지냈습니다.

The house and room were nice, air-conditioning helped on the hot nights. Communication was very poor however, I understand there was a language barrier but I don't think this excuses the constant emails back and forth and the host consistently asking questions we had just answered. We never met Alexis as he was away and check in was handled by his very nice friend but she wasn't able to give us much information. We were also awoken at 5am on the first night by the hosts drunk (Hidden by Airbnb) and we hadn't been told there would be anyone else in the house so this was a bit alarming.

The location was perfect! Almost all the tourist spots are within walking distance. There are also small supermarket nearby and lots of good restaurants too! Alexis also recommended good restaurants and tours. Rooms is the same as the photo.

Alexis is such a great host! Very nice and accomodating. We had no problem checking in and out. He was very responsive to messages. The air con is a must in the summer time in Barcelona! We had a pleasant 7 nights stay at Alexis' home. He also has 2 very cute cats. Missing them already! By the way, there are plenty of great restaurants in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) favourite ones are Blai9, Cera 23 and Meson David :) also Alexis' reccomendations.

Alexis' appartment was a nice place to stay at for 4 nights. You get what you see from the pictures, and it is definitely recommendable if you just need a place to sleep when coming home after a long day of exploring the city. It is value for money :)

We had the most incredible stay with Alex! His house was so central, and we we're able to walk to the beach, markets, La Rambla, and many other destinations from there. In saying that, once you're on his street it feels very quiet and private- perfect for regenerating. One of the best parts was the rooftop terrace on the 4th floor- the perfect place to put a blanket down and share a bottle of wine/dinner/watch the sun go down away from the hustle and bustle of Barcelona.
We will definitely be booking this place next time we are in town!

We had a wonderful stay in Barcelona! Alexis was a great host and was always willing to provide suggestions for things to do and places to see. He would take the time to show us how to get where we needed to go. The room was just what we needed for a place to rest after a long day of sight seeing. Overall I would definitely recommend staying here!
Alexis i a great host, very friendly, helpful! The house had everything that we need! We have enjoyed our stay in the colourfull Barcelona!
Alexis is a great host

The accommodation was exactly as shown in the picture. Alexis was a great host, always willing to help us with everything and his answers were always very fast. The accommodation is within easy reach of Barcelona's main sights.

Alexis is a very nice and thoughtful host, he helped us with everything, finding locations and transportations to tips on things to do in the city. 
The room is just as described, one bed that's enough for two persons and an air conditioner which saved our lives during the hot days. 
It's located in a pulse full area with mixed nationalities and everyone was kind, you've got near to the metro, bus station, different kind of restaurants and grocery stores and also near to Las Ramblas! I've read about the area before going there and had my prejudice but it was so much better than I've thought, it's a safe area so nothing to worry about. 
Even though there was a language barrier, we managed to organize things and communicate. 
Thank you Alexis for a great, pleasant and edicational stay, we're very happy with the place and you as a host and would definitely recommend you as a host! 
Muchos gracias

Alexis is an amazing host who always cares and supports guests whenever we need help. He shared with us a lot of useful information about places to eat and traveling safely in Barcelona. The location is convinient, just few minutes walking to Gothic Quarters and the nearby metro stations. Hope to see him in the nearest time.

líbila se nám lokalita - v docházkové vzdálenosti od centra, byt byl čistý

nelíbilo - pokoj bez okna, pouze klimatizace - ale nepřijeli jsme do barcelony trávit čas na pokoji, takže na přespání bylo OK :-)

Although Alexis and myself did not speak as much during my stay, I can say he is a very hospitable man and made my stay a pleasant and comfortable one. The apartment is located in El Raval, an area that is full of life, energy and people of mix culture which I found a great place to be staying in. We were only about 15-20 minutes walk from the tourist areas such as La Rambla and the gothic quarter. There are also many cafes and restaurants nearby in the area which made my stay easier. I would recommend Alexis’ place.

Alexis place was wonderful, apartment located in El Raval multicultural area of the city where everyone is living all the time. The apartment itself was clean, had air conditioner wich helped a lot at night time. Alexis provided towels, shampoo, all the main stuff you would need to start off a-day even a cup of coffe. Also helped all the time whit planing the trip or to get to any place in most efficient way. Had 2 nice cats, one of them likes to cuddle so don't hesitate to pet a cat :D. All along everything was as it was written in the Airbnb site. Thanks you Alexis ! :)

Alexis was a very good host even when I did a mistake!!!
I already knew the city super well, I didn't need advises on where and how to go, so I could just chill with Alexis, who is very open for little chats when he is not working! The few times I asked him for tips and advises he was super helpful.

Alexis fue un anfitrión muy amable y atento. La habitación es pequeña y aunque tiene aire acondicionado, le falta ventilación. Está bien ubicada en el Raval a pocas cuadras del metro y la Rambla. El baño tiene paredes de bloques de vidrio difuminado, lo que hace que le falte un poco de intimidad. De todas maneras para nosotros esto no fue un problema. Es una opción accesible para estadías de pocos días.
Unique and beautiful house design with blurred glass toilet walls. Within walking distance to attractions.

Estado todo bien . De casa muy limpito y centro de Barcelona , todo muy cerca .Ademas gatos tambien son muy cariñoso. Dueño de casa es muy majo y abierta a LGBT .

후기가 너무 좋고 가격이 너무 저렴해서 이용하게 됐는데 생각보다 더욱더 집상태는 청결했고 (정말정말 가본곳중에 제일 청결) 바르셀로나 중심에 위치해있어서 어디든 가까워서 좋았다. 집주인 알렉시스가 너무 친절하고 너무 좋았다. 뭐 하나 빠지는거 없이 편하고 저렴하게 머무를수 있어서 좋았다.

今まで泊まったところで一番綺麗だった｡alexisは優しいし､色々情報も教えるし､何1つでも足りなかった｡あと､家は真ん中のﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅに位置していてどこでも近かった｡

Alexis is very kind and his house was very clean . Everything was perfect. If i visit Barcelona again, i will stay there one more time.
The place is very clean and stylish
It was great staying there. Close to everything and safe neighborhood. Alexis is so friendly and kind it was a pleasure !

Staying at Alexis was very pleasant. Apartment very clean, available kitchen with equipment. Very good communication with Alexis. Alexis gave me very detailed tips that will help you get to his apartment without any problems. Five stars :) I recommend

호스트는 친절하고 우리에게 뭐가 필요한지 항상 적극적으로 도와주려고 합니다. 한국인 후기가 많아서 찾아갔는데 전반적으로 괜찮았어요. 키우는 고양이들도 귀엽고 매일 방앞에 찾아와요 ㅠㅠ 너무 사랑스러움. 열쇠로 방문을 잠글 수 있어서 걱정없이 잘 다녔어요. 세탁과 주방 이용을 마음껏 할 수 있었어요. 근데 방이 좀 습해요. 에어컨은 될때도 있고 안될 때도 있더군요.
댠죰은 쥬윙가 쬬큠 위홈해효 먜읠 굥계하고 다뇻오용 라발지구 자체가 댜얭한 인죵드릐 맪고 약걘 쟐솨는 동뇌눈 아뉨. 처음 숙소를 찾을때 힘들었지만 바르셀로나에 도착하면 미리 (Hidden by Airbnb) 을 깔아서 호스트와 연락을 주고 받으며 숙소를 찾아가길 추천합니다.
람블라스거리까지 10분거리고 보케리아시장도 가까워서 걸어다녔어요. 주위에 맛집도 추천해주시고 좋았어요. 저녁엔 이야기도 많이했어요. 댸쒼 발움의 완죤 구뤼뉘꽈 영어쒀둬 쟐 몬알어둘오요.알고붜니 꾸꿀본욕귀 돌뤼도라구욤 수건도 주시고 드라이기나 샴푸같은거 다있으니 편하긴 해오.

Alex is very nice and helpful person. He gave me and my friend a lot of tips what to do in Barcelona. Our flight was at night, but it wasn't problem for him and we could do check-in at 1 am. The room was cleaned and sufficient for 2 people. The localization is great. You can walk to the main street in Barcelona.

+ Zeer net
+ badkamer
+ gastheer
+ tips voor toeristen
- geen raam in kamer
Very central location, great wifi, and very clean apartment! Alexis was a very warm host and I had a wonderful time living here. Gracias!!
Thank you Alexis it was a great time with you
Perfect location in the middle of interesting neighborhood. Very nice host, small room without the window, thin walls but in general good room for that price.

Alex un gran anfitrión, super tranquilo y responsable, está atento a cualquier necesidad. El trato fue inmejorable.
La casa es muy linda y ordenada, además de muy limpia. Está situada a 200 mts. del metro así que todo está a la mano. También se llega a todos lados caminando.
En cuanto al barrio, El Raval, es un poco oscuro de noche y en un primer momento parece peligroso, sin embargo a lo largo de la estancia no nos sucedió nada malo y tampoco vimos que pasara nada.
Por la relación costo-beneficio es un lugar super recomendable y Alex es un tipo que se toma muy enserio su trabajo.
Volveremos.
Gracias Alex!

Le logement d'Alexis est très propre et proche du centre ville (La Rambla, boutiques, restaurants...).
Alexis est un hôte très aimable, à l'écoute et discret. 
Je recommande ce logement pour son calme et sa proximité du centre.

My friend and I had an amazing time at this room in Barcelona! Unfortunately I fell very ill so I had to stay in the room for half of the stay, but Alexis was so sweet to even offer soup, tea and coffee! He tried his best to make us feel very welcome and at home and the cats were so cute as well! We had to check in after midnight which wasn't a problem at all. The room as well as the bathroom were astonishingly clean. It is amazingly central, you can reach everything by walking with plenty of shops, cafes and very cool bars around. Alexis gave us plenty of nice recommendations as well. All in all I couldn't recommend the room enough and I can't wait to come back to proper see the city this time!

We had a great experience at Alexis place. He provided us with everything that we needed and much more. I loved how modern big and clean is the kitchen, as well the bathroom. The beds are comfortable and the place is quiet. As well the host has a friendly and welcoming personality. The cats are amazing as well!

호스트(Alexis)가 친절하여, 지내기 불편함은 없습니다. 위치도 버스나 지하철 이용 또는 람블라스로의 도보 이동은 용이합니다. 두분에 (남자 둘 말고), 빡센 관광 일정이시라면, 가격대비로는 추천합니다. 
It’s recommendable..

В комнате есть стол и шкаф, что очень удобно. Нет окон и если не проветривать через дверь, становится душно. Расположение удобное, пешком можно дойти до центра довольно близко. Внутри дома приятный сад. В квартире чисто и уютно.

Ubicazione perfetta, molto vicino alla Rambla e alla metropolitana. 
In casa con noi c'erano altre due ragazze, ma lo spazio bastava per tutti e non ci sono stati grossi problemi ad utilizzare l'unico bagno.
Alexis è molto disponibile e sempre pronto a dare consigli di ogni genere, molto gentile ed ospitale.

It was very nice to stay at Alexis house.. Everything was great.. Alexis gave us very good information how to arrive at his house. He made us feel like our home.. The room was very nice and cheap for Barcelona's standard. The only disadvantage of the room is that there is no window. Except for that, everything was very nice. Also very close to the main  street la rambla and generally to the centre... Thnx Alexis for the host...

Fue una gran experiencia quedar hospedados en uno de los barrios de Barcelona con más historia.
La habitacion, asi como el departamento, es tal cual como las fotos. Alexis nos dio buenas recomendaciones.
Todo ok.
Clean and in a good location! Good value at all if you don’t mind without window in your (Website hidden by Airbnb) Alexis is really helpful!
Great location and a nice place. Alex gave us a lot of tips and was very helpful.

Alexis place is very nice, and stylish. the room is very nice (and air conditioned!) Alexis is very friendly and helpfull, cares about his guests, and had great recommendations. His english isn't great though, but sometimes we used (Hidden by Airbnb) translate and it worked perfectly. Great place

My wife and I enjoyed staying in Alexis’ home. Alexis was very responsive and gave excellent directions on how to get to his place. Additionally he recommended several places to eat and several things to do. The apartment is located in a perfect spot, all of Barcelona’s top attractions are within walking distance.

Place was really close to La Rambla and other areas. The room was clean and very functional. Cats were extra cute. Alexis was also very kind and let us use his printer and leave our luggage on the check-out day. Would recommend

Bon emplacement, en revanche quartier un peu bizarre, personnes pas très net à notre goût. Logement un peu petit, et surtout pas de fenêtre dans la chambre où on était, seulement la climatisation. Sinon Alexis est accueillant et sympathique, malgré la barrière de la langue.

괜찮았어요. 위치는 지하철에서 10분정도걸으면됩니다. 다만 아랍계사람들이 사는동네라그런지 깨끗하진않아요 6박동안 별일은없었습니다. 장점이자 단점이라면 주인장이 매우 깔끔한성격입니다. 눈치를 주는편임다 방은 창문이없어서답답하나 에어컨이있어시원했구요. 최대단점이라먼 부엌이랑 화장실이같이있어요 다른사람이 뭐먹을때 화장실쓰기불편하고 뭐먹을때 누가 화장실쓰면신경쓰입니다. 요리해먹는건 자유로이해먹을수잇고 빨래도 했습니다. 바다간다고하니까 아이스박스랑 파라솔도빌려주었습니다. 친절하고 괜찮은편입니다. 저렴한가격에추천합니다.
Alexis is a helpful and hospitable host. The house is in a place where is near to la rambla and the metro. Very convenient.

Alexis is a wonderful host! He was incredibly helpful answering all of our questions regarding public transportation, markets to go to, places to visit etc. When we went to the beach he let us use his mini cooler and umbrella! Very sweet and kind man. As for the room and apartment itself, it is in an amazing location. We were able to walk almost everywhere or take the metro/bus. The small streets are filled with different kinds of people which was awesome to be around. Tons of vegan options around! We felt very safe walking around at night. The room has AC which was a life saver with the heat and we were able to use the kitchen with ease. Overall an excellent and very clean place to stay, Alexis is wonderful and also has two cute cats. I would highly recommend to anyone!! Thank you Alexis! :)
Best Airbnb experience ever!

Alexis is an excellent host, the room was really good value, and the room is in a great location in a very safe neighbourhood close to the city centre. Air conditioning was very useful and everything was really clean. Alexis provided us with many great recommendations and we had a great time in Barcelona!
We didn’t encounter any problem at Alexis’ place and everything described was respected. We strongly recommand this room for young and dynamic student couples
Great location! Alexis was kind and helpful host. Clean and cozy room with A/C. Recommend.
Great location
We like the place. Especially, the location is great. You can easily reach everything by foot.

Questa casa è davvero nel centro di Barcellona: si trova a soli 10 minuti a piedi dalla Rambla, ma la cosa fantastica è che si trova a soli 5 minuti dalla fermata della metro “Paral-lel” dalla quale raggiungevamo qualsiasi altra zona di Barcellona. Il quartiere in cui è situata, El Raval, viene spesso descritto come pericoloso o roba del genere…durante la mia settimana di soggiorno nessuna di queste caratteristiche si è rivelata veritiera. E’ un quartiere tranquillo, particolare, multietnico, pieno di locali come Burger King, minimarket, Carrefour, forni e pasticcerie, macellerie, kebab, parrucchieri, e localini che fanno tapas, paella e altri piatti tipici. Alexis è una persona disponibilissima, sempre sorridente, sempre pronto a trovare una soluzione ai tuoi problemi. Ci ha accolto mostrandoci il piccolo soggiorno, la cucina attrezzatissima di qualsiasi comodità (piatti, bicchieri, pentole, posate, microonde, fornelli a induzione, frigorifero e freezer grandissimi, ecc.ecc.), il bagno e successivamente la nostra camera che si trovava al piano di sopra (dotata di aria condizionata, con la possibilità di poter chiudere la porta a chiave). La casa è piccolina ma accogliente, e Alexis fa di tutto per metterti a tuo agio e per farti sentire a casa tua (mi ripeteva sempre “feel home!!!”). Inoltre sa parlare bene l’inglese, oltre allo spagnolo.
Consigliatissimo per chi vuole un appartamento centrale ed economico per trascorrere una vacanza a Barcellona.
Convivencia sencilla y sin complicaciones. Cumple lo que promete y muestra completa atención por sus huéspedes.

Nos llevamos el mejor recuerdo de Barcelona, que gran anfitrión Alexis, los tiempos de respuesta excelentes y siempre estuvo dispuesto a guiarnos. El alojamiento impecable y cerca a sitios de interés de la ciudad. Reitero mi agradecimiento,muy recomendado

Apartamento no El Raval, dizem que é um bairro perigoso, havia uma rua mais "estranha" mas existem alternativas bem mais acessíveis e mais perto. limpo, arrumado, muito perto do centro a pé, e também tem uma estação de metro muito perto. O Alex foi bastante atencioso desde o início, enviou nos a localização, que nos facilitou a deslocação até lá, o apartamento estava arrumado, o quarto é tal e qual como está na foto. gostei bastante. Obrigada Alex

We loved our stay at Alexis's place. Location was great for us, the host was welcoming and the house was clean and warm. The room is pretty small, but nice and it was ok for us, as we didn't spend there much time. Can't wait for our next visit to Barcelona!
muy bien
Muy buena relación precio/calidad. Muy atento y dispuesto Alexis.
Muy bien
便利 温馨 还有两只猫咪

Staying at Alexis's place was really great. Location is perfect with almost no tourists (at least in January :)) Room is small but it is enough for few nights, you don't need more. We would appreciate window in the room,  staying there for a longer time could be kind of depressive. Luckily air condition helped at least with fresh air. Alexis is a great host and staying there is definitely worth it.
La estancia fue correcta

Everything was great, got many amazing tips from Alexis where to go and what to see, also the cats are lovely! Clean, fresh and tidy! Thank you Alexis for helping us to get a taxi to the airport, that really helped! Being there just felt safe in general.

name: Room,  Bikes and views!  SGL-DBL
summary: Habitación Single o Doble  Wi-Fi  y Bicicleta ( incluídos )
space: SUPER PROMO !! From November 15th, 2018 when you book a room in my house you will have a full day of free bicycle included! so that you and your partner can ride around the city, or move without spending money on transport and in a sustainable way from morning to night :) Ask for more details to Jóse Ad Description: Welcome to Barcelona! Do you like Gaudí? Modernism age, the Sagrada Familia Church, or the Park Guell? or you are coming for shopping at the best shoops in Paseo de Gracia St. ? maybe your dream is to see the "Barça " and Messi at Camp Nou! or just ride the city by bike and spend a few summer days on the beach, Barcelona has it all, and I have a room waiting for You, this is my home and I share 3 rooms with my new friends ( guests ) Straight or Gay, Guy or Girl Friendly. Your room: very sunny and with amazing views, a double bed 1 or (2 people sharing), includes 2 towels per person , bed clothes and free WI - FI connection 24 hours  a day   and being in the room you have fr
