From November 15th, 2018 when you book a room in my house you will have a full day of free bicycle included! so that you and your partner can ride around the city, or move without spending money on transport and in a sustainable way from morning to night :) Ask for more details to Jóse Ad Description: Welcome to Barcelona! Do you like Gaudí? Modernism age, the Sagrada Familia Church, or the Park Guell? or you are coming for shopping at the best shoops in Paseo de Gracia St. ? maybe your dream is to see the "Barça " and Messi at Camp Nou! or just ride the city by bike and spend a few summer days on the beach, Barcelona has it all, and I have a room waiting for You, this is my home and I share 3 rooms with my new friends ( guests ) Straight or Gay, Guy or Girl Friendly. Your room: very sunny and with amazing views, a double bed 1 or (2 people sharing), includes 2 towels per person , bed clothes and free WI - FI connection 24 hours  a day   and being in the room you have fr
neighborhood_overview: we are in a privileged position within the city, out of the craziness of downtown but so close that if you like walking, you can walk to the main attractions of the city  The neighborhood is very safe and quiet, around there are plenty of supermarkets, bars, restaurants and so on.
transit: Good weather, short distances and a complete Bike path network make Barcelona the ideal city for cycling, you can book your bike in advance by asking me when to make your reservation
access: At home there are 2 bathroom, Leaving Room, and kitchen ( all these areas are shared with me and some other guest, no privated )
house_rules: VERY IMPORTANT! Due to my work I'm usually all day away from home so it is VERY IMPORTANT that before traveling you to send me an e -mail with information about your flight , train, bus or medium you use to get to Barcelona , what city Place arrive (airport, railway station , bus station, and so on ) If your flight , etc. . is delayed please email me before leaving , telling me of the change and the new scheduled time for your arrival , finally would be good as soon you get the airport , and so on. You to send me a wassap ( free cost ) or an SMS saying "We're already at the airport " to calculate exactly how long should I wait. Remember that not being a hotel there will be nobody available 24 hours to receive you when your check In. I don´t answer SMS before the scheduled check-in, answer only Wassaps. if you have any questions before you get my home, you can call me on my cell phone and will gladly clarify any doubts . I will appreciate this gesture of you to communicate with me befor

host.host_about:
Soy Argentino y vengo de la hermosa Patagonia, he vivido en distintos lugares del mundo y hace 10 años que he cumplido el sueño de radicarme en Barcelona, donde tengo un Piso con privilegiadas vistas y una inmejorable ubicación, el cual compàrto ocasionalmente con mas gente, viejos y nuevos amigos y amigas que vienen por unos pocos dias a conocer esta hermosa ciudad o a quedarse por una temporada, Si hay tiempo llegaremos a conocernos un poco, y puedes contar conmigo para lo que necesites
Un saludo!
Jóse
I'm Argentine and I come from the beautiful Patagonia, I have lived in different parts of the world and since last 10 years I have fulfilled the dream of living in Barcelona, where I have an apartment with spectacular views and an unbeatable location, which occasionally I share with more people, old and new friends who come for a few days to explore this beautiful city or stay for a season, if we have time we will get to know a little, will be a pleasure to help you with whatever you need
A greeting!
Jóse

reviews.comments: Jose is a very easy going and honest host!. He and his roommate Rebecca will answer all your questions and will make sure your stay will be a good one. The views from the apartment are absolutely amazing!! You can see the sea, the mountains and Sagrada Familia. The room is exactly as it appears on the photos - bright, simple and cozy. Also, the big advantage is that the room is very sunny, but in the same time it doesn't get too hot because it is on the 12th floor and there is always a nice breeze. The building is centrally located, but in the same time not so touristy (which I loved). Just a couple of metro stops away are all major sights and sightseeing areas and there are cafes and restaurants within a block radius. Muchas gracias Jose!

Jose is a very kind host. He was humorous and he even made dinner one night which he shared with me - mucho gracias!

 I stayed at his flat on the twelfth floor for two nights. My room was quaint and clean with a view of a former bull-fighting stadium directly across the street. If you place your head outside the window and face west/northwest, you'll have a great view of Sagrada Familia, a few blocks away. The flat has a balcony which allows access to wonderful views of the sea and various points of interest throughout Barcelona.

The entire experience was fantastic and I would definitely reccommend contacting Jose should you need an economical place to stay.

Ciao!

Arthur

Jose fue bastante amable! nos ayudo con la habitación y a ubicarnos en barcelona. El apartamento supero nuestras expectativas pues es muy grande y tiene una vista espectacular, ademas de estar impecable. Lastimosmente no pudimos compartir mas tiempo con el

Jose's flat is perfectly situated for visitors-- it overlooks Monumental (the bull-fighting ring), is a few blocks from Sagrada Familia, and also within walking distance to the beach. It is clean and offers all the amenities one might need, including laundry and wifi. More importantly, Jose is an excellent host and makes his guests feel at home and comfortable. He is completely fluent in English, and gives great travel suggestions.

I had a fantastic stay with Jose.  The (small) room was exactly as promised and the view from the main balcony was beautiful day and night.  Jose was very friendly and helpful, with lots of information and advice for Barcelona and Spain in general.  I also appreciated the kitchen, washing machine and other included services.  I really enjoyed my stay and would definitely book here again.
The host is a great man. The view from the balcony is super. Would like to go back.
Great location, comfortable beds, very nice and helpful host, great price - perfect place to stay! Thank you one more time Jose :)

Joes's place is great, in the heart of the city (5 min from Sagrada Familia), with excellent views and Best value for the money so if you hesitate to to pick this one in Barcelona do not any more this is the place. One hint for the people arriving by car you can park on side of main street next to Bullring of Barcelona and it is free when there is no event on the ring (I tested personally from Friday to Monday afternoon)
If I will be again in Barcelona I already know where to stay.

Thanks

Hey,
Jóse is a very helpful, friendly and hospitable host. He was always available to inform us, guid us and provide us with valuable information and tricks... Our stay at his place was wonderful. the flat was clean, handsomely furnished and looked like in he pictures.  We will surely consider his place for our next visit to the nice city, Barcelona.
Thanks a lot Jóse

Jóse's Appartment ist ein super Ausgangspunkt für jeden Barcelona Trip! Es liegt sehr zentral, man kann alles gut zu Fuß erreichen und bekommt noch dazu viele gut Tipps von Jóse! Die Zimmer sind sauber, man hat die Gelegenheit zu kochen und kann im Wohnzimmer auch einen super Fernseh-Aend verbringen! Sehr zu empfehlen!

Fantastic man (so inteligent and friendly), fantastic location (near Sagrada Familia, with beautiful view).  
Everything was grat!!!  Thanks from me and Dorota. :)

Great place with a fantastic location at a great price! And if that's not enough, the host Jose is a great guy as well, he'll give you many tips and have nice conversations with you. Highly recommended

Jose est très sympathique et donne volontiers de bonnes infos.
L'appartement est propre et bien placé.

We spent a few days in Barcelona with a friend of mine and we really enjoyed our stay at José's appartment! It is quite centric as you are only a few metro stations away from most points of interest. The appartment is very clean, in a modern and tall building.
The quality you get is really worth the low price you pay! I strongly recommend!
His house was really easy to find and close to the metro station monumental. Was good for people with big luggages like us. He welcomed us warmly and helped us a lot.

Best location, best price, best view from the room! Jóse is a very helpful host (and one information to the girls: he is goodlooking too!) The flat is so clean, like no other, I think. Wanna go back right now!

José was an excellent host! He was very welcoming and made me feel at home. It was initially intimidating being an English speaker in Spain for the first time, but it helped that José spoke English and was helpful in providing recommendations for what to do and how to see the city of Barcelona. The location is very near Sagrada Familia, which is nice, and although is not within walking distance of Las Ramblas and other tourist attractions, the flat is right next to the Monumental metro stop, where it is easy to travel to any other location in the city. I would highly recommend!

José's place was great,  close to a few different Metro stops,  just a few minutes walking from Sagrada Familia, clean,  basic, affordable, we had full use of the kitchen which was nice, and there's more than one bathroom. There's an elevator, which was a nice change from all the stairs we've been walking. Wifi is good. Other people were staying there but we hardly saw or noticed them. Beautiful view from the room as well for sunset :) And he was also kind enough to drop my sister's postcards in the mail because she forgot.

A pesar de que llegamos muy tarde en la noche, tuvimos un excelente recibimiento por parte de Jose, es su acogedor y hermoso apartamento, con todas las comodidades, muy seguro, confortable y muy bien ubicado. 
El anfitrión es una excelente persona, respetuoso, divertido, siempre dispuesto a ayudar, muy directo y estricto con las reglas de la casa, lo cual me parece excelente. 
Jose conoce todos los detalles que pueden hacer de la estadía en la hermosa Barcelona sea lo más provechosa posible, excelente anfitrión, un crack!!!

J'ai passé 3 nuit chez Jose, tout c'est super bien passer, et on fut rassurer des le début. 
Il répond aux messages très clairement et rapidement, il explique tout le trajet en détails depuis l’aéroport ou la gare, et plein de petites astuces.
L'appartement quant à lui propose un très bon rapport qualités prix, les serviettes et premier soin sont déjà sur place.
L'appartement en lui même est en plein centre ville, tout prêt du métro et de la sagrada famillia.

Je recommande largement l'appartement ainsi que l’hôte qui est très accueillant.

Excellent!! Very clean nice place and right in the heart of Barcelona.  We pretty much walked everywhere or used the metro which was a block away. Jose was very friendly and helpful. Thank you Jose hope to stay again in the future :-)

Jose was an excellent host - he met us at the flat and took time to sit down with us and give us some advice about Barcelona (it was a first visit for both of us).  Basic accommodations, the room had a good view.  Jose was around and available to assist us with any questions during our stay; there were also some other guests in the other bedrooms who were there for both business and vacation.  Would definitely recommend.

As soon as we entered the apartment Jóse was there to greet us and give us a tour. He was extremely inviting and informative, and even spent a half hour going over a map of Barcelona so that we had an idea of how to navigate the city. The apartment was extremely clean and in a perfect location. From our room we could see into the bull fighting ring, and the famous Barcelona church was within walking distance. We had an amazing experience, and I would highly recommend staying at Jóse's establishment.

A friend and i started off our Euro trip in Barcelona staying with Jose. We got in a bit late and he waited up for us, and was extremely helpful. He obviously has some experience hosting so for first time airbnb users he was really great. Our room was better than we expected with really amazing views - i would definitely stay there again!

We had a very nice time in Barcelona! The room was as shown on the pictures and the whole flat was clean. The beds in the twin room were a bit uncomfortable, but the amazing view was compensating for that. The location is also very good. There is only one shower, so be prepared for "traffic jams" in the morning if the flat is fully booked.
Thank you Jóse for being a nice host!
J'ai passé un très bon séjour chez José, c'est un hôte vraiment très agréable et chaleureux. On a l'impression d'être chez soi. Je recommande

Living at Jóses Apartment was fantastic. He's a perfect host and knows lots of good places to visit in Barcelona. The view out of his apartment is unique and the rooms are very clean and cosy. In addition, if you like walking you can reach almost every famous hot spot / sight by foot (sagrada familia, el born, triumphal arch, las Ramblas, the beach) but the metro station is very close as well or you can rent city bikes at a public station nearby.
Muchisimas gracias Jóse por este tiempo tan chevere ....lo siento COPADO queria que decir ;-) ya sabes, cuando volveramos vamos a quedarnos en tu lugar :-D para irnos a la playa juntos!

The flat can be the tallest building among others in that area, where the beach, S. Famila can be easily figured out. It is only five min walk away from the underground station, very convenient location. I did't notice, however, the first time I come to the building that the post code only indicates a area, not the exact building. It took a time for me find the address with only post code, which may presented mistakenly about the address. Jose is really nice guy, finally picking me up from the across. He also gave me so much recommendations about how to travel around in Barcelona. It was really great communication with him and even fantastic to learn some Spainsh with him! Memorable experience!

Place is prefect to stay in Barcelona: good spot in the city is close to the city center and the beach. Apartment is clean, cozy
And that view from the windows!! Jose is very friendly and helpful. It was pleasure to rent a room in his place and from him. I can recommend in 100%.

The location is very very good! We could see Sagrada Família from there. And you can walk to some grocery store, restaurant, metro, beach, and so on! 
Jóse is really helpful host. So, we had good time there! Thank you, Jóse :)

¿Que puedo decir? José fue fantástico e muy hospitalario y amable. Su apartamento es un una posición muy buena por los transporte y también para caminar hacia el centro. 
Su casa es muy grande y cómoda, el fue muy presente y preciso para darnos información útil para la ciudad. Gracias por todo José!

Jóse is really helpful and nice host, for sure. And the location of the house is perfect for getting around Barcelona easily. In the house, you have everything exactly like in your own house, so it is very comfortable. Moreover, Jóse gives a practical and neat overview of the city once you get there, so it is also very nice of him. All in all, you can choose his apartment for a nice Barcelona stay.

Jose  welcomed us warmly at his apartment. His apartment is in the city center , very convinience and clean. He explained well about the rule of the house clearly.We can see the Bulls ring from our room and Segrada (Website hidden by Airbnb) was so nice.The room is the same with the pictures and all basic need provided. Muchas Gracias Jose.

It was a excellent experience in Jose house. The room is bigger enough for two people and so tidy and clean. Also Jose gave many helpful info on the day arrived. And the house is so near to The centre of the city. Can't find any reason to say no to the house! Highly recommended for accommodation.
Of course Jose is a very good host, he treated us very well and gave us much advice, his room is clean and quite, it was a good choice to be here.

La estancia en casa de Jose ha sido genial. Él mismo nos recibió y tras explicarnos el funcionamiento de la casa (horarios, espacios y útiles disponibles, etc) nos introdujo un poco en la ciudad, la zona y los transportes. 
La habitación, y toda la casa en general, estaba limpísima y con todo lo que pudimos necesitar. Me gustaría destacar la eficiente organización de espacios y útiles por color y habitación. Muy cómodo y fácil de usar.
Lo mejor es que Jose ha sido un anfitrión amable, accesible, generoso y abierto.

Wir haben drei Nächte in Jóses Apartment in Barcelona übernachtet und hatten dort eine tolle Zeit. Als Gast kann man, neben dem gebuchten Zimmer, beide Badezimmer, das Wohnzimmer sowie die Küche benutzen. Die gesamte Wohnung war sehr sauber und wir haben uns wohl gefühlt. 
In zwei Minuten erreicht man zu Fuß die Metrostation "Monumental" und ist in nur wenigen Minuten im Zentrum Barcelonas. 
Auch Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind nicht weit entfernt.

Jose was an amazing host, everything crystal clear from the first email contact. Once we were there he provide us all the information that we could need and he is also very cordial and nice. Always ready to give some good advice.
JOSE是非常和善的人,房子所有地方都很乾淨,住的很舒服也很符合敍述.地理位置非常的好.可以走到聖家堂.門口的H12公車去哪都很方便.我非常的喜歡~

Soggiorno perfetto a Barcellona, la casa è esattamente come da descrizione, a 150 metri dalla fermata della metro Monumental e a 350 metri dalla Sagrata Familia. Jose inoltre è un padrone di casa molto attento e organizzatissimo per ricevere al meglio i suoi ospiti.
Una buena experiencia muy limpio el cuarto, muy agradable la estancia ahi. Sin duda si vuelvo a barcelona me quedare de nuevo

Jóse is a nice and friendly host. Room are clean and bright with nice city view. Close to Sagrada Famila from here, quiet neighborhood. My friend and I had great time here. 

Jóseはとても親切で情熱なﾎｽﾄです｡部屋や共有ｽﾍﾟｰｽは綺麗で､窓からの景色も素晴らしかった｡ｻｸﾞﾗﾀﾞﾌｧﾐﾘｱからも徒歩15分ほどの距離で､近隣も静かです｡友達と楽しい時間をすごしました｡

Jóse was a great host and we had an excellent stay at his apartment. The apartment is in a good location so exploring Barcelona was very easy. He told us about Barcelona and where to visit which was a big help.

Para comenzar me gustaría referirme a Jose el anfitrión, fue muy atento, mantiene el lugar muy limpio y organizado, un punto muy importante es que durante todo el viaje nunca dudo en ayudarnos; En cuanto el apartamento es bastante amplio y comodo y el barrio es muy seguro con fácil acceso a cualquier actividad turistica para terminar puedo decir que definitivamente cuando vuela a ir a Barcelona mirare este lugar antes que cualquier otro

Genio. El departamento es muy lindo y tiene una vista increíble. La ubicación es excelente. Jose es una muy buena persona, totalmente predispuesta a ayudar al visitante. Sin dudas si vuelvo a Barcelona voy a volver a la casa de él!

Jose nos recibio muy bien. Todo el tiempo estuvo pendiente de nuestra hora de llegada (que vario varias veces a causa de problemas en la aerolinea). La ubicacion de la casa es muy buena, se puede caminar a muchos lugares de interes.

El apartamento se encuentra muy bien ubicado, se puede caminar fácilmente a los sitios turísticos mas importantes y también se puede acceder fácilmente al transporte público. Es un buen sitio para pasar pocas noches siempre y cuando no te incomode compartir baño y cocina con varias personas que se alojan  en otros cuartos del apartamento. Nosotros eramos en total 7 personas compartiendo un baño y medio lo cual resultó algo incomodo.

Jóse was amazing. First of all we were in a tough situation with no place to stay and he let us book same day, life saver. He was very nice, the apartment was great. Bedroom had a really nice view and it was really close to both a metro and bus stop. Would definitely recommend.

My girlfriend and I spent 4 nights at Jóse’s. Many days before arriving, he gave us all the instructions to find our way from BCN airport to his place which is very easy by the way.
He welcomed us and gave us a quick lesson about where we were situated, and which directions to go to to find places of interest. There are small grocery stores not far away.

Here are some pros and cons about the place.

Pros :
- Location : Next to two metro stations, 5min walk to each. The area is safe at night.
- The view : From the 12th floor, you have a wonderful view on top of the former plaza de toros and the rest of the city
- Cleanliness : Everything was clean all around
- Practicality : Each room has its dining set, which means you always have what you need to eat
- The room : Just the right size, and there’s a ceiling fan which is very useful.
- There's a cell phone shop down the building. If your cell phone is unlocked, you get good deals there for a SIM with data.

Cons :
- Location : Being on the Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes (major axis in Barcelona) not far from Plaça de les Glories Catalanes means lots of trafic. So have your earplugs ready if you don’t tolerate noise.
- The bed : The end-of-life foam mattress forms a curve when you lie on it. We put some spare pillows under it to improve the situation a tiny bit.

Muchas gracias José, 
el viaje se pasaba muy bien en Barcelona con la cuidad y con José.
José es un hombre muy simpatico, con muy buenos consejos y que explica muy bien todo lo que se puede hacer en la ciudad.
El piso compartido es una muy buena idea, asi se puede encontrar otras personas, y la vista de la habitacion sobre Barcelona es extraordinaria !!!!!
La proxima vez que me voy a Barcelona, me voy en el piso de José!!!!
Le recomando a todos !!
Perfect location, perfect apartment and super-friendly host. I had a great time there and I can recommend you to go there.

Received a warm welcome from Jose. He is a very organized person and explained how he has set up the apartment for guest usage of dishes, plates, etc. The kitchen is well equipped and we have full use of it. There are 2 bathrooms, one with full bath and shower. The apartment is on the 12th floor with excellent view of the city, the bull fighting ring and city. Within walking distance to Segrada Familia, Metro Station and bus stop just across the street. I have a walking disability and it was effortless getting to and from, using public transportation from the apartment.  The place is clean and tidy. Jose has been helpful and is an informative person about Barcelona. I would stay at his place again and recommend it to others.

Un departamento muy lindo,cómodo y super limpio,está ubicado en un lugar muy lindo,cerca de todo y con el monumental de Toros enfrente que le dá una vista única,ademas Jose un excelente anfitrión que nos ayudo a armar una visita a la ciudad dándonos referencias de alguien que conoce muy bien el lugar,gracias por todo y hasta nuestra próxima visita

Wir hatten einen wirklich sehr schönen Aufenhalt in der Wohnung von Jóse und das Zimmer bietet wirklich einen fantastischen Ausblick wie auf den Bildern dargestellt. Insgesamt sieht die Wohnung mitsamt Einrichtung auch in Realität aus wie auf den Fotos. Jóse selbst ist geselliger, netter und hilfsbereiter Kerl. Ich kann dieses Apartment mit bestem Gewissen weiterempfehlen. Jóse, vielen dank für alles. Myriam & Isolde
Jose was a very friendly and helpful host, I honestly recommend him for everyone! :) He showed us how to prepare a great Sangria, and told us many interesting stories about city.
It was very very good,jose was very helpful,apartman was clean and very good location, access metro , no any problem we will be back soon.Thank you very much jose!!!

I was by José 5 days, everything was OK. He give us many tips for visiting some interesent places in Barca. Very helpfully, friendly, flat and our room was clean. The place of this room is fantastic, 5minutes to go to metro,centrum,etc. Next visit in Barca I take this room too. 
Ich war bei José für 5 Tage, alles war super. Er hat uns viele Tips an verschiedene interesante Plätze in Barcelona. Er ist sehr freundlich,hilfsbereit, das Wochnung sowie unsere Zimmer war immer sauber. Wohnung ist 5 Minuten von alles wichtige. Nächstesmal wieder bei José.

Jose was a great host. He was really helpful in describing Barcelona to us and places to visit.  His place is cosy and has a great view. You can see Sagrada Familia from his flat. It's a great location and we found it very easy traveling around Barcelona from his flat.  Thank you Jose. Jes
位置方便,房间干净设施齐全,房东非常热情,很推荐!

He was a great Host!! Very friendly And helpful!! The Appartement was Quite nice And very Good Organized!! You can walk to Most of The Interesting Monuments!! It is also enough Place There to live Witz Other Peoples! You Find everything you Need There!!
WE would choose him again as our host!!
Todo bien, limpio, muy buena vista
Lovely apartment in an excellent location. Jóse is very welcoming and will give you all the advice you need for your trip. Room was spotless and had a great view. Would definitely stay here again.

Jóse was a very nice host! He was always helpful and patient specially because we arrived late at night. The house is in a really good location and it was clean and very organized. I really recommend Jóse and his house!
Jose was a great host; he was very friendly and accommodating! The location is also great, conveniently located, and quiet.

The apartment is exactly as given in the description. Jose is very friendly and an excellent host. Apartment - clean and tidy. All the things were highly organized. Lovely view from the window. Excellent location and metro station is nearby. Highly recommended...would love to go back again.

La actitud de Jose fue muy amable y colaborativa en todo momento. Nos espero hasta las tantas de la mañana con el mejor de los talantes. Nos explico ubicación de la casa y como teniamos que desenvolvernos en Barcelona.
Todo estaba muy limpio y bien organizado.

José was a very friendly and perfect host. He was waiting for us at his place and even though we were later than expected he took the time to explain everything and answer all of our questions.
The appartement was very clean and organized. The room had an amazing view and a nice bed. 
The neighborhood was very pleasant to stay in, just outside the crowded city center but close enough to walk to some of the main attractions and the beach. The metro system was also easily accessible and the closest station was only 150m away.
All and all we had an amazing time in Barcelona!
We had a lovely stay in Jóse's place. The views are stunning. Great location and he was very accommodation. Would defiantly stay again.

The stay at Jóse's place was amazing. The flat is clean and spacious. You'll find yourself in the best location. Monumental is directly next to the apartment and everything is in walking distance. Jóse helped me and my friend get around and had some good tips.

Jóse was a great host who was more than accomodating for us. He recommended us things to do in Barcelona and provided us more than enough information on the public transport that we could take. The accomodation itself was great, with clear and understandable rules as well as a great view of the whole city. The kitchen had all the utensils you would need and the living space was very comfortable. Just a 2 minute bus ride from the beach and right near a metro station, it was the perfect base to explore Barcelona as a whole. If I visit Barcelona again, I'll be staying with Jóse.
Hola! Muchas gracias por tu ayuda con todo lo que me apoyaste. Mucha suerte. Gracias.

Notre séjour chez Jòse. C'est tres bien passer. Notre chambre était propre. Ce que nous avons apprécier chez lui, c'est qu'il est bien organisé. C'etait la premier fois qu'on utilisais Airbnb pour partir en vacance. On était pas dessu. Nous avons eu une très belle vue de notre chambre sur barcelone. Et l'appartement est tres facile d'accès, on avais le metro a côté de l'appartement et aussi les taxi au alentour. Franchement je vous le conseil. Juste un truc il est vrai que Jòse allaire très directe quand il vous contact. Mais face a face c'est une bonne personne.

If you are going to Barcelona you must book an accommodation at José's place! One reason is the flat - super location, beautiful window view, everything clean. The other reason is that José is wonderful man. He is nice, very funny

Jose was an excellent host! He is very friendly and organized, and speaks conversational English. As soon as we arrived he gave us a full tour of his home, and showed us how to get around from there. The apartment is really beautiful with amazing views of the city! He gave us towels and dishes to use which was great. Even with the other two rooms rented out, there was not an issue waiting for the bathroom because he has 1 1/2 baths. Great location very close to sagrada familia. Thank you for helping to make our trip to Barcelona an amazing and unforgettable experience! You won't regret booking this one.

Amazing views from the flat and very spacious! Jose has an extremely organised set up which meant a very easy and simple stay.. Didn't see him very much in the time we were there however I'm sure he would of answered any questions we had.. Very lovely welcome and overall a great place to stay for experiencing Barcelona for the first time!

Jose has a super clean apartment and the location is very nice,It's about a 3 minute walk from the metro. He offers us a lot of tourist information and his sense of humor and hospitality made us enjoy our stay very much. I would definitely recommend this apartment.

I was stolen when I arrived Barcelona. I explained this to José, that I lost my passport and wallet. José kindly lended to me 20 euros and walked me to the police station to report. 

It was very kind for him to do so, really helped me, and cheered me up. I was a little depressed for what happened in Barcelona earlier.

José also helped me to do the laundry. Didn't have chance to say thanks because I left very early the day after.

And the location of this flat is awesome. You can get to all the famous places by bus or tren easily.
Perfect ! Jose was very nice and very welcoming. His flat was perfect. I recommend.

José was a great host and made us feel very welcome in his appartment! The location is fantastic in the heart of Barcelona, next to a metro stop and in short walking distance to the Sagrada Familia. The appartment was shared with him and other travellers, but there was enough privacy and space for everyone and everything was very clean, it was just a little bit warm at night as there was no A/C and we came to Barcelona in an expecially hot week. We felt absolutely comfortable and enjoyed to talk to José who did everything to make it a great stay for us - he provided cutlery, fridge space, towels, shampoo etc and even offered to store our luggage after the check-out time. Hope to stay there again!
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The stay was perfect. All that Jose promised, he delivered. Very professional communication, amicable host with all the local information to make our stay comfortable and charming. Easy access to walk, bike or train to all things Barcelona!
Beautiful view! Excellent organization that makes the stay seamless for both parties! Thanks Jose! Highly Recommend.

Jòse was a welcoming host from the moment we walked through the door. Even before that, he sent us detailed information on how to navigate the city to his apartment! He was happy to situate us to Barcelona and its surroundings as well as provide a map with all the main attractions on it (very helpful). His apartment was clean and comfortable. His system to organize all his guests works very well and makes everyone feel at home. The apartment sits close to a metro station and the Sagrada Familia. If you're looking to be in the heart of Barcelona, near the beach or Gothic Quarter, you will have to walk a ways to get there, but we didn't find this an issue as Barcelona has lovely weather and is beautiful all around. Thanks again Jòse!

Tres bonne adresse avec un superbe emplacement. L'endroit est propre et parfaitement organisé!!! José l'hote est une personne serieuse toujours la pour vous conseiller sur les bons plans! Magnifique vue sur la ville!!! Je recommande sincerement. J'y retournerai...

Really nice and clean. Walking distance to most attractions, restaurants and bars. Jose was so helpful and friendly. I can truly recommend Jose's apartment for everybody who wishes a comfortable stay in Barcelona!
Jose was extremely helpful and accommodating. Would recommend!

Room itself is ok, flat as well. View from 12 floor is really amazing.

Be aware that check-in time can be moved unexpectedly. And keep in mind that there is a shower schedule and you can't use one after 11pm. Even if your flight is at 5am, Jose will suggest you to take shower earlier in evening not to worry him :D
Great host and location! Easy walking distance to La Sagrada Familia and El Born. Has a kitchen for those who prefer to save a bit of money by cooking food.
Jóse is rad! He gave us some helpful tips for exploring the city,   the view is great, and the guest's "colour coding" system is brilliant ;)
This house enjoys an amazingly beautiful view and is very near to Sagrada Familia. The host Jóse is really helpful and warm-hearted. I bet you will like this house.

Josés Unterkunft war genau wie beschrieben. Die Kommunikation vorab hat gut geklappt. Der Check-in war pünktlich und es gab hilfreiche Infos zum Viertel. Er hat sich sehr gut um uns gekümmert und alles genau erklärt, so dass alle Gäste auch untereinander gut klar kommen. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und gut ausgestattet.

Die Lage oben in einem der wenigen Hochhäuser von Barcelona bietet einen tollen Blick über die Stadt. Mit den nahegelegenen Stationen von Metro, Tram und Bus erreicht man alle Sehenswürdigkeiten schnell. Nachts fährt auch regelmäßig der Nachtbus.

It's a great apartment!  Close to the metro and buses, which get you quickly to where you want to go. The apartment is very clean, beds are great and it is a very comfortable place to stay. Jóse is an awesome host and very helpful. We highly recommend it.

주인아저씨 완전 친절하시고 위치도 진짜 짱짱! 주변에 버스정류장이 여러개 있어서 어딜가든 문제 없었어요. 떠나는날 아침일찍 택시를 탔어야 했는데 직접 택시예약도 해주시고 너무 스윗하시다는^^ 
Jose is really kind and his place is clean and has fast wifi. And there are a lot of bus stations and metroes around his place! If I go there again, I will stay his place again. Great thankful to Jose:)

Jóse es una persona detallista y súper organizada con su casa.
Sus sugerencias y ayudas fueron grandiosas, tanto como para llegar como para movilizarme en Barcelona 
Una ciudad maravillosa 
Saludos!
Jose was a great host, the room was comfortable and well equipped and it was lovely to be able to use the kitchen

José is great! The directions that he gave helped a lot. Place is very clean and to be honest we felt better than in some hotels. 
Recommended 10/10.
When we are back in Barcelona we will stay at José! 
Thanks again for everything Jose!
amazing stay in a perfect location. everything you need in an apartment and a wonderful host who goes above and beyond expectation. thank you again José, enjoy your beers.

Perfect location, everything you could need for a city trip away. Was great to be able to use the kitchen as this saved us money. We only ate out at evenings and the rest we made food in the house as there is a Lidl down the road! Would reccomend to any one wanting to stay in Barcelona!
Tout s'est très bien passé chez José, hôte disponible et sympathique. L'appartement est bien organisé et situé en position stratégique.
Jose was a really nice host with a good appartement. We had an awesome holiday!

We want to thank Jose for being such an amazing host! He is very welcoming and helpful. If you have any questions about anything in the city you can count on him. His place is very clean and organized, and in the perfect location to visit most of the attractions and close to public transportation. We would definitely come back and recommend 100%.
Thank you again Jose!

Un hôte gentil si accueillant qui nous a bien expliqué la ville et a été de bon conseil de nombreuses fois. Une organisation bien rodée pour l'utilisation des parties communes de l'appartement et permettant le confort de tous.

Una persona muy simpatica y acogida que pasa tiempo para explicarnos la ciudad y darnos consejos. La organisacìon del piso esta muy bien pensada para la comodidad de todos.

We meet someone very sympatic ans welcoming who spend time to explain us the city and many ideas to have nice trip. The flat and its organisation are well think to hello every body to enjoy Time on this flat.

Очень удобное расположение, рядом метро.
Красивый вид из окна на Sagrada Familia. 
Комната небольшая, но чистая и достаточно уютная, кровать хорошая.
Есть кухня с персональной посудой.
Хозяин сдает несколько комнат, вам могут попасться шумные ночные туристы.
Температура воды в душе непостоянна, бывает непросто справиться с ним.
Хозяин радушный, доброжелательный и всегда готовый помочь.
Нам понравилось.

Muy buen lugar , muy recomendable , el anfitrión excelente y bien predispuesto a ayudar en lo q se necesite , nosotros pudimos dejar nuestras maletas unas horas el último día , salimos del apto a las 10 pero como nuestro avión salía a las 17 hs pudimos dejar las maletas hasta las 14:30

We had a great long weekend at José's. The flat is well located, a close walk to the Sagrada Familia and next to a metro station. It's well equipped and has great views. José was an incredibly helpful and accommodating host - would highly recommend!
Jose was an amazing host! Very kind, helpful, communicative and the place was great

The apartment is nicely situatuated in the city. It was easy to get to scenic locations, beach, la sagrada familia just a few blocks down. The window view was spectular. The room/apartment was very clean, spacious and organized. Bed was comfortable.  Jose was very friendly and helpful. We plan on returning and highly recommend to airbnb community
Jóse is a very friendly host. Our trip was super uncomplicated. Thanks for the warm welcome Jóse!

Jose, the host, is incredibly organized and clean. He has a beautiful home with a great view. Looking directly out our window we had a bull ring. To the left was the ocean. To the right was the Salgrada Famila. There is a metro near by so the whole city can easily be transversed. Amazing Airbnb! 4 days was not enough time in Barcelona.
sauberkeit ewünscht

Joe hat uns außerordentlich freundlich empfangen!:) Es war alles super organisiert. Wir haben uns wie zu Hause gefühlt. Die lange ist sehr zentral in der Nähe gibt es einen bus und eine metro. Der Ausblick ist fantastisch aus dem 12ten Stock!

Jose is a good and nice host. His apartment has a beautiful view of Sagrada Familia and also the sea. It is not a luxury apartment, but it contains all practical necessities for a convenient stay, like bathrooms, a bedroom with a fan and a kitchen with access to fridge and stove. We did not feel that we stayed at someone's private home. It was more like a "hostel-like" experience. However overall very good, and we can recommend Jose and his apartment.

Jóse's apartment has been one of our favourite stays. Jóse is a fantastic host who communicates really well, offers plenty of hints, tips and great places to see, and maintains a super organised, super clean apartment. The location was fantastic- we walked everywhere, and there are options to eat, drink and shop close by. We much preferred being a bit further away from La Rambla, and the view of the old bull fighting ring and La Sagrada Familia from the window was so cool. 

Other travellers were staying in other rooms in the apartment and it was a good chance to swap stories. Although there were a few people in the apartment it never felt crowded, we never waited for the bathroom and we only really saw each other over breakfast (which is provided). We would definitely stay with Jóse again and would recommend his place to anyone.

Barcelona is beautiful and this apartment has a nice view of the city. If you have a short stay and will be sightseeing most of the time, this is a good clean home. Jose is very helpful and has good tips for sightseeing and navigating the city.
Jose était très accueillant, son appartement est bien situé, nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour et le recommandons !
Jóse is a wonderful host. I cannot recommend him and his accommodation enough. Definitely would return!
José is a great host, made us feel like it's our home too. We can come up to him with questions. The room were clean. If you wanna book Josés place don't hesitate

Persona simpaticissima e molto organizzata, giovanile. Ci ha fatto vedere tutta la casa e spiegato come utilizzare le varie cose. Le regole della casa vanno a favore di tutti e ogni ospite ha il proprio armadietto/scaffale privato sia in bagno che in cucina! 
Ottimo!!

Jose was a great host!  He was so friendly and always willing to help us with any questions that we had.
The place is very well organised and clean.  The apartment is very big and spacious and although you may be sharing the place with others, you would never know it!  
The position was great.  The views were amazing and it was walking distance to the beach.  Overall, we were very happy with our stay!
José is very friendly with a realy nice and clean house. The room has an amazing view. Had a lovely stay in Barcelona.
José muy buen anfitrión, la pieza cómoda un poco de ruido de la calle, pero nada complicado. Muy buenos accesos a movilización, en especial metro, y cerca de puntos turísticos.

Jóse was an excellent host - very friendly and easy to communicate with. Even though you share the space with other guests you can hardly notice it. Would highly recommend this as a place to stay if you are traveling alone or with a partner.

Excelente lugar! La habitación, la vista, la limpieza y el anfitrión del 10!!! José en todo momento estaba dispuesto a responder nuestras dudas, muy cordial y el departamento es hermoso, bien ubicado para recorrer Barcelona y la vista increíble!

Reserve la habitación para mis padres, estuvieron cómodos y tranquilos, sus únicos comentarios fue que la ducha es difícil de cerrar y las toallas podrían ser de mejor calidad. Muchas gracias José por tu hospitalidad.

Jose's flat is an ideal place for  a tourist who would like to explore and enjoy all the savors that Barcelona has to offer. The apartment is located in the hart of the city next to Sagrada Familia, and that makes it easy to move around on foot or by means of public transport. Jose is a fantastic host and always happy to be of help if that is needed. Those scary HOUSE RULES are not so scary. In fact they are very friendly and reasonable. We would have stayed longer if we could and definitely recommend it for everybody.
Thank you Jose for an excellent experience. All the best.    

Mieszkanie Jose to wspaniale miejsce dla turysty, który chcialby poznac uroki Barcelony. Mieszkanie jest ulokowane w samym centrum, co pozwala na swobodne poruszanie sie po miescie za równo pieszo jak i metrem. Jose jest swietnym gospodarzem, zawsze sluzy pomoca i rada a zasady domu sa rozsadne i przyjazne. Z przyjemnoscia zostalibysmy dluzej i szczerze polecamy go kazdemu.

Host: Jóse is fantastic- Friendly, accommodating, very informative, and really nice.

Room: We stayed in the room that's facing the old bull fighting arena and the view is beautiful. Although the sun rises on the other side of the building, the sun rays creeping up on the arena and La Sagrada Familia to the right still makes for a great sunrise. Room is neat and set up nicely.  

Additional: Jóse has everything well organized. He does rent out 2 other rooms as well so to keep everything running smoothly he's put up simple instructions and rules that are pretty straightforward. Although we didn't have time for coffee and toast in the morning, I absolutely loved that these were made available. 

Overall: 10/5 stars. I'd definitely stay there again if I visit Barcelona again. Location is convenient and I felt very comfortable. 

Tip: Bathroom includes soap and shampoo, but bring your own toothpaste.
José é um excelente anfitrião e sua casa é muito agradável e limpa. Dispõe de uma vista incrível de Barcelona, e muito acessível a todos os locais. Sem dúvidas recomendo!
excellent location, great value for money and a friendly host

Jose is an outstanding host. Everything about the house is just perfect. Location is central - close to metro, bus, beaches, city central.
The house is super organised. Every room has its own private space for everything - even in the fridge.

Jose is full of energy and life. Do not forget to take local transport tips from him. He is very helpful and friendly.

Jose is a very friendly and organized guy. He gave us tips how best to get to his place, so it was really easy to find it. The room we stayed in was very clean with a great view! My friend and I loved everything about the house and its location ( very close to everything). He let me leave my luggage at his place after I checked out, so I won’t carry it with me everywhere I go before my flight, that was really appreciated.
Thank you, Jose, for your hospitality! Next time I’m coming to Barcelona I’m definitely staying with you :)
Muy buen anfitrión, atento y dispuesto a ayudar a los visitantes. Recomendable

It was what exactly explained in description. Jóse welcomed us right on time, and everything was very organized and clean. There are strict rules for guests and as long as you are keeping it mind, there will be zero problem. Since i was traveling with my friend, i didn't really have time to spend with Jóse, but I knew he is nice guy. 
To sum up, perfect location and clean environment were the best.
Excelente ubicación, el lugar es perfecto para todo tipo de viajero, Jose desde el inicio fue muy atento, sus consejos y en general todo fue perfecto. Completament (Website hidden by Airbnb) !!

Excellent location, upmarket residential building and a very clean and swanky apartment with great views! What else can a traveller ask for ? Jose is an experienced host and that clearly reflects in the way he manages the constantly flow of travellers in his apartment. He is accommodating to the needs of the guests, is completely non-intrusive and amiable to deal with.  My first trip to Barcelona became more memorable because of the comfortable 6 days I spent in his apartment.
Location was very good 15 min walk from center. Apartment and our room was clean and everything was well organized. Jose was friendly and very helpful. This was a good place to stay thank you jose.

Excelente en todo!
José es súper amable y les ayudará con cualquier duda.
Lugar muy limpio y ordenado, y muy buena ubicación.
Recomiendo.
José è molto cordiale e ha organizzato l'appartamento al meglio per garantire una buona condivisione degli spazi comuni. Ottima la posizione e incantevole vista!

Muy linda habilitación, con desayuno incluido. Ambiente muy tranquilo. Lo que más destaco es la limpieza. José es muy amable y nos permitió guardar las valijas hasta el mediodía que nos íbamos. 
Recomiendo!!

We had a great time in Barcelona and Jose‘s appartment. The room was clean, the bed super comfortable, the view amazing, the bathrooms clean and the kitchen well stocked. Jose is a super friendly, open and weloming guy and answered all our questions about Barcelona. We recommend his appartment and would definately stay there again!
Jose es un excelente anfitrión! El depto esta muy bien ubicado, en un barrio muy lindo! Jose tiene todo organizado para que disfrutes de la estadía!
Vista ottima, posizione perfetta, alloggio pulito e confortevole. Super consigliato
地理位置优越 房东热情好客

El lugar estaba muy ordenado y limpio. José se preocupó por resolvernos problemas que surgieron ajenos a la estadía, siempre super amable y atento. Volveríamos a hospedarnos en su depto. Gracias por todo! Cecilia y Diego

Josè's home is such a nice and clean place to stay, and Josè is a fantastic host. He stayed up until 2 in the night and waited for us to arrive from the airport, and even though we arrived very late, he had time to give us some good advices for the next day. The flat contains 3 rooms for guests, and Josè also live there. From the room the view over the city was amazing! It is located 3 minutes away from a metro stop, and it takes 10-15 minutes by metro to Barcelona downtown. No problem at all, because it is a big city and you will need the metro to get around anyway. We really enjoyed our stay, and really wanna recommend Josè's home.
매우 좋은 위치. 투우장이 바로 앞에 있어요.오른쪽에는 사그라다 파밀리아가 있어요. 12층에 위치해 있어 뷰도 정말 좋아요. 아침도 먹을 수 있어요. 커피기계, 빵, 버터, 잼, 시리얼, 우유가 비치되어 있어요. 호세 아저씨도 정말 친절하세요. 추천해요.
A lovely place.thanks so much for waiting for us so late!

José is very nice, helpfull and reactive 
I recommand his room !
Jose recibió muy a mis Padres, el lugar es super agradable y Jose muy atento. El lugar esta muy bien ubicado para acceder a todos los puntos turísticos de Barcelona. Muy recomendable!

Il soggiorno nella casa di José é stato all'altezza delle nostre aspettative. José si é mostrato disponibile, gentile e con la sua simpatia ci siamo sentite subito a nostro agio. Posizione strategica e vista sulla cittá incantevole. Barcellona ci ha conquistate e ci ritorneremo!

I stayed in Jóse’s place and it was really nice. The communication before the trip with him was easy. He gave me detailed instructions how to reach his place. Also he was so kind to change the meeting time with almost 2 hours, as my flight was delay. Jóse gave me and my mom some great tips about the city. The place by itself is really clean and well organized. The apartment is also well situated , as you have a lot of restaurant around, bus stops, metro, so it is easy to go wherever you want. Spend a perfect time with Jóse and definitely would be happy to stay in his place for my next trip to Barcelona!

Jóse was everything we expected and more! Our first trip to Barcelona was an easy one- and Jóse thought through each element of our stay- including giving us great tips for seeing the city. Central location - close to metro and quite walkable. Beautiful and clean apartment. Would definitely recommend and stay again!
Nice location, but too much rules)
Jose’s place is very well organized and a nice place to stay after spending the day exploring Barcelona. Jose was kind to give us some advice and tips for traveling the city.
Tutto è andato molto bene, la casa è in posizione ottima vicino alla sagrada familia, alla metro e al bus v21 per la spiaggia. José è un ottimo host. Ritornerò sicuramente

José è stato da subito disponibile ed accogliente con noi. Appartamento organizzato nei minimi dettagli, pulito e funzionale. Bellissima la vista sulla città! 
Lo consiglio a tutti se andata a Barcellona, alloggiate qui e non ve ne pentirete!
Jose is very organized and very helpful. I enjoyed myself. Everything just as advertised. About a 20 minute walk to the beach. Great view.

Extraordinary apartment in a terrific location in Barcelona. The views of the Monumental Plaza de Toros and the Sagrada Familia are breathtaking, simply amazing! The apartment is perfectly organized down to the smallest detail, everything is set up for you to have a very pleasant stay -stuff to prepare your own breakfast included! José's hospitality makes you feel at home right away, communicationwith him was easy, fast and open. Tons of useful information were provided, everything was very well explained since the very first contact -including instructions on how to get to the apartment from different points in town. You can reach Sagrada Familia in under 15 minutes walking, or under 5 on a bike -which you can also rent from José at better prices than most places downtown. Biking around Barcelona is very safe and 100% recommended! All in all a great experience staying with José!
God

Jose was great. We had issues finding the apartment but Jose was very helpful and waited for us till we found our way which we appreciated massively. Highly recommend this apartment and the view is nothing short of amazing. 10/10
Localización muy buena entre el mar y la Sagrada Familia con la parada de metro al lado

Sehr schöne und zentral liegende Wohnung welche man sich mit Jóse und ggf anderen Gästen teilt. Jóse ist ein sehr netter, hilfsbereiter und Gastfreundlicher Gastgeber. Insgesamt sehr saubere und ordentlich ausgestattete Wohnung.
gerne wieder!!

Jose is a nice host, you can ask him whatever you need to know about, in Barcelona. However, don't expect that you are going to stay at a luxury apartment. What one should know is that Jose's place is shared, consisting of 4 rooms, the kitchen is not sparkling clean, and the breakfast is the most simple thing, namely, butter, coffee, and marmalades. Jose has his rules, which anyone should obey and this may give a feeling of military! But it's necessary because there is a big bunch of people in one apartment. Everywhere, there are rules that tell you how to act! Another thing is that, if you arrive at Barcelona after 11, he will ask you to take a taxi, because he cannot wait for you till late, and you may have to pay about 35 euros from the airport to get to his apartment as soon as he desire. After all, if you have already decided to stay in his place, do not miss the opportunity of renting his bikes, Barcelona is one of the best cities to hang around with bike and his bikes are fairly cheap.

首先地理位置很优越 距离圣家堂很近 交通也很便利

其次房东人很细心,有一些要求也是为了大家都舒服｡

整体而言还是挺不错的,不过由于我们入住的时候已经是8月下旬,天气很热｡之前看评价说12楼很凉快,但是我们入住的那三晚真的是热爆了｡窗户打开有点风,但是相当的吵,根本没法睡,关上的话又很热｡天花板上有个电风扇,我们试图找开关,发现疑似开关被拿胶带贴住了｡建议小伙伴们如果去的时候天气不热可以去住,或者不介意开窗吵的｡毕竟地理位置还是很不错的｡另外,洗澡有明确的时间,好像是7至晚11｡并非只有一个房间有租客,碰上租客全满的时候,要规划好游玩时间,避免回来太迟没有充足的时间洗澡｡
We had a great stay! Room was clean, location was great and the bike rent for only EUR 3,50 per bike per day was awesome.
ﾎｽﾄの方の手厚いﾌｫﾛｰには感謝している｡調理器具が揃っていて､か快適な生活を送れた｡

está habitación está muy céntrica,  bien ubicada y comunicada. excelentes vistas. todos los servicios descritos. igual q en las fotos. siguiendo las normas de la casa no hay ningún inconveniente. anfitrión amistoso

El departamento se encuentra en una ubicación excelente, muy fácil de llegar a cuálquier punto turístico. José siempre dispuesto a brindar información . El cuarto muy cómodo y la casa muy bien equipada. Gracias. Volveremos
Muy buen lugar para quedarse. Jose una persona espectacular!!
The flat has really great position. It’s relatively close to city center, very close to bus station and metro is like around the corner. View from windows is fantastic.
Jose very nice, his apartment very clean. The pictures are exactly what the place is like. Great location, 2 min walk from metro. Would definitely stay here next time.
스페인어가 안되도 영어만 할줄안다면 이 호스트는 당신에게 훌륭한 도움이 될것입니다.

Ha sido una estancia muy buena, José es un perfecto anfitrión; atento, simpático y servicial. 
Nos hizo recomendaciones sobre la ciudad. Cada habitación cuenta con su propio espacio y utensilios en la cocina.
Las vistas desde nuestro dormitorio eran sencillamente increíbles, a la monumental y sagrada familia. 
Repetiremos sin dudarlo. Muchas gracias por todo!

Our stay in Jóse’s place was amazing! His place was near the metro, and within walking distance from Sagrada Familia. We also enjoyed the view from the room- the  monumental toro and Sagrada Familia itself. He had greeted us personally, and provided us instructions on how to use the house, as well as some tips about the city. We truly appreciate his concern and he even offered for us to check in early. The place was quiet and well maintained, and smells really good! Makes you feel relaxed after a long day of tour. Thank you again Jòse for making our Barcelona trip even better!

La casa es muy acogedora y llena de luz; ubicada in un lugar muy conveniente para llegar al centro della ciudad paseando o también col metro/bus. José es una persona soleada y muy amable; y también  es un Host realmente organizado y práctico.
Otra cosa genial es la posibilidad de utilizar unas de las bicicletas di José para explorar Barcelona que tiene numerosos caminos para bicicletas.
Todo perfecto!

El lugar es excelente! José fue un anfitrión increible! Todo muy bien organizado y lleno de detalles pensado para que tengas todo lo que precisas. La limpieza excelente. Las camas super cómodas. La habitación tiene una vista espectacular. José siempre atento para ayudarte. Definitivamente un Súper host! Seguramente volveré a hospedarme alli!
Jose's place was perfectly located. Could not recommend it enough. Clean, great view, easy to walk everywhere. Jose, himself was wonderful as well and very accommodating.

Consiglio vivamente la casa di Josè. Vista spettacolare, posizione comodissima, 10 minuti a piedi dalla Sagrada familia, 3 minuti dalla metro L2, in cui si può raggiungere il centro di barcellona in 3 fermate, proprietario gentilissimo e disponibile. Se devo dire qualcosa di negativo mi posso lamentare solo del fatto che i riscaldamenti erano spenti (ma era specificato, quindi non mi sono stupito). Probabilmente non potevo scegliere un appartamento migliore. Straconsigliato.

Jose was a wonderful host! He was flexible and very helpful. He provided many details on the best ways to arrive and tips for the city. His place was very cute. The photos are very accurate with great views. The metro was super convenient or things were close enough to walk to. We hope to see him again soon! Definitely, recommend!
Our stay was really nice, the flat is very well organized with simple rules to make everything comfortable for everyone. the flat is perfectly located, and Jóse was really helpful.

Nuestra estancia en el dpto fue muy grata. el mismo es comodo, teniamos identificadas nuestra vajilla y alacena con un  color para uso nuestro exclusivo. jose fue muy amable al recibirnos, dandonos indicaciones de las atracciones que podia.os ver desde la ventana de la habitacion. sin dudas volveriamos a su casa!!
Really nice and accommodating, and the location is great!!

Jose’s place is very conveniently located and great value for your stay in Barcelona. It gets a bit chilly at night so make sure to pack some sweaters if you’re staying during the winter! We had a great stay at the place and he was very accommodating for our travel needs.

Superhost. Jose is  very friendly and helpful, giving you all the information about Barcelona. The flat is located in a very good area, aprox 5 mins from Sagrada Familia, and very close to metro stations. The apartment is very clean and organized.
Great host, beautiful bedroom, amazing location. Everything went without a hitch and we have nothing to complain about.

Jóse’s apartment is very comfortable and he is an extremely welcoming host. He gave me and my partner very detailed instructions how to commute to his apartment and the apartment was located well, minutes walk from the Segrada Familia. The entire apartment has excellent views of the city from most windows of the apartment. The amenities are very good and the cleanliness of the flat was also impressive with reasonable and expected rules. Thanks Jose for your hospitality:)

name: Home17 - R2
summary: An old completely restored house in the centre of Porto. You will find 5 Double Rooms and 1 Single Room all with Private Bathroom. A large common room where you can find a TV, WiFi and a comfortable couch. There is a large full equipped kitchen.
space: Home17 is a family project that will try to bring you an unique experience in the marvellous city of Porto. The House was originally built in the beginnings of the 20th century, more precisely in 1912. Last year the house was completely restored and designed to accommodate Porto's most beloved visitors, tourists!   You will find 5 Rooms all with Private Bathrooms and 1 Single room also with Private Bathroom. All rooms have their own keys, so you can be reassure no one will invade your privacy. The kitchen is full equipped, open and common with the living room, where guests can cook and eat in a group or alone. The living room is spacious and has a large sofa and TV so you can relax.  We have also a small terrace where you can just sit down and enjoy the morning sun while you have a cup of coffee. Additionally, the house has a laundry room (free) for guests who want to wash and dry their clothes. There is free wireless internet in the whole house. Guests are welcome to make special requ
description: An old completely restored house in the centre of Porto. You will find 5 Double Rooms and 1 Single Room all with Private Bathroom. A large common room where you can find a TV, WiFi and a comfortable couch. There is a large full equipped kitchen. Home17 is a family project that will try to bring you an unique experience in the marvellous city of Porto. The House was originally built in the beginnings of the 20th century, more precisely in 1912. Last year the house was completely restored and designed to accommodate Porto's most beloved visitors, tourists!   You will find 5 Rooms all with Private Bathrooms and 1 Single room also with Private Bathroom. All rooms have their own keys, so you can be reassure no one will invade your privacy. The kitchen is full equipped, open and common with the living room, where guests can cook and eat in a group or alone. The living room is spacious and has a large sofa and TV so you can relax.  We have also a small terrace where you can just sit down and
neighborhood_overview: The location is 5 minutes walking distance from the historic centre of the city. It is a quite area, very close to restaurants, bar and shops. Public transportation are also nearby.
notes: If you stay long periods we can arrange a cleaning schedule. At the moment your room will be clean before your check-in  and we will access your room only after your check out . This topic will be taken care individually by each reservation.
transit: Home17 is in the heart of the City. It is placed in a quiet area, but only 7 minutes walk from the most famous city monuments and streets.  In the neighbourhood you have also Porto's artisitic area: in Miguel Bombarda you will find art galleries, nice shops and comfortable coffee places. Around you also have traditional Portuguese restaurants, pubs, bars, clubs.  Home17 is easy to find and you have free parking space in the street where it is located or you can opt for one of the paid parking lots. If you need more details, we are more than happy to help.
access: Guest will have all the privacy wanted in their rooms. They have also free access to the common room, laundry room and terrace.
interaction: The interaction with guests only depends on them. We are more than happy to help you by providing all the information you need. We also provide a personal phone number in the case you need some help or have questions.  We will help as much as we can, the better we know, and as much as you need! You are our Guest and we like to treat our guests well :)
house_rules: We do not allow smoking inside  the house. If you are a smoker, we invite you to go to the terrace and smoke.   It is also asked for all the guests not to play loud music in order not to disturb other guests. Every time the kitchen is used we ask to put everything in the washing machine so other guests can cook after you.

host.host_about: I was raised and born in Porto! Porto offers the mix between beauty, good food, the beach and very friendly people. Porto citizens are very characteristic and I am proud to make part of that "group". We love to welcome people, we treat them like our own family. We always like that our guest feel that Home17 is their own home.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
I would definitely go back to Home17. 

It's a lovely recently refurbished old the house, the inside has been done up to a good modern standard & is kept clean and tidy. The room I stayed in had plenty of daylight and a nice little desk. The kitchen had all the equipment you need to make yourself a meal.

The location was good, with galleries and shops close by and the old town only 15minute walk away.

Home 17 was a very nice place to stay. We felt very welcome from the second we came in! It is very well located next to many restaurants and bars. Everything was very clean. The kitchen is very nice and in the morning you can enjoy the sun in the backyard. I would highly recommend home17 to other visitors !

The place was really good located for the day and night life and it was very clean. We had a very nice stay in Porto. The only thing that we regret is that we did not have a chance to meet the host and we did by have any advice in what to do in Porto. We felt more like in a hotel than in someone's house as we were looking for by choosing airbnb. But if you are bot looking for that, I recommend you this place !

Home17 is fantastic and Luis is a great host! We stayed four days at Home17 as we went to a wedding near Porto. Home17 is greatly located, was very clean, spacious, and had a perfect admosphere. Luis helped us by arranging a taxi to get to the wedding and even bought a brand new ironing board as wanted to iron our wedding clothes that were wrinckeled from carrying it in our suit cases. On our first night his sister gave us directions on how to get to the bar area of Porto, which was an easy 5 minute walk. We didn't use the kitchen, but it was fully equipped with all possible tools and the apartment also has a washing machine.  I really can't come up with any negative points!

Luis wasnt´t there but his mother opened the door for us, all went smoothly! The room was very nice, with a little balcony, all very clean and tidy.
It was a great location, close to the city center but away from the crowd!
Very good location, well decorated apartment, nice host, everything was perfect.

Luis and Luisa were very friendly and helpful, and we had a really great stay. The room was very comfortable, it was exactly as described and had everything we needed - if anything, it was better than we expected and very clean. We didn't use the kitchen much except to eat some of the delicious home grown oranges, but the kitchen and shared living area were great. The location was very convenient and also very quiet. Thanks again, we will definitely recommend a stay here to anyone we know travelling to Porto.
We had a great time in porto! Thanks for everything luis and luisa the house was really clean and you had really good recommendations. I would really like to come back again.

This is a really nice place. The house is beautiful, old but completely renovated and located right next to the city centre, just a few minutes walk from many interesting places in Porto. The rooms are nice and clean. Luis was very helpful with information and recommendations of what to do in Porto. Totally recomendable.

They gave us the feeling that we came home. Very pleasant :) beautifull house located absolutely fine. luckily we got an upgrade which we did not asked for so we were very satisfied. We can recommend this place!!

Das Zimmer und das Haus sind sehr sauber und schick eingerichtet. In der gemeinschaftlichen Küche kann man super kochen oder morgens frühstücken. Die Küche ist immer sehr sauber, sowie der Rest des Hauses. Es liegt sehr zentral und man kann alles fußläufig gut erreichen. Luis und seine Frau sind sehr herzlich und haben uns auch sehr kurzfristig bei sich aufgenommen. Aufjedenfall zu empfehlen.

Home17 es exactamente como lo describen las fotos:

- La casa posee habitaciones con baños privados para cada una y una cocina y sala comunitaria con todos los implementos necesarios: Cocina, lavaplatos, refrigeradora, platos, tenedores / cucharas, vasos, etc.

- Luis y Luisa son excelentes anfitriones. Luis nos dio consejos de como llegar desde el aeropuerto y nos explicó la ruta a seguir. Luisa nos recibió el día de la llegada, nos dio un recorrido del lugar, nos entregó la llave y nos dio tips sobre Porto.

- Home17 está localizada cerca de un supermercado, farmacias, café, estación de taxi y el centro de la ciudad (donde se puede recorrer las calles tranquilamente).

- El dia de nuestra llegado fuimos a comprar comida y bebida al supermercado, guardamos todo en el refrigerador y utilizamos la cocina para los desayunos durante nuestro hospedaje. Logramos compartir con otros huéspedes de diferentes nacionalidades por lo que la experiencia en general fue increíblemente mejor.

Home17 es recomendada 100% para cualquier viaje a la ciudad de Porto.

The room was beautifully renovated and value for money. The guesthouse is in a great location, we didn't need to take any public transportation during our stay. 

Luis and Luisa were amazing hosts, very friendly and helpful, and provided great suggestions of where to go and what to do during our stay. 

The facilities were amazing, with a huge common area complete with a modern kitchen,  large dining table and lounge, and free laundry access. 

We were also able to leave our bags and take the keys with us on our final day as we had a late flight, which was lovely! 

Thank you so much! We loved our stay

The room is fantastic and very close to the city center. The hosts are very friendly and comprehensive, they make you feel like home :)
Thanks for the great time!
Localização excelente, quarto confortável, limpeza perfeita. Anfitriões simpáticos e disponíveis. Uma óptima escolha, no centro do Porto.
Quiet area, very nice house after renovation.  Very nice equipment of the room. Clean. 3min in the center. Places to eat breakfast around.
Luis' guest house is great! Everything is as described, and Luis is a kind person. Very quiet and clean place! Would definitely stay again!

name: Bright Suite Apartments
summary: Restored in 2012 within the framework of the local area and retaining its charm, this air-conditioned aparthotel consists of 15 suites and offers stylish accommodation suitable for leisure and business guests alike. Guests are welcomed in the lobby,
space: Located on a side street in the heart of Besiktas, the residences are within walking distance of Dolmabahce Palace, Yildiz Palace and the ferry port to the Asian side of the city. Taksim Square is 2.3 km away and Ataturk International Airport 21 km from the establishment. Sabiha Gokcen International Airport is approximately 43 km from the hotel.

Guests can enjoy breakfast continental style- or may wish to indulge in lunch or dinner in the hotel restaurant.
