If a couple with children under 12 years, I can leave the value of the guest extra $ 50. An excellent place to enjoy wonderful days in Rio de Janeiro.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Sou estilista e escritora, moro com meu marido e dois filhos numa cidade que adoro.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Great place!! Spectacular postcard view of Sugar Loaf Botafogo beach.The apartment is newly-renovated and air-conditioned .There is a shopping mall ,grocery stores,a great independent  movie theater, bookstores, and great cafes minutes from the building. The metro station is located just a few blocks away. Copacabana and Ipanema beaches are just a few stops away by bus or metro. You can actually walk to Copacabana and Urca ! Ana Amelia was  so responsive and worked with me to create a vacation with everything.She is very prompt on responding to requests and is extremely helpful.

Estou muito satisfeita com o atendimento e transparência com que fui tratada, tanto pela anfitriã ANA AMÉLIA como pelo site AIRBNB.
Tive inúmeros imprevistos durante a reserva do Flat, incluindo a necessidade de mudar a data de chegada até o cancelamento definitivo da minha viagem. Em todos eles, fui atendida com muito atencão, flexibilidade e consideracão por ambas as (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza indico!!! 
É nas horas em que as coisas não saem como planejamos que percebemos o quanto é importante tratar com pessoas competentes e honestas.
Muito Obrigada por tudo! E espero em breve fechar outras reservas!
Sophia
Ana was nice as well as Patricia, and the space is incredible.  Clean, bright, airy...with an absolutely perfect view.

This apartment is just incredible: it has a breathtaking view on the "pao de azucar", and even an hammock on which you can lay and watch the panorama. It is really as it seems on the photos, and probably even better. Moreover, Ana has been very kind, taking care of all my needs/requests. If I will ever come back to Rio, I hope I can stay here again.

The apartment is charming and really does have a spectacular view from the 12th floor, is safe and does have very good air-conditioning!

The location in Botafogo was perfect for my trip which was for work so the easy access to the Metro and numerous buses was really helpful as we needed to be all over the city each day for meetings.

I was very impressed with Ana Amelia's efficiency in responding to my booking and various enquiries - this was appreciated. Also, Patricia her assistant was punctual for the handover of the keys despite the lateness of my arrival and she was also very helpful when I had any questions. Also, the reception staff were extremely nice and helpful too!

I really enjoyed my stay and have recommended it to a number of friends.

However, as it is important to provide a truthful review, it is fair to say that my only negative comment about the apartment is that the noise levels from the street below are very high due to the many lanes of traffic in front of the building but most significantly the windows are of extremely poor quality so there was never a quiet moment - the flat really does need secondary glazing.

Finally, many thanks for hosting us - it was a memorable trip!

I spent a wonderful time in Ana's apartment. The view is really spectacular!  It is near the shopping,,10 minutes from Copacabana and 15 from Ipanema. You have every transportation you want at your door or pretty near.
Amelia and her assistant Patricia were really nice and cosy and if something is missing or if you need anything they  are very helpful.

We spent 11 days at Ana's apartment and agree it has to be the best view in Rio!  The location is great, especially if you want to spend time both in the south (at the famous beaches and Lagoa) and further north in the city centre seeing some of the cultural bits, as Botafogo is mid-way between them. In fact we did lots of walking (as far afield as the Jardim Botanico and to Urca for the Sugar Loaf cable car) and relied on the nearby Metro for our transport needs.

The apartment was clean, modern, safe and had all the facilities we needed including a great big fridge/freezer, coffee percolator, washing machine, huge wet-room style shower, wireless internet, and effective air conditioning which was especially welcome.  I'd agree about the noise of the 11 lanes of traffic, but the earplugs we brought with us meant we weren't disturbed.

Ana's list of local suggestions of shops, restaurants etc was a big help.  Highlights of our trip included a day trip by ferry to Niteroi, an afternoon at the brilliant exhibitions in the Paço Imperial, cycling round the Lagoa, a swish lunch at Confeitaria Colombo in town, the Saturday antiques market at Praça XV de Novembro (much better than the Sunday craft fair at Ipanema General Osorio) and of course plenty of relaxation with agua de coco and caipirinhas at Copacabana and Ipanema!

If we go back to Rio (which I hope we will) I'd be very happy to stay at Ana's place again.

Me encanto el apartamento, realmente una vista magnífica al pao de acucar! El baño muy limpio, el aire acondicionado funcionaba perfecto. Un barrio recidencial, muy tranquilo y a la vez cerca de los sitios turísticos.

We have been looking at the photos of Ana Amelia's apartment all through the cold British winter and the reality was even better than the pictures.  What a view and perfectly positioned to walk to the shopping, run along the beach, catch a taxi to the centre or in the other direction the swimming beaches.  

The apartment was well equipped but not at all cluttered - I hope we will be able to return in future years.
The reservation was canceled 341 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Appartement super lumineux avec une vue sublime!!!!
A 10-15 minutes à pied ou transports en commun de tout!
Très bon accueil et conseils; si nous revenons à Rio nous reviendrons c'est sûr!

This place is absolutely perfect, just like the other reviews say. I stayed for 2 weeks while I was in Rio for work. The subway is just a few minutes away, everything you need is close by (pharmacies, grocery stores, the Botafogo shopping mall...). It's just what I needed. 

The apartment is very well equipped and I was able to cook and do everything else. The living room area is really nice and the cable television has channels in English available. The kitchen is easy to cook in and the oven, etc, work perfectly. The washing machine was also very helpful!

Ana's assistant greeted me when I arrived because Ana wasn't available. She explained everything and was always available by phone in case of a problem. 

I would definitely book this place without hesitating if I have to go back to Rio again!

We stayed in this apartment 6 days and, summarizing, it was better than we expected.
The apartment was clean, big enough for a couple, and has all the things that you could need (iron, whasing machine, gas kitchen, fridge, tv with cable, air condicioner...)

But the thing that we loved was the view. The Pao de Açucar and the beach of Botafogo are visible from the hole apartment (excepting the bathroom). 

The only thing that can be a bit annoying is the fact that the apartment is in front of one of the main roads of Rio and therefore, there is a constant traffic noise. 

Summarizing, the apartament

We overall had a great experience at Ana's apartment.  The view was fantastic as you can see in the picture.  The location was great too, in walking distance there were juice bars, convenience stores, a mall, and the metro.  Also, the doormen were very friendly and helpful during our stay.

An amazing place to stay in Rio. The apartment is spotless and is perfectly laid out with everything one could need. SO convenient, with the metro close by and a continuous stream of busses right out of the front door. Cabs are very easy to find also. The area is well served by supermarkets and great restaurants. The huge Botafogo Praia shopping mall is a block away. Patricia, Ana's assistant, was there to help with any needs and kindly helped us, along with the friendly doorman, with our cases when we checked out. As for the view, wow- truly unbelievable! Would love to come back!

A great ten night stay indeed! The apartment is really good. It is in good condition and there is everything you'll need: bed linen, towels, good wifi, an iron, washing machine, aircon, well equipped kitchen etc... The location is perfect. The metro station is near so it is easy to get around the city. Also, Botafogo seems to be really safe even at night and there are great restaurants and supermarkets nearby. Ana (even I did not meet her) and her assistant were really kind and helpful and everything went perfectly. Would book again, definitely!

We really enjoyed our stay with Ana Amelia Macedo's place at "The most beautiful view in Rio"! The place is clean, secure and beautifully located for the one of the best views in Rio. All amenities works perfectly. Ana's assistant (Patricia) it was very helpful with the small details about the place and outside in the neighborhood. Her response it was always stellar. We definitely recommend it.

We  had a great experience at Ana's apartment. The view from the apartment is fantastic. If you take pictures, you will have a Rio de Janeiro postal.
The location is great, in walking distance there convenience stores, a shopping mall, and the metro. The apartment is clean and big. 
It have all the equipment that you need for a good stay in Rio. Otherwise Ana and Patricia, the Ana´s assistant are very polite.

I stood in "the most beautiful view in Rio" apartment for one week. I highly recommend it. The view is very beautiful especially between five and six in the morning. The kitchen has everything you need to prepare your own meals and the washer is very convenient in the bathroom. 

I did not meet Amelia but I was welcomed by her assistant Patricia who was very helpful. 

Thank you Amelia and Patricia, we enjoyed our stay and plan to return in the future!

Yes! The view is fabuleus. 
The apartment is cosy and complete and the location (Botafogo) is perfect. 
Disadvantage:  there is a lot of traffic noise during the day and during the night.
Ótimo apartamento, perfeito para casal! Bem localizado, metrô e restaurantes próximos. Prédio antigo, mas bem conservado. Uma boa opção de hospedagem.

O apartamento é muito confortável, bem equipado e limpo. Tem tudo que você precisa para relaxar e muito mais. Nós fomos capazes de levar o nosso cachorro e ate ele se sentia bem lá. A vista das janelas é maravilhosa e a localização é perfeita: o bairro não é muito lindo, mas tem mercados, botecos, a praia é em frente e é facilmente acessível. Passamos um fim de semana muito lindo. Obrigada por tudo Amelia Ana e Patricia! Esperamos voltar em breve.

The flat is spacious, with a beautiful view indeed. It is ideally located for those who want to see more than Rio's beaches, with good transport links anywhere in town and the airports. Being so central, the flat is a bit noisy; I was pleasantly surprised to see how quickly I got used to the city hum. Thanks very much !

Even though I didn´t meet Ana, she was always in communication with us through Paty, her assistant; they were very accommodating with us and Paty gave us some great advices about the city.

The apartment is nice and it was very clean, you have everything you need. The best thing about this place is the view, it is really amazing. If I come back to Rio, I definitely will consider this place to stay again.

¡I recommend this place to anyone that want to visit Rio!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Aunque no conocí a Ana, ella siempre estaba en comunicación con nosotros a través de Paty, su asistente; ellas siempre estuvieron al pendiente de nosotros y Paty nos dio buenos consejos sobre la ciudad. 

El apartamento es agradable y estaba muy limpio, tiene todo lo que necesita. Lo mejor de este lugar es la vista, es realmente increíble. Si regreso a Río, definitivamente consideraré este lugar para quedarme de nuevo. 

¡Recomiendo este lugar a cualquiera que quiera visitar Rio!

This apartment has a gorgeous view,  but it is located right above a very busy road. Beware of constant noise, day and night. Place is cute and conveniently located. It was easy to grab a taxi and close to metro.  Unfortunately Ana Amelia was away. Her helper, the girl who opened the flat for us, did not speak English and was not helpful at all. The TV did not work and we could not reach her for any assistance for 5 days.

The apartment has great views! Whilst a lot of the previous comments provided by other tenants mentioned the noise issue, my husband and I were not too disturbed by the noise. The apartment is also very spacious which was definitely a plus point! 

Upon our arrival we were greeted by Anna's assistant, Laura. Whilst Laura was very helpful, she did not speak English too well so there were a lot of things about the apartment that was left unexplained. 

Our stay was generally great with some water interruption occurring towards the end. Notwithstanding, Anna was always prompt in replying to is when there were interruptions. Furthermore, Anna kindly compensated the shortcomings by provisioning the taxi transport to the airport (which was a very nice gesture!)

In summary, my husband and I were in Rio for 8 days and thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Anna's apartment.

One Word: LOCATION!
The flat is in a very central and nice area of Rio and the view is even more incredible than in the pictures.
As some other visitors mentioned, it is a bit noisy (because of the cars) day & night... so bring your earplugs!
But honestly, the view is really worth it!
We haven't met Ana Amelia but Laura for check in / check out. No problems with that, it all went smoothly at the times that were planned.

Overall, very good flat for a stay in Rio with everything you will need (and even a very nice juice bar downstairs)!

Ana's apartment indeed has a breathtaking view - and this is a source of constant pleasure. The sun rise is particularly stunning!  It is a bit noisy - the road outside is really busy most of the day and night - but it was surprising how quickly one gets used to it with the windows shut. The place was beautifully clean and equipped with anything you could want. The bed is comfortable and the shower powerful and large.  There is A/C and a fan and good wireless. Ana and her assistant Laura could not have been more helpful, and were quick to respond to questions. The juice bar on the corner beneath the apartment is a must - try the Mango juice but remember to ask for no sugar!

Ana Amelia's apartment is very nice and modern and, as promised in the description, it really is the most beautiful view in Rio. Great location, although the building is huge with many apartments, many people in and out and some stores on the first floor and it's on a very busy street. It's easy to get metro, bus, taxi from there.

Arrived at the apartment and greeted by the lovely Ana and her assistant Lara. Beautiful view took our breath away. Clean and spacious with everything needed for your stay. Super shower and plenty of storage space. Comfy bed and great air con. Yes there is traffic noise but ear plugs did the job and we got used to it after a few days. Ideal position for the metro and buses, but taxi rides really cheap so used those at night for safety. Shopping mall close by and great restaurants. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend this apartment.
Um belo apartamento, bem localizado, simples, funcional e confortável. A vista é deslumbrante até com o céu encoberto. Espero voltar em breve. Recomendo, com certeza.

Ana Amelia`s apartment was really great. The view is even better than the photos. Flat is very clean and tidy. When we arrived Ana Amelia and Lara greeted us with a generous welcome. Everthing was ready in the aparment for us to stay in comfort. The location was great. Very easy to reach by public transportation. Close to Lapa and Beaches as well. Don`t think twice this apartment is simply great and  will meet your expectation in every aspects. Thanks Ana and Lara.

Exceptional flat with an incredible view over the famous "Pão de Açúcar". Very bright and clean . A nice vintage deck chair, from which you see only the Pao de Acucar. Aircondition works very well.
What a pity you cannot swim in the sea from the nice Botofago beach in front of the house, which is poluted and that you have to take a bus or taxi to go to Cocapabana.
Food shop is a little too far (15mn walk), even for bying a bottle of water. Very few restaurants in the aera. Nevertheless a very nice place to spend a few days.
Ótimo apartamento. Bem localizado, boas acomodações, limpo e atendimento muito receptivo. A vista merece um comentário à parte, pois é realmente uma das mais bonitas do Rio de Janeiro. Super indico.

I will break this review into three items - the unit, location, and assistance.  

The Unit:
The view is amazing, the unit is very spacious, the bed is comfortable, the AC works great, and all appliances work well - it has everything you will need (pots, pans, glasses, silverware, etc.). 
The noisy traffic outside did not bother specially after closing the  windows. 

Location:
The location is great, just outside the entrance there are two juice bars and a "padaria" (deli).  It's also close to banks and a 3-minute walk to the Botafogo Praia Shopping.  
It's about a 5-10 minute walk to the subway, there is a bus stop nearby, and there are cabs driving by all the time (to get an idea there are 33,000+ cabs in Rio which is more than twice the number of cabs in NYC).

Assistance:
I had a few questions while I was there and Ana always responded promptly and ready to help.   Laura (the assistant that met with us to turn in the keys) was very nice and always on time - for getting us the key she was in the apartment at least 30 minutes earlier, and to turn in the apartment she was 10 minutes early. 

Overall, I strongly recommend to anyone that wants to visit Rio!

Host was very welcoming. We had a late arrival and due to traffic we arrived later than stated but Camille waited around showed us the apartment. The apartment itself was as described! Absolutely luved out stay - spacious for three people, amenities needed there and the view was simply gorgeous. The area it self is convenient. When we come back next year will definitely stay here again! ☺️

The apartment was as indicated in the app, clean, modern, and tastefully decorated. The view is amazing! The neighborhood is central and safe. The only negative point was the loud street noise, which of course is normal in most areas of Rio.

I booked the flat for myself, my husband and a friend to stay for a week. It was impeccably clean and there were fresh sheets on the main bed. Ana Amelia and her assistant Laura welcomed me to the flat and everything was in order. During our time there we twice had a problem with our keys, where one spare set did not fit the lock at all. Ana Amelia's assistant, Laura, sorted the problem out instantly. We really appreciated this. The only negative was that the sofa bed is quite old, and although comfortable, we felt that we had to put double sheets on the mattress as it was quite stained. Otherwise the flat was very comfortable, and I would certainly suggest the flat to family and friends. The building is very safe with 24hr porters who were more than kind and helpful on our lock issue days!  In all, we had a wonderful stay and waking up to the magnificent view of the Sugar Loaf every day was wonderful.

Le logement est bien situé, conforme à la description. La vue est effectivement magnifique !!!
Le manque de double vitrage a fait que nous avons été obligés de dormir avec des boules quiès.
Malgré cet inconvénient, nous avons été satisfait des 3 nuits passées dans cet appartement.
I was unique waking up with a view the Sugarloaf every day!

Appartement conforme à la description sur le site, encore plus charmant en réalité. 
Équipement sommaire mais le nécessaire est là (draps, serviettes de toilette, ustensiles de cuisine, eau).
La vue sur le pain de sucre est saisissante et vaut à elle seule que l'on choisisse cet appartement.
Seul bémol: le bruit (important trafic au pied de l'immeuble)= boules quies obligatoires, à prévoir.
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Ana Amelia durant notre séjour, les check in et check out ont été réalisés par deux jeunes filles très gentilles mais dont l'une ne parlait pas anglais.
Immeuble sécurisé (gardien 24h/24).
Emplacement idéal (moins de 10min à pied du métro, arrêt de bus au pied de l'immeuble, quartier populaire très agréable).
En somme, très bon séjour, appartement à recommander.

The host was accommodating and the description was accurate.
However, the living room air conditioner did not function at all.

The description of "the most beautiful view is Rio" is, and I have seen almost every view, an understatement.

The staff was helpful and thoughtful.

Botafogo is a fun place to wander around.

Gostei muito de ficar no apartamento da Ana Ameila, a vista de Pão de Açúcar é incrível, não perca a oportunidade de acordar com essa vista quando você ficar no Rio de Janeiro! O apartamento também é muito comfortável e limpo e tem tudo que você precisa. O apartmento fica no prédio seguro e bem localizado para conhecer a cidade maravilhosa. Ana Ameila ajudou bastante com nossa estadia e organizou um jeito para deixar as chaves com ela então poderíamos sair cedo no final dia para pegar nosso voo. Gostaria de voltar com certeza!

Great stay at Rio , the place have indeed an amazing view , we had a little problem with the AC but was resolved by the host , Ana was always checking that all was perfect for us , Rio is a lot of fun so we are planning to come back very soon :).

The apartment was clean , and the building is pretty safe.

Bellissimo!!! Vista stupenda e oltre al pão de açùcar si vede anche il Corcovado dalla finestra del bagno! Appartamento spazioso, sicuro e in un'ottima posizione con tutti i servizi. Veramente perfetto!!!

Ana's flat is exactly as advertised. Spacious, comfy, and with and amazing view. Close to a mall that has everything you need. And easy transport connections to mail sightseeing points.

Fernanda and Dan received us very well and communication with Ana was great all the way.

Thank you for a lovely stay!

Todo o atendimento foi feito virtualmente. E funcionou. Todas as minhas dúvidas foram rapidamente atendidas e de forma eficiente.
A vista do apto é de fato linda!
O apto é espaçoso, prédio de 12 andares com elevador e muitos serviços úteis ao redor (metro, onibus, shopping, farmácia, etc).


Para casais, um bom custo x benefício!
Great and luminous flat. The view is impressive (just like in the pictures). If you are coming from overseas and are jet lagged, you will enjoy unforgettable sunrises.

This apartment really does have the most beautiful view in Rio!  This is the second time we stayed here.  The apartment is clean, simply furnished, and has everything you need to make you feel at home.  But the best part of the apartment is the location.  It is close to the subway, to major bus lines, and an easy cab ride both to the beaches and the center.

Very good location right in front of Botafogo beach with a stunning view on the sugar loaf. The landlady was very responsive. The apartment was sufficiently spacious and clean. Everything was as described in the website. We recommended the landlady to install a power shower device to make taking a shower more comfortable.
Ótima localização, vista realmente deslumbrante, apt fiel ao descrito e as imagens da oferta, equipado e limpo. Adoramos (eu e minha família) a experiência.

Ana's home was clean, comfortable and interesting - the views were more spectacular than in the photos. The location was perfect for sightseeing and walking around the city's landmarks. Ana also had a handy folder of recommendations for things to do in the area.

We had a few initial glitches - there was no toilet paper in the bathroom and the toilet at one point got clogged (we were only told later, during the de-clogging process, that plumbing in Brazil is not up to scratch and because of this, toilet paper is binned not flushed). But Ana's assistant Laura was on call and despite the communication problem (she speaks Portuguese, we speak English), she ensured that the issue was taken care. Overall, a good experience.

Travelled with colleagues in September 2016.
Хороший район, все необходимое рядом. Вид из окна лучше чем на фото!, он просто потрясающий! Очень уютная и милая квартира, все правда. Хозяева отзывчивые и пунктуальные.
A vista é insuperável e o apartamento é lindo e confortável. Super recomendo!
I really enjoyed my stay in this cute cozy yet spacious apartment with the greatest view! Definitely recommend it!

name: 2 quartos no Centro - Arcos da Lapa em frente!
summary: apartamento na
space: Sofa cama casal; 2 Camas BOX casal; 2 TVs 32; Cozinha, com pratos, talher, algumas panelas acessórios e cafeteira; Shampoo, condicionador, sabonete, pasta de dente, papel higiênico incluído; Cada quarto possui uma varanda privativa;
description: apartamento na
neighborhood_overview: Diversos Bares, restaurantes e casas noturnas. Mercado, farmácia, lojas americanas, etc. Do outro lado, a Cinelandia com o teatro municipal e diversas construções arquitetonicas da historia Brasileira.
transit: Metro estação Cinelandia e diversas linhas de onibus: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , etc. Para quem chegar pela Rodoviaria novo Rio e aeroporto Santos Dumond tem a opcao do VLT, tipo um  trenzinho que deixa voces na Cinelandia. Por aqui tambem usarmos bastante app de taxis e uber.
access: Excelente localização, próximo às estações Carioca e Cinelândia do metrô, além de ônibus para diversos bairros como Flamengo, Copacana, Ipanema, Leblon, Jardim Botânico, etc. e zona norte, e principais pontos turísticos, como Corcovado, Pão de Açúcar, Maracanã, Santa Teresa, etc. A Lapa é considerada o berço da boemia carioca, com um rico conjunto arquitetônico, abriga os melhores bares, restaurantes e casas noturnas da cidade, oferecendo música para todos os gostos, além de lojas de antiguidades e a tradicional feira da Rua do Lavradio. O bairro dispõe de supermercados, padarias, lanchonetes e bancos. Destaque para a Igreja de Santo Antônio dos Pobres, que foi restaurada e possui um belo órgão, além dos sobrados da rua dos Inválidos.  Buscamos melhorar sempre para superar suas expectativas.
interaction: Pouca interação devido ao trabalho. Basicamente entrego e pego as chaves, me colocando a disposição via email, telefone, app e zap.
house_rules: - Estou começando uma campanha de Imãs de geladeira, portanto peço aos hospedes que levem um imã de sua cidade; - Favor não jogar nada pela janela; - Favor deixar as roupas de cama e toalhas utilizadas em cima da cama;

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Tivemos dias incríveis no apartamento do Gustavo! Mal desembarquei no Rio, recebi uma mensagem dele me dando as boas vindas e se colocando à minha disposição. O apartamento é bem equipado, o prédio é bacana e os funcionários, muito gentis. Nos hospedamos em 5 pessoas, confortavelmente. A localização é sensacional, e facilitou muito o trânsito pelo Rio. Além disso, fica em frente ao batalhão da PM, o que nos fez sentir bastante seguros. Gostamos muito da experiência, e já estamos conversando sobre uma próxima. Obrigada!
Anfitrião bem disponível e atencioso. O apartamento fica super bem localizado no centro da cidade, perto de tudo e é muito aconchegante, inclusive bem melhor que as fotos!!! Recomendado!!

Hospedagem super tranquila. Anfitrião muito prestativo e de fácil comunicação. Apartamento bem localizado e confortável. Recomendo para famílias e grupos. Quando voltar ao Rio me hospedarei novamente, com certeza.

O Gustavo foi um ótimo anfitrião, desde o início da negociação até o momento final da estadia, sempre disponível e prestativo. O Ape é simplesmente perfeito, condiz exatamente com enunciado, aconchegante, e o melhor de tudo, com um preço justíssimo! Nos sentimos em casa! A Lapa é aquela loucura que só quem conhece sabe, acho que só não é indicado pra quem tem sono muuuuito leve, nós não tivemos problema nenhum e com certeza nos hospedaremos novamente numa próxima vez!

Eu e mais quatro amigos ficamos 5 noites no apartamento do Gustavo. O apartamento estava conforme o anúncio e acomodou a todos conforme o esperado. Gustavo foi super prestativo em se ajustar aos nossos horários de voo, o que facilitou. Por ficar próximo a uma avenida movimentada, o apartamento se tornava bem barulhento às vezes, mas com a canseira da agitação pré-carnaval, o barulho não foi um incômodo para nós. A localização é excelente, pertinho dos bares agitados da Lapa e também bem próximos ao metrô da Cinelândia, o que facilita muito ir para as praias durante o dia.

O Gustavo, nosso anfitrião,  é uma pessoa nota 1000! Extremamente educado e prestativo para tudo que solicitamos, sempre pronto a ajudar e prestar informações. Foi uma grande pena não podermos conhecê-lo pessoalmente... 
O apto, embora pequeno (o que não importa, pois só utilizamos à noite) é muito bem localizado. Tem todos os equipamentos e utensílios necessários para uma boa hospedagem, e não nos preocupamos com (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza retornaremos, e indicaremos a outros contatos que desejem ir ao Rio de Janeiro.

Fora algumas coisas que já falei com o Gustavo que precisam ser trocadas, o apartamento é bem localizado, tivemos muita liberdade, o pessoal que trabalha no prédio também é ótimo!!! Até a próxima!!! Obrigada por tudo.
O apartamento é bem agradável e muito bem localizado, próximo ao metrô e ao estacionamento da Cinelândia. Não deixou nada a desejar e superou as expectativas!
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

O AP tem uma excelente localização, camas são muito confortáveis, Eu e meus amigos alugamos a casa por conta de um show no circo voador e para essa finalidade a localização foi extraordinária em 1 minuto estávamos no nosso destino, alem de ser colado com os arcos da Lapa é muito próximo ao metro e a outros estabelecimentos que só colaboraram para excelente estadia

O apartamento do Gustavo é bastante limpo e organizado. Todos os 4 cantos do ap estavam limpíssimo! A comunicação foi sempre rápida e clara. Gustavo é um cara bem atencioso e flexível. Há 2 quartos, ambos com ar-condicionado. A internet Wi-fi funciona perfeitamente. O ap está bem localizado, poucos metros dos Arcos da Lapa. Como precisei ir ao Consulado Americano do RJ, precisei andar apenas 10 minutos. Recomendo para qualquer amigo ou familiar.

El apartamento es tql cual se muestra en las fotos. Está junto al acuaducto de lapa y muy bien comunicado. 
Gustavo fue facil de contactar y muys amable.
Recomendable parq cualquier viajero!
P

Minha primeira experiência pelo Airbnb não poderia ter sido melhor, não conheci o Gustavo pessoalmente mas ele foi bem atencioso. A hospedagem foi maravilhosa, apartamento aconchegante, bem equipado, super bem localizado, perto de metrô, VLT, aeroporto, pontos turísticos... Enfim, super recomendo o apartamento do Gustavo.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Apartamento aconchegante e muito bem localizado.
A sala é pequena, mas para poucas pessoas isso não interfere.
Gustavo muito prestativo, educado e atencioso.
Adorei.
Obrigada por nos receber.

Apartamento do Gustavo é excelente, a localização é excelente, facil de chegar, e ir para diversos lugares da cidade, rua tranquila, portaria 24hs, internet otima, vista da janela é tentadora, varios lugares para comer, banco, mercadinho, padaria, tudo pertinho. Gustavo desde antes da reserva sempre respondendo as duvidas rapidamente, com dicas e orientações otimas, acompanhamento da nossa estadia  foi excelente, e sim ... futuros hóspedes, deixem um imã de geladeira de presente pra ele.. é muito legal... e em breve ele vai ter que comprar outra geladeira para colocar tantas lembranças !  Obrigado e como já disse, vamos voltar sempre !
Ótima estadia. Gustavo responde às mensagens rapidamente e é muito amável. O apartamento e confortável e tem tudo o necesario para uma boa estadia.
Ótimo anfitrião, fácil acesso a ele e muito tranquilo.

Bom, essa foi a minha segunda vez que fico hospedado no apartamento no ano, e foi simplesmente sensacional, o apartamento é ótimo, confortável, limpinho, preço muito bacana e é perto de tudo. Gustavo como sempre foi bem atencioso, sempre apto a ajudar. Super recomendo ;)

Gostei muito do apartamento, supriu as necessidades e cumpriu com o que promete, ótima localização, limpo, tudo em pleno funcionamento e o Gustavo sempre disponível para esclarecer dúvidas. Recomendo!

Super indico!
Quartos espaçosos, vizinhança tranquila, localização perfeita, próximo à vários bares ótimos e a vários museus e teatros!

Casa limpa e arrumadinha.. os porteiros do prédio foram muito solícitos para ajudar com as malas. 
Entretanto, na descrição falava que tinha shampoo e condicionador, mas na realidade tinha um restinho mínimo de shampoo que não dava nem pra lavar o cabelo de 1 pessoa.. tivemos que comprar. 
O lugar é perigoso a noite.
Gustavo sempre muito atencioso. E o apartamento é bem localizado.
O Gustavo foi um ótimo anfitrião que nos recebeu no último minuto. Tudo correu muito bem. Recomendo a todos.

Apartamento de acordo com a descrição, local bem bacana, bonitinho, limpo e arrumado. 
Porteiro 24h, liberdade para entrarmos e sairmos sempre que desejávamos.
pretendo retornar :)

Precisa melhorar a estrutura, a porta do banheiro não fecha, luz da
Sala não acende.
Ótima localização. Edifício com porteiro 24hrs. Nos sentimos em casa. Indico e hospedaria novamente.

Foi ótimo ficar na casa do Gustavo. Quando fui procurar um ap na Lapa não pensei que encontraria um tão perto dos arcos. Além disso é pertinho também do Teatro Municipal, da Biblioteca Nacional, do Circo Voador, da Fundição e de outros pontos turísticos super bacanas. O VLT é a menos de 5 minutos a pé, muito perto mesmo. Andando alguns minutos também dá pra encontrar mercadinhos e muitos restaurantes e bares legais! A casa é espaçosa e aconchegante. Nos sentimos em (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza alugaria de novo

O apartamento é simples, porem tudo bem limpo, bem organizado, é super bem localizado, fácil acesso a tudo, metro, aeroporto, lugares para comer, barzinhos e etc.
O Gustavo sempre atencioso, e sempre respondia na hora que mandávamos mensagens.
A luz da sala não estava funcionando, porem não foi algo que nos fez falta.
Adoramos, muito bem localizado e completo. Cama Boa, itens do apto bons, recomendamos.
Apartamento muito bem consolidado e com dois quartos muito confortáveis, com ar, roupa de cama e um dos quartos com beliche. Certamente voltaremos.
Otimo lugar, em breve estamos de volta
Apartamento excelente, localização perto de todas as baladas da LAPA, perto de centro cultural, apartamento completo. espero poder voltar novamente.

Muito bem localizado, tudo o que ele prometeu realmente estava lá nos esperando. Gustavo foi muito simpático e gente boa conosco. Uma ótima opção para quem vai curtir a Lapa é não quer se preocupar com lei seca ou táxi. Gostamos muito e vamos voltar.

Apartamento confortável e organizado. O prédio é muito bem localizado, tem dois restaurantes embaixo. Fica também muito próximo dos barzinhos mais movimentados da Lapa. E Gustavo foi bastante atencioso, tanto antes quanto durante a estadia. Super recomendo!
Muuuy bien ubicado, y el departamento cumple con las expectativas

Foi muito bom me hospedar no apartamento do Gustavo. Local limpo, agradável e espaçoso. 
Recomendo.
A nossa experiência no espaço do Gustavo foi ótima. Ele sempre atencioso, atendeu sempre que precisamos dele. O espaço é super confortável e bem localizado!
Ótima localização! Perfeito para quem quer usufruir da região da Lapa, mas também para outros lugares, pois o acesso é fácil e rápido. O valor também ficou justo.
Um ótimo apartamento muito bem localizado.Gustavo foi muito cordial..
Bien ubicado

A localização é muito boa, com tudo perto, mas barulhenta.... estranhei o acolhimento que não foi dos melhores, pois nem conheci Gustavo pessoalmente. A comunicação com ele foi morosa e insatifatoria... O chuveiro estava queimado e, mesmo solicitando providências a Gustavo, ficamos no banho gelado durante toda a estadia. Talvez tenha dado azar, pois vi boas referências sobre Gustavo.... mas a verdade é que foi um pouco difícil a comunicação com ele.

Great place in the perfect location. 3 min to Lapa party street / 5 min to Selaronda stairs. 
Communication was great despite booking on the last minute. The key was waiting at the door man. Everything went smoothly.
Very basics apartment in the middle of lapa which is amazing.
Um passo dos arcos da lapa. Prédio seguro com porteiro e apartamento super funcional e limpo. Muito obrigada, Gustavo.
Gustavo é muito eficiente e atencioso,  foi muito rápido para combinar tudo,  foi um prazer ficar no seu apartamento!

Excelente departamento, y ubicación. 
Todo tal cual muestra la publicación. 
Si bien no conocimos a Gustavo, estuvo disponible para cualquier duda o consulta. Muy recomendable.
Muy buena ubicacion. Infelizmente la pasajera anterior se retraso en la salida

Aparatamento próximo a Lapa, com porteiros simpáticos e muito limpo. Atendeu nossas expectativas, indico para quem deseja ficar perto do agito da noite carioca. Mesmo tao perto existe pouco barulho e é possível dormir tranquilamente. Gustavo foi rápido em suas respostas, deixou tudo organizado e foi preocupado conosco. Super indicado!

Perto de tudo (bares, restaurantes, Starbucks, metrô, Arcos da Lapa, lanchonetes...).
Fiel as fotos.
Apartamento muito bem localizado, anfitrião atencioso, voltaremos com certeza
Local de fácil acesso, seguro, limpo. Próximo de tudo, sem necessidade de muito gasto para se locomover. Ótimo apartamento... Super recomendo...
Ótimo anfitrião! Foi super flexível com os horários de check-in e check-out. Lugar muito agradável.

Se você, como eu, estiver indo no RJ para lazer, o espaço atende perfeitamente. Não é um espaço luxuoso, mas garante a funcionalidade para passeios pelo Centro e Lapa. Os porteiros foram muito gentis . Gustavo mantém comunicação quando solicitado. No geral foi uma boa experiência.
Tutto come descritto nell’annuncio niente da eccepire

Gustavo como sempre muito atencioso e disponível. Obrigada por nos confiar seu espaço. Essa é a segunda vez que ficamos lá e, por ser tão perto dos Arcos da Lapa, é super prático ficar no apartamento. Vamos voltar sempre que precisarmos ficar pelo Centro. Muito obrigada.
Ótima localização, o apartamento tem o necessário para uma estadía confortável, e uma boa relação calidade preço.

Havíamos fechado a hospedagem para o Réveillon em Março, então tínhamos uma grande expectativa quanto à essa viagem. 
O apartamento não parecia que tinha sido limpo, haviam muitas formigas em cima da geladeira e o congelador estava muito sujo. No banheiro não havia luz e na sala também não. 
As paredes do quarto maior estavam muito sujas, não dava vontade de encostar na parede pra dormir. O colchão de casal estava manchado, amarelado. O mesmo aconteceu com os travesseiros. 
Várias tomadas estavam folgadas e não conectavam direito. 
Mas o ponto alto do descontentamento foi a máquina de lavar. No anúncio consta a possibilidade de lavar roupas, o que se torna um grande atrativo para um grupo de 5 pessoas. Mas a máquina estava suja, completamente preta por dentro. Havia resto de sabão e água. 
Fiquei bastante surpresa com estes problemas pois não havia nenhuma reclamação deste tipo nas avaliações. O apartamento precisa de limpeza e de algumas reformas.

name: Luxury Duplex in Williamsburg with private bath
summary: I live in a modern duplex with 2 bedrooms and 2 full baths with amazing views of the city.  You'll be staying in my second bedroom: it's furnished with a queen sized bed, small desk, and a private full bathroom!
space: Hello travelers! The apartment is a 900sq ft duplex with a great layout, amazing southern and northern light, tree/sky/city views and a wonderful airy feel. All the great details are here: wide-plank ash wood floors, custom lighting, climate control, high-speed WiFi, a gorgeous bathroom with shower, and a stone & stainless steel kitchen with dishwasher. The apartment features one guest bedroom, one guest bathroom, and a living room with a super high ceiling and balcony for you to enjoy. You'll be sharing the apartment with myself. (You have your own private bathroom!) Your room has a very comfortable double bed - recently upgraded with a lovely memory foam mattress and organic cotton sheets for ultimate comfort!
description: I live in a modern duplex with 2 bedrooms and 2 full baths with amazing views of the city.  You'll be staying in my second bedroom: it's furnished with a queen sized bed, small desk, and a private full bathroom! Hello travelers! The apartment is a 900sq ft duplex with a great layout, amazing southern and northern light, tree/sky/city views and a wonderful airy feel. All the great details are here: wide-plank ash wood floors, custom lighting, climate control, high-speed WiFi, a gorgeous bathroom with shower, and a stone & stainless steel kitchen with dishwasher. The apartment features one guest bedroom, one guest bathroom, and a living room with a super high ceiling and balcony for you to enjoy. You'll be sharing the apartment with myself. (You have your own private bathroom!) Your room has a very comfortable double bed - recently upgraded with a lovely memory foam mattress and organic cotton sheets for ultimate comfort! You'll have your own private bedroom and your own full bathroom wi
neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg is the epicenter of the art world and creativity right now. You can't walk a single block without seeing large, incredible murals on varying building walls and facades. It hosts frequent pop-up shopping, food trucks, and events. Also my apartment is in the heart of Williamsburg (yet you would never know, as it's so quiet inside the apt!). Dozens of restaurants, boutiques, coffee shops, and the like are found just blocks away from the apt. Some of my favorite spots for coffee are Blind Barber and House of Small Wonders (try the cappuccino!). For a bite we recommend Meadowsweet and Reynard, within easy walking distance. McCarren Park is another can't miss with great open green space and a view on the real Williamsburg.
notes: Please note: if you would like a later checkout to be guaranteed after 10am, please book an additional night to ensure there are no conflicts with the arrival of other guests. ** Additionally - if you are staying more than 7 nights, a small additional cleaning fee will be added to your booking ($40) to cover additional laundry and cleaning services. - NYC mandated recycling city wide. Use the blue bin (or paper bag) in the kitchen for plastics, paper and other recyclables.  - Keep the tea pot (and any other cooking items) out of the dishwasher. Also, it's not so great with wood, so wash those by hand.
transit: I live right on the L subway line (Lorimer Stop), so you can be in the downtown Manhattan in less than 10 minutes. Williamsburg is also covered in Citi Bike stations. They're just $10 per day. There are two stations right around the corner from my place. The apartment is located the following distances from these main attractions:  One World Trade Center - 3.6 miles / L to the E Trains Chelsea Market/Highline - 4.2 miles / L Trains Empire State Building - 3.9 miles/ L to the 6 or N, Q, R Trains Grand Central - 3.9 miles/ L to the 4 or 5 Train Rockefeller Center - 4.5 miles/ L to the N or Q, R, F, M Trains Museum of Modern Art - 4.8 miles/ L to the E or F, M , N, Q , R Trains Central Park - 5.1 miles/ L to the C Trains American Museum of Natural History - 6.5 miles/ L to the 1 or C Trains Guggenheim/MET - 6.5 miles/ 6L to the 4 or 5, 6 Trains JFK (John F. Kennedy Airport) is located outside of Manhattan and is around 1 hour car ride or 1 hour subway/train ride.  A trip from my home to J
access: You'll have your own private bedroom and your own full bathroom with shower. You're free to use the living room and kitchen as much as you like (see cooking notes below). The apartment is bright with sun coming in from sun rise to mid-afternoon.
interaction: Normally my schedules differ from week to week, but I'm usually around between 7pm and 7am. I am up quite early in the morning, but I'm always available for questions via email/text.
house_rules: - I have a gluten allergy, so please respect my request to NOT COOK any bread, flour, cookies, barley etc into the house. (gluten is in barley, wheat, rye, spelt, kamut). Please do not bring these items into my home as well. - Please keep all food in the kitchen. There is plenty of counter space for snacks. - My home is my escape from the hustle of the city. As such, please respect it. Don't invite over additional guests (without checking with me first), be clean and considerate, no smoking of any kind, no illegal drugs.  - Don't steal my stuff, don't leave lights on when you're away or do other things your mother would not approve of.

host.host_about: I host Airbnb folks all year-round in our Brooklyn duplex. NYC residents for over ten years, I know the city very well, and I'd be happy to help you make the most of your stay.

reviews.comments: We had a great time at Annas apt! She is a wonderful host and we would definitely recommend to stay here!!! We had a whole week for our trip to ny and the spot was perfect for our day trips to the different boroughs. The neighborhood is friendly, safe and very interesting. You'll find small bars, cafes and restaurants close by and the more packed area of Williamsburg is in walking distance.

Anna was very helpful even from before we arrived. She is very knowledgeable about things to do in New York and happy to share her favourite places. When we were feeling under the weather, she left tea and cough medicine out for us! Anna was very warm and welcoming. 
The apartment is also very cool and comfortable and situated in a great location. It's walking distance to all of Williamsburg and a short subway ride to Manhattan.

Anna's place in Williamsburg is super. The location is very convenient, easy transport to other parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan, and is itself a vibrant neighborhood with great cafes and restaurants close by. Her home is lovely, a great space to be in, filled with light, and the actual airbnb room is comfortable (large bed with firm mattress a definite plus) and has its own bathroom. Anna herself is a very helpful and responsive host. Strongly recommend!

Anna was nice, generous and helpful for any question we had. 
We enjoyed staying in the apartment, it is full of light and situated in a quiet area in Williamsburg but just 2 subway stations from Manhattan.
We recomend staying here if you come to New York.

Anna is a great and welcoming host. Her apartment is super convenient for access to Brooklyn and the City. The apartment is clean, well decorated, and has all the amenities you need. Would definitely recommend!

The place is fantastic. Anna is really welcoming and super helpful in regards to anything we needed or asked.  Definitely recommend the house, she's a great person and the place is in good location.  Absolutely no complaints.

I had a fantastic time staying with Anna. Her apartment is beautiful and in a really great location. Anna is lovely and was always available if needed. She also offered some fantastic recommendations in the neighbourhood. Would highly recommend staying here.
Anna's apartment is well-kept and super conveniently located and she is a warm and welcoming host. Would definitely stay with her again!

Anna Duplex is well located in Williamsburg and fit perfectly with the description.

It has been very easy to interact with Anna which is fully respectful of intimacy and keeping a quiet atmosphere in the apartment.

There is only one thing that could have made my stay better: A more regular/extensive usage of AC in the apartment like as a someone coming from Europe, it was difficult for me to accommodate with the very warm summer weather in Brooklyn.
Anna's place was great. location is awesome. clean and quiet, lots of space. Anna is a relaxed and accommodating host. would recommend.

Anne's place is perfect. She is a great host with great communication. The room has a private entrance and bathroom. Very clean and quiet. The bed is comfy! 

The overall space is great with bight sunny windows. I cannot recommend Anne's place any higher. Five stars!
Was good!

Anna propose une chambre au deuxième étage de son appartement duplex. Elle dispose de sa propre entrée ainsi que de sa propre salle de bain.
Le logement est propre et très bien décoré.
Anna nous propose dès notre arrivée de riches conseils de visites / restauration dans Brooklyn et nous aide à programmer notre séjour en répondant à toutes nos questions. 
La localisation de l'appartement est parfait pour ceux souhaitant se promener à Brooklyn et plus particulièrement dans Williamsburg.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

neighborhood_overview: Excellente location, deux rues au sud de la rue Sainte-Catherine, deux rues à l'est de la rue Université.  Proximité du Centre Bell et plusieurs autoroutes facilitant l'accès à l'aéroport.  Métros accessibles tout à côté (Place d'Armes, Square Victoria ou Bonaventure).  For the business traveler, the main conference center (Palais des  Congres) is two blocks north and most of downtown's main corporate offices are within walking distance (Rene-Levesque street).  The metro and underground city are one block away, McGill street is full of taxis and there is a Bixi rent-a-bike rack 2 steps from the building. So whether you are here in winter or summer, you should have no trouble easily getting to your destinations.
notes: ***THE TENANT ARE REQUIRED TO LEAVE PROOF OF LIABILITY INSURANCE UPON OCCUPANCY OTHERWISE, HE/SHE/ THEY WILL BE HELD FULLY RESPONSIBLE OF ANY AND ALL DAMAGES CAUSE BY THEMSELVES OR A THIRD PARTIES ON THE PREMISES. SPECIAL RATE/GRAND-PRIX, CHRISMAST EVE, ETC..4500$/WEEK-END/ PLUS DEPARTURE CLEANING AND THE SECURITY DEPOSIT.

Equipped with 3 plasma TVs (2 home theatre), 2 dvs, 2 Ipod stand. The building is home to “Daylight Cafe”, and a hair salon. High ceilings (12 feet), huge (10 feet) replicated factory windows. 2 full bathrooms with individual bathtub and glass shower. Includes high speed wi-fi, A/C, electricity,local phone, satellite cable. Possibility of indoor parking.   Excellent location, situated 2 blocks south of St. Catherine Street, north of Notre-Dame (old Montreal), west of Blvd. St. Laurent and east of University Street, the Bell Center and all highways leading out of the city center to airports. One block away from two metro stations (Place D'Armes and Square Victoria) and just next to the 'W' Ho

NO party, NO évènement, NO photo-shoot, NO tournage ARE ALLOWED/ and will result in eviction from the property, sans l'autorisation écrite du propriétaire. host.host_about:
CREATIVE FLATS
Le concept est créé en 2000 pour servir une clientèle grandissante
qui cherche à louer des espaces meublés, luxueux et agréables, au design actuel.

Reconnues pour leur sens de l’innovation en matière de design,la propriétaire-fondatrice
Nathalie Bouchard et sa collaboratrice, la directrice artistique-styliste Annie Horth effectuent
une recherche de style et d’authenticité pour chaque résidence. Le talent avec lequel elles
collectionnent les objets et meubles de différents styles et époques, assure que chaque détail
est parfaitement choisi pour l’espace.

L’art, la mode, l’histoire et les voyages, une approche multi-culturelle qui constitue leur
propre vocabulaire.

Un vocabulaire qu’elles déclinent dans ces lieux sophistiqués et contemporains.

reviews.comments: Great loft! Beautifully styled, pictures are very accurate. Location is perfect. Nathalie and staff were  very accommodating and wonderful hosts.

This place was amazing, as advertised. The pictures don't do this place justice, when you walk in you're immediately blown away by the old yet modern fell. Nathalie and her team capped the experience with some bottles of wine and nice fruit pairings. Will stay in this place every time I come to Montreal for the Formula 1 race.
it was great

El departamento es muy bonito, tal cual las fotos. Es ideal para una familia grande, la cocina está super equipada ( aparte de qué hay dos), es muy cómodo tener dos lavadoras y secadoras, Nathalie fue una increíble anfitriona que cuida cada detalle y fue muy comprensiva en nuestra hora de llegada y salida.

name: Duplex Penthouse Terrace & View :)
summary: Modern & stylish flat with nice view on Sultanahmet & Galata tower from its open sky terrace. 120 m2 duplex, your bedroom can fit 2 people comfortably. Centrally located in Cihangir, in the heart of old city, safe area ! Easy access to transports
space: *** I will be out of town from October 28th to 31st and from December 19th to 29th, you would have the whole apartment for you only :) *** The flat is located in Cihangir's Cukur Cuma street, famous for its antic shops. This area is 100% safe for westerners (I live there). It is fully furnished and decorated in a modern turkish way.  The duplex structure of the flat will really make you feel like home, with your own private room on a floor, you will kind of have your own floor ! The southern terrace will provide you with a stunning full view on Cihangir, Galata and Sultanahmet ! Cihangir is the most vibrant area of Istanbul, you will be less than 5 minutes walk from city's best bars, restaurants, breakfasts and nightclubs It is very central, everything will be at walking distance: 5 minutes walk to Istiklal street and Taksim square (the real heart of Istanbul), 10 minutes walk to Galata Tower and 20 minutes walk to Sultanahmet area. Should you wish to go a bit further, all public trans
