neighborhood_overview: Centrally located in vibrant Cihangir area, in the heart of old city
transit: Havatas Buses (from airports) Metro Tramway Closed parking for motorcycles upon request
access: You will have access to the whole apartment and its equipment ! The available room is on one floor, mine is on the other, so you will kind of have a floor for you only :) No check-in / check-out times.
interaction: I'm always up for a drink to discuss your plans and show you nice places around ;)

host.host_about: Easy going :)

reviews.comments:
We enjoyed our stay at David's a lot. David is a very nice person and a good host. We were able to keep in touch via e-mail during our stay in case we had some questions. David also provided us with a wifi device which we could carry around with us, and that was very useful to check up the sights and places to visit.

The apartment is nice and tidy, looks even better than in the pictures and has everything that is necessary. The view from the terrace is breathtaking and makes the terrace a perfect spot for late night drinks. 

The place is located in the hipster district of Beyoglu, Cukurcuma, which is pretty adorable with a handful of lovely cafes, especially for breakfast - best breakfast spots are within 3 min walking.
It is also pretty close to main shopping street, Galata tower or Taksim square.

All in all, I fully recommend David's apartment for a nice stay in Istanbul.

Excellent place to stay in Istanbul. Well located, clean and calm, this place is definitely an excellent choice!
Moreover David is a really nice guy, friendly, flexible and he will provide you with precious advices on Istanbul and its neighbourhood. 
Do not hesitate to book this accommodation.

The location is really good, not loud, safe, to the main shopping street 10 minutes by foot, 15 minutes till Taksim place. Near to appartments are many nice cafes and bars. Every morning we enjoyed breakfast on the terrace wit really great view. The flat is big and clean. David is very nice, hospitable and helpful host. He showed us also nice places where good und cheap to eat. I am recommending Davids flat.

Good experience in David'house. Apartment simple but with all you need. The terrasse is really nice and we appreciated to have breakfast there. 
Neighbourhood very nice, with a lot of nice cafés, restos, shops,... We liked it a lot.
David is very friendly and helpful. We felt very welcomed. He was also very reactive when we sent messages.

Staying with David was like staying with an old friend I had not seen for a while. My wife and I felt so comfortable and at home in his apartment and we are very grateful for this.

Davids apartment is in an amazing location, 5 mins to Istiklal street (pedestrian shopping street), 5mins from Taksim Gezi park and 10 mins from the Havatas Bus stop near Taksim square. The area he is in is also great, with lots of great cafes, restaurants, antique stores and supermarkets.

David gave us some great recommendations on where to eat and what to see and the view from his balcony is unbelievable. The bed was also very comfortable.

Davids internet was broken when we visited, though he bought a new router and was trying to get it fixed. David's place was also a little unclean, due to him being very busy with work, though this did not detract from our stay.

Thanks so much Dave for an amazing time in Istanbul. We hope you are well!



apartment is in an amazing location, right next to Istiklal street,

We really enjoyed the stay at Davids apartment. It is really centrally located, Istiklal street,Taksim square, Galata Tower and Sultanahmet are within walking distance. Nevertheless, it was very quiet at night. We truly enjoyed the breakfast, restaurant and hamam recommendation in the neighborhood he had prepared for us.
We only met David for a couple of hours as he was about to leave for vacation himself the day we arrived. Eventhough he was not home during our stay, we found everything prepared and felt very welcome! 
We could keep in close contact with David not only before but also during our stay in his apartment.
Excellent place to stay in Istanbul! Thank you, David, for the amazing week we had!

Für uns war diese ruhige und komfortable Wohnung ein perfekter Ort für Erholung vom Großstadttrubel. Wir haben uns total wohlgefühlt. Alles war wie beschrieben und David ist ein sehr freundlicher, zuvorkommender und trotzdem zurückhaltender Gastgeber. Besser hätten wir es nicht treffen können!

David was an excellent host - communicative, friendly and helpful. Before we arrived, David was easy to communicate with and we had no problems finding his apartment. He was also kind, extremely easy to get along with, and a great conversationalist. David also provided great recommendations for places to eat in the area.

The apartment is extremely spacious and had everything we needed for a one-week stay. The view from the balcony is truly amazing! Also, the wi-fi connection is very good, which isn't always easy to find when you are traveling.

In terms of location - perfect! It's in one of the coolest neighborhoods in Istanbul. Right near excellent restaurants, cafes and shops. But also within 5 minutes of Istikal and the tram, which takes you right to many of the tourists destinations.

Great apartment and great host!

David was a courteous and friendly host for the two months that I spent at his Duplex in Beyoglu - what I like to call the 'Soho' of Istanbul. 

You can't go wrong here - with stunning views, and Turkish charm laced with international flair. 

David was always attentive, and ready to help - even more so after I damaged my ankle ligaments! 

And this goes without saying - but he is a great guy to share a beer with and have a night out on the town. 

When I return to Istanbul, I know where my port of call will be!

David is a really friendly and helpful host. The communication before the arrival was easy and David kindly provided us with a place to put our luggage since he had to work when we arrived. The apartment is spacious with two bad rooms and a beautiful rooftop terrace. It’s a really nice neighborhood with lots of cafés and antiques. David had some great recommendations for us too. The Taksim Square and Galata Tower are easy to reach from the apartment and the tram which takes you to Eminönü isn’t far either. 

Thanks again, David! We had a really great time in Istanbul!

David's apartment is amazing. Perfect location, 5 min. to Istiklal, vibrant heart of "new" Istanbul, where there are many shops, restaurants, bars and night clubs. Every touristic attractions are easily reachable by walk, so are boat stops to go to the Asian side and the gold horn.
The apartment has everything I needed for a 1-week stay. It's like I had my own space ; a comfortable bed, toilets right near the room an the most charming : a beautiful terrace from where I had a nice view of Galata Tower.
David is easygoing and it was very convenient to communicate with him before, during and after my journey. He kindly advised me about good restaurants and interesting places to visit.
I highly recommend Beyoglu duplex!
Best place to enjoy Istanbul!!

I highly recommend staying at David's place. We really enjoyed our stay.
The double story apartment has a fantastic view from the rooftop terrace! A great place to relax after taking in the sites of Istanbul. Our room was a good size, tidy, comfy bed and our own toilet nearby. 
The apartment has a great location - on a quiet street, but near taksim square, lot of cute/hip local cafés, restaurants and creative shops. Very nice area and easy to get to all the classic tourist sites and the airport as well. 
David vas away during our stay, but he made sure we felt very welcome. He was helpful and very responsive during our whole stay. I can only give David and his place my highest recommendations!

Die Wohnung hat den absolut perfekten Standort. Sie liegt Nahe am Taksim Platz und an der Istiklal (Hauptshopping-Strasse). Die Wohnung befindet sich auf zwei Stockwerken. Die obere Etage wird grds. von David bewohnt, denn er hat dort sein Zimmer und ein kleines Wohnzimmer. Überdies befindet sich die Dusche (auch für Gäste, gemeinsamer Gebrauch) auf der oberen Etage. 
Das Gästezimmer ist auf der untere Etage und hat alles was man braucht. Überdies hat man eine Toilette und ein Lavabo zur Verfügung. Auch die Küche und das grössere Wohnzimmer befinden sich in der unteren Etage. 
Der Balkon bietet eine unglaubliche Sicht über Istanbul und eignet sich perfekt für einen Apéro nach einem langen Tag in der Stadt. 
David ist zuvorkommend und freundlich und sehr hilfsbereit.
Appartement très chouette, dans quartier vivant et très agréable. Terrasse très sympathique.

Quartier des antiquaires, très agréable, proche de Taksim, de tous les commerces/cafés (le must: proche du meilleur breakfast d'Istanbul :-) ) appartement au calme, avec ascenseur, la terrasse est un sacré plus! 
:-) David est un hôte très ouvert, et très accueillant. Il a tout fait pour que le séjour se passe parfaitement et nous a conseillé de très bonnes adresses dans le quartier. Parti quelques jours, il a répondu à nos questions à distance en un temps record! A recommander sans l'ombre d'une hésitation.

David's hospitality and generosity is second to none. It's doubtful if there is a more peaceful terrace in Istanbul with such a stunning view. 

It's a duplex and David let us range upstairs and down so there's a great feeling of space and freedom. The bed is comfy too. 

Overall, it was an ideal base to explore Istanbul. There are great places to eat nearby, as well as baths, and reaching the bridge to Sultanahmet is just a good stretch of your legs away - perhaps 20 mins, passing the Galata tower on the way. 

Any downsides? A gentle mention to David and all is sorted!

Nous avons grandement apprécié notre séjour chez David :
accueil sympathique (avec dégustation de bières turques dès l'arrivée:-), appartement propre, confortable et très agréable à vivre, situé dans le quartier 'bohème' non dénué de charme d'Istanbul et non loin de la place Taksim (quartier central d'Istanbul)
David est très avenant et disponible pour nous aiguiller dans la découverte de la ville, il nous a communiqué beaucoup de bonnes adresses (restaurants, bars, et autres avec cartes de visite à l'appui) pour profiter pleinement de cette semaine stambouliote.
Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse pour séjourner à Istanbul et David y est un hôte particulièrement attentionné..
Emmanuelle, Jean-Michel et Anya

David was a wonderful host! He was helpful in finding my brother and I when our taxi driver didn't know where the apartment was and he made us feel very welcome in Istanbul! The apartment was very nice and clean. Everything was exactly as it appeared in the pictures and description and it is in the perfect location. There are so many cool bars, restaurants, and cafes all around the apartment. It was about a 45 minute walk into the historic center...and we just walked there every time because it was a great way to get to know the city. The balcony has an amazing view of Istanbul. I would highly recommend staying here!

David was available by phone to help us figure out the location of his apt.
We waited in a lovely cafe for his return from work on our day of arrival. He was cheerful and attentive to our needs, providing at the outset a list of restaurants in the neighborhood  that proved invaluable.
The location of his apt afforded us an authentic setting and the view from the rooftop balcony is breathtaking.
David was welcoming and friendly. The apartment is clean, spacious, comfortable, beautiful view from the terrace (great for having both breakfast and dinner). All in all a positive experience.

The room was a bit hot but otherwise the apartment was pretty much as said. Balcony has a nice view to relax and chill.

Great location to get out and about.

In terms of hosting David gets 15/10 in my books. Extremely accommodating, friendly, prompt responses, good knowledge of things to do and even met some his friends whom were equally receptive. Thanx for adding to the experience.

David met us at a local coffee house after his work day. Once we settled into the apartment we went out for dinner
Our room was bright and we had access to the upstairs living room and veranda that had a lovely view of the Galata tower
Location is excellent not far from Taksim or to the tram. Neighbourhood is quiet and relaxed. We loved it and we're very satisfied with the arrangements

The home of David was clean and in the center of Beyoglu/Istanbul.   Although David wasn´t at home for our whole stay he asked regulary if everything was okay... he gave us usefull information and answers about every question we had.. he answered immedeatly, when we wrote him!
the mailcontact before the holiday was very helpful. the flat is midst in beyöglu. perfect and clean. david is very symphatic. we can only recommend this flat.

David was a great host, we felt at home right away. He was there upon our arrival to welcome us, in a nearby café. He explained how everything worked, provided us with maps and all sorts of recommendations. Unlike other apartment rental agencies who hand you the keys and send you on your way, David made us feel like his guests. As for the appartement, it is cozy and spacious as the pictures suggest. 
Even when we didn't know if our flight got postponed because of the snow, David kindly told us we could stay one more night if we needed. Everything we were hoping for!
Thanks a lot!

name: Charming Boutique Room in Bushwick
summary: This is a boutique style room at the edge of Bushwick, Brooklyn's new hub of arts, culture, and nightlife. My name is Kip and I'm a lighting designer working out of my home. I've hosted hundreds of guests, and love having travelers pass through my home. I'm happy to guide guests with dining and activity recommendations, especially for those looking to go beyond Times Square and other popular tourist areas.
space: The Basics: Minimal space furnished with antiques and lots of natural ligh. TV in room with Apple TV. The apartment also boasts super high speed FIOS internet for those who need a solid internet connection. A record player and solid sound system is available for those coming to NYC searching for vinyl. I am also a lighting designer and artist, and often use my apartment as space to test out new ideas and concerts, that means, you, might find yourself in a living, constantly changing art piece. :)
description: This is a boutique style room at the edge of Bushwick, Brooklyn's new hub of arts, culture, and nightlife. My name is Kip and I'm a lighting designer working out of my home. I've hosted hundreds of guests, and love having travelers pass through my home. I'm happy to guide guests with dining and activity recommendations, especially for those looking to go beyond Times Square and other popular tourist areas. The Basics: Minimal space furnished with antiques and lots of natural ligh. TV in room with Apple TV. The apartment also boasts super high speed FIOS internet for those who need a solid internet connection. A record player and solid sound system is available for those coming to NYC searching for vinyl. I am also a lighting designer and artist, and often use my apartment as space to test out new ideas and concerts, that means, you, might find yourself in a living, constantly changing art piece. :) Towels are provided. Guests have full use of the apartment, please enjoy the living room
neighborhood_overview: Bushwick is an up-and-coming neighborhood and hosts some of the new and amazing restaurants, nightclubs, and galleries. I'm happy to make recommendations and share my tips on Bushwick and New York. Feel free to listen to music, hang out, and enjoy the space!
notes: Welcome International travelers! 420 Friendly LGBTQ Friendly Able to prepare meals for an additional fee.
transit: We are steps from the L train and a ten minute walk from the M train.
access: Towels are provided. Guests have full use of the apartment, please enjoy the living room and kitchen!
interaction: I am generally home and able to provide assistance with directions, recommendations, etc. No matter what your interests I can point you in the right direction and often offer insider access.
house_rules: Respect the space and me, the host. Do not leave food waste in room. Please recycle all paper, plastics, and cans in the kitchen. Clean the kitchen after use. Please take shoes off inside apt. No Cigarettes

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Artist/Designer living in Bushwick, i love my neighborhood and have lived here for 6 years. I keep a very clean house, love music and movies, and am very friendly.

reviews.comments:
Here is so good
Living here is nice
This place is near subway

This place is beautiful. So clean and sunny. Absolutely love the space. And Kip is so helpful and welcoming. Having a park nearby was a wonderful add on as well. Morning walks and late night Chinese food. Would definitely come back and highly recommend it

It was a pleasure to stay at Kip's place. It's so nice to stay at a place that's comfortable, private and super clean. I highly recommend it. Kip is a nice guy, a pleasure to talk to, and his cat Lucy is extra sweet and very playful.
Great space and also very accessible to subway. The kitty cat was also super sweet.

Our stay with Richard was great. Richard is very nice and hospitable and the room felt like a room in a in a boutique hotel. The place is also close to the subway and getting to Manhattan in real easy. Would definitely recommend staying with Richard.
Super! Clean and gorgeous. Thanks for the mini soap and shampoo!

The apartment was very clean, lovely room with air conditioning and one of the most comfortable beds i've slept in!
Richard was very friendly and went out of his way to launder my towels whilst I was out one day.
The location is great its 5 minutes from the L train and takes less than 20 minutes to get into Manhattan.

I would highly recommend staying here!

The room was pleasant looking, very clean and comfortable, and suited our needs as a couple. However, it had a heavy unpleasant smell that we found difficult to air (although we didn't mention it to our host so we don't know whether he had any solution to offer).
The location was off-Bushwick, quite distant by foot from the interesting parts of the neighborhood. However, the transportation to Manhattan was very convenient through the near L stop.

Richard was amazing, so welcoming. The flat was perfect for someone who wants to visit the city but not wish to pay the price. The bed was comfy, the shower perfect. All round so welcoming and worth it. Subway is so close as well.

My partner and I were very pleased with our stay at Richard's (or Kip's) last weekend in Bushwick, New York City.

As a host, Richard has been very welcoming, thoughtful and very much accommodating. When we first arrived, he insisted on making sure our rooms were all nicely prepped up (even though we were not very particular about it). So what we got was a nice, clean and comfortable room, with fresh linen and towels. Definitely made our day especially after our long and tiring journey. :)

He also shared with us excellent dining suggestions! This guy definitely knows his town really well, therefore rest assured you won't feel out of place living there. On that note, Richard's unit is in a pleasant quiet neighbourhood, not far away from Williamsburg where all the alternative New York actions are at. You have to check this area out before it becomes overly commercialised soon. It is just 2 mins walk to Halsey St station, and less than 30 mins to reach the main touristy places. Highly accessible!

On our last day, we made a mistake of not informing him in advance about our check out plans. It was embarrassing, but Richard and his visiting mom were patient and nice enough to shift and neatly arrange our belongings at the common room, without making a fuss about it. We really appreciate their kind gesture. 

Richard has a cat name Lucy who is absolutely adorable! Lucy would sneak into our room in the morning, probably to wish us good morning. She also ran to us before we left, probably to bid us farewell. If you love cats, you'd love Lucy! We are missing Lucy right now.

In summary, Richard's place is perfect, if you are looking for a comfortable stay at a neat, tastefully furnished room at an interesting part of town not far away from Brooklyn and Manhattan. Richard does design fyi and that explains why his home is so handsome. Richard is a great host too who is very respectful of your space and needs. You won't feel awkward having him as a host. We only wished we could see and talk to him more (understand that he was quite busy with work on the weekend we were there).

The city needs more AirBnb hosts like him. We highly recommend his and his place for your next stay in Brooklyn, NYC.
Richards place is great - clean, private, conveniently located, and relaxing. He is an excellent host, very helpful, but not intrusive and very friendly.

We had a nice room in Richards cosy apartment for 4 nights. Richard is very welcomming - and the little black cat very charming and visiting us from time to time - nice too.

There was no tv at the room as expected - but it really did not matter.

Unfortunately there were bedbugs, which left many itchy "souvenirs" on our bodies. But we would not mind comming back, when the bugs are gone :-)

Richard is a nice person, very quiet and respectful. We had everything we needed, even the soap and a beer! The room is very bright and comfortable, we had a lot of space! Everything was very clean, including the bathroom. The apartment is also very close to the subway, the neighbourhood  is lovely and animated. Thank you very much! 
PS: the cat Lucy is so cute and friendly!

My boyfriend and I rented out our first airbnb place and it was definitely a wonderful experience. Richard is just a sweet heart, super friendly and extremely respectful. We had everything we needed, fresh towels,clean sheets,and even a nice cold beer! Not to mention his adorable cat Lucy who I loved so much I am surprised I didn't just take her with me.

The room is very bright, beautiful sunlight peaking through the windows looking out to the neighborhood, it was delightful.Not to mention the bed IS the most comfortable thing ever! Everything was very clean, including the bathroom. He even made a space to put our food in his kitchen and was extremely helpful when we asked questions.
Also the apartment is very close to the (L train) subway, the neighborhood is lovely, with a laundry matt on the corner and a bodega that makes the best breakfast sandwiches. 

I would recommend to stay with him in a heart beat!

P.S: This place is bedbug free! I repeat this place is bedbug free!
 he had a person come in to spray and check for signs of bedbugs and even though there where no signs of bugs he had someone come clean anyway. Made our month stay that much pleasant. 
Thank you Richard!!!!!! c:

Kip is a cool guy, and communicating with him before meeting up was easy. The room is as advertised, with a very comfortable bed, the whole thing just a 5-minute walk away from the L-train subway station. As a bonus you get to hang out with a very affectionate cat, Lucy. Only downside was that some of my bedsheets were not very clean, but this was solved when I found others in the cupboard. Also, some people who are sensitive to noise might feel that the street noises are a bit too loud through the AC unit, but this was not my case. In any event, recommended!

Kip keeps a tidy comfortable classy home. I was needing a place where I could bake a birthday cake, cook and decorate the room to surprise my boyfriend for his birthday. Kip was accomodating and although he was out of town, he made arrangements so that his housemate could meet me there to let me in. The room is just as portrayed in the ad.  The bed was very comfortable. The bonus was Lucy, Kip's sweet tempered cat, made us feel right home.  If you're a light sleeper though, the occasional street noise may interrupt your sleep.

Richard is very welcoming, very smooth, and respectable for every communication. I love so much his taste, decoration, table, chair everything was very well selected! kind of small boutique hotel! 

Room is so fresh, blight! 

Everyone said, L-trains was just 5 min by walk!!

I definitely recommend his cute appartement to every air bnber!
Richard was very accessible and his friend who let us in was friendly and warm.
Richard has been so good to us. There was nothing that troubled me. I definitely had good time at his place.  Thank you Richard, and Lucy!!

We really loved our stay at Kip's place in Bushwick!  The room and apartment were immaculately clean and the 12 foot ceilings give the place a spacious feel.  Kip was a superb host who really made us feel welcome.  He has an excellent knowledge of the area and of the "workings" of the city.  We had use of the kitchen which made life much easier.  We very much enjoyed our conversations on a wide range of topics.  There's no doubt that we'll stay at the Chill Room on our next trip to NY.

We loved staying at Kip's place!  He keeps the room and the whole apartment immaculately clean and free of clutter.  Having 12 foot ceilings really gives the apartment a sense of spaciousness. Kip was extremely welcoming and a fantastic host.  He knows the area well and we very much enjoyed our conversations on a wide range of topics.  The neighborhood's pretty quiet with surprisingly easy parking.  Without a doubt we'll stay at Kip's on future visits to NY!
Richard is lovely and his apartment is clean and comfortable. The area was cool, quite safe and very close to the subway. His cat is adorable too.
Kip's place is awesome. Good location and great apartment. The room is warm and well decorated. We had a good time.
Kip's apartment was super comfortable, clean and close to public transport. He gave us some good tips on places to go in Bushwick, and all-in-all we had a great experience.

We ended up extending our stay with Kip for 4 extra days as his place was so lovely. He was very friendly and helpful, gave us some great recommendations of cool places to go in Bushwick and was generally an ideal host.

Lovely place, everything was so clean and perfectly decorated, from the room to the bathroom and every room in between. His cat was adorable, super friendly and adventurous. and yes, like the other reviews say the bed is simple AMAZING.
It was a nice apartment with cool interior. Staying there is an experience. There are some good restaurants nearby.
Great price for the location and a very stylish place.
Richard was very welcoming, and easy to get a hold of for check-in. The apartment is beautiful, clean, and comfortable. Very close to the train. I would recommend anyone stay here.

Very nice, clean and warm room, enough space for two people and a comfortable bed. Richard and Lucy were kind and relaxed hosts. 
We can highly recommend this place!

Richard was a really friendly and helpfull host. The room was clean and nice. The appartment is close to the subway that directly leads to Manhatten.
I always would stay there again.
The neighborhood was typical Brooklyn.

Kips appartment was lovely. He was a very accommodating guest and it was a really great place to stay. For cat lovers this is a really treat as Kips cat is super friendly and makes you feel right at home. Would definitely stay there again if we go back to NYC

Kip (Richard) was very friendly and welcoming , he has a very interesting job, I wish we had been able to talk more about it. The room is wonderful! Really high quality sheets and beautifully decorated with big windows. The rest of the apartment is great too, Kip's home cinema set-up is impressive. The neighborhood was really nice and his apartment is really not far from the subway so I felt safe walking at night. I highly recommend staying here, it's beautiful. His cat is adorable too.

Our stay was great, no complaints! Room was clean and warm with high ceilings.  Cool lighting in the other parts of the apartment.  Richard (Kip?) was nice and really accommodating even though our booking was extremely last minute.
Kip's space was great! Room  was spotless and the living space was very unique. Highly recommended!

My boyfriend and I truly enjoyed our stay in Kip's artistic home! Other than hearing the loud neighborhood music one afternoon (due to the air conditioner on the street side of the room), the location was fine. Bed was very comfortable and everything was tidy and clean!

Kip is a great host who provided an excellent, clean and comfortable room, in a very nice apartment in Brooklyn. The room was exactly as described, and Kip was very friendly and reachable if we needed anything. The apartment is conveniently located, near the L train, and the neighborhood is pretty cool. Definitely a great place to stay!

Kip was a really great host, flexible and responsive with our arrival and departure time. And he has the cutest cat!
The room was very comfortable, clean and well decorated! 
Location is accessible with the trains and the neighborhood is nice as well.
I definitely recommend this place.

I had a wonderful experience staying here. The apartment was very clean and organized; not to mention nicely decorated. It was a comfortable place to stay in the Brooklyn area. It was in close proximity to the subway which made exploring the city convenient. In addition to the great apartment, he had a very cute and friendly cat that made me feel more at home.
Kip's place was clean and cool!
Quiet and peaceful. Kip is a great host with a great location and friendly cat.

The quartier near Halsey station is lovely, as the house is. Kip is really nice and welcoming: we had a great time and he was really helpfull with everything. The house is beautiful, clean and comfortable!
we advise it

Great location, great space, great host, great cat!!
The apartment is very close to the L train and is on the same block as a laundromat and convenience store. The neighbourhood is lively and never felt unsafe. Lots of good restaurants nearby as well. 
The room is spacious with very high ceilings and nicely decorated. The bed is like sleeping on a cloud! The apartment is very clean and was kept tidy for the entire stay. 
Kip was friendly and even let us drop our bags off very early and take a shower after our 40+ hour greyhound ride (SO GRATEFUL!!). 
Lucy (the cat) is too cute for words and her presence made the apartment really feel like home. 
A+! Highly recommended! Would love to stay again!!

Easy check in. Description and photographs accurate. Host very helpful and quick to respond to emails. 
Apartment has a great feel to it and is incredibly clean and comfortable.
Area is up and coming with some great bars and cafes near by. 
Easy to commute to Manhattan.

Kip was very welcoming and helped us carry our heavy suitcases up the stairs! He made us feel at home. The apartment was immaculately clean and the bed was so comfy, also perfect location for getting the L train to the city. definitely stay with Kip if you can!

Nossa estadia em NY foi ótima. O quarto/apartamento é maravilhoso. Parecia que eu estava em casa. É bem aparelhado e tinha tudo que necessitávamos. A cama é ótima com lençóis e toalhas fornecidas pelo Kip. O apartamento fica há 3 minutos do trem, e são mais 20 minutos para estar na Union Square. É muito fácil de chegar e sair de lá. Fica fácil de chegar lá de trem vindo do JFK. O bairo é tranquilo e residencial, tendo restaurantes e mercados bem próximo. Recomendo muito o lugar. O Kip é super gente fina. nos recebeu muito bem e nos ajudou em tudo o que precisávamos. Muito atencioso e prestativo. A gatinha do Kip é um amor também.

So we didn't get to see much of Kip as hey we were on holiday and therefore out most of the time. 
His apartment is lovely and the immediate neighbourhood felt safe. The air conditioning was welcomed as was Lucy the cat. 
We met his mum later on into our stay and she was lovely and welcoming. Felt a bit sad to leave.
My only criticism is that it is too much of a trek to go back to freshen up before any evening affairs. But that's more about my choice of location than anything. 
Missing all already.

Kip was out of town the weekend of my visit but his wonderful mom was there to host. The space is absolutely lovely, very clean and bright. Towels were fluffy and bed one of the most comfortable I've slept in. It's only a block away from the L train and in a safe neighborhood!

We were welcomed even with a day late arrival and Kip had a helping hand to be there since he was unavailable. We were treated to homemade baked goods and accommodated regarding laundry and the neighborhood. The space was clean to a professional level. We didn't have a third person in the end which was good because it would have been very tight. Kip checked in and made himself available again during our stay to make sure our needs were met. Overall it was a hotel / house mate sort of split. The bedroom is at the opposite end of the flat but also close to the entrance.  Cleanliness and order of a hotel mixed with the shared kitchen and sometimes late night company of his visitors. But very worldly and kind people.

Bei Kip war alles super organisiert. Er hat sich bei der Ankunftszeit ganz nach uns gerichtet, obwohl es spät abends war, und dafür gesorgt dass er zu der Zeit zuhause war. Er hat uns sofort alles gezeigt und uns die Schlüssel gegeben. Die Wohnung ist wirklich sauber und das Zimmer schön eingerichtet und sonnig. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt :)
Die Katze ist auch echt lieb und war immer willkommene Gesellschaft! Ich würde Kips Wohnung auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen! Es hat Spaß gemacht!

We only stayed ons night at Kip's place, but everything was perfect. The communication with Kip was easy, the appartment was really close to the L train, and the room was really clean en pretty just as in the pictures. Would surely recommend this place!

Kip was a very helpful and responsive host and his apartment was just as described. The room was clean and well furnished, the bathroom and shower were also very clean and everything worked OK. The location was good - just a few minutes walk to the nearest subway station - and although the neighborhood feels a little "rough" after dark, I felt perfectly safe at all times. 
I'd definitely stay here again and would thoroughly recommend it to fellow AirBNBers!

Kip's place was spotless and well-presented, and the room is really lovely. There's not much in the immediate area but plenty going on a short journey away, and you're close to the subway and a bus stop. Kip was helpful and friendly.
The room was clean and quiet. Kip decorated the room with interesting setting such as antique watches and pipes. Kip was a good host. BTW, the cat was very cute.

The room was charming and very well illuminated and clean. The location is great, just a few steps away from the bus stop and one block away from the train station. Kip was very kind and helpful and allowed us to drop off our bags very early before the check in time. We came early one evening and he set up his huge screen so we could watch Netflix, it was like the movies :). His cat, Lucy was the greatest co-host, she has an amazing personality. Very good experience overall
La habitación coincide con la publicación del anuncio. Buena ubicación, metro muy próximo.
Great place and host.  Kip's place was very clean and charming and super conveniently located. He as a host also had insider NY recommendations and helped us having a wonderful stay.

Kip is a great communicator and a lovely person. The space was perfect for us, near to the subway and in a wonderful neighbourhood.
Naturally, we adored Lucy.
Great location! Very convenient! Smooth communication with Kip! Apartment clean and exactly as advertised! Highly recommended
Apartment is as described and checkin was simple.

Kip is an excellent host!
Very friendly, not intrusive at all, and incredibly patient. During our stay with him, Kip was very supportive and did us a few favours he was not obliged to do. 

The whole apartment is very tidy, looks exactly as pictured in the profile, and was a pleasant place to stay. It is also situated in a nice neighbourhood and in close proximity to several subway lines. A trip to Manhattan takes no longer than 30 minutes (including long train intervals that sometimes occur in NYC).  

P.S. I am not a cat person, but Kip's cat is something special. Lucy is a charming purring creature. What makes her unique is that she doesn't leave fur anywhere. Not a single black hair could be found after she'd lay on the bed's white blankets. Hint: ask Kip how is so, there is an interesting story behind it ;)

Kip was a great host, very friendly. The room was super clean and exactly as listed. The listing is at most a 5 minute walk from the subway station, which was wonderful. There's also a great deli literally right across the street from this place with awesome + cheap sandwiches, so the location really couldn't have been more convenient.

Also, Kip's cat is the friendliest and cutest thing.

My fiance and I stayed with Kip for one night. The place was clean, the bed was comfortable, just what we needed. The whole experience was easy. The room was decorated with neat, vintage pieces, very cool. I would definitely stay with Kip again.
It has been a fantastic experience. Super clean and warm room in a quite area. Elegant furnitures. You can't ask more. Totally recommended!
Kip was a great host. He was very friendly and accommodating. The apartment is comfortable, clean and beautiful, decorated with interesting art and antiques. I would highly recommend staying here.
This was such a comfortable stay. Kip was lovely and accommodating. His place is super cool and very clean. Would love to stay again. And will recommend to anyone staying in Brooklyn.

Excellent séjour à New-York! Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour chez Kip, l'appartement est magnifique, c'est une véritable galerie d'art contemporain. La chambre est spacieuse et confortable. L'appartement est propre et agréable. Il se situe à moins de 5 minutes d'une station de métro ce qui est très agréable pour se rendre en ville.

Kip est génial,très accueillant et très arrangeant pour les hôtes. Il partage ses créations artistiques et coup de cœur musicaux. Ce partage culturel permet pleinement de s’imprégner de la culture New-Yorkaise.

Nous te remercions encore Kip pour ce séjour, et nous regrettons de ne pas avoir pu rester plus longtemps.

See you soon!

Kip's home was lovely, cool place to stay, he was also kind and helpful. It looks like artist's home. Media arts and music equipments in the living room are enjoyable to see. His cat Lucy is so lovely and kind, she always welcomed me to the home. Location is good to go to Mantattan and Williamsberg. Room is sunny and quiet, car noise very sometimes. I was really satisfied for all the days staying.
We really like Kip's house, the apartment is really clean and the bedroom confortable. The metro station is just 2 blocks far from the building, it is really convenient.

The room was cozy and clean (the portable heater and travel adapter put in by Kip showed his considerate nature). Kip was hospitable and helped us (me and my friend) getting familiar with the city. He welcomed us with some sumptuous coffee which was very comforting. The house is very close to Halsey St. L line which made it easy for us to commute to NYC. There are a couple of grocery stores right opposite the building so buying daily necessities becomes easy. The only glitch was the bed which was a little small for me and my friend but Kip immediately made arrangements for a cot which was very kind of him. The highlight of my stay at Kips was Lucy, his cat. She is cute and benign (but scared me at times since I'm not used to it). All in all I had an amazing stay at Kips and would definitely recommend it.
This was my second time staying here. It was just as clean, tidy, and inviting as the first time. Love staying at Kip's and Lucy is so sweet and friendly.

This place was perfect for me. I only spent one night here, but I wish it had been more. The room is large private and quiet. The bed dreamy, I slept like a baby crisp white linens surrounded my pillows.  Kip was straight forward  and pleasant. His communication was good and all went as planned. His place was creative and cool, very organized, clean, and cared for. It close to subway for easy transit as well. 
Thanks again Kip.

Kip's house was the most interesting house we've ever been during our trip! absolutely stunning house he has! and THE BED!! super comfy it was! he kindly offered us few beers too! and it is just few step away from subway! thanks kip!
Nice n tidy with a comfy bed and close to the subway :)
Great flat! super comfortable, clean and calm. Kip is a great host, his cat is a sweetheart. I recommend this place a 100%.

Great place. Close to L line. Extremely clean. Kip was laid back and easily contactable in the lead up to our stay. We were able to leave our bags at his place until our later departure. We very much enjoyed staying with Kip and his lovely cat Lucy.
Very Nice room and location! Lucy is a plus! She is lovely.

The room is as pictured, a nice space, cosy, quiet. The streets were very empty in the evening, not many people around. It's very close to the subway station which is well connected to the rest of the city.

Kip's room is cosy and located conveniently near the L line. Lucy the cat always welcomed us, which was nice. The apartment is clean and nicely decorated. In the immediate area there is less to see but we always took the metro to everywhere. Some 7 blocks from the Halsey metro stop there is a big supermarket and just at the end of the street a small deli/supermarket. We enjoyed our stay in nyc very much.

The room is just as pictured—bright, nicely furnished, comfortable, and clean. Kip thoughtfully provided towels and an extra blanket, as well as a much-appreciated space heater to help stave off the chilly NYC winter. The rest of the apartment is kept nice and clean and is very tastefully decorated. Amenities were as advertised. Lucy the cat is a total sweetie and made me feel like I was home every time I returned to the apartment.

Kip was welcoming and friendly and is very knowledgeable about Bushwick/Brooklyn/New York City in general. In particular, he went above and beyond and gave nightlife recommendations that only someone connected to the local scene would be able to do.

This part of Bushwick is fairly quiet and residential but has easy access to the rest of the city.—the apartment is, as advertised, right next to the Halsey L stop, with plenty of bodegas and small businesses within walking distance. 

Great first time in Brooklyn and I wouldnt hesitate to stay here again.

The best thing about staying with Kip is the absolute level of comfort. There's a great deal of character to his place and you feel very welcomed in it. It's so close to the train and in a very unique part of Brooklyn that is at the intersection of all the kinds of people who live there. Plus Lucy is one of the most welcoming cats I've ever come across.

all went very smoothly with arranging my stay at kip's home. his home and the room are just as pictured, just lovely. i really enjoyed being further down the L as it gave access to explore more parts of brooklyn and an easy commute from jfk. kip was welcoming and easy going and i found him most interesting. his cat lucy is the sweetest, it is true.

This place was really clean, cozy and perfect for me. Kip's house looked like a gallery. The charming and beautiful works are decorating everywhere in the house. If you enjoy arts, then Kip's house will be your perfect choice. And You can go to the downtown by using the L-train. We can easily go out to the downtown and come in kip's house Since the location of the house is nearby the station. I think Lucy makes the house more attractive and always made me feel happy.
Es una casa limpia y bonita. La habitación está muy bien. El gato es cariñoso.
Great place in convenient location, the room was nice and comfy, Kip is a charmjng host and I will definitely come back if I can!
The space that Kip provided was perfect for our stay. It is conveniently located near the L train which takes you directly to manhattan.  He also a friendly cat, Lucy.  Thank you Kip.

Our stay was very pleasant. It was simple and easy, with a comfortable bedroom, plenty privacy, and a good area close to the train. My favorite part might have been the adorable little cat. Kip was accommodating and made us feel at ease.
Kip is very kind and helpful. The room is very clean and full of sunshine. The house is close to the subway. It is very convenient to the downtown and other places.
He was weird

We stayed with Kip for 5 nights. Kip was flexible with me in letting me drop off my bags ahead of time, even though my flight was delayed. Kip's apartment is in a secured building which was nice. The bed is super comfortable and the neighborhood felt safe. Location to transit was good too. It was a few blocks away from the L Train or your could hop on a bus on the corner to get down to the J Train in a few minutes. We had a nice time and a nice stay!
Super Cool house! Spacious room. Description matches perfectly.  Kip was a great host.
Kip is awesome!! His cat Lucy is the cutest ll go back in a heartbeat.
Friendly and informative host, clean room in an immaculate apartment, easy location right off the L. Pleasant experience!

Kip was accommodating and a great host. He keeps the place clean and tidy. Lucy the cat is really sweet. The L train is seriously a block a way and a quick trip into the city. Would recommend staying here.

I had a great experience staying with kip. From a very late arrival to a late departure, Kip was extremely helpful and accommodating. The room is clean and comfortable with big windows and lots of sunlight. Very friendly kitty too. Also right next to the L for easy commute to Manhattan. Would definitely stay again.

Staying with Kip was fine. He and Lucy are friendly, the flat was clean and cool, the location was great close to subway and Dunkin doughnuts! :) We were able to use the bathroom every time we need, which I appreciate. It was cool, thank you! :)

My wife and I stayed two nights at Kip's place. The location was very convenient - just around the corner from the L train. The bed was comfy, the apt clean and equipped with everything we needed. Kip made sure we had a great stay at his place. I recommend his place to anyone visiting New York.
Estuvimos muy cómodos. La habitación es muy agradable, todo estaba limpio y ordenado. Lucy, un gatita muy tierna y grata compañía!
A nice, clean apartment with a cool cat named Lucy, convenient to the L train, in a safe & interesting neighborhood.
Awesome host. Lots of privacy. Room was lovely and clean. Would go back for sure!

We had a great stay at Kip's appartment. The appartment and the room are really lovely, clean and are close to a L-train station. 
Everything is exactly as you can see it on the photos. :)

Kip has an amazing apartment, it's clean, hip, and has everything you would need for a great stay. The location is very close to a subway where you can easily travel to any NY destination. I would 100% recommend staying with Kip for a fantastic time in New York. Kip is also very welcoming and chilled, we shared common interests in which he happily gave us advice and information on the best places to check out. I have nothing negative to say!!

La estancia fue una agradable experiencia, la habitación era tal cual aparece en la descripción y todo está ordenado y muy limpio.
En todo momento nos sentimos cómodos, cuando Kip estaba en casa prácticamente no te enterabas. Y Lucy  (gatita) es adorable y cariñosa, siempre venía a recibirte a la puerta.
Fue una buena elección,sin duda.
El metro está a 1 minuto y la línea te comunica con el centro d Manhattan.
Brooklyn fue un fantástico descubrimiento.

Kip has an excellent apartment in a convenient location (bushwick). The room had excellent decor, and also had a great air conditioning unit which was a lifesaver in the 35°C weather! Overall a great stay.

We loved our stay in Kip's place! We were in NYC for a long weekend, and spent lots of time out and about, and it was great to have a peaceful place to come back to and rest. The apartment is exactly as described, the room is creatively decorated and has a nice sense of privacy. The subway is really close, so are lots of great coffee shops and places to eat. Kip was really understanding about our late arrival due to train delay, and was helpful and considerate.

Kip was great and very accommodating. He is a great communicator, and was super helpful. His place is clean, it is a great location (close to the L line-35mins dt lower Manhattan). We were so glad we stayed there, and would recommend it to anyone.

Chambre très propre et décorée avec goût ! Présence d'air conditionné ce qui est très apprécié pour les mois d'été. L'appartement est très propre et dispose de tout le nécessaire ! Nous avons beaucoup apprécié et recommandons sans hésiter !

Kip's place is simply amazing, it is no wonder why he has such great ratings! The location of the house is just a few minute walk to the L train. Kip was out of town, but his roommate let us in and helped out with any questions we had. This place was spotless, had a great bed, shower, and AC, and ultra cool decor. The only thing I regret is not getting to meet Kip and thank him for such a great stay. Thanks again Kip!

This place is FANTASTIC. Seriously, such a dream. Kip was great- super nice, helpful, and responsive. His place is gorgeous, and right near the L. Lucy is a sweetheart and we miss her already. The place is impeccably decorated and the bed is so comfortable. We'd stay here again in a heartbeat and cannot recommend it enough!

Kip is helpful, nice and polite. His place are clean, and cozy. It's located in nice area , it about 5 min walk to train station. I recommend your all to stay at Kip's place during a trip in New York.
super emplacement a deux pas du metro et chambre comfortable avec hote respectueux et discret!!!

Kip was very accommodating and helpful before our arrival. The apartment is clean and the room is great for a short trip to NYC! Although further from manhattan than other neighborhoods, the place is very close to the subway and at a good price.
Kip is very friendly and his guest room is clean. Quite Convenient to subway station. Recommended.

All nice and simple. The room looks great and is comfortable. 
Subway connectionis is close by and easy.

I would recommend Kip's apartment for guests who would like to explore Brooklyn and have a low budget place to stay. If you're going to be a lot in Manhattan, you'll use quite some time in the subway, when staying in this apartment (it's five minutes walk from a subway station).
However, Brooklyn is interesting and Kip is a great host. Kip was flexible around our check in and out time, and helpful about insider recommendations for the Brooklyn exploration.
You have to like cats and not be allergic, when staying here. If you happen to like cats, Lucy the cat is very friendship seeking.

Kip's place was perfect for our few days in NY. We talked with him a bit the first evening we got in, then he pretty much kept to himself after that. We really only slept there and were out and about otherwise. Our bedroom was right by the apartment entrance and opposite Kips room in the apartment, so coming in super late felt minimally disruptive. All other reviewers already say it, but Lucy the cat was the best!! She loved hanging with us in the mornings while we were getting ready. Staying in Brooklyn was nice; a quite street with plenty of walkable spots and easy train access. We would definitely stay again/recommend!

Bydlení u Kipa, vypadá přesně jako na fotkách. Byt je čistý, vše potřebné je k dispozici. Na rohu je obchod, kde se dá koupit snídaně, sendviče, burgery nebo jiné potraviny. Místo je 3 min od metra L, které jede přímo na Manhattan (cca 30 min.). Nabídku ubytování doporučuji.

Kip was fine, showed us the flat and left us to it which suited us well. Lucy - the cat - was very cute and loved attention so we enjoyed being with her. The location is literally 5 mins from the L train which is perfect. It's a funky area in Bushwick and so it was nice to live somewhere a bit different.
Good place in bushwick with a cool cat :)
The host canceled this reservation 280 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Kip's place is a great one to stay in NYC! Pleasant, comfy and in a good taste. There's everything you need in there. Very well communicated with Manhattan and JFK airport. And the cat is so charming!
Clean room with very comfy bed. Good connection to the L train which takes you to the city.

Clean/quiet/comfortable room, easygoing and communicative host, super-easy access to all the Bushwick/Williamsburg/East Village bars and restaurants and venues your hipster heart desires (as long as the L train is running) and the cat is indeed adorable.
A very enjoyable stay... The room and bathroom are clean. And the location is perfect.
Great place

The room is perfect if you are looking for a comfortable place to sleep in between exploring NYC! The apartment was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The transit was a minutes walk away (L train) which took you straight into Manhattan!
By far the cleanest and coziest Airbnb I've stayed in. Kip and his kitty, Lucy, are both very sweet! The location is perfect. I will definitely be back next time I go to NYC <3

This is a pretty good spot offering a decent amount of value. It's only a block away from the L train station and fairly simple to get to. The nearby train provides an easy 30-40 minute trip into Manhattan. 

In regards to the room, it was pretty clean with a decent amount of space. The bed is big enough for two and there is a large flat screen TV with streaming options including Netflix and Hulu. 

Only had a few interactions with Kip, but everything was straightforward. Most of our interactions were actually with the cat, Lucy, who was very friendly and playful. She was a highlight of the the stay. 

Overall a good trip and I wouldn't mind staying there again.
Kip is so nice, and Lucy is the sweetest lil' cat. His place is so clean and comfortable. Definitely recommending him as host to anyone staying in NYC!
Kipp's place was really lovely and made my week in New York really easy. Getting in to Manhattan was very quick and not at all any trouble.

Although we only saw Kip in person during the check-in process, he was always quick to respond to texts. His cat, Lucy made us feel right at home! Super sweet and friendly! The room is clean and comfortable. A short walk to the L train which takes you all over the city.
Beautiful room, clean and wonderful cat!!

Kip is super cool host. I stayed for 2 weeks and it was full of joy. Spacious room, lovely kitty Lucy(I miss her a lot), easy to access train L, great neighborhood and 100% private staying. PERFECT. Choose this house right now, No regret.

Had a nice stay at Kip's place. The home is very clean. Location is a little ways away from Manhattan but with that being said the subway is only a couple of minutes away. Very good value for your dollar.
Thank you for letting me stay at your place. Great location, and very cool room!
A great place to stay! Super clean with a friendly cat. Many thanks
Excelente!!!!
A clean and very welcoming place. It feels like home and Kip is very friendly. Very close to the metro and you can move more easily. It is an excellent place to stay.
Great place to stay. He is around to communicate with you and if you have any questions he is able to answer them. Overall a great stay.
kip has a really beautiful place and is a very accommodating host. the location is perfectly located next to several subway options. lucy the cat is also amazing!
Great stay!
Beautiful flat in an amazing neighbourhood.

We needed a reasonable place to crash while we spent a few days going to the galleries and museums and Kip's place fit the bill. Very close access to the L train, which was super convenient for exploring Brooklyn and getting into Manhattan. The bed was comfortable and the tv with Netflix was a really nice touch. Lucy the cat is very friendly. Thanks Kip!
Everything was very good. Clean room, close to subway, Kip was very nice and definitely did more than he was supposed to, but I would love to give the sixth star to the sweetest cat Lucy!

My stay at Kip's place could not have been better. The location was perfect for me (close to relative I was visiting) and so close to the L Train. The nearby Trans Am cafe is a great spot for breakfast/lunch, particularly for vegetarians. The room is spacious and spotless. Kip is easy to communicate with -- open and direct. Lucy is beyond adorable and super lovable. She came running to great me every time I entered the apartment. I will stay again.
Great place and close to the subway!

The apartment was lovely, well kept and had air con. Lots of light in the room and plenty of storage space. Kip was excellent at communicating with me about a change in my arrival times and went above and beyond to accommodate. Best NYC AirBNB I've had.
Subway station very convenient, but a bit far from the main activities
Perfect!!
Great experience❤️ clean and comfortable , good location ) 5 stars

Kip's flat is nice and well located (few minutes from the L train, it takes more or less 30 minutes to reach Manhattan ). The room is nice furnished and towels and sheets are clean. Nevertheless, the floor was not that clean and the cat - even though she is very cute - sneaks everywhere, so there are cat's hairs on the floor. But that is just a detail, I would recommend this place !

Kip's apartment may be the cleanisy apartment I've ever stayed in on airbnb with pretty every amenity and comfort you could reasonably need. The apartment is well placed in the cool and lively Bushwick area with good access to the whole of New York. Kip was always friendly and responsive with communication. Highly recommended.
Comfortable, convenient, and friendly. Would stay again
We had a short but really nice stay at Kips place and would definitely choose it again if we came back!

Kip thank you so much for being so nice.Your home is great.We had the best time in New York so far.Highly recommended Kip's place if you're ever in the area.Would stay here again!!! Claudia and Yeleina.
Great and affordable place in Bushwick! Close to subway.  Lucy the cat was super friendly :)

Kip est un hôte très aimable et serviable. Le logement se trouve à proximité de la ligne L du métro et est facile à trouver. C'est un espace bien agencé avec une déco moderne. La chambre elle-même est assez spacieuse, à noter que le lit est un 140, donc mieux adapté à ceux qui aiment les étreintes.
Je recommande absolument.

Kip's place was clean and comfortable. We loved the decorations in the room and it has a good view of the street. It was very close to the subway and the neighborhood has a lot of personality. Lucy the cat was a great host as well and we certainly enjoyed her company.

Checking in was easy. Kipp was there to show us our room and the rest of the apartment. The room and the apartment were clean and had everything we needed it. It was really nice and very close to the subway! Definitely recommend.
Kip was a nice host. His house was close to L line.
Kip was a really reliable and nice host! The appartament was very clean, he had two cute little cats, the communication was perfect and Kip was very flexible! I can definitely recommand his place

Kip was awesome! Quick responses and always very reliable. The kitty Lucy was also such a great host who is great to relax with after a busy day in the city. The most friendly cat I have ever met. Thanks Kip for the great room. Very clean, relaxed,  and convenient. Take care!

Kip is a FANTASTIC host and really adapts to your personality as far as how involved he is in your interactions and is very friendly and nice. The room is perfect, spacious, clean, comfortable. It's also only two blocks from the L which takes you right into Manhattan in around 30 minutes (public transportation isn't perfect so that time can vary). I had a great stay and definitely would recommend picking this amazing spot, I'll most likely be back in the near future!
Great space

Super clean. Kip was great, he even gave us recommendations for a late snack. The room is exactly how you see it in the pics. The high ceiling is amazing. Once you close the room's door, you can't hear anything. Good shower. Spotless. In terms of location, the apartment itself is located a block away from the station. Super convenient and accessible. The only thing I would point out is that for me, particularly, it seemed a bit far from Manhattan, but this is up to your sense of relatively. About the neighborhood, I didn't get a chance to explore; at late hours it seemed a bit on the rougher side but take into consideration that I basically only came to the apartment to sleep at pretty late hours. Loved the graffiti that's on the way to the station though. Overall the place is great.
We had a great time at Kip's apartment! Lucy (the cat) was so sweet. Charming apartment and very close to the subway. :):)
Staying at Kip and Lucy's house was very confortable, the connection to all the metro lines was very easy. We had a great time, everything was very clean. Kip is a great host!
Kip was a great host, and it was certainly worthwhile staying at his place. The room was nice and spacious and he was very easy to communicate with. Would stay again!

The room was exactly we needed it, every detail in the room make it special. We liked a lot the location, just two blocks from the subway station. The neighborhood has an industrial look, some decadent vibe, but we felt safe always.  We felt very comfortable, good linens and good shower. Lucy the cat was very friendly and cute.

We've had a great time at Kip's apartment! Neighbourhood is great, and the transportation options are fantastic. This is a cool apartment with everything we needed for a week in NY.
Thanks again!

Kip was so kind, welcoming, and helpful. He truly made my stay a unique and wonderful experience! The room is also a delight to stay in and has the most amazing sunlight shining in each morning, or blackout curtains if you want to sleep in. Location is great as well, I would recommend this place to anyone in a heartbeat. Thanks again Kip (:
The place was exactly as advertised. Everything was clean. The room was charming and artistic. The location was close to the Halsey Street subway and easy to find. Kip was very helpful.
Kip has two lovely black cats and a cool fashionable flat. The area around Bushwick is really something to be discovered, really charming, with excellent restaurants and music, go and check it out!
Kip is a fantastic host! He was generous with tips about places to eat (all of which were excellent) and accommodating with his space. It was a great trip made better by his hospitality.
Kip hosted us for 2 weeks while we looked for an apartment in the area. Very respectful host in a great area just a few minutes walk to the subway.
Kip is absolutely lovely, Lucy (the cat) is the sweetest. The space is clean, well located, and gorgeously decorated. 10/10 recommend.

Kip is an amzing host, he gave us local tips on where to go, was very nice and was always there for us via text or in person. The room is great and the bed is really comfy and the room is very stylish. The apt is very near to the subway
The place is amazing and well located. He is personable and respects your privacy. High recommendation!

The room is actually even nicer in person than it is in photos. Super convenient location, a couple of minutes away from the L train. Quiet street/building. Extremely clean. Very nice cat that will come and say hi whenever you return to the apartment. Kip is also a lighting designer, so there are a few subtle light installations around the apartment that will please Dan Flavin fans. All in all, an amazing deal and totally recommended.
really comfortable, clean and very very stylish place, right by the L so easy to get through Brooklyn and to Manhattan, adorable and extremely sweet cat who is also an excellent co-host!

Très bon accueil de kip avec des petits chocolats! 
Son chat lucy est très gentille aussi!
La chambre est très confortable il y a également une grande télé avec Netflix idéal pour se reposer après une grosse journée!
On reviendra sans hésiter
Great host, awesome apartment, and a super sweet cat!
Had a great experience at Kip's apartment.  He's a great host - considerate, detailed, and helpful.  The space is clean, spacious and carefully furnished.  Would stay again - 5 stars

Kip is a wonderful host! Very friendly and accomodating. He offered a list of local restaurants to check out. He has a sweet cat named Lucy. It's worth noting that although I have a bit of a cat allergy, he went to the lengths of ordering a new air purifier express-shipped in time for my stay. The apartment is kept very clean and has a cool aesthetic. The bedroom offers a lot of natural light, and it also has blackout curtains if preferred. You can't beat the location - it is right down the street from the L train. I would definitely recommend this spot to anyone.
Great value for money - location is great, room is great, Lucy the cat is great! And Kip made sure our stay was comfortable. Overall, nothing to complain about!

Absoutely loved staying at Kip’s place. Super cool environment (with awesome lights) and very clean. His cat Lucy is also extremely sweet and even slept with us at night! Would definitely recommend staying here.

Kip was a great host. He gave us a mini tour when we arrived and checked in on us halfway through our stay. He had the room and washroom laid out and prepared it as well as a fancy hotel!
The room looked even better in person than the photos. It was nice to look at all the decor and various knick knacks. We really liked the neon lights set up around the house, it added a cool vibe to the place at night.
The toiletries provided covered all our needs. They all smelled very lovely and were aesthetically pleasing. I’m going to be looking into getting me some of the shampoo and conditioner when I’m back home.
The cat, Lucy, was adorable. She was well behaved and really loved the attention you gave her. She also brushed up against our leg when we came back.
We found the location very good to get around. It’s very close to the L train which is less than 30 minutes to Manhattan. It also connects to the blue line which is handy to get around Brooklyn. It’s near a few food places and bars, a grocery store, and convenient store with a lovely store clerk.
Overall great experience, highly recommend booking this place for your trip!
We really enjoyed our stay at Kips, check-in was easy, the bed was comfy and the location good value for budget travellers.
Kip was very kind and accommodating! I  would definitely recommend! The place is clean and comfortable.

Kip’s place was wonderful!! Very very clean. My friend and I had been to the city lots of times, so we did about our thing and so did kip! The apartment had very cool lights and Lucy! Lucy was such a sweet cat always ready for Love. The apartment was located very convenient to public transportation. Would love to spend another trip at Kip’s. One of my better air bnb’s in NY.

Spotless apartment, comfortable bedroom, adorable cat. We had a great time staying in Bushwick, and Kip was an excellent host. He suggested Capybara, a local plant-based bar and restaurant that we would also highly recommend – the cocktails and vegan food were excellent. Great stay, really glad we booked this. Thank you!
Minimal setup, but well designed.  Host is accommodating and knowledgeable about NYC. Must dig cats (1 cat).

Kip's place is exactly what you see in the images! His place is very clean and we were greeted to our room with cute pieces of chocolate on our pillows. His cat, Lucy, is so sweet and loves to come in and say hello every chance she got. Overall, Kip was an amazing host and just did his thing while we did ours.
The best. I love the apartment and the place. Very close to subway.

Kip’s place was very clean and cozy. The design was very modern and stylish. More spacy than I expected. I loved how the ceiling of the room was high and how the curtains blocks sunlight. Bed was extremely comfy. The location is close to Halsey st. but takes quite a bit to Manhatten. Besides that Kip was an amazing host, very friendly and nice. Would defo come here again

Staying at Kip’s place was great! Check-in was easy, the apartment was clean and stylish, we loved the light design in this place. The room itself was fine, we had 2 pillows a person and the bed was pretty comfy. His cat Lucy was adorable and was usually playfully running around the place or chilling in our room. Bathroom has everything and Kip also provided towels so that saved us packing. Nice neighborhood in Brooklyn, about 20 - 30 minutes away from Manhattan by subway. And hour away from JFK airport.

Good value for money. Nice clean place. Comfortable bed and tv in room to relax after a day strolling through NYC. 

Close to the L line (5 min walk)which brings you to lower Manhattan in about 30 min. Nice deli on the corner for sandwiches, coffee etc.
Great place and easy access to train stations.

Good for it’s value. It takes about 3 min to get to the metro station and about 20 to get Manhattan. The neighbor hood seems decent. It’s easy to buy anything to eat. Kip agreed to check in us earlier so big plus! There were no problems during our stay, except the WiFi connection in our room which was quite poor.

La chambre proposée par Kip est tout à fait conforme à la description de l’annonce : belle, agréable et facile d’accès. Nous avons intégré le logement en autonomie et rencontré Kip un peu plus tard.
L’appartement est vaste et disposé de telle manière que personne ne se marche sur les pieds.
C’est une bonne solution pour se reposer lors d’un séjour à NYC.
Seul bémol : c’est un peu fastidieux de rejoindre les quartiers de Dumbo ou Williamsburg.

Alles war wie beschrieben. Für uns ruheverwöhnten Landeier etwas lautstarke Nachbarn aber mit geschlossenem Fenster und aircondition on o.k.
Mit Line L gute Verbindung in alle Richtungen.
Nice guy, nice apartment, nice neighbourhood and a great price. Recommended in every way!
Amazing place, everything is so clean and so NY vibes.

Kip’s place was fabulous! He communicated fast and check in was a breeze. The neighborhood is nice, with lots of food and drinks options. His cat Lucy is so affectionate but not annoying. His house is set up with these amzing lights and motion detectors that are you feel like you are in a performance art space. He was helpful in every way and his house was very clean. You can get to the L in a block or twoJ/M about 8 blocks away.

My partner and I stayed at Kip's place this past weekend and he is an excellent host. His place looks exactly like the photos, the room is very spacious and nicely decorated. He was also great at responding and was totally cool with us having a later check-in. 

His place is super close to the subway which makes it very convenient and close to lots of great neighbourhood spots. 

I would highly recommend Kip as a host.

Beautiful place, very tastefully decorated, sparkling clean. Everything looks and feels impeccable. Plenty of new-like towels, nice bed linen, all bathroom supplies provided... I  have never stayed at an Airbnb in a  price range any close to Kip's that would compare favorably to his place.  Highly recommended! 
Only exceptions: Guests with a disability (two flights walk-up) or allergy to cats (Lucy is very quiet, sweet and sociable, but she's still a cat)
I felt right at home as soon as I arrived. Everything you need is there and Kip is always happy to help. One of the best Airbnb's I've stayed at.
Great place to stay! Bed was comfortable,  sheets and towels were clean.  The bathroom was clean as well. If you are allergic to cats,  don't leave the bedroom door opened.

We had a great stay! Loved how clean Kip’s place is, and accessible to public transportation. Check in was also hassle free, and Kip even allowed us to check in way earlier! We arrived in NY 4 am and he was thoughtful enough to let us in or otherwise we might have been roaming the streets of brooklyn in wee hours. Lol. Even received chocolates from him! Thank you Kip! Highly recommended

Safe neighborhood. Convenient to subway. Apartment was clean. Kip was very easy to deal with and extremely accommodating. However the real stars of the show are the amazing bed and Lucy the cat. The bed is one of the most comfortable beds I’ve ever slept on. And Lucy is adorable!

name: Excellent Location and price !
summary: Welcome To Sultanahmet Star Holiday Hotel! Star Holiday Hotel is an unbeatable place to stay, for its location, price and the friendly welcome of the staff ! Our hotel has been fully renovated  (April 2014) : the  rooms, terrace,  loby, furnitures a
description: Welcome To Sultanahmet Star Holiday Hotel! Star Holiday Hotel is an unbeatable place to stay, for its location, price and the friendly welcome of the staff ! Our hotel has been fully renovated  (April 2014) : the  rooms, terrace,  loby, furnitures a

reviews.comments: What a perfect location. Central to the attraction in Sultanahmet and so easy to locate. We had a great time. All facilities were clean and the breakfast was great to get your tourist day started. And the view from the dining room is a great start to each day. Can recommend the Star Holiday Hotel any day.

name: PETIT HOUSE
summary: the petit house is located in the bosphorous and very close to downtown. it takes five minutes to get to the seaside. it overlooks the Bebek bay which makes the petit house special. it has a big terrace and a big (website hidden) is fully furbished house.
space: the whole house can be rented out to a family or a group of friends who would like to save some money from lodging and spent it on either food or sightseeing ! the house can accomadate 3 grown-ups..
description: the petit house is located in the bosphorous and very close to downtown. it takes five minutes to get to the seaside. it overlooks the Bebek bay which makes the petit house special. it has a big terrace and a big (website hidden) is fully furbished house. the whole house can be rented out to a family or a group of friends who would like to save some money from lodging and spent it on either food or sightseeing ! the house can accomadate 3 grown-ups.. Guests have access to everything the premises has to offer. as much as possible the neighbourhood is  very  calm comparing the rest of the city and yet quite close to city center with public transportation.  since it s quite close to sea side , you can stroll up and down the shore where you will see many nice restaurant,cafes and bars to eat and hang out. plenty of them. Suggestions  where to visit and where to eat ranging from reasonable ones to the fancy ones...

transit: plenty of them.
