interaction: as much as possible
house_rules: enjoy your stay and treat the house as if it s your house and please fully comply with the directions given to you about the HOUSE RULES.

host.host_about: grounded and well-traveled interior architect

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Ercan is wonderful, as his family, and they will very quickly make you feel welcome.  The apartment is beautifully designed and has everything you would need for both a short or long term stay.  The house requires a climb up a few hill or staircases, but the neighborhood is utterly charming--it feels like a intimate village within Istanbul's grand sweep.  It is also located on the Bosphorous with lovely walks and restaurants.  I would definitely recommend staying here, but be certain you are comfortable with dogs!

The Petit house was amazing! The neighborhood is absolutely beautiful and the perfect stay away from the tourist trap. The house itself is so nicely designed and comfortable and feels much bigger in real life. Perfect for a couple. Great views from the balcony. Most of all, Ercan is such a fantastic host and really made our stay memorable; giving us all the great local tips among other acts of generosity. Can't recommend enough. Thanks again Ercan!

Cozy flat with a great view towards Bosphours. Ercan was a caring host and very concern about every detail of his place.the flat was clean and tidy and we enjoyed our stay in his place. Dogs were around most of the time and they were friendly also.
Thanks Ercan for letting me staying at your place.

Ercan was such a lovely host. He was fast with responses, picked us up at Taksim to take us to the house (which was really appreciated because he lives at the top of a steep hill), and was generous with his suggestions/recommendations. We visited at least three restaurants on his recommendation (loved them all). 

The house itself is wonderful to stay in. It is petit, but plenty of space for two people. The views from the deck and living room windows are amazing! Of course, you have to earn this view by climbing the hill! This was not bad, but do be prepared for a 10 min hilly walk from the closest bus stop. The view and house is worth it. Ercan has three dogs and they stay in the "compound", but not the house itself. The dogs are friendly and lovable. 

The location in Arnavutkoy is wonderful. You feel like you're in a village inside Istanbul. I would really recommend it.
Ev sahibimizin eve varis animizdan itibaren sicak ve icten yaklasimiyla,evin temizligiyle,merkezi konumuyla,guzel manzarasiyla,gunesli havaninda yardimiyla mukemmel 5 gun gecirdik..Herkese oneririm..

Ercan is a great person who helped and guided us very well. The house met our expectations perfectly. The neighborhood (Arnavutkoy) is an amazing place. Almost fall into love with the region....

The house is on the hill so if you like to walk and hike it is perfect for you. The place is not for from the shore where the center of the town is, so not much walk but the sharp uphills might be challenging to some. However if you hire a cap no problem at all, they all come up and drop you off in front of the house. The taxi prices are not expensive. We, personally, took the cap only once during our one week stay, other times enjoyed walking among old Turkish stile houses and absorbing the superb view glaring under a beautiful sun.

name: Serenity amidst the busy city
space: SPECIAL RATES FOR STRANDED TRAVELERS DUE TO HURRICANE  SANDY  Loveky apartment  in the heart of the Upper East Side near shopping, nightlife, and major NYC attractions. You will be 10 min walk to Central Park. Close to wonderful museums MET, Guggenheim , Frick, Natural history , tons of restaurants , art galleries and boutiques Very big , comfortable and quiet apartment Near major subways (4, 5, 6),  Second avenue Q train  Double Bed, extra futon and a sofa Eat-in dining area Modern Bath and Kitchen with everything you need gas stove, full size fridge, microwave, coffeemaker, blender, pots, pans, glasses.... Fresh towels, pillows, linens and blankets included Toiletries like shampoos, body wash, hair products, moisturizers etc Hair dryer, iron, umbrellas, tourist guides, books, CDs, yoga mat Cable HD TV, DVD,CD, Mp3 Fast Internet connection and a PC to use Wi Fi $99 a day all inclusive Special Promotion for February : Flexible rate $50- $135 depending on availability Please contact me

Fresh towels, pillows, linens and blankets included Toiletries like shampoos, body wash, hair products, moisturizers etc Hair dryer, iron, umbrellas, tourist guides, books, CDs, yoga mat Cable HD TV, DVD,CD, Mp3 Fast Internet connection and a PC to use Wi Fi $99 a day all inclusive Special Promotion for February : Flexible rate $50- $135 depending on availability Please contact me
neighborhood_overview: Upper East Site the jewel in Manhattan neighborhoods! Museum Mile with MET, Frick , Guggenheim museums. Galleries all around, World class shopping on Fifth avenue and Madison   and Michelin star restaurants And of course Central Park just a short walk away.
transit: Second Avenue Q  subway train  around the corner. Buses stop at 1st , 2nd and 3 avenue.
access: Entire apartment is for guests.
interaction: Available 24/7 via email,  phone or Airbnb ..
house_rules: In general there are no strict rules , but  since  I  like clarity and open communication: upon check in I'll tell you what I expect of you, remind you of the house rules, happily listen to any questions or concerns you might have about the space or NYC in general, and encourage you to check in with me about any problems with the space during your stay.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hi we are avid travelers and know importance of  good accommodation and an insider tip on a city. Happy to show you around NYC and make your stay a pleasant adventure.
Please feel free to contact me with any questions.

reviews.comments: Our stay in NY at Marie's place was a good one. Street and neightbourhood were nice. The apartment is big enough for two. Because at the back side no sunlight, so a bit dark. We slept well.

Marie was out of the country, but her daughter Maria was *the* perfect host. The guests staying in the apartment before me missed their flight but Maria (and Marie, from halfway across the world) managed to find a solution which worked for all of us.

The apartment is quite charming and really cozy. Although I was out most of the time, I managed to flip through a couple of interior design books. There were nice little touches too, like new magazines and fruit.

The neighborhood, of course, is pretty quiet and safe. I managed to lock myself out (with my phone in the apartment) less than fifteen minutes before my ride to the airport was supposed to arrive, but the super was super helpful (no pun intended).

Taxis are pretty easy to hail nearby (York/1st Ave). There's also a crosstown-bus stop a couple of minutes away, at 79th & York. The Met is a fifteen-minute walk away.

All in all, I would definitely stay in Marie's and Maria's apartment again.

Nous avons passés 3 semaines chez Marie en septembre 2012. L'appartement est exactement comme décris et correspond bien aux photos. Une station de métro "express" est à dix minutes de l'appartement. Central park est également à une dizaine de minutes à pieds : parfait pour les footings matinaux. Il y a beaucoup de commerces dans le quatiers (plusieurs supermarché à proximité), il y a egalement beaucoup de restaurant de tous types. Un marché a aussi lieu le samedi matin dans la rue. 
L'appartement est très calme, aucun bruit de l’extérieur la nuit.
La cuisine n'est pas très grande mais nous mangions toujours a l'exterieur donc nous ne l'utilisons pas.
Nous n'avons pas reussi à utiliser le Wifi mais un ordinateur connecté  à Internet et à disposition dans l'appartement.
Il y a une laverie dans l'immeuble avec machine a laver et seche linge.
Le contact avec Marie est parfait. Elle est adorable et répond toujours très rapidement aux messages.
L'appartement parfait pour les petits budgets.

We arrived late and our host had made plans for us to pick up our keys in a convenient location.  She later called to confirm.  There was no internet connection, but we were able to obtain what we needed on out phones.  Our apartment was quaint, clean but (somewhat dusty) and quiet.  It reminded us of housing post college graduation.  We were quite pleased with our host and our stay and would consider a return trip in the future.

Queridos amigos, es imposible recomendar el departamento de Mery, ya que lo alquila para 4 personas y tiene mínimamente "comodidad " para 2 . Ya que consta de una cama matrimonial y un sofá que no es cama, salvó que quieras dormir en un colchón inflable pinchado. En el departamento convivirás con ratones que te comen tus alimentos si los dejas fuera del refrigerador. Las sábanas a pesar de estar lavadas tenían manchas de suciedad y no pretendas encontrar un plato o vaso igual al otro. No te dan la dirección exacta hasta 10 minutos antes de entrar 15 hs. Así qué deambularas por la cuidad con tus maletas. Si esto no es suficiente tengo fotos que lo demuestran, solamente escríbeme a mi correo y te las mandare. Espero que esta opinión te sirva para no tener que perder el dinero como me paso a mi, ya que tuve que hospedarme en un hostel cercano. Suerte

it was unfortunate that the apartment was not available for my whole stay but i stayed at Marie`s apartment for 3 nights. Safe and convenient location. Great for people who come for business. Very clean, can be recommended for people who will spend most of the time outside. Thanks Marie and Maria.

Nous sommes restés une semaine chez Marie au mois de mars. Marie a été très sympathique par mail et a pris du temps pour répondre à nos questions.Elle ne vit pas sur place, c'est sa fille qui s'occupe de l'appartement.
L'appartement est un peu vieillot et sombre mais assez propre.Une des fenêtre de ferme pas et le lit est plutôt moyen.
Il est bien situé, assez loin de la zone touristique, il y a des écoles à côté, c'est un "vrai quartier habité" par des New Yorkais, ce qui est plutôt sympa Un petit marché le samedi, des restaus pas loin, 15 minutes à pieds du Met.
Il faut marcher 10 bonnes minutes pour attraper le métro et il faut bien compter 40 45 minutes pour arriver vers Wall Street, une demi -heure environ pour Times Square. 
Expérience sympa pour les petits budgets (pas si petits que ça au final, mais bon, tout est très cher à New York!)

Marie was an excellent host. She responded to all questions and offered helpful information. She was flexible with check in/out times, which was extremely helpful. She also gave us some tips for good restaurants around town.

The apartment was in a safe location, within walking distance of food and the subway. Toiletries, linens, and appliances were all provided. The apartment was decorated very nicely. It had a welcoming feel.
The reservation was canceled 42 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We spent three weeks in the apartment, and we were very very disappointed by the host. 

First, it is really dusty and dirty :
- no cleaning done as it was said
- full of dust under the bed
- no toilet paper
- very dark inside
- 20 minutes walk to central park (not 10)
- 15 minutes walk to subway
- very noisy with the neighbour, especially upstairs taking a bath (sound like a airplane military landing) everymorning
- windows don't close very well (cold and noisy)
- bed bug (little insects) which sting
- no space for food in cupboards
- the bed smells the cat poop
- it is only for two persons
- mildew in the bathroom
- relocation in the apartment just next door with build works 


Then, the owner asked us at the middle of our stay if it was possible to change of apartment because she did a mistake and had to host other people... so she purposed a friend's room...  we refused and then, the last day, for the check out, she told us, the new guest did enough "sacrifice", so we had to go out early and depose our luggage in town... 50$ of deposit..

The price should be much lower, I don't recommend this host.

Our experience at Marie's was great. She was very welcoming and explained everything clearly upon arrival. The apartment is well located. It could be a little bit closer to subway (you have to walk 10 minutes or more to get to it) but you also have other means of transport to move. The neighbourhood is lovely, quiet, safe and full of shops of any kind. Inside the apartment everything was very clean and nice. New or almost new sheets and towels as well as an almost fully equipped kitchen (a microwave is missing). The bed was very comfortable and wifi and air conditioning worked perfectly. The relationship price quality is perfect. We definitely recommend this apartment for a young couple like us.
The reservation was canceled 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Marie's place was exactly as it looks in the photos! Very comfortable and a great value. Marie took time to explain how everything in the apartment worked and even made certain that I tried the locks before she left. As a young woman traveling alone in NYC I felt completely safe walking around the neighborhood both during the day and at night. There are plenty of local conveniences nearby (drug stores, bodegas, bars and restaurants.) I would gladly rent from Marie again!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Hilltop Legacy | Hilo Bay Room
summary: LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION!  You won't need a tourist map to find your way down the street to beaches, shopping, restaurants and much more! This is the perfect spot for you to explore everything The Big Island has to offer!
space: Hilltop Legacy Vacation Rental in Downtown Hilo Bay - Free Wifi  - Private Bathrooms  - Beautiful Views of Downtown Hilo Bay  - Fridge & Microwave in all Guest Rooms  - Billiard Table  - 2 Fireplaces  - 3 Lanai's Cozy room, amazing ocean views and lots of natural light. The best part of living here is the location. You're right in Downtown Hilo within a minutes drive to everywhere, but you'll feel like you're way out in the country! Many coffee shops are right down the street. Great Hawaiian, Japanese, Thai, and Italian restaurants are less than 5 minutes away. Want some McDonald's instead? Not a problem, there's one just down the road! Places like Rainbow Falls, Lyman Museum, Hawaii Tropical Botanical Gardens, Zip lines, and much more are just a short drive away, and there's pretty much any kind of restaurant you can think of too. You will be renting the Hilo Bay Room located in the most convenient location in Hilo! There's a lot of natural light all day long, and although we live ste
description: LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION!  You won't need a tourist map to find your way down the street to beaches, shopping, restaurants and much more! This is the perfect spot for you to explore everything The Big Island has to offer! Hilltop Legacy Vacation Rental in Downtown Hilo Bay - Free Wifi  - Private Bathrooms  - Beautiful Views of Downtown Hilo Bay  - Fridge & Microwave in all Guest Rooms  - Billiard Table  - 2 Fireplaces  - 3 Lanai's Cozy room, amazing ocean views and lots of natural light. The best part of living here is the location. You're right in Downtown Hilo within a minutes drive to everywhere, but you'll feel like you're way out in the country! Many coffee shops are right down the street. Great Hawaiian, Japanese, Thai, and Italian restaurants are less than 5 minutes away. Want some McDonald's instead? Not a problem, there's one just down the road! Places like Rainbow Falls, Lyman Museum, Hawaii Tropical Botanical Gardens, Zip lines, and much more are just a short drive away,
neighborhood_overview: People are also really nice around here. Everyone is used to having tourists around all year long, so even if you don't speak english, they will find a way to help you out. It's also a really safe area, and there are cops everywhere all day and night long.
notes: Please be aware that there is no property manager on site. Someone will be there periodically throughout the days, but we will always be available in the event of an emergency as well as by phone.
transit: I do recommend renting a car if possible. Although we are located so close to many restaurants, shops and attractions, to really get the most out of your trip to the Big Island, you will need to explore! This is a Big Island, an there are so many great things to see that you would be missing out on if you don't have a vehicle. If you have a car, parking is available for you. We provide safe parking just outside of the house. If you want, pop, your head out the window and make sure your car is still there! Easy access to:  Rainbow Falls Many Beaches Hawaii Tropical Botanical Gardens Akaka Falls Volcanoes National Park Shopping & Dining Lyman Museum Imiloa Astronomy Center
access: Guests are invited to enjoy our two outdoor lanai's, stainless steel gas grill and dining areas. Two additional areas sport a large living room with a fireplace, billiard table and books to help you plan your day and an intimate oriental garden with a koi pond and fountain.
interaction: I will not be available in person, but I am always available by telephone or through Airbnb. I live in Hilo and am always available in the event of an emergency. On the day of check-in, once your room is ready, we will message you the codes you will need to check yourself in along with your room number. If you have any issues getting into the property, you may always call me and we can guide you in over the telephone.
house_rules: Our Policy: - All room rates are based on double occupancy. There is additional persons fee of $25 per person per night which must be paid upon arrival prior to check-in.  - No smoking is allowed in the house. but we have two big lanai's and you are allowed to smoke there anytime. - To follow Hawaiian tradition, street shoes may not be worn inside the house, but you may bring soft-soled indoor slippers for your convenience. - Check In time is between 3:00 pm-6:00 pm, let us know if you will be arriving earlier or later so we can make sure to send you check-in instructions.  - A valid photo ID and credit card is required to check-in. - Please lock the front door at ALL times.

host.host_about: Aloha! I enjoy meeting new people and sharing the great experience that Hawaii has to offer. I'm glad that Airbnb gives us the opportunity to travel and connect in a very unique way. I love taking pictures and always have my camera with me. I was born and raised in Hilo and would be more than happy to share my knowledge of this beautiful Island with you! Look forward to seeing you soon! Mahalo!

reviews.comments: Charming, vintage local family manse atop a cute, in-town pu'u, with a cheerful local young innkeeper. Great location, great views and charming surrounding hilltop garden, more than sufficient continental breakfast, Jade was kind and helpful.

very nice and clean room with spacious bathroom and a great view over Hilo town. I stayed there for five nights and felt very comfortable. A very beautiful house with very tasty furniture and very beautiful and peaceful japanese Zen-like garden. Jade was a great and very friendly host and gave me a lot of information and tour tips for my photographic work. It was the best accomodation i had during my time in Hawaii and really can recommand this quiet and peaceful place on top of the hill. Very good continenatl breakfast and Jade did his best to answer all my questions about Lavafields, tours and the nature highlights of Big Island. Thank you very much.

My boyfriend and I had a great experience staying in Jade's Hilltop Legacy room.  The house was beautiful and the rooms have amazing views of Hilo Bay.  He provided a delicious breakfast that included fresh local fruit in the mornings, and had a lot of outdoor gear accommodations  (snorkles, beach towels, etc) which was definitely convenient for light packers.  The room was very private and had all of the conveniences of a hotel.  Great location, great accommodations, great host.  I will definitely be back next time.
Wonderful space, clean, quiet, comfortable and in central Hilo.  Beautiful view of town and the ocean to the east.  My preferred place to stay when visiting East Hawaii.
Great host, spectacular vantage over Hilo, lovely breakfast in the formal dining area or outside next to the rock garden and pond.  I will stay here if I can when I am next in Hilo!  Thank you Jade!

Jade is a wonderful host. He was very friendly and made us feel at home right from the start. He even upgraded our room to a suite (with a great view and a Jacuzzi) at no additional cost. He is quite knowledgable about the area and shared his thoughts with us and provided suggestions for things to do aroung the Island. 

The house in located at the end of a private driveway, less than 5 minutes from downtown Hilo. Yet, it was very quiet (and very romantic according to my wife :) ). There is ample parking within the property. The house is well decorated with family trinkets and local handicrafts. A simple continental breakfast is served every morning between 8 to 9 AM. Without a doubt, for my next visit to Hilo, I will first contact Jade to see if there is a room available in his BnB.

It was a wonderful experience and Jade was a wonderful host ready to help and share his knowledge at any time.
The breakfast was wonderful.
Thanks a lot Jade

My husband and I was in september in the smallest room in Hilltop legacy. Jade was a great host, nice and polite.
The breakfast, the lanais, gardens and the hall was wonderfoull
The room was clean and luminous but at night there was thousand of frogs croaking all the night outside!!
Thank you Jade!!

We stayed here when we were visiting Hilo side of the island. The place certainly has a charm. Jade, our host was very friendly and personable. He made sure our stay was comfortable. We drove up to Mauna Kea for sky gazing, which is one of the highest place on the island. Jade offered jackets for us to take up to the summit. This was very considered gesture.
There was also very welcoming and curious cats in the house, specially Snowball was found of us and circled around us almost entire time when we were there.

Thank YOU Jade!

Jade is a wonderful host, and the property is gorgeous. The view from our room was fantastic, and Jade went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable. The self-serve continental breakfast has everything you'd need, which was great for us early-risers. A quick, full breakfast was welcome and allowed us to be on our way and enjoy the adventures that side of the Big Island had to offer.

The room is cozy and outfitted with fast WiFi, a television, a mini fridge and microwave, a coffee maker, and had a private bathroom. The only minor issue I had was that the water pressure in the shower was pretty weak. It's not a huge deal, but it's something to note. Also very minor, and not really an issue for most, but if you ARE allergic, there is a cat there. Snowball's very friendly, but it's just another thing to note.

All in all, this is a great place to stay, and Jade has the place outfitted such that you'll have everything you need. Need fresh towels? No problem. Want a glass or a bottle of wine? Just ask and you can buy one for a very fair price. All of this, and I didn't even mention that the first floor of the house has a common room with a large screen TV and full-sized pool table! Very cool.

I'd absolutely stay with Jade again. Definitely consider this property on your trip to Hilo.

Jade is a great host and his place is every bit as beautiful as the photos.  It is a clean and safe plase to stay in a beautiful paradise.  You are close enough to town to walk in less than 30 minutes, but far enough to enjoy the scerenity of his hilltop location.   I highly recommend it to anyone.  Jade also took the time to help answer question when we needed advice.

Jade was on the ball and very helpful. He was kind and considerate of my time and space. I would highly recommend him and his place.
Mahalo Jade
Clark

We stayed two nigths at Jades place. The place offers privacy, because the guestrooms are seperated from the rest of the house. For us it was perfect to have some privacy, after many nights in other accomodations. But our short encounters with Jade were very nice too. He is a very friendly person and seems to be very professional. He offered us a simple breakfast, but with our favorite fruit papaya. We would recommend Jades place.

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay in the Hilo Bay room at the Hilltop Legacy. It's an older house, the room was  comfortable with private bathroom and a nice view. There was shampoo, conditioner and body lotion with plenty of towels provided. Breakfast in the morning was delicious fresh fruit, bagels, english muffins, and croissants with juice and coffee. It's a good location, although we had a car so we always drove. We only met Jade briefly but he was very accommodating. I would definitely recommend staying here while exploring Hilo, Mauna Kea, or the Volcano National Park.

The hilltop legacy was a great stay for me.   What a view from my window.    The grounds are beautiful and lush.    Jade was helpful host and down to earth.     It is a mile up the hill from town a healthy trek either walking or running but worth every step.   You really need a car to see all the sights.
AMAZING location. Beautiful property. Very kind and responsible host. Clean room. yummy breakfast. Room was exactly like the picture. Walls are a little thin, but that is every house in Hilo.

The place was great.  Jade was very friendly and helpful.  We upgraded the room when we got there, as there was a bigger one available with a balcony.  The spaces are great, with a pool table to use and very tranquil garden to sit in.  Both rooms had an amazing  view overlooking Hilo and the ocean.  The water pressure wasn't great, but for one night it was no problem.  The rooms are very private, and had everything we needed.

A nice and clean, simple little room, quiet and hidden up on the hillside it has a lovely view down to the town. A simple breakfast in the morning which you could help yourself too. A lovely place to use as a base for this side of the island if you have lots of things planned.

Jade is a very friendly person. The location of the accommodation is good. 
The room was clean. The breakfast was a nice addition. There was plenty of choice.
Arrival went very smoothly.

I arrived at night and check-in was smooth. I did not see Jade, but Mr. Lee happened to be at the house. He was very nice. The house itself is nicely decorated and the room is clean and has everything you will need. The night view of the Hilo Bay is priceless. Wish I could spend more time at the house. One downside is I was woken up early in the morning by a lady talking very loud on the phone in the room next door. I am talking about super early, like 5 something. I understand there is jet lag, but it is just a little annoying.
A very nice place, easy to find. Clean, quiet, well organized. Our skyroom is big and comfortable , great view.
It was perfect! Thank you Jade :)
We had a great time at hilltop legacy .The property has a great view and is also close to the volcano park and also the restaurants in the area
We had a lovely nights stay here, location was great, facilities and the room were more than we were expecting and our host was welcoming! Really great place to stay

Jade made the check in process very easy and he was very welcoming! We checked in after normal check in hours, and he gave simple yet detailed instructions.  Very friendly, accommodating, and easy to work with. 

The place was great! (For the most part) it was convenient to town yet secluded and quiet. Down stairs was fantastic! Truly a gorgeous place. Modern and fun. The patios are well set up and comfortable. 

The only thing that we did not like was the bedroom. It was a little dated and underwhelming.  Hopefully it is a work in progress. Because if he puts as much care into the bedroom as he did to the rest of the house, this will be a 5 star air bnb!

The home was in a lovely location and had an amazing view. The common areas had everything you need and the outside area was quaint. This home is set up like a hostel with individual rooms.  The room itself was very outdated and only semi clean. Lots of dust on the curtains and the sheets and blankets have been worn down to threads. I would suggest bringing your own towel as the once white towels provided are extremely dingy from years of use I'm  sure. I cannot comment on the host as I never actually met him. I received check-in instructions through text and only met his father Mr Lee by chance one late night. He seemed very pleasant as did the other people staying there.  I did text Jade about a severe bug (roach and ant) problem in the room and I didn't see anything done about it. I left at 3am the day of my check out (my flight wasnt until 3pm) because I had just killed several  bugs and a few in the bed. I just couldn't sleep there anymore. I was very disappointed, I truly wanted to like this place better.

This home is in a beautiful spot overlooking Hilo Bay. Very convenient to town. And the gardens are wonderful. I did not meet Jade but his father was very nice and welcoming. I wish I could have stayed longer.
매우 친절한 호스트, 정김가는 방.

I'm not one for leaving terrible reviews but this will be my first. I really wish I did not book this place. Although "checking in" and parking was a breeze, the room itself was the equivalent of a cheap motel except it was half the size. The towels seem to all be air dried or something because they were rock hard and crunchy to use. The bed was uncomfortable and squeaky. I woke up itchy all over and discovered a squished bug that I could not identify on my legs accompanied with dozens of bites. They were not mosquito bites but rather some sort of mysterious bed bug. The room was covered in ants and the fan was far more noisy than helpful, even with ear plugs I could hear the old fan struggling to work. There is no kitchen at all which makes eating in impossible even when a tiny fridge and microwave is available. I was excited to get out of the place in the morning. It was purely a dark and gloomy old home with an old 1950s vibe motel on the second floor with a good view to make up for it.

This is not a very comfortable place to spend a night. The room is in very poor condition, as is the bathroom. The towels were absolutely gross-- super stiff, and rough. The pillows were barely there, they provided no support. The bed is old and the spring mattress is ridiculously uncomfortable. The smell in the room was very unpleasant. The temperature in the room was way too hot, and the fan that was provided was not adequate. The mini refrigerator was not turned on when we arrived, so all the drinks we wanted to drink that night were too warm. There are ants in the room, as is expected in Hawaii. The only positive thing about this room was the location.

Everything was as described and I had everything I needed. The location was perfect. The outside garden area was beautiful. I I wished I had more time to enjoy it.  One thing, while the towels were plentiful, they were rough as sandpaper. I would stay there again for sure, but perhaps bring my own towels. Thank you for a peaceful stay.

Our guest room needs so TLC.
Bathroom dimly lit, matress soft.
Could use some sprucing up.
The hosts father was very personable.
Good stay in a room perched up on a hill with views of Hilo and private bathroom. However, bed is very uncomfortable and is due for a new mattress!
Poor condition for the bed and the towels. Late responses from the host.
nice place. smelled a bit mildewy
Nice house and good location, but the room could do with some work, and was missing homey touches. However it did the job and had a good view

Great location and views over Hilo. We were able to walk into the center of town every day. The room was clean, comfortable and peaceful. It was also nice to spot wild pigs in the garden on our last morning!

Jade's place is a beautiful house with several bedrooms on the second floor that are rented out. It felt similar to staying in a hotel room with coded door locks, single serve coffee machine, laminated house rules posting, ID check in procedure. I think our room was the smallest, which made it tough to manage several suitcases. The private bathroom was nice and clean, and small. Our room had no A/C and a loud fan. A newer fan would have been nice. Location is great, only about a 5 minute drive to downtown Hilo and nice views from the hilltop. The best part of our stay was meeting the host. We were greeted by Jade's father and he is very nice and accommodating.
丘の頂上に､綺麗に整いた日本庭園のある宿です｡眺める景色も最高｡
Great view, great location!  Check in was seamless.
Amazing view and great, comfortable space! Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again when visiting Hilo next (:
The room was very small, very small bed. As we had no cell phone on our trip it was difficult to contact the host and the host was not available when we arrived to check us in.
Good stay!

Nice location, so you can go down town of Hilo soon. 
And the view is nice, because it's hill top. I had great time!
Simple, clean, outstanding view
Easy check in, good communication with host. Atmosphere and other guest was a little weird but ok for one night

Pros:Great location and great view. 
Cons: The place is outdated, and you can hear the sound of next door very easily.

We had a great stay at Jade’s place. We never met in person but Jade’s dad was there to greet us when we arrived. I did like that we had our own private washroom in our room. The location was great as it was only a 20 mins walk to the downtown area. I definitely recommend staying with Jade :)

name: Nice Flat close to the Copa beach
summary: Gute Lage ruhige Wohnung nur 350 Meter bis zum Strand vom der Copacabana. Renoviertes gut ausgestattetes Apartment mit 60m ², Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett ,Bad, Küche,Wohnzimmer. Deckenventilator, Klimaanlage.Blick aus dem Fenster auf die Corcovado.
space: Schöne 1 Schlafzimmer Wohnung für  2 Personen.Nur 350 Meter bis zum weltberühmten Copacabana Strand im berühmten Stadteil von Copacabana in Rio de Janeiro. In der Nähe der Metro und des Strandes!Schöne Unterkunft mit einem Schlafzimmer für bis zu  maximal 3 Personen. Im berühmten Stadtteil von Copacabana gelegen!Renoviertes und gut ausgestattetes Apartment mit 60m², unterteilt in Wohnzimmer Schlafzimmer-Suite, Küche mit Kühlschrank,Herd mit Backofen und Küchenutensilien. Esszimmer mit ein Tisch 2 Stühlen und Klimaanlage.Das Schlafzimmer (Suite) verfügt über ein eigenes Badezimmer und ist möbliert mit einem Doppelbett,Einbaukleiderschrank und Deckenventilator, Fernseher ausgestattet. Das Wohnzimmer verfügt über couch und mit Deckenventilator,.Die Unterkunft ist ausgestattet mit kostenlosen WLAN- Internet.In der Nähe der Metro Station Siqueira Campos! Schöne Unterkunft für ihren Urlaub in Rio de Janeiro.Ruhig im 10 Stock eines Gebäudes mit 24h Concierge gelegen.Sie können etliche Restaur

Deckenventilator, Klimaanlage.Blick aus dem Fenster auf die Corcovado. Esszimmer mit ein Tisch 2 Stühlen und Klimaanlage.Das Schlafzimmer (Suite) verfügt über ein eigenes Badezimmer und ist möbliert mit einem Doppelbett,Einbaukleiderschrank und Deckenventilator, Fernseher ausgestattet. Das Wohnzimmer verfügt über couch und mit Deckenventilator,
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana einer der schönsten Strände der Welt liegt nur350 Meter entfernt. Hinter dem Haus gibt es einen ruhigen Platz zum entspannen und für die Kinder zum spielen. Jeden Mittwoch gibt es einen Wochenmarkt. Daneben gibt es im Stadtteil Copacabana perfekte Shopping Möglichkeiten in kleinen Geschäften (z.B. Rua Santa Clara 33) oder mittleren bis großen Einkaufszentren (z.B. Rio Sul). Es gibt viele typische brasilianische Restaurants, zum Beispiel das köstliche Picanha (am Tisch gegrillte Rindfleisch-Filet-Stücke z.B. im weltbekannten Restaurant Garota de Ipanema). An der nächsten Straßenecke findest Du fast immer leckere frisch gepresste Fruchtsäfte.
notes: Verbindliche Reservierung: Für eine verbindliche Reservierung benötigen wir die folgenden Informationen von den Kunden: Was müssen Sie tun, um Ihre Reservierung zu bestätigen. Im Zeitraum von karneval,Weihnachten, Neujahr und Großveranstaltungen müssen 30 Tage vor bestätigt werden. Ihre NameAnschrift Pass oder ID  Kopie,E-Mail Adresse und Telefonnummer. Name Pass Kopie oder ID(n) der anderen Mitbewohner Der Check-In: / Flugnummer (im Falle von Reisen mit dem Flugzeug) Abreisezeit Definiert Check-in Zeit, so dass unsere Mitarbeiter kann ihn in der Wohnung erwarten. Genaue Anzahl der Gäste und die Nationalität, um die Kommunikation zu erleichtern .Bitte lesen Sie aufmerksam die Hausordnung.
transit: In der Nähe der Metro Station Siqueira Campos! Schöne Unterkunft für ihren Urlaub in Rio de Janeiro.Sie können etliche Restaurants, Supermärkte,Wechselstuben, öffentliche Verkehrsmittel und Banken in der Nähe finden. Einen Spielplatz und einige Sportgeräte für Erwachsene und Kinder direkt hinter dem Gebäude auf dem Platz. In der Nähe des Apartments gibt es U-Bahn Taxi Busse, in alle Richtungen   einen Supermarkt 24 Stunden, Bars,Theater, Geschäfte, Internet—Cafés und Einkaufszentren. Die U-Bahn-Station Siqueira Campos liegt in der Nähe. Die verkehrsgünstige Lage der Wohnung ermöglicht es,Cristo Redentor, Zuckerhut, Forte de Copacabana, Ipanema, Leblon, Downtown und auch die Flughäfen schnell zu erreichen.350 Meter zum  Copacabana Strand, 3 Min zum Bus und 5 Min zur  Metro Siqueira Campos
access: Die Gäste  haben zugang zum einen Spielplatz und einige Sportgeräte für Erwachsene und Kinder direkt hinter dem Gebäude auf dem Platz.
interaction: Mein  ist Name Maria Ich bin ein sehr offener Mensch, Ich Reise gerne und viel . ich mag  Menschen aus verschiedenen Kulturen kennenzulernen . Meine Hobbes sind: Lesen, Sport, Theater, Kino, Kochen und Tanz Ich spreche Portugiesisch, Englisch, Deutsch, Französisch, Spanisch und Italienisch. Ich lebe seit Jahren zwischen Europa und Brasilien. Sie können mir auch in einer dieser Sprachen schreiben. Durch die viel reisen ich weiß, wie wichtig Kommunikation ist. Und den Menschen zu helfen, wenn wir in anderen Ländern sind. In der Tat wir  sind alle Ausländer. Diese Wohnung ist auch für meiner Familie und meinen Freunden zu genießen  Und Kunden, die oft zu Freunden werden. Wenn ich Zeit habe,zeige ich gern meine Kunden das Gebiet rund um die Wohnung. Ich wünsche Ihnen allen einen angenehmen und schönen Aufenthalt.
house_rules: Lieber Gast Leben Sie in Frieden mit der Natur. Ein naturbewusster Gast lässt die Natur glücklich sein.  Wir möchten Ihren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich gestalten. Dies ist eine private Wohnung, die liebevoll für Sie vorbereitet wurde . Fühlen Sie sich zu Hause und behandeln Sie sie, als ob sie zu Hause waren . In den geschlossenen Schränken sind private Dinge. Bitte öffnen Sie sie nicht. Strand: Vergessen Sie nie, Ihren Charme spielen zu lassen und fragen Sie jemanden, der während Sie baden, auf Ihre Habseligkeiten achte. Ein guter Grund , um einen Chat zu starten. Der Sand gehört an den Strand. Wenn es ein Waschbecken im Eingangsbereich des Gebäudes gibt, bitte waschen Sie den Sand dort von Ihren Füssen, andernfalls bitte waschen Sie schon am Strand den Sand von Ihren Füssen und schütteln Sie Ihre Strandtücher aus. Schuhe: Benutzen Sie bitte keine Schuhe mit Absätzen in der Wohnung, um das Parkett nicht zu beschädigen.. Badezimmer: Bitte werfen Sie das Toilettenpapier immer in d

host.host_about:
Ich bin ein sehr offener Mensch, ich reise selbst sehr gerne und mir macht es Spaß Menschen aus allen Ländern kennenzulernen. 
Meine Hobby´s sind: Sport, Theater, Kino, Kochen und Tanzen 
Ich spreche Portugiesisch, Deutsch, Englisch, Französisch, Spanisch und Italienisch. Ihr könnt mir auch in einer dieser Sprachen schreiben.

reviews.comments: We had a really great time and Rio is an amazing city.

Maria was a wonderful host!!! The position of the apartment is actualy 5 minutes walking from the beach of Copacabana thus make our reveillon unforgettable! In addition, the apartment make you feel leaving into a real brazilian life: colourful and full of energy!!!
Gostei muito!! Ela é muito atenciosa e o apartamento é espaçoso e limpo. Muito perto de tudo!

María fue muy agradable, siempre atenta con nosotros, nos ayudó a conseguir cómo viajar hacia Ilha Grande!! 
Solo que en el departamento mejoraría algunas comodidades, en el baño, dónde poner la ropa, y algunas cosas en la cocina que faltan como para poder estar más cómodos aún.
Igualmente pasamos unos días muy lindos en Río.

name: Quite flat in the heart of Gràcia
summary: My flat is in a fourth floor in the center of the legendary district of Gràcia, in the Plaza del Sol and is very quiet, like its neighbors. It has 2 bedrooms available, a bathroom, kitchen, living room and a bright gallery.
description: My flat is in a fourth floor in the center of the legendary district of Gràcia, in the Plaza del Sol and is very quiet, like its neighbors. It has 2 bedrooms available, a bathroom, kitchen, living room and a bright gallery.
house_rules: no es pot fumar.s' ha de tenir un comportament tranquil,  per una bona convivència a casa i amb els veïns i veines

host.host_about: We are a family that has lived the whole life in the neighbourhood. We have an extensive social net among our nieghbours and cultural associations. I work as a cook with organic products.

reviews.comments: Piso tranquilo en zona agradable de Barcelona. Eva muy atenta.

We are three have spent two weeks in Eva's flat. 
The neighborhood is charming, and the flat had everything we needed for a convenient life, especially if you like the live place, which doesn't look like hotel. It has two bedrooms and a table-room, and a full collection of facilities. The host wasn't obtrusive and we spent all the time on our own. 
I would definitely recommend it again.
Appartement calme bien situé dans le quartier typique de Gracia. Proche du métro et des commerces.  Beaucoup de charme et d'espace. Accueil chaleureux d'Eva. Une adresse à retenir.

Lovely spacious and quiet flat in the perfect location of Gracia!  Eva stayed in touch throughout our stay in case we needed anything. 

Really recommend staying here!
La verdad que la casa muy bien, en una plaza de Gracia, línea de metro al lado y casa acogedora

El piso está muy bien. La localizacion es muy buena y el piso no es nada ruidoso.
Las instalaciones son antiguas pero se está a gusto. Eva fue muy buena anfitriona y nos hizo sentir como en casa.
Agréable appartement dans un quartier tout aussi agréable ou il fait bon flâner à l'écart de la foule. Accueil efficace.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Eva. Elle laisse son appartement à disposition, ce qui vous fait sentir comme à la maison. Le coin véranda est très agréable ainsi que l'ensemble du logement. Il est idéalement situé, dans un quartier animé mais il donne dans une rue plus calme, à 5 min du métro. 
Je vous recommande ce logement sans hésiter!

Location is perfect. It is in a lively square in Gracia which is like a small village inside of Barcelona. Apartment was lovely, antique and very cozy. Eva was very kind and flexible with our checkout time when our travel plans changed. Muchas gracias Eva!!

Die Wohnung von Eva liegt zentral im Stadtteil Gracia und ist gut mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel erreichbar (ca. 5 Gehminuten zur Metrostation). Gracia ist ein Stadtteil, in dem viele verschiedene Menschen anzutreffen sind. 
Die Wohnung hat den Flair einer Wohngemeinschaft und ist alternativ mit gebrauchten Möbel ausgestattet. Das Wesentliche war für unseren 14-tägigen Aufenthalt knapp bemessen, so dass wir „nachrüsten“ mussten. 
Unsere Gastgeberin haben wir leider nicht kennen gelernt, die Schlüsselübergabe erfolgte durch ihre Freundin. Bedauerlicherweise war es nicht möglich, in dem Mehrfamilienhaus die Wohnungstür abzuschließen, wir konnten sie lediglich ins Schloss ziehen. 
Die Wohnung hat unsere bisherigen guten Erfahrungen mit Airbnb nicht erfüllt, ebenfalls sehen wir kein positives Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis.

Eva è stata molto disponibile ad accoglierci anche la sera dopo cena ! La sua è una casa "vissuta", per niente anonima,piacevole e molto comoda come posizione per raggiungere ogni parte della città. Il quartiere ti offre ogni servizio e ti senti avvolto da una bella atmosfera, genuina e non troppo turistica.

Eva was just perfect,  flexible and so kind. She gave us some excellent adresses of restaurants around the appartment.
The appartment is simple, rustic, simple but  spacious,  so cosy and very quiet.
The flat is the same as decribed in the pictures
We felt at home and really appreciated this "vintage atmosphere".
We highly recommend if you do not search for modern style

Moreover it is really well placed  in Barcelona: close from metro (5mn walk) and is just at the perfect place in Gracia (lovely Playa del sol)

Eva greeted us warmly and made sure we had everything we needed before leaving us. The neighborhood was very lively and perfectly situated near many restaurants.  5-10 minute walk to metro station.  Elevator in the building that is small, but maneuverable . We had a stroller for our son that just barely fit , but it wasn't impossible. Overall a comfortable stay, felt like we were staying at a friends place!
vraiment central dans le quartier Gracia

Accueil très sympa d'Eva. Bonne location dans un quartier Catalan typique. Appartement très rustique avec des beaux livres d'artistes. Pas idéal en hiver car il n'y a qu'un chauffage d'appoint dans le salon. Problème de pression d'eau dans la douche.
Lo recomiendo

Casa simpatica e vissuta, anzi vivente. Comodissima per visitare la città sia a piedi che utilizzando i mezzi pubblici, vivo e caratteristico il quartiere. Si dorme benissimo nonostante sia in placa del Sol frequentatissima fino a notte fonda.
Grazie ad Eva per la flessibilità e la disponibilità.
Appartement très bien placé dans Barcelone. Par contre, pas de chauffage donc il peut faire froid si le soleil n'est pas au rendez vous, et manque de pression dans la douche.

This was my 3rd trip to Barcelona and I can honestly confirm the best one, including the place where we stayed. The area, the building and the appartment itself were exactly what I was looking for - like my grandma's appartment but with Catalunian flavor:)

Appartement typique. Bien situé pour vister Barcelone. La Plaça del Sol est agréable et très animée le soir.
Eva est très sympathique tout en restant discrète.

Accueil plus qu'agréable, appartement spacieux et fonctionnel situé idéalement dans Barcelone. Pour les grincheux qui ne supportent pas le bruit, attention...nous sommes en Espagne, et les nuits espagnoles sont animées. Merci eva, et au plaisir.
Una casa veramente accogliente, ce ne siamo innamorate subito appena entrate.  La zona è vivace e comoda. Eva è stata veramente gentile e disponibile con noi....siamo state molto bene.

name: 2 Bedroom Condo With Private Roof Terrace!
summary: Welcoming condo on the Plateau, walking distance to the metro Mont-Royal (subway system), LaFontaine Parc, Mount-Royal street and countless restaurants and bars. I lived at this location for four years and loved every second of it! I hope you will enjoy it as much as I have :)  Also enjoy a 300sqft privte roof terrace with view of the city and the sun! No smoking!
space: This welcoming condo is conveniently located steps away from an array of restaurants, groceries stores, cafes, shops, and parks in the trendy Plateau area of Montreal.  PARKING: There is free street parking available outside of the condo, with a restriction between 4-6pm during Monday-Friday for rush hour. During these restricted times, there is free street parking on any parallel (or perpendicular) street. During the weekends, there is no time restriction or fee for street parking.  *The condo is located on the 3rd floor, therefore is unfortunately not wheelchair accessible*
description: Welcoming condo on the Plateau, walking distance to the metro Mont-Royal (subway system), LaFontaine Parc, Mount-Royal street and countless restaurants and bars. I lived at this location for four years and loved every second of it! I hope you will enjoy it as much as I have :)  Also enjoy a 300sqft privte roof terrace with view of the city and the sun! No smoking! This welcoming condo is conveniently located steps away from an array of restaurants, groceries stores, cafes, shops, and parks in the trendy Plateau area of Montreal.  PARKING: There is free street parking available outside of the condo, with a restriction between 4-6pm during Monday-Friday for rush hour. During these restricted times, there is free street parking on any parallel (or perpendicular) street. During the weekends, there is no time restriction or fee for street parking.  *The condo is located on the 3rd floor, therefore is unfortunately not wheelchair accessible* Wifi is included in your stay with a maximum of 40
notes: *The roof terrace is only set up between June 1st - October 1st. Other months furniture will be stored - plants will be removed due to weather*
transit: 24hr busses that run every ten minutes, metro, also very close to bike path along Rachel street!
access: Wifi is included in your stay with a maximum of 400gb per month. Or 100gb per week.
interaction: I will gladly help you with any questions, directions, recommendations, etc. Don't be shy to text me :)
house_rules: If you break or damage something you are responsible for it.

host.host_about:
Im a photographer born and raised in MTL. 

Work at a yoga studio close by, and was a hotel receptionist for 4 years prior. 

I'm definitely the right person to help you find awesome things to do in the city, no matter what your style is!

reviews.comments:
Melanie and her roommate, Alex, were friendly, thoughtful, and kind hosts. Just wonderful. Both took time to help orient us to the apartment, neighborhood, and city, and were available in case we had any additional questions. They were also generous and flexible with our schedules and graciously shared the apartment's amenities such as the washer/dryer and dishwasher. We can't thank Melanie & Alex enough for the experience of having our own, quiet and homey, pied-à-terre while visiting Montréal. We felt like welcome guests rather than clients.

Melanie's apartment is charming and has an excellent view of the city and the Plateau from the relaxing rooftop garden, which is a delicious bit of private luxury before or after a day out in the city. It's close to streets that conveniently connect to nearby East & West neighborhoods via rue Mont-Royale and rue Sherbrooke. (A Bixi bike station off Mont-Royale is likewise convenient.) Yet it's in a small quartier that also has restaurants, grocers, shopping and nightlife in it's own right, and is conveniently near green areas, such as Parc La Fontaine, Picine Laurier, the Olympic Park, and the parks on Île St. Hélèn via la Pont Jacques Cartier, which one can walk or bike across. (The view of the St. Lawrence & the city from this bridge is worth it alone.)

In short Melanie's apartment is wonderful and in a perfect location to experience the best of Montréal. 

I hope you also get to experience the good life from this perspective! 

Thank you again, Melanie and Alex! Wishing you both the best!

Sarah Katherine & Marte

Melanie was very welcoming throughout the trip and told us about some of her favourite places to go. She let us drop off our bags and explore the city while she got the place ready for us. The description of the place is very accurate and the entire place feels homey.  The neighbourhood is peaceful and there are a ton of restaurants, shops, bars and places to buy alcohol. The metro subway station is also very close by. The private roof terrace is absolutely amazing and I can definitely say that we spent most of our time outside on it. I miss this place already!

The condo is one of the nicest places we could imagine to stay at for a weekend. It is spacious, beautifully furnished and has a magnificent terrace to have breakfast or a drink in the late afternoon. The location is very convenient with many bakeries, grocery stores, bus stations etc. close by. 
Although we inquired on very short notice, Melanie was open to host us.   She is a very kind, easy-going person that gave us many good tips on where to go out, have brunch etc. Melanies roommate is also a very nice person but we only saw her shortly once.
Melanie was great. Listing was accurate and the place was very nice. On a hot summer night it can get hot in the room, so be advised and stay close to the fan!
The place is beautiful and in a great part of town- bed was comfy, apartment was clean and inviting. Definitely would recommend to all!

Expérience très positive ! 
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié d'être près de toutes les commodités et d'avoir accès à la belle terrasse. 
L'appartement était propre et Mélanie très accueillante.
Great place to stay! The location is amazing and Melanie's apartment is really cool! The rooftop terrace was our favourite part :)

We were late getting into Montreal but Melanie was very accommodating. She answered all of our questions promptly. Her apartment was clean and exactly as listed. Melanie even surprised us with some bakes treats. Overall we had a great experience and Melanie was a great host.
The host canceled this reservation 40 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

If I return to Montreal with another couple, Melanie's place would be perfect! Her apartment is a big 2 bedroom place with a DYNAMITE rooftop patio.  Who would say no to coffee and the sunrise on the top of a builiding? It is close to a busy street with restaurants, bars, shops, and the subway and the bed was veeery comfortable.  Thank you, Melanie!

We had a really fantastic stay at Melanie's apartment. The apartment is big and comfortable. There is everything you may need in the kitchen (and even more !)and this roof top terrasse (with view on Mont Royal park and Downtown Montréal)  is just exclusive. After a 20kms walk during the day you 'll loooove having a Belle Gueule beer on the terrasse :-p
Concerning the neighborhood, Le Plateau is a trendy and hipster place, calm and typical with many restaurants, but be careful it may be a bit far from Downtown (metro Mont Royal is 5min walk from Melanie's apt).
Moreover we actually reserved the room at the very last minute and arrived very late but Melanie was very accessible on the AirBnb app and we didn't have difficulties to get the keys. Take it easy and enjoy your stay at Melanie's apt !
Melanie was a great host. She provided what we needed and made the stay comfortable.
Melanie was very easy to communicate with. The apartment was spacious, comfortable, and in a trendy location. Street parking was easy to find, which was a plus! We very much enjoyed Montreal.
Apartment was clean and with an open-model. Lots of space and light. Melanie was very accommodating and kind. Thanks again!
Appartement mignon et confortable. La terrasse sur le toit est super sympa!

Great area of Montreal to see and do different things, easy transportation, the three day metro/bus pass is a must for short stays.
Melanie was responsive to questions we had. Condo isn't air conditioned but is nice and airy and our stay was comfortable through four of the hottest days of the summer so far.

Melanie's apartment is located in a great section of the Plateau and easily walkable to a lot of shopping, stores, restaurants, and the metro. The roof deck is phenomenal, and in my opinion, is what sets this listing apart. You will certainly want to spend your evenings out there, and if you like to cook, plan to have some dinners up there too! We also didn't have any issue finding parking around the corner, which was a plus. Two recommendations - Le Pegase is around the corner and is BYOB, and Les Co'Pains d'Abord has phenomenal croissants in the morning for breakfast.

One caveat, as others mentioned, is that the apartment is not air conditioned. This is not that big of a deal during the day, but the bedroom does not have a portable AC unit either, and that made sleeping quite difficult all three nights. The only way that we could sleep was with the windows wide open, but that let all the light and noise from busy Ave Papineau into the room, and it was still pretty hot at that. The second bedroom is dark but has no windows to open and thus was too hot. We also only had one fan, which did not serve to cool down the room enough. I imagine that this is not an issue in the fall and spring, which are probably the best times to rent this apartment since you will still be able to use the roof deck but will also be able to keep the windows closed at night. Also please note that when we were there it was swelteringly hot, with nights in the upper 70s and high humidity. I imagine that cool summer nights may not be too bad either. We did know about the lack of AC when we rented the apartment, so it wasn't like Melanie was not honest, but if you don't like humidity or light/noise when you sleep, you may want to wait until the fall or spring to book this place.
Une très belle adresse et un appartement tres mignon

We did not get to meet Melanie, but her apartment was awesome and in a great location.  The rooftop was a great addition even though we did not really spend any time up there!

We were mostly out of the apartment during the day time, but I slept more in those few days than I have in weeks.  I would definitely book this apartment again!
Très bon emplacement, et très jolie appartement, nous n'avons vu personne a l'entrée ni à la sortie c'est dommage...
This place was great!  Quiet at night.  Located right next to a main thoroughfare with shops, restaurants, bars, and the Doggy Cafe!  Would stay here again.
It was very good, really cosy and comfortable. Good attention from Melanie and very nice answers

We enjoyed our stay with Melanie. She was super responsive and really the sweetest, very helpful and offered a lot of great suggestions. It really is incredibly close to all of the amenities, while still being incredibly quiet and comfortable. Quick (10 minute) walk to the metro which made traveling around the city a breeze! Very much worth the value. We loved it. 

The only thing I would say to be aware of, is parking. As the listing says, it is completely restricted from 4-6pm for rush hour. But there is also another restriction of 60 minute stays between 9-4. There was parking available on a side street, so we didn't end up leaving our car there as we noticed the parking authority out and we didn't really want a ticket.
Transit is so easy to access, Melanie was a great hostess & Montreal is a beautiful place to be. 10/10 would stay there again.

Mel was great! Place was perfect for two people. Lots of street parking but cannot park between 4-6pm for rush hour. No troubles parking on side streets. Melanie was informative and helpful with any questions we had. Busy street but the noise was not a concern. A lot of steps up to condo, not an issue for us but could be for some. HDMI only for TV use. Full internet access. Overall a great experience. Thanks a lot Mel!

The location is terrific - central to so many wonderful places to eat and walk! The apartment was very comfortable - there were 2 of us (and our dog!) but the apartment easily sleeps 4.  I felt very much at home and perfectly comfortable.  Thank you Melanie!

We didn't get to meet her in person, but she was very friendly and helpful. She went out of her way to make sure we could comfortably complete our visit and not be rushed during checkout. A great place to say in a good location with a great hostess.

This is a very convenient place if you want to explore the Mont Royal or Plateau area.  The beds are comfortable - but I might bring my own pillow if I return!  There is a lovely dining table with four chairs to eat at and the kitchen was equipped well enough to make basic meals.  For the price this was a very nice place to spend a long weekend.

Great location close to everything but some amenities and essentials listed weren't provided and the extra occupancy fee didn't cover the extra essentials needed for more people. Host was slow to respond to questions about the house.
Appartement original et bien situé.

Melanie's place is a really charming place to stay in the plateau/Mont Royal area. All the amenities you need for your home away from home are available - beds are comfy and clean. It can get a bit hot during hot days but windows offer good cross breeze. The rooftop patio is very cool as well. Those who might not like stairs too much may have a hard time, but the location and features were great!

Lots of restaurants, shops and boulangeries are nearby. Mont Royal metro station is <10 min walk away, or a few mins by bus. 

Melanie was amazing - she offered lots of helpful info and advice for our stay and trip. She was very communicative and quick to respond to any of our inquiries. Thanks for a lovely stay, Melanie! If ever we are in Montreal again and you're still an Airbnb host, we will certainly look you up! Merci beaucoup!

Le logement est très bien situé. Nous avons trouvé facilement la rue, qui est à deux pas de l'avenue du Mont Royal. Le quartier ne manque ni de bar ni de restaurant. Il y a plusieurs supermarchés à proximité.
L'appartement est bien équipé. Il y a de l'espace pour s'étaler ! Les balcons sont vraiment sympas pour profiter d'un apéro (si le temps le permet!) 
Le rooftop est génial! 
Juste un petit point d'amélioration, le canapé était malheureusement très sale... L'idéal serait de le changer ou de mettre des couvertures afin de recouvrir les housses.

Mélanie a été très disponible et arrangeante, particulièrement le dernier jour! Merci pour ta gentillesse !!!
Nous recommandons ce logement pour découvrir Montréal :)

Melanies home was clean, well equipped and comfortable. The roof top terrace was and added bonus. There are several means of transportation very close by, great bakeries and shops within walking distance. I would definitely stay again.
Melanie's place was perfect for our weekend in Montreal.  The location off of Mont-Royal was ideal and the rooftop patio was superb!
It was great. Nice place. Close to lots of restaurants and bars. Rooftop patio is icing on the cake
Awesome place in MTL everything you'd need and more (Roof Top Balcony is EPIC !!)

Melanie's home is what you'd expect from reading the description and seeing the on line photos.  Melanie was quick to respond to my messages and allowed a quick drop off for my bags before venturing on a walking tour.  The home was clean but the bathroom may have benefited from a deep around the shower and floor clean.  Melanie's home is what you'd expect from reading the description and seeing the on line photos.  I just didn’t realize (my own lack of research) that the home is quite far from many of the attractions I had planned to visit but my friend and I walked each way a couple times and then took a quick 15 minute subway ride as well.  I would recommend Melanie’s home to anyone but for myself, I’d prefer to stay closer to the downtown area only for the convenience.  Thanks Melanie!
All went well.

Had a great time at Melanie's. Stayed with another couple and the apartment was big enough with two rooms. The rooftop deck is nice, just be sure to hold open the latch until it fully locks open. If you close it, it automatically locks. We were locked out on the rooftop for a little bit until the couple we stayed with came back to let us in :) Great location with many options of restaurants, bars and shops!

Great space, comfortable beds
 Getting in and out is simple. The neighborhood is fun and walkable, and it's about $16 Uber to get downtown. We had a fantastic stay!

Un bel appartement très bien situé et très confortable. La terrasse sur le toit est également très agréable.
Dans l'ensemble c'est un très bon logement.

Melanie's apartment was absolutely fantastic. Spacious, open, washer and dryer, and the rooftop patio was incredible. Beautiful views of the city and the perfect place to drink wine with friends. Would come back here in a heartbeat.
First time using Airbnb and I hope all in future are this pleasant. Melanie always responded promptly and was always very helpful. Would definitely stay again.
Appartement très bien situé et superficie très convenable pour 4 pers. Hôte très disponible par messages. A recommander

What a great place to stay, very close from everything. The beds were comfy and the place is spacious, with a cool terrace on the top.The place was clean and all the instructions for the house was clear. Melanie was responding quick to my emails who was great. I will go and stay there again. Thanks Melanie

Melanie was a perfect host, she lets us arrive at the time we wanted and accepted my cat!  Everything was clean and beautiful.  The apartment is well located, near an Intermarché open 24/7, really convenient!  I definitly recommand this airbnb, and the kindness of Melanie!
A lovely apartment in a very cool area in Montreal! We didn't meet Melanie but she was great at messaging back quickly and was very helpful! We would definitely recommend this place.
Melanie is a great host and her place is exactly as described. The location and rooftop were absolutely amazing! I would definitely stay here again!
We really enjoyed our stay, thanks, Melanie!
Melanie's place was easy to find, minutes away from anything you need. The rooftop is really great, the view is spectacular!! It was clean and communication was quick. I would recommend this place.
The place was nice, the area was good. The only problem was the bathroom that needed a deep clean :/

Great location, nice exposed brick walls and roof-top terrace, relatively quiet (on a main street, so expect a bit of traffic noise in the room, but not too bad. The place was generally clean with a few exceptions in the kitchen.

Melanie's place was the perfect location for my trip to Montreal. It was a cozy and spacious two bedroom apartment that felt like home after the first step inside. 
The space was really clean and fresh, I appreciated all the little touches that made a difference ( throw pillows on the beds, extra towels and amenities. 
Melanie was also readily available by text message with any of my questions about where to go, which was so kind and helpful!! 
Thanks so much for everything :) 
We will stay here again if ever we make the trip to Montreal in the future.

Can’t say enough about the apartment, excellent location, space, and comfort. Within walking distance to plenty of great restaurants, and we liked the neighborhood as well. Melanie was great at contacting us and made checking in a breeze, would come back if in Montreal again.

Melanie was a great host. She made the check in and check so easy! She was also very quick to respond to my messages.

The space is great for a weekend visit. The apartment was clean, with the exception of the bathroom, could've used a nice scrub with CLR mold and mildew remover. The shower is also very tiny. It was a little claustrophobic. 

The bedrooms were comfortable and clean. Although the bedroom facing the street has sheer curtains, so if you like to sleep in bring an eye mask to block the light.

The kitchen  had all the essentials and was clean.

The apartment is actually a 25 minute walk from the metro. A little inconvenient when the weather is bad. But it's a quick Uber ride.

The location is great. Plenty of restaurants near by. The liquor store and 24 hour grocery were 2 minutes away. There was also a dollar store right there, so if you forgot your toothbrush or any little item it's no hassle to get them. 

If you want to be close to the night life and attractions, it is a little far removed.

All in all, very happy with the apartment and would love to stay there again on the summer to take advantage of the rooftop terrace.
This apartment is a lovely base to explore Montreal! Spacious, nicely decorated (I loved the romantic touch!), and very well located, in the middle of the vibrant Plateau. Highly recommended!

Melanie's place was BEAUTIFUL! I cannot describe to you the type of vintage vibe i got from her condo. It was really cozy and made you feel right at home. There were shops just down the street that was convenient to go to. She would get back to me about any questions I had right away. She was overall one of the best hosts I've had. I highly recommend her place for anyone that wants that Paris cozy home feeling.

My sister and I had a wonderful time in Melanies lovely clean  walk up apartment in Montreal. The neighbourhood was perfect. I was also able to bring my dog! The two bedrooms were very comfortable as was the living space.

Close to buses, or can walk to Metro.  Close to Mont Royal, 24 hour grocery store, banks, cafes, restaurants etc. 
Well maintained place; lots of nice touches, coffee, sugar, spices of all sorts, sauces, etc.  Bedrooms were best part of this apartment; 2 private bedrooms. Would be great in summer to go out onto roof top although stair way is pretty steep to roof.  Hostess responds to inquiries, questions etc.

The appartment was clean and bright (and warm) when we arrived, with two comfy beds. The metro station in about 15-20 minute walk away which takes you right into the city, but the buses were great as well as the appartment is right on an interchange. 
I would recommend the appartment as a good base.
Perfect place for a couple.  Great neighborhood with restaurants, exercise places, a park...and very close the downtown activities.
Melanie’s place was amazing. It was cozy and clean. Great location. Close to downtown. There are a lot of great restaurants nearby.

Spent two days there and had a great time. We didn’t spend much time in the apartment, but it’s cozy and the rooftop terrace offers great views. There’s a park, as well as plenty of places to eat nearby as well. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay.
We enjoyed our stay here.  The space was very clean and had a feel like home.

Melanie’s place is a hidden gem! It has an amazing location close to everything, and the place itself is absolutely gorgeous. Melanie was extremely accommodating for us since we were driving in from the US and she provided all the needed amenities. Don’t hesitate, stay here!

Melanie's place was great.  Check in was easy.  It was in a great location and parking was super easy.  Melanie gave us great recommendations for places to eat and it was easy to fill out weekend with activities around Montreal.  I would highly recommend this place is your are looking for a GREAT value for a GREAT price!   This place was great for two friends but I would also recommend it for two couples.  Highly recommend!

Great place to stay.
Thanks Melanie!
Beautiful place to stay!
Super logement, très bien placé, chaleureux et propre. Bel accueil et réponses rapides aux questions. La terrasse en été doit être magnifique!!!
Great place clean and close to downtown Montreal!
Beau et vraiment bien situé! Un peu bruyant car la chambre est sur une rue passante mais il y une autre chambre . Tout ce que vous avez besoin se situe à proximité!
We really enjoyed our stay at Melanie's place. It was tidy and in a good location! Melanie was very responsive and made a great host!
it's a great place to stay over, good location as well
Excellent !
Vraiment satisfait !
Très bien situé.
Awesome neighborhood. Coffee shops & stores right outside the door. SUPER clean. Overall very happy with our stay.
Great location with easy access to downtown Montreal via the metro. Good views from the rooftop patio!

Melanie's place was great. The roof deck was amazing and I wish we could have stayed longer! Street parking was annoying, but I suppose that's par for the course. Would definitely stay at Melanie's place again--it was clean with comfortable beds, close to everything and did I mention the roof deck!??

My friend drove up from Ontario and I flew in from BC for an epic best friends reunion. Melanie’s place was great for our needs. Had everything we needed and great location. Would definitely stay there again and recommend!!
An easy check-in and check-out, cute and clean, no frills spot in Montreal. Thanks for a nice stay!
Appartement sympa,  un peu de marche jusqu'au centre Montréal mais c'était prévu ! Bon séjour

Melanie’s place is in a good location and is a good value. We were a bit worried about parking, but it was easy. Dog friendly is a big plus. Not a luxury apartment—the bathroom is quite small, some windows don’t have screens, no lock box—but you aren’t paying for luxury, either.
Nice and convenient place to stay in a perfect neighbourhood!

A terrific space with plenty of amenities in walking distance, and close to so much of the best the city has to offer, including Mile End, the mountain, and Old Montreal. Would gladly stay here again.

The place was clean and stylish (I love loft style places) and and all amenities mentioned were available. Location is great with lots of places to eat, 10mins drive to Mount Royal. Melanie accommodated for a bit of late check out and was available for any questions.
Was great!!
Great space in a great location. Would recommend to anyone staying and looking for a hip spot close to bars and a good selection of restaurants!
Grand logement spacieux parfait pour petit groupe de voyageurs. La terasse sur le toît est très bien avec une très belle vue.
Lovely neighbourhood and very nice accommodations!

Appartement bien situé avec terrasse et vue sur Montréal. 
Seconde fois que nous logeons dans cet appartement que nous apprécions

 Mélanie a été disponible par téléphone et messages quand nous avions besoin.
Excellent location, comfy beds and the on street parking was never a problem.

Melanie's place was very homey and comfortable. We loved the big TV, board games, and lots of tea and coffee. It's a little hard to find the first time, but once you know where it is it's very accessible. We loved our stay!

Daily need: Supermarkets and convenient stores opens till late daily. Basically you can get everything you need in walking distance.

The apartment is in a great location surrounded by many good restaurants and shops.  Just next to Prince Edward MTR station.  The apartment is clean with all the necessities and well maintained.   Lulu has been very accommodating to allow early check in and quick to respond to our questions.  Was met my Mr. Leung on arrival and he has been very kind and explained what needed to be explained.   Overall a good experience and would highly recommend this place.

Very good location! 50 meters from Taizi subway C2 exit! Super clean and tidy. 3 separate rooms but not soundproof and two of them has no door but curtains. Recommend to group of close friends and family going to HK.

It was a wonderful stay. Our host has provided directions to get to the apartment from the airport and someone was there to pick us up when we reached. They have showed us how to use the facilities. Location was very accessible, 40 seconds to the nearest mtr exit and many eateries around the apartment.

Lulu met us at the metro to show us to the unit which was very nice and made my family feel welcome. The unit looked like the pictures and met the discription. The unit presents well and was very close to the metro and amenities. Hong Kong was an exciting city to visit. Lulu's plcace made it affordable for my family to stay and play.  Thanks lulu.

2051.5.2-5.3 다녀왔습니다. 전혀 추천하고 싶지 않습니다.
이유는 
1. 수소 준비가 되지 않은 상태에서 예약을 접수하였습니다.
 - 도착해 보니 완전 엉망이된 숙소 상태에서 한 2시간후에 오면 정리해 놓겠다 하더군요!
2. 인근 지하철역에 도착하니 아무도 픽업을 나오지 않고 2시간 가까이를 밖에서 기다려야했습니다.
3. 우리를 마중나온 사람은 영어가 전혀되지 않고 주인과 어떤 관계인지도 몰랐습니다.
4. 숙소는 가격대비 매우 허름한 아파트였고 차라리 호텔을 이용하는게 나을뻔 했습니다.
5. 수건, 비누는 단1장도 없었고 요구하니 추가요금을 달라고 하더군요.
6. 전화통화하려니 전화도 거의 받지않습니다.
7.체크아웃에대한 설명도 없습니다.

Pros:
- Lulu was very accommodating and allowed us to check in very early at 8:30am. 
- Even though we did not manage to meet Lulu, a very nice helpful man came and met us at the MTR exit and brought us to the house. Communication was good but it is recommended that travellers can speak some basic Mandarin or Cantonese. 
- The house is very convenient and very near the MTR exits, about 1-2 min away from exit C2 of Prince Edward MTR Station. 
- Beds are comfortable and the pillows are the curved kinds which were very comfortable. Air-conditioning works well. 
- Neighbourhood is very good. Lots of shops with good food, and there is also a supermarket nearby other exits of the MTR station.
- The place looks exactly like what is presented in the picture.
- Cleanliness is about 7/10. Acceptable. 

Cons:
- One of the rooms, nearest to the kitchen, is quite stuffy as the air-conditioning does not really circulate there. There is no fan provided as well.
- Clock is spoilt.
很好的房间 六个人住特别足够 离地铁站非常近 很满意很愉快的一次旅行 房间很温馨有家的感觉 下次去香港还会选择这里
Easy meet up. Place was clean and spacious.

This listing is very near the Prince Edward C2 exit station, very accessible. The neighborhood is full of restaurants, you'll never go hungry. The place is perfect for 4 to 6 people (but just 1 bathroom). When we arrived, we were communicating with Simon through SMS (he can speak English). However, the one who welcomed us doesn't speak nor understands English. It was a challenge (for us and for him) to communicate, but he tried his best to explain some reminders. Overall experience was great, would recommend this listing to my friends.
房子布置得很温馨,环境干净,而且房东很贴心的提供了一些生活必需品(洗发水,肥皂,牙膏,吹风机,厕纸,热水壶等等),位置真的很靠近地铁站,下楼左转就是了,蛮方便的就是楼下有很多食肆,药房和7-11,位于闹区的小小缺点就是晚上有点吵,不过还算可以接受的程度啦,值得推荐

Listing is accurate. Feel very welcome as the host was very reassuring prior to arrival by replying to (Hidden by Airbnb) about the booking, location to wait and phone number to call, upon reaching HK.

Met with Mr Leung on arrival at MTR. He brought us promptly to the place.

Place is clean, things are in order and Mr Leung explained things slowly and clearly. Bedding and toilet is clean. comes with a washing machine, which is very useful when travelling.

Place is convenient to travel around.

She was super quick to respond at a time of need. She doesn't speak English but makes arrangements for communications. Place is small but works. There's a 7-eleven close by for any needs because you'll need to buy towels & toiletries. Overall, it was great if you need a quick place to stay.

The room was same as shown in picture. Location is really good which is just few steps to MTR station.
House is clean but there is some of the mattress has dust. While the heater becomes cold very fast if use too much of water and needs to wait for it to reboil.
The owner is very nice and friendly. He also let us to keep our luggage at his place despite our check out time.
Amazing house, good location, responsible host, prompt reply. A Lot of food can be found Downstair. Definitely will choose this again for next trip.
