驻地非常棒｡附近交通 吃都很便利｡值得一提的是楼下新鲜海鲜哇撒了｡美味
我們是5個好友一起去,一對情侶,有一個房間是有雙架床的｡地段超級好,就在太子地鐵站C2出口｡去哪裡都方便,而且不像那些小旅館一樣擁擠,住的很舒適｡房東非常和善,下次去還會定!

入住前以及入住时的联络都及时及方便｡入住前,会有个友善的阿姨带领去住宿地,空调已提前开好,令我们感到舒服以及振奋｡
房间很大,我们是三人入住,一人一间,沙发也能同时坐下,设施齐全,相当便利以及舒适｡
周边环境也很繁华,离地铁以及去机场的大巴都相当近｡
本次体验相当满意,会推荐朋友｡

It was a great experience going to Hong Kong and Lulu was very helpful in all aspects. Just give her a phone call and then she will do her best to help you . Location wise it was great since it's only 1min away from the MTR station. It's very convenient and there's a lot of great food nearby too !
Very good, close to MTR
非常不错的房子,房子打扫干净,主要是房东非常热情服务!
房子离地铁太子站很近,不怕迷路,周边吃东西很方便｡三间房住一家六口还有富余,有点像日式榻榻米,蛮舒服的｡房东Lulu很nice, 亲自到地铁口接我们,房子也收拾得很干净｡我们发现没有转换插头,打给Lulu,专门买了送过来｡走的那天因为在周边买东西,耽搁到下午3点多,Lulu也很好商量,完全没有催促｡总之,一家人都很满意｡
房子离地铁口也就1分钟不到的路程 床是塌塌米 各方面我都超喜欢 房东很棒
我们是6个人一起的,虽然房子的电梯比较老了,但是房间内部很温馨,很干净!空调效果也很好,晚上睡觉都被冻醒了!总的来说,对于工薪阶层来说比住酒店实在划算太多了
Lulu 非常热情,给了各种玩的建议,房子很棒,很干净,在地铁口,走路就可以到旺角逛街,父母很喜欢｡
房子离地铁站很近,交通非常方便,周围也有很多吃饭的地方,总体还不错
这套房子真的很棒,跟我的同学一起来的,7个人睡,非常方便｡洗衣机吹风筒等便利措施让一晚上的生活都充满乐趣｡房间干净,离地铁口很近｡就是插座有点少,但是瑕不掩瑜｡
跟家人一起,房子虽小,但是住的下,图片绝对真实,价格很实在!推荐

Lulu is nice.
The house is cozy and clean.
It looks the same as the photos.

I stayed at Lulu home stay with 3 Adult's 2 Children's. The home size exactly as per photo and the location very near to Prince Edwards MRT Station Exit C2. Down stair got a lot of restaurant which you no need to worried for curving...hahaha
Lulu was very friendly & nice, she even intro us her friend of the transportation to airport :)
But before to book on Airbnb , please try to text the host confirm the location instead of seeing on the MAP Location. For my case i saw the home stay actually near to Mongkok MRT Station  on the Map from Airbnb provided but after i received the confirmation just found out the area is near to Prince Edward MRT so PLEASE must check with host before make booking ya~
大致上還算不錯
这是一套交通非常便利的房子,内部设施比较齐全,简洁清爽,wifi也很稳定｡唯一美中不足的就是热水器功率比较小,每个人洗澡时间很仓促,下一个人洗还需要等一段时间｡周边的饮食非常方便,味道也不错｡
Lulu is very accurate in giving directions. Her assistant fetched us and directed us to his apartment. Wifi is very strong and fast. She answers my inquiry in a timely manner. Great apartment indeed.
交通非常便利

เหมือนในรูปเลย มีแอร์ตัวนึง แบ่งเป็นสามห้องนอน กับพท.รวม โดยรวมดีนะ เว้นอุปกรณ์ทำครัวไม่โอ กับไม่มีผ้าเช็ดตัวให้

แถวที่พักมีร้านของกินเยอะนะ แต่จะโดนป่าวต้องลอง แนะนำเตี๋ยวหลอดข้างๆเลย ดีงามอันดับต้นๆของที่นี่เลย

มาสี่ห้าคน ถ้านอนรร.คงแพงกว่านี้ ที่นี่ช่วยประหยัดได้ การติดต่อเจ้าของดี ตอบตลอด มีปัญหาไรถามได้
If you don't bring your own towels, you can ask Lulu to purchase ahead of time.
港铁太子站C2出口,交通便利!适合家庭5人以上旅行居住!
我们是7个人入住的,住得非常好｡一共3个房间,都很干净整洁,房子离太子站C2出口很近,出来走路不到100米就到了｡推荐入住
Apartment perfect for 6, located nearby the MRT station, very clean place.
这次是一家老小五口人入住的,也是我第一次尝试b&b,体验非常棒｡房子位置紧挨着荃湾线太子站, (Hidden by Airbnb) 都方便,楼下有饭店､便利店､药店,选择性很大;房东热情且细致的交待一切,人非常好,下次再去香港有机会还要选择这一家｡
交通真的很方便,不过是在太子站B2出口,别的都很好,就是洗澡有点麻烦,因为是电热水器,人多的话就要排队等候,我们5个人第一天晚上后面洗的都是冷水澡,还好第二天我们分批回来洗｡房东人不错,回应很快｡

Convenient location and clean. There is a small kitchenette but no cutlery available.
Also remember to pack your own towels!!
Good location as it is close to the train station. Lots of restaurants on the street.
榻榻米不算太舒适,晚上比较吵
整体感觉很不错,离太子地铁站2分钟,很方便
Great location, owner is so friendly.
住宿在商业区,楼下就有地铁口很方便,家里很干净,一切设备也都使用正常,还有洗衣机可以用,房东也很好怕我们找不到特地来接我们,总的来说很好~~~
房子虽然不大,但弄得非常干净,七个人住的很舒服｡以后去香港还会过来的
good location and near MTR.
各方面都很满意,在香港这个寸土寸金的地方,有一个个干净整洁的房子,非常不错,以后过香港还会选择这里
地方很好找,就在太子站c2出口附近,房东人很好,服务非常周到,很好的体验

房東的回應非常迅速,也非常配合~
交通真的非常方便,但是地點標示有誤建議可以改一下,應該是在382號,鄰近太子站C2出口
另外,可能電熱水器較小,需要洗快些､人多的話也需要等久些,不然到後面會是洗冷水
地點真的很好,附近很多餐廳､小吃營業到很晚,整體來說,是很好的住宿體驗~
挺小的,那个电梯上全人之前一定不要按楼层
房子不错 靠近地铁站 楼下很多吃的

Owner very friendly and helpful in attending on our needs. Location is top notch as it is very near the station(1 minute walk). Room is very spacious as it described.
Will definitely use this room again when we going back to Hong Kong.
整体上还是非常不错的,就是隔音有点问题,晚上睡觉的时候外面的声音有点大｡
榻榻米的床垫很舒适,东西都很干净卫生!
图片真实,位置很便捷｡不足处是热水冷得太快,一人还没洗完出水已经不热了……

The best thing of this place is the location. Just one minute from Prince Edward Station to this place as the owner mentioned. 

The owner is superb. Lulu and Simon are great. They can help you anytime as you want. Because of my schedule was changed, they still could solve my problem. Outstanding!!!!! 

Restaurants and grocery shops are nearby. So, it is very easy to find some food when you get room late. I recommended "One Dim Sum" It is pretty near like 5 minutes walking. You guys should make a reservation before you go.  

However, the place seems to be old. Time to clean the A/C and some accessories such as the shower, hair dryer and so on. My friend got sicked because of his allergy. He always has a problem with dust.
The house very clean n suitable with a group of 6-9 peoples n the location is very good, next to MTR n many restaurant.... will go there again whenever I go to Hongkong
房东人好热情    性价比高    非常好    各方面都满意
房间是比较陈旧的楼房,电梯很有年代感,房间不大,但是像家一样还是很温馨的｡就是蟑螂太多了,特别怕｡如果是和一家人来旅行,还是不错的选择｡

住的地方交通很方便,到太子地铁C出口5分钟不到,楼下就有茶餐厅,还有小吃｡住的很舒服,房间很干净,设备也齐全特别是空调很给力,热水也是棒棒哒!房主很耐心解答疑问~
因为住的很好,我会推荐给我朋友!
市中心飲食很多,靠近地铁非常方便,一切很好｡
第2次住了,不错,很方便,
房间还是不错的 楼下挺多吃的 离地铁口也很近 但电视坏了
几好嘅
几好
房间干净､舒服,除了毛巾牙刷需自带,其他一切齐全,而且交通出行方便,适合一家人旅游居住｡唯一一个不足就是偶尔有一只蟑螂｡
Great place to stay in Hong Kong
房子不错,坐地铁真心方便,楼下有茶餐厅,附近有超市
非常好,非常适合团队入住,我们七个男生入住非常合适,交通也方便,楼下很多吃的!下次还来
房间偏小
位置很好找 出门离地铁站也很近 附近也有很多小店 虽然没有想象中的大但是很方便 下楼就可以吃饭 设备很齐全噢
Good!
房子位置很好找,房间也蛮宽敞,适合小团队来住,性价比高｡房主和助手梁先生很热情,感谢
很開心!舒服!有家的感覺
交通非常方便,房间干净卫生,适合家庭和小团队入住,周围餐饮和购物一应俱全｡｡｡很好的体验一把香港当地人的生活｡｡｡
距离prince edward 站仅1分钟,交通方便,房间很干净,看得出屋主有用心安排,但电梯间非常狭小,开关电梯都非常迅速存在赶不上的情形,热水器水温变化很大,淋浴体验较差｡
总体不错的入住体验,适合家庭入住!lulu人也不错,谢谢梁生到地铁口接我们!
Very near to mrt station. A lot of restaurants nearby the apartment, value for money
交通方便
Good location. Near at MTR very convinient!✌

Pros:
- Location is super convenient and 1 min walk to MTR Prince Edward. Security is good. There are lot of eateries downstair.

- Water pressure is very good for showering.

- Almost all ammenties are provided except towel.

- Owner is super friendly and introduction to the house was swift and fast.

Cons:
- House is at street level. Noise are constantly heard from moving vehicles and people talking throughout the night.

- Each invidually room are not partition with no door for 2 room. 

- Heater mechanic is weird as the water need to be store in tank before discharging out for warm water.

Overall, this house is recommend to traveler which does not mind the noise at street and for people who seek a super convenient transport.
很好实惠｡
舒适方便,满足我们的要求｡
Lulu好好,还特地为我安排车去机场｡
Very good.
Great location to stay, house is clean, comfortable mattress, an idea place for friends gathering.
Photo/picture not accurate with actual unit
Nice and clean place
Nice place which is near to MTR station. The service person is very nice and provide immediate help to us. The place is clean and tidy. Suitable for family and friends!
The place is awesome, fit our group just fine without feeling cramped or squished. Very convenient location just steps from the metro.
位置非常方便,超近地鐵站,樓下多野買
房子这个价位性价比在香港算很高的,离地铁站口很近,附近商店吃的店都挺多的,下次来还会继续入住｡
Near MRT and Restaurant
挺好的 房东会在地铁口接 房子干净 冲热水澡要算着时间因为热水不多 楼下就有大家乐粥粉面
房子在香港的民宿里算性价比不错的,不过真的感叹香港寸土寸金,别期待太多……
Nice apartment
服务很赞!交通也非常便利,就在太子地铁站边上!入住很愉快!

Very near to the MRT; plenty of eating places around.
Near to many tourists attractions.
一家人去香港旅游,非常开心｡真的让我知道寸土寸金的地方生活起来压力大,房子非常方便,不管是去尖沙咀还是迪斯尼都很方便,就在地铁口旁边,没有一次性牙刷,以及毛巾,其他都有非常好｡下次去还会住这里,赞

It was a comfortable stay, the house can fit more than 5 people. 

Convenient location for travelling to tourist attractions by MTR. Around 5 mins walk from Prince Edward MTR to the house.

Lots of food restaurants nearby.

Overall was good , the owner was kind enough to let us check in early and clean up later. Worth the price!
房间其实如果都很熟可以睡8个人 3个榻榻米双人 一个上铺单人 一个沙发 这个季节不冷不热住民宿很舒服,以后去香港想过夜还会选择民宿
the location is great restaurants just step away, MRT just around the corner
I was a very good location next to the train station
Small but cozy apartment
地理位置好,空间够7个成年人居住,卫生好,服务好,设施正常,热水器热水量对女生来说可能稍显不足｡

Awesome location. Fast response time. Lulu was kind enough to allowed early check in on the day itself. When we left our phones in the unit upon check out, she quickly sent a staff to open the unit without question. Thank you.
位置很方便,总体来说还可以
Great night~
房子位置好
Great location... nice place...
很好
Sophie is very accommodating and she is very responsive to queries.
地點很方便,不管是吃的(樓下附近就有很多餐館)或是地鐵站(走路只要2~3分鐘可達-太子站),推薦大家入住｡
交通真的无敌方便
总体来说还不错,离地铁站也近,性价比也蛮高｡就是厨房没有调料之类的(油,盐等等)
距离地铁站很近 出行方便

sophie很热心,本来该14点入住,可是我们到早了,老板很贴心提前把钥匙给我们放行李,然后轻松出行,很感谢的｡
房间有三间榻榻米,其中一间有高低床,住6人满轻松的,每个房间有空调,卫生间有干湿分区淋雨,毛巾拖鞋洗发水都有准备,只是我们环保出行,有自带没有用,温馨的家离地铁站很近,1分钟到太子站C出口,逛弥敦道很是方便｡

Super Appartement. Etwas kleiner als auf den Fotos aber ausreichend für 6 Personen. Jede Klimaanlage hat funktioniert und Wohnung sehr sauber. Dusche/WC gefliest und Küche ausreichend ausgestattet. Lage der Wohnung ist optimal. Klare Empfehlung für Trips nach Hongkong.
地理位置优越,离太子地铁站很近｡房子算是很大了,三个房间,榻榻米的床,房子卫生干净,有客厅电视沙发,适合最佳人数4人入住｡
房东Sophie跟助手梁生都很好说话,房子的地理位置很方便外出就餐及搭乘地铁｡
房间很好也很舒服,位置也很好找,有问题也解答的很快
The host canceled this reservation 115 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
good location
地理位置很好
房间的位置非常好,距离地铁口非常近,三个房间(还有一个高低床)6个人住妥妥的｡
Very good location and superb host... everything is nearby.. definitely will stay again..

name: Flat in city center
summary: The apartment is very well located, just in front of metro Faria Guimaraes and walking distance from downtown. The apartment has 3 rooms, with 4 single beds and possible an adicional bed. It was a full equipped kitchen, well lit and a living room with sofas. The apartment has 2 complete bathrooms.
description: The apartment is very well located, just in front of metro Faria Guimaraes and walking distance from downtown. The apartment has 3 rooms, with 4 single beds and possible an adicional bed. It was a full equipped kitchen, well lit and a living room with sofas. The apartment has 2 complete bathrooms.

host.host_about: I am a person who loves travel and know different cultures, different food, different ways to live your life. I like to observe and to enjoy small things in the daily life. I like to eat healthy food and make sport, it renew my mind and my body.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Everything was excellent! Someone came to meet us and show us the place and was very friendly. The place itself was very nice and close to central. Would definitely recommend it! :D
Sejour agréable, bon accueil, appart sympa
We had a very nice stay at Ana's. It is very close to the metro and if you want to you can walk towards the river easily as well. Everything is present at the apartment cooking wise etc.
The host canceled this reservation 81 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

El apartamento es muy céntrico, con una parada de metro prácticamente en frente de la puerta. Pueden dormir perfectamente 5 personas y el detalle de tener dos baños le da un plus! La cocina está muy bien equipada. El único defecto es que en los días de verano hace demasiado calor por ser el último piso, sería conveniente poner algún ventilador. De resto, todo muy bien.

El apartamento estaba un poco sucio y está viejo, pero lo que nosotras queriamos era un sitio para dormir y bien ubicado, ya que pasamos todo el día fuera de casa. En relación calidad precio es altamente recomendable, sin duda repetiría si volviera a Oporto, la anfitriona se portó muy bien con nosotras, nos facilitó mucho la entrada y salida y estuvo atenta cuando le preguntabamos cualquier cosa

Ana a toujours été aimable et  réactive dans ses réponses mais l appartement est déconseillé pour des familles avec jeunes enfants ... il y a du moisi un peu partout, les fenêtres ferment mal, il n y a pas de volets et l installation électrique est vétuste voire dangereuse à certains endroits ... Il est quand même bien situé et facilement accessible.
Highly recommend !! Was perfect size and location for us , very welcoming. Everything was very clean and ideal for us . Quick responses and all round 10/10

Tranquilo de dia, menos em períodos de jogos.  Muito bem localizado, supermercado próximos. Como peguei pelo período do inverno não tive problemas com temperatura por causa do sol. Anfitriã única, super solicita, super paciência, fácil acesso. Recomendo este lugar quando for a Porto.

name: Azulejo Porto Riverside
summary: Enjoy this freshly furnished 1 bedroom apartment where all the rooms have fabulous views over the river Douro, the port wine lodges and the Luis I bridge.  It's located in the historic city centre in a quiet neighbourhood. Most of the main touristic attractions are at walking distance and you can also find public transportation (metro, train, bus) nearby. It has a spacious living room and can accommodate up to 4 guests.
space: The building is located in the historic city centre, on the hill, halfway between the Cathedral of Porto and Luis I bridge, in Ribeira. To the apartments there is pedestrian access only, along 80 steps/stairs, (please see last photo on the website) either down from the Cathedral or up from the river. It may be a drawback if you have mobility concerns, but it does afford you privacy, peacefulness and fabulous views in one of the most genuine quarters of Porto :-)
description: Enjoy this freshly furnished 1 bedroom apartment where all the rooms have fabulous views over the river Douro, the port wine lodges and the Luis I bridge.  It's located in the historic city centre in a quiet neighbourhood. Most of the main touristic attractions are at walking distance and you can also find public transportation (metro, train, bus) nearby. It has a spacious living room and can accommodate up to 4 guests. The building is located in the historic city centre, on the hill, halfway between the Cathedral of Porto and Luis I bridge, in Ribeira. To the apartments there is pedestrian access only, along 80 steps/stairs, (please see last photo on the website) either down from the Cathedral or up from the river. It may be a drawback if you have mobility concerns, but it does afford you privacy, peacefulness and fabulous views in one of the most genuine quarters of Porto :-) The apartment is located in an iconic building 2 minutes walk from the famous Ribeira with its restaurants, b
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in an iconic building 2 minutes walk from the famous Ribeira with its restaurants, bars and boat trips, 2 minutes from the cathedral, and 5 minutes from São Bento station. It is perfectly placed to visit the world heritage site of Porto city centre. Go down to the Ribeira to watch the world go by in a riverside cafe, or to take a river trip up the Douro to see the Port wine vineyards.  Walk across the river to sample wines in the port wine lodges in Gaia.  Visit the Cathedral, the Clérigos Tower and the colourful Bolhão market. Visit the Serralves Museum, one of the best art galleries in Europe, and the Casa da Música, an incredible work of contemporary architecture. Take in the cafes, bars, restaurants and clubs of the city. It's all on your doorstep.
notes: Discounts apply on weekly and monthly rates.
transit: Most of the main tourist attractions, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, etc, are at walking distance and you can also find public transportation (bus, metro, train) nearby. 6km from the popular beaches of Foz do Douro, and easy access to the beautiful Atlantic Costa Verde. Peaceful safe river beaches upstream on the River Douro. 15km from Porto's international airport, with metro and bus service direct to/from the city centre.
house_rules: - Quiet time from 10 pm till 9 am. Merci de ne pas faire de bruit de 22h à 8h - Check in after 4pm (flexible if no guests leaving on the same day). Check in après 16h (flexible s’il n’y a pas de voyageurs qui partent le même jour) - Check out before 12 am (flexible if no bookings for the same day). Check out avant 12h (midi) (flexible s’il n’y a pas de réservations pour le même jour) - Please inform us immediately in case of damage or any malfunction in the apartment. Merci de nous informer immédiatement en cas de dommage ou de mauvais fonctionnement dans l'appartement - Pets allowed on request. Animaux acceptés sur demande - We expect guests to be respectful and to keep the apartment with the basic standards of cleanliness and tidiness.  Merci de laisser l’appartement dans l’etat dans le quel vous l’avez trouvè

host.host_about: Please don't hesitate to contact me for further information.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Very nice apartment in a central area.
Claudia is a friendly help!

First of all I would like to say great thanks to Claudia & her wonderful apartment! Our staying in Porto was the best part of our Portugal trip. Claudia is the kindest person, very friendly and very responsive. She was always in touch to help or give any advice or recommendation. 
Her wonderful apartment has a great location and there are some interesting features such as street elevator or a few entrances to the yard near. The view from the windows is really fantastic! There are a lot of space inside, apartment is very clean, and comfortable. There are national Portugal azulejo on the walls. I'm sure that you will be pleasant to spend a time there :)

Nuestra estancia en el apartamento de Claudia ha sido maravillosa. 
El apartamento es exactamente como aparece en el anuncio: espacioso, limpio, cómodo, bien orientado, bien equipado, luminoso y con unas vistas espectaculares al río y el puente. La anfitriona nos atendió muy cordialmente y nos facilito la información necesaria para movernos por la ciudad. Apartamento absolutamente recomendable. Gracias Claudia. Agosto 2014

What an amazing city and what a great apartment to visit it from! It's situation half way between the cathedral and the Cais de Ribeira means you have a fantastic view of the Ponte Luis I and direct access to the back streets of this old part of the town. The area has loads of charm and the apartment sits in the heart of it. The apartment itself has everything you're likely to need when on holiday, being clean and well appointed! Claudia was fantastic, from the warm welcome after we had been delayed, to giving advice on local services. All in all, it was a great welcome to a cosy apartment in an amazing city!

Claudia is a very kind and welcoming person, always ready to answer to any questions. The appartement is just amazing, exactly as on the photos: incredible view, full equiped kitchen, very comfortable sofa... 
The location is crazy too. Indeed you can do everything by foot. I spend a  beautiful trip in Porto thanks to Claudia and his appartement. 
I highly recommend it!

Super séjour à l'appartement et que dire de l'accueil, exceptionnel! L'appartement est vraiment génial grâce d'abord à son emplacement qui offre une vue magnifique sur le pont et le Douro, ensuite, il est situé dans le cœur historique de porto et enfin, tout près du pont à traverser pour visiter les caves à vins et surtout déguster leurs produits. Merci Claudia pour tes précieux conseils.

Pluies diluviennes, peut-être mauvaise estimation du temps nécessaire... on est arrivés avec un bon quart d'heure de retard sur l'horaire prévu... mais Cláudia était bien là, mouillée mais très souriante à côté de la cathédrale. 

On est descendus à l'appartement (Porto est tout sauf une ville plate) en discutant moitié en français moitié en portugais. Cláudia nous a très gentiment montré les quelques petites choses à savoir sur l'appartement, et tout expliqué sur les nombreux itinéraires de sortie possible (vers le haut de la ville, vers le fleuve...).

L'appartement est encore plus grand que l'impression qu'il donne sur les photos, très très agréable dans sa blancheur rehaussée d'azulejos... et la vue, vraiment merveilleuse, fait oublier les quelques marches qu'il faut gravir pour l'atteindre.

Cláudia est vraiment super, accueillante, très sympa, au petit soins dés notre arrivé.
L'appartement est parfait, le salon-salle à manger est spacieux, la salle de bain aussi et très joliment décorée, la chambre  à coucher est très bien, La cuisine ouverte est très bien équipée pour se faire à manger. Il est bien insonorisé, propre et bien équipé.
Pour la vue, les photos parlent d'elles mêmes, mais à la tombé de la nuit c'est vraiment magnifique. 
Il est idéalement situé au cœur du Ribeira, derrière la cathédrale. Juste à coté de l'appartement, il y a un ascenseur qui donne directement accès aux rives du Douro (ouvert de 9h à 19h), nickel.
Il y a quelques marchent à emprunter pour accéder à l'appartement, mais rien d'insurmontable, nous étions un couple avec un bébé (donc poussette), ça se fait les yeux fermés.
On peut visiter pas mal de chose à pied en partant de l'appart, gare de São Bento, à 3 minutes, caves de Porto, juste en face à 10 minutes et les rives du Douro à 3 minutes.
On reviendra un jour, c'est sur.
Merci Cláudia

El apartamento, perfecto. Limpísimo, la ubicación inmejorable, luminoso, amplio, una cama comodísima, unas vistas impresionantes...
La anfitriona, majísima, atenta, detallista muy simpática...
Hemos estado muy agusto. En el apartamento había un montón de información de porto, una guía, mapas, información de bodegas...

The apartment was the perfect place to explore the beautiful 
city of Porto, very well equiped with everything you need for a city break.
The Location is just perfect, with a breathtaking view of the Ponte Luis and the Douro River.
Claudia is a very kind and friendly person, who made us feel at home right away.
If you plan on going to Porto, which you should, stay here, you won't regret it!!!

We were originally going to stay with Cláudia's flat along with our friends, but have decided to extend our trip and booked another flat. Cláudia has been very understanding and very welcoming with our friends who stayed at the lovely and well decorated apartment in the centre of the old down. She also kept their luggage in a safe place as they arrived very early in the day prior to the previous guests departure. Cláudia took the time to show them everything in the flat that they needed to know about. If you want to be near the river and Ribeira then this is an excellent location. There are great restaurants very close and we could chose between the more touristy places on the river and some lovely eateries on the back streets.

We spent a wonderful time in Porto in Claudia's apartment. She is such a delightful lady. She explained us everything about the house, and gave us some good tips. The apartment is very confortable and the light and view are just amazing !
It was too short to visit all in 4 days so if we come back, I will definitively book again Claudia's house. Thanks for all.

Claudias apartment is fantastic, and highly recommended! Perfect views over Porto, and a very comfortable, modern and homely apartment. The apartment is in an excellent location, with great access to anything you need. Claudia was a great host and very personable, and greeted us warmly despite our late arrival.

Très bon accueil de Cláudia qui nous a fixé une rencontre en ville en soirée lors de notre arrivée tardive et nous a guidé jusqu'à l'appartement. Tout est conforme à l'annonce. L'appartement est bien placé dans la vieille ville, la vue sur le Douro est parfaite, l'équipement est complet, la déco est sobre et agréable, le couchage est confortable, la salle de bain est grande et bien équipée, tout est prévu pour un agréable séjour. Cláudia est aux petits soins, il y avait même de quoi prendre nos premiers petits déjeuners ainsi que quelques jeux pour enfant. Prévoir tout de même la montée et la descente de pas mal de marches d'escaliers pour bénéficier de la vue, cela permet une digestion rapide après avoir testé les bons restaurants de Porto. L’ascenseur qui mène aux quais est à 20 mètres mais ne fonctionne pas le soir et les weekends. Nous reviendrons volontiers chez Cláudia que nous remercions pour ses attentions et sa gentillesse.

Cláudia has been a kind and wonderful host. She did everything to make us comfortable during our trip. She even came get us at the metro station when we arrived.
The apartment is very pleasant and quiet in the historic part of Porto with a wonderful view on Douro river and has all amenities, dishwasher, wifi, etc...
I will definitely recommend renting here.

Claudia was a great host!! She made it so easy from the booking, to the information from the airport to the apartment. She even came to pick us at the metro station when we arrived.
The apartment is really nice. The geographical situation makes it special and the view is really amazing. A few steps away from the river and a lot of restaurants, the neighborhood is very safe.
Regarding restaurants Claudia won't hesitate in sharing her tips for all the nice places around.
Yes you will have to face the steps at the end of the day, but the place deserves it and it will allow you to eat more pasteis… 
I hope to come back soon, thank you Claudia :)

We had such a great stay in Porto at Claudia's apartment. Not only was it beautiful and modern, but Claudia was a perfect host. She met us at the station and helped us with booking taxis, along with telling us about the city. We would highly recommend staying here.

Hemos pasado cuatro días alojadas en el apartamento de Claudia y ha cumplido todas las expectativas. El apartamento es amplio, tiene todo lo necesario, está superlimpio y además es personal en su decoración, lo que lo hace muy recomendable. Reconocemos que los azulejos nos llamaron la atención y fueron un punto más para elegir este lugar y no otro. Un 10 para la vista sobre el Duero, inmejorable, y un 10 también para la atención que dispensa Claudia como anfitriona. Ha estado pendiente de nosotras, contestando rápido cuando le hemos preguntado algo y además es encantadora y detallista. Todo se corresponde con lo que Claudia cuenta en su anuncio. Y además nos avisó de que está en una zona en cuesta. Es tan céntrico que eso no es un problema.

Great apartment in the heart of Porto - lovely views and very spacious. Claudia made us feel very welcome. The location is great for for accessing the Ribiera and other areas of the city (the steps keep you fit too!). We'd happily stay here again if in Porto.

adresse très sympa : accueil au top, indications guidage très clairs... appartement très fonctionnel, avec des azuléjos et une vue imprenable sur le pont eiffel. tout pres du centre ville et du douros ! tout fait une adresse a ne pas rater. la ville et l'accueil des portugais est chaleureux.

Das Appartement von Claudia war einfach wunderbar, die Lage mit Sicht auf dem Fluss einmalig. Claudia war sehr hilfsbereit und hat mir alles Wichtige gezeigt - bereits die Kommunikation vor Beginn der Reise war super. Wenn ich wieder nach Porto komme, dann gerne wieder in dieses Appartement, ich kann es allen empfehlen.

Cláudia war eine exzellente Gastgeberin und hat uns – obwohl wir zu später Stunde angereist sind – mit offenen Armen empfangen, uns sogar an der Metro abgeholt. Die Wohnung ist mindestens genauso schön wie auf den Bildern, in echt ist der Ausblick jedoch fast unschlagbar. Das Apartment liegt in der Altstadt und sämtliche Ausflugsziele sind gut zu Fuß bzw. durch die nahe Metro-Station leicht erreichen. Eine Top-Adresse in Porto!

Liebe Cláudia,
danke für die schöne Woche. Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt.
Gerne erinnern wir uns an Deinen Empfang und die Erstversorgung.

Liebe Grüße
Susanne und Jürgen
Superb location and wonderful appartment, Claudia is sooo nice, we have enjoyed our stay and would recommend highly if you are considering Porto.

Cládia est une hôte attentionnée et sympathique. Son appartement très agréable à vivre et la vue est superbe. Ce fut l'occasion pour moi de connaître Porto que j'ai vaillamment arpenté de long en large pendant cinq jours c'est une ville magnifique qui à gardé du passé des bâtiments historiques comme des constructions populaires et dont des initiatives contemporaines comme la casa la Casa da Música ou "l'aménagement à usages croisés" à côté de la Torre dos Clérigos sont à mon avis particulièrement réussies.
Je vous recommande de bonnes chaussures et une certaine énergie pour visiter la ville et rejoindre l'appartement de Cláudia c'est LA condition mais vous en serez largement récompensé.

Claudia est venue nous chercher pour pouvoir se garer à côté de l'appartement. Elle nous a aidé à décharger la voiture, nous a fait visiter l'appartement sublime; elle nous avait acheté du café, de l'huile, des gâteaux: accueil très chaleureux. L'apartement est conforme à la description est idéalement placé offrant une vue superbe. L'appartement est très bien équipé, très propre et très agréable.

Claudia was super welcoming and helpful, and the flat is lovely – she warned us beforehand that it's a bit of a challenge to get to, but it's worth it! Perfectly situated with lovely views in A Ribeira, a short walk from all of the surrounding bars and restaurants and an easy walk across the bridge to all of the Port houses.

Claudia was a really helpful host. I stayed with my husband from 16th to 19th September.  She met us at the  Sao Bento train station and walked with us to the apartment.
First impressions did not disappoint and the apartment has a spectacular  view over the river and it feels like you are almost on the bridge as its so close.
Claudia was really helpful giving us clear instructions and keys and how to access the flat which is a little complicated.  The flat is well equipped very clean and quiet.  We slept well.
Porto was lovely and we crammed a lot into our short stay  I wasn't prepared fro the steps and hills but in a way it added to the experience.  We went up the tower, over the bridge, walked to the market, ate at the Majestic,   visited the "Harry Potter 'inspied lib ray.  Went to Foz  visited several churches  and the Tiles everywhere are amazing.
I will return one day as we didn't manage several things but the whole short stay was fabulous.
thank you.

We have had a marvelous time in Claudias apartment. Location is superb with an magnificent view over the River, and the apartment is stylish with all what you need for a holiday. Claudia responded very fast on our mails with practical question and the information was very valuable. She picked us up at the Metro station and guided us to the apartment and gave us a good intro to Porto. Super service.
We can highly recommend staying at Claudias apartment, and hope to get a chance to get back some times.
Best regards
Joan & Peter

I've just returned from a wonderful 3 night stay at Azueljo Porto Riverside. Claudia was the perfect host and did everything to ensure we had a comfortable stay. The apartment is beautiful and the views from all rooms, to Luis 1 Bridge, and down to the riverside, are amazing!. it's so quiet and peaceful here, but you are also located close to everything. The bars and restaurants are along the riverside below the apartment, you are a few steps away to the beautiful cathedral. The centre of Porto, Sao Bento train station is less than 10 mins walk. There is so much to do and see here in the beautiful city of Porto, our only regret was that we did not stay longer!. I have no hesitation to recommend Claudia's place, enjoy!

Estuvimos 5 noches en el piso de Claudia y la verdad es que nuestra estancia no hubiera podido ser más agradable. El piso es mejor aún que en las fotos, las vistas sobre el Duero y el puente son especulares, tienes mucha luz. Su ubicación es una de las mejores para hospedarse en Oporto, una ciudad muy hermosa, cerca de la catedral, del Duero, de la plaça da liberdade. Sin hablar de Claudia, una anfitriona muy simpática, agradable y cercana. Sin lugar a duda os recomiendo este piso.

Claudia fue fantasticamente amable, nos fue a recoger a la estación de metro y de allí nos llevo hasta el departamento, que esta justo detrás de la Se, con unas vistas fantásticas al Duero. El apartamento es tal cual las fotos, super acogedor y cerca de todo, a pie unos minutos. Super recomendable. si volvemos a Oporto volveremos a este apartamento!!

Claudia a été une hôtesse parfaite ... Elle est même venue nous chercher au métro ! ... Présente et réactive ... elle a rendu notre séjour très confortable !
L'appartement est très bien placé dans Porto ... conforme au descriptif ... D'un côté et à quelques mètres : la cathédrale ... et de l'autre côté ... un ascenseur public vous amène directement sur le quai du Douro ...
CLAUDIA SPENT ALMOST AN HOUR WITH US GIVING INFORMATION ABOUT THE FLAT AND ALSO INSIGHT INTO PORTO.

L'appartement est idéalement placé et conforme au descriptif. Claudia est gentiment venue nous chercher à la sortie du métro malgré l'heure tardive de notre arrivée. Bref, une très bonne adresse malgré la pluie et le vent incessants de ce week-end de St Valentin 2016 !

Claudia a été une hôte charmante et très accueillante.
Nous avons retrouvé un logement conforme aux photos, un logement agréable, fonctionnel et très bien placé.

Ev tam özelliklerinde sıralandığı gibi en turistik yerde idi. Manzarası çok iyiydi. Temiz ve kusursuzdu. Ev sahibimiz bize evi teslim ederken tüm açıklamaları yaptı. Bu evde kalmak bizi çok mutlu etti. Tavsiye ederim.

Claudia war eine fantastische Gastgeberin. Obwohl wir erst Mitternacht anreisen konnten, hat Sie uns in der Nähe der Unterkunft abgeholt und eingewiesen. Die Unterkunft selbst ist sehr zentral gelegen, gut ausgestattet und hat bietet eine großartige Aussicht. Auf den Umstand, dass die Wohnung über mehrere Treppen zu erreichen ist, hat uns Claudia vorab hingewiesen. Das hat uns nicht gestört. Trotz schlechten Wetters haben wir unseren Aufenthalt in Porto auch dank der schönen Unterkunft genossen.

Claudia was a wonderful host - lots of communication before arrival and a clear plan was made to meet us at Sao Bento station which was a 10 minute walk to the apartment. Claudia helped carry our bags down the many steps to reach the apartment and gave us a guided tour and lots of information on things to do in Porto before she left.
The apartment has the most wonderful view of Luis I bridge and the river. It is very clean and fully equipped with everything you could possibly need for your stay including fast wifi. There were even a few basic food items to make a drink & snack. 
The apartment is ideally positioned but you have to negotiate lots of steps either up into the centre of town or down to the river. There is a lift to access the river level which operates til 7pm. The apartment was very quiet but within minutes you were in the centre of the Ribeira with lots of places to eat & drink along with a small food shop from which you can get the basics.
Porto is a wonderful city and across the river are the Port houses and a cycle path to Vila Nova de Gaia which runs along the stunning wild Atlantic coast.
I would definitely recommend this apartment for your stay in Porto
Thank you Claudia

A wonderful place to stay for a couple of days off and we couldn´t think of a better host than Cláudia! Quick answers on our questions from the beginning to the end. Since this was our first time using Airbnb we needed a little extra info before deciding. Cláudia helped us with everthing not only regarding the apartment but also Porto as a Place to visit. Restaurants, boat trip etc. 

The apartment was perfectly placed at the Douro river and the restaurants by the riverside. On the other side of the bridge we had all the Portwine stores and a few meters to the boattrips. Could´nt be better. A nice view, well equipped apartment with everything you need. There was even some breakfast, water, coffe and other things wich was perfect for us with a late arrival. 

Cláudia met us at the Metrostation and walked us to the apartment a fewq blocks away even though we arrived in the middle of the night around 1.30 am. We are so satisfied with all the service and our highly recommendations both for the apartment and for Cláudia!

/Pelle &  Susanne, Sweden

We were welcomed warmly by Claudia despite being late because of our plane being delayed for 2 hours. Not only a warm greeting but Claudia helped us carry our luggage down the many steps to our apartment. 
The apartment, amazing with everything and more that we imagined. Bright, tastefully furnished and vey comfortable. 
The location absolutely perfect with an awesome view from our windows and after negotiating the stairs to the Ribeira, we were in amongst the action and close also to Gaia and the port cellars. 
Thank you Claudia. You are a wonderful hostess.

Claudia is a very warm person who makes us feel easly " at home" . She was very very helpful and gave us lot's of information to find our way in Porto. She was waiting for us when we arrived by car. You need some guidinace to find the apartment the first time. During our stay we could easily get in touch with Claudia to raise remaining questions which pops up during our stay.
We had a lot of fun together when we supported the Portugese football team which we " adopted" ,as our substitute for the Dutch football team who didn't make it to the European Championship.
The apartment is a perfect location to discover Porto. It's right in the centre and parking your car is no problem and even for free. The pictures were matching our expectations totally. We will recommend this apartment to all our friends.

Excellent accueil de Claudia qui est venue nous récupérer au métro.
Vue superbe, appartement très agréable et bien placé. Tout le confort nécessaire et tout est fait pour que l'on se sente à l'aise . Des petites attentions en prime : tout pour un petit dèjeuner dans le frigo et de l'eau bienvenue par 35 degrés. On reviendra

Thank you Claudia for giving us such a warm and wonderful welcome to Porto! This was our first experience with Airbnb and you made it excellent one. From the very beginning when we were making arrangements, you were so quick to respond to our questions and so kind. We felt welcome before we arrived. Our arrival was first class, with you meeting us directly at the train station and walking with us to the magical apartment. Honestly, it was even prettier than we had expected with the extraordinary view and luminous space. Everything is so functional and it was great to have lots of space to hang clothing and put things away. The bathroom is so large and well designed. Everything was so clean and well organized, even down to the tourist information, stacked in categories for easy access. The location is postcard perfect and one can not tire of gazing out the windows, at any time of day or night. The stairs to climb make for good excercise after indulging in delicous local food! Claudia gave us great restaurant recommendations as well as tourist activities, always going out of her way to make sure we enjoyed the best of this wonderful city. We fell in love with Porto and felt so fortunate to have spent out time in this very special place. Many, many thanks to you Claudia -- you are a wonderful host!
The apartment is exactly how it looks in the pictures, the view is perfect. Claudia was very available and helped us with all our requests.

L'appartement de Claudia est exceptionnel et l'on n'imagine pas mieux pour séjourner à Porto. L'emplacement est parfait, il est à la fois près des quais, des chais et du centre historique. La vue est magnifique. Il est vaste et lumineux et la décoration est belle. Enfin Claudia nous a accueilli avec efficacité attention et beaucoup de gentillesse. Très bel endroit à ne pas manquer.
Très bon accueil. Nous étions avec nos 2 enfants, et notre séjour s'est très bien passé !

We spent 5 nights in Cláudia's apartment and really loved it. It is exactly as in the picture: new, full of light and with a perfectly furnished kitchen. The azulejos (local style tiles) are gorgeous and turned every shower into a "unique experience": you don't find a bathroom decorated so beautifully every day! The location is amazing: waking up with the view of the river was a delightful experience - although, as they say in the Marvel universe: "with great views (of the river and the bridge), comes some (Website hidden by Airbnb) took me a couple of days to get used to the metro passing by every few minutes (day and night, at week ends). Bars, restaurants and the cathedral are all very close. For a tasty and affordable breakfast, try the Casa-Museu Guerra Junqueiro, at the top of the steps. We found a small fish market a few meters away from the cathedral that sold also the best fruit at rock bottom prices (about one third of the price charged by the stores near the river). The metro station is near although the steps make it feel a bit farther than what it is. You can walk to Vila Nova de Gaia (for the Porto tasting) and to Porto town itself. Cláudia was very friendly, responsive and helpful before, during and after our staying; she came to pick us up and showed us the house, and gave us a number of informative brochures and other material. She was extremely understanding and nice when we changed our time of departure from the apartment: thank you for a great staying!

We had a wonderful 3 days at Cláudia's en Mafalda's apartment. The view on the Douro and the Bridge is phenomenal. OK, you need to do some exercising along the stairs but that comes with the charme. The apartment itself was spacious and very clean.
Cláudia and Mafalda even picked us up at the metro station nearby and walked us to the apartment. They were great and helped us with touristic things and even booked a taxi for us to get to the airport very early.
So thanks! A super experience, we will come back some day ....
Jessica & Jos

This is the best Airbnb experience we've had (over 10 in various countries, in the past 5 years). 
Cláudia and Mafalda were waiting to meet us at Se Catedral, the closest landmark. Our taxi driver took a longer route than necessary and wasn't convincing in his explanation why. Cláudia and Mafalda actually took the trouble of asking too, which was very caring of them.  From Se Catedral it's an easy walk down to the apartment, which has pedestrian access only. Whilst that may be an inconvenience for a few, it does afford you privacy, peacefulness away from traffic and stupendous views ;) The pictures do not do the room justice, the views are fantastic and stretch along the Douro. 

We had a very relaxing and enjoyable 3 nights there and loved every minute. Cláudia and Mafalda live very close by and on hand for any issues. One day we walked past a small family gathering outside and they very kindly and with great hospitality, invited us to be with them, but we had plans, so unfortunately not able to join them that time. They were so genuine and friendly, it was heartwarming.

Also Cláudia and Mafalda gave us very good dining recommendations and things to do. We really enjoyed both Taberna dos Mercadores and Jimão Tapas e Vinhos.

Would love to go back.

We had a great stay in Claudia's flat: perfect from the start, she collected us at the station and a warm welcome. The flat has a stunning view over the river and we enjoyed watching the sunrise early in the morning.
It is definitely worth the steps that takes you there!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour de quelques jours chez Claudia. La communication écrite en français et orale en espagnol ou anglais a été très fluide. Claudia et Mafalda nous ont accueillis à la station de métro pour nous conduire jusqu'au logement. Elles ont ensuite pris le temps de nous indiquer quelques endroits utiles et de nous expliquer le fonctionnement des commodités de l'appartement. La vue depuis toutes les pièces est tournée vers le Douro et le pont Dom Luis. C'est juste sublime, nuit et jour. C'est pour moi le gros point fort de l'appartement. L'appartement est très propre et tout est fonctionnel. Il y a quelques points à savoir :
- Le logement est située dans une rue qui est un escalier. le logement est au 3/4 de la hauteur (à plusieurs dizaines de mètres au dessus du Douro). Il y a donc toujours des marches à descendre pour aller vers Ribeira ou à gravir pour aller vers le centre ville.
- Le matelas du lit de la chambre est assez dur. La première nuit cela nous a surpris mais après on s'y est habitué.
- Il n'y a pas de gel douche/shampoing à disposition dans la salle de bain.
Ces points n'ont pour nous pas terni l'ensemble du séjour qui fut très agréable. Recommandé.

Claudia is an awesome host - even though our plane was delayed, she met us late into the night and made sure we felt welcomed.
The flat itself is amazing: astonishing views over Nova de Gaia, excellent decor, very clean throughout. 
All the needed things are present - dishes, utensils, hairdryer, and Claudia and Mafalda have left some snacks for us - which is very pleasant when you've just arrived from the airport!
Overall, we felt at home and really enjoyed our stay - will make sure to book again next time we're in Porto.

Loved my stay at Azulejo Porto Riverside.  It's a very scenic area, the views are great and wandering around was very pleasant.  Be prepared to climb a lot of stairs!  Claudia met me at the Sao Bento train station and brought me to the apartment, which was very helpful.  It has plenty of space and everything you need.  Highly recommended.

Amazing view of the river, great location, central to all things Porto. Claudia and Mafalda were very helpful showing us to the apartment and giving us recommendations around Porto. Would definitely stay again!

Our stay at Cláudia's place was amazing! They were so accommodating, kind and helpful for everything we needed and really made sure we were looked after. The apartment had one of the most incredible views you could imagine! It was also very clean and had beautiful Porto tiles throughout! Thank you both so much for a fantastic trip :) we'll definitely be back!
The apartment is perfect, verry clean and  located near to historical centre. The view on the river was stunning! Defenitely recommend this apartment to explore Porto.
Wohnung zentral zwischen Fluss und City, viele Treppen dorthin.

It is very nice view like profile photo!!
Although there are so many steps, it is worth it. The house is clean and cosy and also Claudia is so kind.

Quelle belle expérience ! Merci à nos hôtes Claudia et Mafalda. Un appartement ultra propre, fonctionnel et décoré sobrement. Le rêve du fait de sa situation (quartier dans la Riviera classé par l'UNESCO) et du panorama qu'il offre jour et nuit. Rien à dire  sauf que cette situation exceptionnelle se rejoint en quelques minutes ( de la  Cathédrale ou du Douro ) uniquement  par des ruelles en escaliers de pierre donc pas d'enfant en bas âge ( sauf si vous le portez), ni d'handicap physique à la  marche. Ne craignez pas le bruit du métro aérien qui passe toutes les 20 minutes sur le pont, il est plus divertissant à voir que gênant. Les goélands sont  bien plus bruyants et eux présents dans toute la ville. Cet appartement est tout simplement magique !

Everything was just perfect! From the beginning on, the communication was quick und very detailed so that we exactly know how to reach the place. Basics for breakfast and first diner was there and the view was just amazing! Again thank you for everything :)

Cláudia and Mafalda were absolutely fantastic hosts! They are very responsive with their communication and made us feel very welcome. They helped us navigate to their place and even greeted us at the metro to make sure we arrived didn't get lost on our way. The place is everything that is advertised, so no surprises. Great home with beautiful views of the river with helpful hosts to match! I would definitely stay here again.

The apartment is very special; the view; the location and the welcome from Claudia made this a wonderful time for us.  Communication with Claudia was quick, easy, efficient and very pleasant. We couldn't have asked for more!
Appartement très agréable situé en plein dans le centre historique. Vue magnifique sur Vila nova de Gaia et le pont Luis I

Claudia' apartment is lovely and in a great location.  Perfect for visiting all around Porto.  It was very clean and really well equipped if you wanted to cook but we ate out all the time as there's so many amazing restaurants within easy walking.  The view from there was amazing - couldn't have been better.  Claudia was very helpful as we missed the turn into the cathedral (it doesn't look like a road ) and she came and found us and guided us back. Thank you Claudia for a great stay.  Hope to be back.

Une vue imprenable sur la ville et le Douro. Au cœur du centre historique et néanmoins calme, cet appartement est idéal pour découvrir Porto. Proche de tous les centre d’intérêts. A choisir sans hésitation !

We agree with all the good reviews: the apartment is fresh, clean and comfortable; the atmosphere and the view are great. Claudia is a fantastic guest, kind, efficient and with a wonderful smile. We will definitely come back.

Nous recommandons chaudement cet appartement magnifique et très bien situé. Appartement très bien agencé et avec une vue superbe sur le Douro. Claudia a été d une grande aide. Et nous revenons avec quelques muscles en plus grâce aux fameux escaliers de Porto !
Highly recommend this place. I was there in busy season and even with the windows closed at night there was noise coming from the fun and festivities by the lake at night. Otherwise 10/10

眺めが大変よく､とても清潔感溢れる家でした｡駅まで迎えに来てくださり､とても親切にして頂きました｡
ﾎﾟﾙﾄでの滞在を快適に楽しく過ごすことができました｡
本当にありがとうございました!

This is a really lovely apartment. Clean and spacious and well equiped with everything you could need. bathroom and kitchen are spotless. It's in a great position just above the river and next to the Ponte Louis 1 .
There are many steps to the apartment both up and down and this caused us (in our 70's) and our visitor some problems and difficulty, although Claudia was very happy to carry our cases. So please be aware that this is not for anyone with mobility problems. It has a fabulous view and we stayed 9 days and were very well welcomed and looked after by Claudia.

Muy bien localizado y una vista excelente..
Hay que tener en cuenta el difícil acceso pues tiene muchas escaleras.

Amazing apartment with amazing view and right in the centre.  If you are fit and don't mind steps it is a perfect location.  Claudia looked after us very well and responded immediately to any queries.  We had 3 nights stay and could have had more.  There is so much to see and do in Porto.
This is an excellent place!! Lovely views, central location for Porto and Villa Nova De Gaia, clean, spacious, and comfortable!  Pack comfy shoes and enjoy!

Had a lovely 12-night stay. Everything was really nice, such a lovely apartment in a great location. Claudia met us from the station and was always attentive to any questions. Apartment was exactly as in the pictures, very clean and tidy, lovely tiling! Great view from the windows and great historic location, easy to walk to the centre or over the river to the port lodges too. Highly recommended.

The apartment is just like in the picture,really comfortable ,clean and sunny!
The view is mesmerizing as the azulejos in the toilet.
I really recommend staying here also for the amazing host who is claudia!

El viaje a Oporto fue perfecto. La casa en un sitio espectacular, con unas vistas difíciles de olvidar. La hospitalidad de Cláudia exquisita. Se preocupó en todo momento para que todo estuviese a nuestro gusto. Y a la llegada, Helena nos mostró la casa y nos recomendó miles de sitios con muchísima amabilidad. Sin duda, si vuelvo a Oporto, será al apartamento de  Cláudia.

Claudia was the perfect host! She met us at the train station and walked us back to the apartment, and gave us several tips on places to visit and restaurant recommendations. She was quick to respond and answer any of our questions, and even called a cab for my departure. We found the apartment very clean, convenient to all the attractions, and the view can’t be beat!

Yes, it's a lot of stairs. But you couldn't ask for a more romantic view, and the location is very convenient to transit and sights. Claudia made sure we had everything we needed... except for good weather, but that's out of her control. A lovely apartment in a pretty city!

Location, location, location! If you can deal with the steps this is such a great place to stay in Porto, close to everything you'll want to see and with a fabulous view over the river. Watch as the sun sets and the lights come on in Porto and Gaia, it's magical. Claudia is great, really welcoming and responsive, and the apartment is spacious, sparkling clean and very comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.
Lovely apartment, incredible view and Cláudia was very friendly!

Claudia was very helpful with us, picking up at the station and helped with everything we needed. The apartment, as you can see from the pictures, has an amazing view of the bridge. Top choice for Porto, very raccomanded

Cláudia is a wonderful host who was very responsive in communication!  The apartment has everything you need and the view is truly amazing.  It is definitely hilly getting there, she is not lying when she says the apartment isn't easily accessible if you struggle with stairs.  We loved our stay and loved Porto!

If you can walk ok and stairs don't bother you, don't even look another minute. Just book Claudia's place cause it is fantastic!

The view is 1000x better in person. Great atmosphere. Handy location, super clean and stylish, comfortable bed, coffee and tea and full kitchen. 

This place is so so good. Do you know what is better than the view... not much, but the host Claudia! She was fantastic. So friendly and make everything very easy for us.

Please book this place and you will not be disappointed.

We are just a couple of low maintenance  kiwis who had their hearts stolen by Porto.

The apartment is nice, the view is great. The apartment is well located, don't be afraid of the stairs, they are all over Porto anyway ;) We were there as two people, but it is very spacious, so it can for sure fit 4 people easily. Highly recommended!

Claudia’s apartment is the perfect place to stay and explore all that Porto has to offer (and it has much to offer!). The apartment is situated half way up the cliff from the Ribeira (read Riviera) and the city itself. But once you have traversed the 100 steps up or the 100 steps down, which we did many time over our four nights there, you are welcomed into a beautifully renovated and well equipped apartment with stunning views up, down and across the Douro river. Cláudia and Helena could not have done more for us. They waited patiently for us to arrive and led us to the apartment while helping with our suitcases. On our departure they did the reverse and also booked us a taxi to get us to the airport with the minimum of fuss. They are the sort of hosts who give Airbnb a good name! Thanks for everything.

We had a great time staying at Claudia’s. The view is fantastic, the apartment has great facilities and she had provided a cot and toys for our daughter. The stairs are a challenge with a pram but Claudia came and met us and helped us with our bags and it was great to be so central with everything on our doorstep. We had a lovely time.

Great apartment with a stunning view of the river and bridge. Access to the apartment is pretty easy, although it is after a lot of steps. However, the location and view makes it completely worth it. Claudia is very helpful and accommodating, and the apartment made our experience in Porto even better.
Vistas y ubicación espectacular aunque hay que andar y bajar unas cuantas escaleras  cuando vas o vuelves al alojamiento.
Fantastic host and location with amazing view.
The view is AMAZING. Near everything there is to see in Porto. There is also the nicest café of all 1 minute away from the apartment.

If the reason you want to go to Porto is to see Dom Luis bridge, Claudia's apartment would be the best choice. Even though 80 steps are waiting for you, you will be completely satisfied with choosing here. 

You can have the great chance to think yourself and have lovely days during the stay. I highly recommend this apartment.

Claudia’s apartment is perfectly placed to visit the sights of Porto and the beaches nearby.  She is the perfect host, even helping us with our bags from the car to the apartment, and gave us plenty of suggestions for places to go.  Porto has a great mix of history and beaches, the Livraria Lello is a must see.

We definitely went home fitter due to the steps up and down from the apartment, flat shoes are a must.
We loved the apartment, the view and the location. The apartment was very clean and nice decorated. Cláudia was an excellent host.
Amazing location and view. Claudia is super helpful and an excellent host! Highly recommend this Porto apartment gem.
Nice place with the greatest view. Some noice and lots and lots of stairs. Don’t being heavy baggage!

Super Appartement mit toller Aussicht auf den Douro und Gaia im Herzen der Altstadt.
Spitzenmäßig zur Erkundung Portos da alles fußläufig erreichbar ist.
Leider muss man sich morgens immer entscheiden ob man den Berg hinauf- (zur Stadt) oder herabsteigt (zum Douro).

Fantastic apartment. The views over the river are spectacular. The apartment is clean, comfortable and brilliantly located. Communication was very easy and Claudia met us at the metro and helped with our bags. Would highly recommend and hope to be back!

Emplacement superbe, appartement très propre, spacieux et très accessible depuis l’aéroport . La gare est également juste à côté . On rejoint très facilement les rives du Douro et tous les lieux d’intérêt touristique . A savoir toutefois, quelques escaliers raides pour bénéficier d’une vue imprenable !

Excellent accueil par Claudia qui est venue nous chercher au métro et nous a accompagnée a la location. L'appartement est comme décrit, très propre, fonctionnel et spacieux. La literie est top et les petites attentions nombreuses. Le point fort est bien sur la vue exceptionnelle !!! Nous avons aussi bcp aimé la localisation centrale pour se balader et revenir se reposer a mi journée (bébé et moi enceinte). Mais les marches sont bien là, il faut un peu de souffle. Cependant, on ne regrette pas nos efforts.
We enjoyed the view of the house and the host was so nice. The stairs are tough, but there is a view of value.

A stylish contemporary, apartment in a fantastic central location with a great view! Not the easiest to access with heavy suitcases but the same is true for many other places in Porto. Very clean, uncluttered and lots of space.

Cláudia was a very communicative, helpful and accommodating host -lovely. 

I would definitely stay there again in the future. Recommended.

정말 친절하시고 너무 좋았어요. 에어비앤비로 머물면서 머무는 내내 호스트 분이 신경 많이 써주는 구나 라고 느낀건 이번이 처음이었던 것 같아요! 
집도 깨끗했고 아늑했어요. 계단이 좀 있어서 캐리어 들고 올라갈 때 좀 힘들기는 했지만 숙소에서 보이는 경치가 너무 좋아서 만족했습니다! 정말 강력 추천합니다!

name: Your own private big Brooklyn apt!
summary: A very spacious, gorgeous, comfy Clinton Hill abode. Conveniently a few blocks away from the C/G subway train, only 15 mins to Manhattan/Soho on the C. The neighborhood is filled w amazing restaurants, bars and cafes. A nice short walk to Fort Greene Park, and BAM.
space: Live like a true Brooklynite in a lovely neighborhood, one of the best areas in Brooklyn in this wonderful Clinton Hill authentic apartment. If you're looking for something homey, with good energy and peaceful this is the place! This apt is a very spacious, sunny, comfy space in a small quiet pre war building. It's Conveniently a few blocks away from the C/G trains, 15 mins to downtown Manhattan on the C 25 mins to SOHO and Meatpacking District. The neighborhood is filled with amazing restaurants, bars and cafes. A nice 15 min walk to Fort Greene Park, BAM and the Brooklyn Flea.  A bright , quiet, eclectic and gorgeous space on a peaceful block and building. Super comfortable, queen sized bed. Lots of light. Wifi. Breakfast nook for two. Nespresso coffee, a chrome cast ready TV setup for streaming Netflix, Hulu, HBO Go and Youtube, lots and lots of Books, Art, record player, records, big tub, and just an all around wonderful place to be in.  LGBTQ welcome.
description: A very spacious, gorgeous, comfy Clinton Hill abode. Conveniently a few blocks away from the C/G subway train, only 15 mins to Manhattan/Soho on the C. The neighborhood is filled w amazing restaurants, bars and cafes. A nice short walk to Fort Greene Park, and BAM. Live like a true Brooklynite in a lovely neighborhood, one of the best areas in Brooklyn in this wonderful Clinton Hill authentic apartment. If you're looking for something homey, with good energy and peaceful this is the place! This apt is a very spacious, sunny, comfy space in a small quiet pre war building. It's Conveniently a few blocks away from the C/G trains, 15 mins to downtown Manhattan on the C 25 mins to SOHO and Meatpacking District. The neighborhood is filled with amazing restaurants, bars and cafes. A nice 15 min walk to Fort Greene Park, BAM and the Brooklyn Flea.  A bright , quiet, eclectic and gorgeous space on a peaceful block and building. Super comfortable, queen sized bed. Lots of light. Wifi. Breakfast
neighborhood_overview: This apt was made with a lot of Love and has lots of Love in it. Clinton Hill is also one of the best neighborhoods around not only in Brooklyn but in all of New York City. This is a special and wonderful area.  Historic and beautiful. Clinton Hill is a landmark area with original brownstones and pre war buildings and the loveliest of people. Dotted with numerous great restaurants and cafés. Lots of Bars, gardens, beautiful tree lined and brownstone streets to explore and walk around in. Awesome brunch spots, locally sourced food markets, a coop and excellent zagat rated restaurants steps away. Quiet, very safe and friendly neighborhood. C train is blocks away, a really great and convenient line, ideal for all locations and hopping around in the city. Welcome!
notes: This is an original apt in a true pre-war Brooklyn building they don't make them like this anymore unfortunately so you'll have real beautiful hardwood floors and high ceilings with original details and solid walls with lots of light and space, these kinds of places can and do come with some light wear and tear of course but that's what gives it its charm, so if you're looking for a cookie cutter brand spanking new squeaky clean condo like space this is not the place for you :)
transit: C train. Franklin stop.  G train. Classon stop.  Buses B52 B38 The C stops at Fulton near Wall st, Chambers, West 4th, West Village, SOHO, Meatpacking District, Chelsea, Penn Station, 42nd st Times Sq, Columbus Circle and Lincoln Center, Upper West Side Natural Museum of History. And transfers to all East side trains are at every stop almost and very convenient to connect to.  The light green G train on Classon is perfect for exploring L.I.C Queens, Williamsburg, Park Slope, Prospect Park, Fort Greene, Gowanus, Cobble Hill and all things Brooklyn and LIC :) It helps to have the seamless App on your phone if you want to order any kind of food in the area, LOTS OF OPTIONS!  -Favorite places around the neighborhood Restaurants  Locanda Vini e Olii  129 Gates Av Amazing super cozy zagat rated authentic Italian in an old drug store. Literally down the street make a right out of the building and walk a few blocks on Gates.  Speedy Romeo  376 Classon Av Great pizzas, brunch and salads. Drinks
access: Entire home
interaction: I'll usually be around to make sure you settle in nicely and greet you :) if not I have simple instructions for a lockbox with keys in the building for self check in.
house_rules: Just leave it as tidy as you can when you check out, respect everything around and please return items to their places if removed or changed. Personal storage closets are of course off limits so thank you for respecting that :) This is a non smoking apartment. Thank you kindly!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: A world traveling, globe trotting New Yorker. I enjoy hosting and sharing my apt while I'm away and making my guests feel comfortable and happy :)

reviews.comments: Ala was wonderful. Apartment in great location. She was extremely patient and a great communicator. Would definitely stay where again
Absolutely loved staying in this awesome Brooklyn apartment!! Great Bedstuy neighborhood and the place was super cute and comfy :) not a single complaint, Ala was very sweet and helpful as well.

very nice stay for one week§i can fully recommend this appartment for your stay in (Website hidden by Airbnb) at home ,no problem and a very good place .
Assia was really cool ,helpfull ,very friendly ..
Ala was a fantastic communicator and host. It was all great! Her apartment was so nice, big and bright. We lacked for nothing.

Ala was a great host and communicator. The apartment was realy very nice and clean. It was a fantastic atmosphere in the apartment. Ala gave us a list with shops and coffes. We have ever Wifi. Whend we visit NY too we will book again by Ala. We recommend it very. We lacked for nothing. Thank
You Ala and best greeting
Ala is communicative, the place was great and I recommend it for your stay in Brooklyn! Perfect (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Ala's apartment is a cosy place and a perfect retreat after exhausting days of sightseeing in NY. The flat is spacious, light, clean and lovely furnished with a lot of sense for details; right as you can see it in the pictures. It is located between 2 metro routes with easy access to other parts of Brooklyn, Williamsburg and Manhattan.
Ala was a great host, very helpful and accomodating. She provided us with a lot of information and made our first airbnb experience a very good one!  Thanks for all, Ala!

Ala's place was just perfect. It is clean, decorated in awesome fashion and quite comfortable. I really liked the location too - tons to eat and drink nearby but the subway lines are quite close too. Ala was super welcoming, really quick with communication and helped with any questions while I was there. I would definitely stay here again.
Apartment looked just like the photos, and Ala gave great restaurant recommendations.

Ala is an amazing host with a beautiful smile. The appartment is very clean and comfortable. The C line is a 5 min walk ( to get to Manhattan) and the G line is a few blocks ( to get to Williamsburg). I will come back again for suuuuure!!

The apartment was perfect, charming and very convenient. Aissa was very helpful and flexible in being in touch and giving me the keys.

I really like the neighborhood and I'd recommend this place to my friends!

Assia was a perfect host, and her Brooklyn apartment could not have been in a better location. It was quaint and had all the necessities to make you feel right at home. She responded immediately to our questions via text, and provided us with suggestions when asked. We arrived fairly late from JFK, and she was patient and more than happy to wait for us to arrive. Upon meeting her, she provided us with a list of bars, restaurants, and coffee shops. The neighborhood was safe, and we had no problem walking the neighborhood even at two in the morning.  Above all, she was unbelievably accommodating. She let us check-out late so we didn't have to carry our bags around with us during our last day in town. We cannot thank her enough, and we would without a doubt stay with her again in the future.

Everything was great.  Easy to communicate with Ala, quick response time, generous with her place, the apartment was big and comfortable, altogether a lucky find for us since it was less than 5 minutes walk from our daughter's apartment in Brooklyn which was the most important thing for us.
Felt like home away from home! Great place.

Ala's apartment is very large, spacious, clean and inviting, with an extremely comfortable bed. Two subway stations are near and the neighbourhood's great. The kitchen is useful, and the wifi strong / worked with no problem. Happy Holidays, Ala-

Awesome host! Ala made everything comfortable. Her apartment is very nice and comfortable. Great area in Brooklyn. 
I'd definitely recommend her place.
Ala was very attentive and helpful.
We spent a very good stay in this apartment ! Very spacious, well located : 30 minutes from Manhattan. And Ala is very nice !

She was very sweet and even made a list of restaurants, bars and subway stops in the area.  The neighborhood was nice and quiet and the apartment was a good size for the two of us.  She was very flexible when it came to picking up and dropping off the keys.  Overall a great hostess!
I had an employee coming from out of town to work for a couple weeks and Ala was very helpful and responsive!

Ala's apartment was very clean and a nice place to stay for a long weekend.  She was a good communicator and met us to give us the keys and a quick overview of the (Website hidden by Airbnb) neighborhood was unique, like every Brooklyn neighborhood.  Her list of "go to" places was helpful and we enjoyed walking around the area and seeing all the historic brownstones and old commercial buildings.

Ala was a great host! She was there to greet us and give us the key and show us around her apartment. Her apartment was perfect - close to C train that took us right into Manhattan and it was comfortable, quiet, and a home away from home. She left us with some local recommendations which were all wonderful. We had a great time and I'd definitely recommend staying here. :)

Ala is very friendly and outgoing. She was willing to let me check-in early which helped with my schedule. Ala gave me a quick tour of the apartment and showed me how things worked. She also provided a list of nearby cafes, restaurants, bars, etc. and I did visit a few of them.

The apartment was as described. Charming and nicely decorated with good books, photos, old cameras, a table in the kitchen for morning coffee, even a record player and albums. The large bed was very comfortable and I slept well - which doesn't always happen when I travel.

Most of my time was spent away visiting family. I enjoyed having my own space to come back to at night. This is a quiet building, with a handy old-style elevator, in a safe neighborhood. I had a great time staying at Ala's and look forward to staying there again when I return to NYC.

My experience with Ala was the best there can be! She swiftly responded all my questions and communication was clear, she was flexible with checking in and made us feel very welcome :) The flat was beautifully decorated and clean and extra spacious, the vinyl player was a definite plus. Would stay again. Thank you for the lovely stay and exciting experiences on your future travels.

Byfar the best apartment I've ever stayed in. So comfortable. After the first day I forgot that it wasn't my actual house. If you're a hipster, this is your spot. And I mean that in a good way. This is a hipsters dream!

I booked this apartment for my Mom when she was visiting. She loved staying at Ala's... The apartment is very clean and cozy, exactly like in the pictures. Nice neighbourhood. Ala was responding to everything very quickly. I'm glad I found this place, will book it again and I highly recommend it.

Lovely clean apartment with comfortable bed in safe neighbourhood.There are good
 transport links nearby making it perfect for exploring Manhattan and Brooklyn.
Ala always responded quickly to any queries, and her recommendations list was invaluable - there are lots of good food places in the area.

A great place to stay!
Best place to stay in Brooklyn!

Ala was a lovely host. She was quick to respond to all inquiries and very easy to work with. She shared tips of places we might like to go and checked on how we were doing. The apartment was nicely decorated, tidy and comfortable, located in a safe residential area, and convenient to the subway. Despite the weather being hot, the air conditioner kept the bedroom cool. We enjoyed staying there.

I think I made the best choice staying at Ala's place.
The area was very nice. I sometimes went out for breakfast to nearby cafes.
The decorations and furnitures at her place are cute too.
She was so welcoming when I arrived even though there were subway delays and made sure I'm doing ok during my stay.
Going back to JFK by subway was easy too!
Thank you thank you so much, Ala:)

Logement agréable dans un quartier moins connu de Brooklyn. Le métro est tout prés et la ligne C va directement à Manhattan.
Ala nous a fait faire le tour de l'appartement à notre arrivée, ce fut très rapide.
Avec la vague caniculaire, on a apprécié la clim dans la chambre.
A la moindre question, avant ou pendant le séjour, Ala répond toujours très rapidement, elle est vraiment disponible pour nous.
La salle de bain aurait mérité un nettoyage un peu plus poussé.
Pour le reste, que du positif !
Listing description accurate and great neighborhood....perfect location!

Ein tolles Appartment, sauber und mit ausreichend Platz!
Ala hat mich herzlich willkommen geheißen und mir viele Infos mit an die Hand gegeben. 
Check-In und Check-Out völlig problemlos. Auch die Kommunikation im Voraus war immer schnell und alle Fragen wurden beantwortet.
Bei meiner Ankunft war ich verunsichert was das Viertel angeht, ob ich mich als allein Reisende auch Abends problemlos dort bewegen kann. Diese Sorge stellt sich als unbegründed raus, ich habe die 2 Tage sehr genossen und konnte zu jeder Zeit alles mit einem sicheren Gefühl erkunden. 
Eine Wohngegend deren Charme es sich zu entdecken lohnt!
Ali was a fantastic host - so responsive and very efficient. The apartment was perfect and we would absolutely stay there again. Thanks so much!

This is a truly great appartment! - very lovely furnished and decorated, comfortable in size, kitchen well equipped, nice and safe neighborhood. Two subway stations near by that will take you everywhere.
Ala was very welcoming and gave us a lot of good tips for Restaurants, Bars and Markets in the "Clinton Hill" neighborhood. Sorry again for the four-hour-delay on our flight! We so much appreciated that you were so patient and kind!
We would definitely book the appartment again and we highly recommend it!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement d'Ala. Il est situé dans un quartier résidentiel de Brooklyn, très proche du métro (ligne C), très pratique pour aller à Manhattan. 
L'appartement est très agréable, meublé avec goût et très typique. 
Ala avait tout préparé pour que notre séjour se déroule sans encombre.
Bref, je recommande sans hésitation.

Ala was very nice and welcoming. The place was as described. Hot water was a little iffy, otherwise the apartment was bright, clean, spacious and cool character. The neighborhood was great. We found a cafe, pizzeria, and bar all within a couple of blocks that we loved.

Nice, cozy old apartment with lots of natural light and warm hardwood floors.  Comfortable bed (and couch!), a great selection of really good books, old records and a turntable, and middle eastern touches throughout make this wonderfully eclectic apartment a great place to stay.  It's in a safe building in an equally safe neighborhood, with an easy walk to the subway in almost any direction.  Ala was especially kind and flexible with our check-in time when our original plans changed.  We will definitely rent this apartment again if we ever again spend extended time in Brooklyn.  This was a win-win.

We stayed for a week in Ala's apartment and it was wonderful.  The apartment is very homely and has everything you need.  It really is beautiful. The neighbourhood was lovely, we very close to the metro, which is only a few stops to other great neighbourhoods as well as only around 25 minutes to Manhattan.  Clinton Hill has lots of great bars and restaurants near the apartment and Ala left us a list of recommendations on our arrival.
Getting the key from Ala when we arrived was very straight forward and she was very helpful and got straight back to me with any questions I had throughout the stay.
I thoroughly recommend this apartment.  We will definitely be back asap.

Lovely apartment, very spacious and convenient for Manhattan and close to an excellent donut shop. What more could you ask for! Ala was a great host and stayed up quite late to meet us from our flight.

I can't recommend this place highly enough. Ala's beautiful apartment was the perfect base in Brooklyn and Ala was a fabulous host, responding quickly to queries and questions we had during our stay. The apartment itself is incredible, full of charm and personality - so much better than a hotel as it makes you feel like you're living the New York life. My only regret is that we couldn't stay longer and just spend some time relaxing in this beautiful space. Thanks so much!

My girlfriend and I stayed at Ala's for 1 month during the winter break and we got so attached to it that leaving it was heartbreaking.
The apartment is spacious, well-furnished, and rich of character. Books are plenty. The projector and the turntable are big pluses. In the early morning and late afternoon, the sunlight floods the apartment beautifully. The fire escape sitting spot is lovely.
The location is a gem. C n G lines are nearby. Laundromat is opposite. Grocery stores are nearby. Peaceful building and neighborhood. Many restaurants around, especially C'mon Everybody on Franklin which is an amazing little place for live indie music.
We miss this place.
J&L
Really comfortable space and great location to both spend time in Brooklyn and ride the subway into the city! Ala provided plenty of info upon booking and made the process super easy.
very welcome - very friendly and helpful

The room is spacious and sunny. Lots of books, records and radio make us feel like staying at home. Grocery store, laundry, cafes, restaurants, wine shops are all within a couple of blocks. It was convenient to enjoy Brooklyn and Manhattan. Ala is very friendly and always respond very quickly.

Conveniently placed within walking distance from both the C-line to Manhattan and G-line to Williamsburg, Ala's apartment is spacious and charming. Light flows the entire apartment, and there is plenty of storage space for your luggage. The neighborhood is quiet and friendly and there are a few really interesting restaurants nearby - you should really check out Black Swan on Bedford Avenue. 

We would definitely stay at Ala´s place again!

Ala was very welcoming and helpful throughout our stay. The apartment was great and situated in an ideal location in Brooklyn. We  loved exploring the local area and the subway to Manhattan was really easy.  We had to carry our bags around on the last day as we couldn't find anywhere nearby to store them. So my advice would be to bear this in mind when booking flights (which Ala does mention on her page but we clearly didn't pay enough notice of!).  x

This apartment is really lovely and comfortable. It gets light just about all day. Ala was very helpful at check-in. There are two nearby subway stops and a bus stop right in front of the building. We stayed a week and would certainly recommend it to anyone.
