We much enjoyed our stay in Ala's spacious light-filled apartment, so conveniently located for buses and subways, and our feet much appreciated an elevator ride at the end of the many miles we walked every day! 
We slept well in the very comfortable bed and appreciated the relative calm of Gates Avenue. 
We'll definitely contact Ala again on our next trip to Brooklyn. 
LB Ducrey
Ala was a gracious and accommodating host. Her apartment is spacious and comfortable. We enjoyed our three-week stay!

My experience was fantastic. The apartment is a great location near to C and G trains so getting around the city was a breeze. The kitchen is fully stocked and perfect for intimate meals with friends and family. Ala was very responsive and helpful with all of my needs. I highly recccomend this apartment.

My boyfriend and I spend 10 amazing days at New York and at Alas apartment. It is well located between stations of the C-Train to Manhattan and the G-Train to Queens via Williamsburg. Even differente supermarkets, bars, cafés and restaurants are near by. Alas apartment itself is clean and full equipped with kitchenware, towels, two aircons and everything else you need like a flatiron. Even we didn't met Ala personal our contact was very uncomplicated. She left some useful tips for us at the kitchen table and was every time reachable.

Ala made us feel very welcome.  He gave us good information about finding his home and ensured we had arrived safely.  He is very warm and friendly.  We enjoyed "the Brooklyn experience" - it is a fun neighborhood, with fun restaurants with fabulous food.  It is a very comfortable place to stay and we felt like we came home at the end of each day.

Ala's apartment is located in a very nice neighborhood with lots of nice spots around and very close to the metro. The place was spacious and luminous, as described. The tips and recommendations are great.

Ala is an amazing host and her flat is really lovely and well located. Even if I never had the chance to meet Ala, it was really easy to communicate with her and she fixed all the issues I could have during my stay. I definitely recommend this air bnb home :) Thank you again Ala !

Ala was fantastic with communication from start to end, very easy to deal with and went out of her way to accommodate our needs (let us check out later even though she had other guests arriving) The apartment is cosy and roomy all whilst being in a very central location (buses and subway easily accessible) with everything one could need being a stones throw away. We were fortunate enough to explore some of the suggestions Ala left - cafes, bars, restaurants, and were very impressed. A humble abode in a quiet and safe neighbourhood. I would definitely consider staying here again should I ever be in New York again - thanks Ala!

Everything about my stay in Ala's apartment was a lovely experience. Her apartment has tons of charm and character, as does the building itself and the neighborhood it is located within. I felt so comfortable and at home in the space that it was difficult to make myself leave the apartment to explore the borough. The apartment is very warm and cozy, and both the bed and the couch are very comfortable. The location of the apartment is very convenient to the subway, and also centrally located within easy walking distance of many excellent neighborhoods. The most enjoyable part of my trip though was spending time in this beautiful apartment, reading a few of the many wonderful books in Ala's collection, and listening to her amazing record collection. She was a very pleasant and inviting host, and was there to meet me when I arrived at the apartment. She was kind enough to allow me a late checkout, and left behind plenty of soft towels and yummy espresso. I would highly recommend this space, and feel very thankful that I was able to spend my Thanksgiving holiday here.
Highly recommending this spacious apartment with everything you need in a great location.

Ala was very communicative with us about everything and responded to questions immediately. We loved the space, it was perfect for us. Loved the nespresso machine! We enjoyed using the kitchen and visiting with my son and his girlfriend in the apartment.  It is very conveniently located, easy to get to the city and other parts of Brooklyn. Lots of lovely places to eat wonderful food. 60th birthday celebration was a great success!  We can't wait to come back and hope we can do so soon. Thank you Ala!

Fantastic host great Apartment,
Loved staying here and will stay here again. Clean cool and perfectly located. I highly recommend Ala and her place:)
Loved my stay at Ala's apartment. Ala was incredibly responsive and very helpful. Everything was perfect!
Great space in a cool old building, Ala's communication was excellent. Really enjoyed my stay :)
Nice and cosy appartment  in a friendly neighbourhood. We were feeling at home
Nice place and Ala was really helpful

We had a fantastic stay at Ala's place and it was everything we were after. Great location, very spacious, private, homely and cool. Close to public transport, subway and bus and lovely neighbourhood. Would definitely stay here again.
Amazing host and lovely apartment! Great location near to the train station. Great communication and would highly recommend!

Ala's place is in a great location in Brooklyn, very close to the C line for transit to Manhattan and very close to some friendly neighbourhood bars and restaurants. Ala was always available for questions and made every effort to ensure I had a great stay. An amazing holiday!

This was a very cute apartment, I was very pleased when we first arrived and the first night that we stayed there. The hot and cold water was a little sketchy and it was a little dusty  but could overlook these as "quirks" or "charm" of an old apartment. On our 4th night out of 6 nights the only A/C unit, which is in the bedroom stopped working. Thankfully, there was a fan, but that was not enough to keep an apartment even slightly cool in July, basically just blew the warm air around. When I communicated this issue to the host that morning, she quickly responded, but we were questioned about how we were using it when we hadn't even touched it and told it "just needed a break" (even though that's not how air conditioning works...) we gave it a chance and kept it off during that day and it of course didn't work and when I told the host it didn't work she responded that she would have someone look at it after our stay. Therefore, we had two more nights of a very hot apartment and uncomfortable sleeping. Location was also a little far from a lot of the attractions of NYC, it is close to the subway but was quite a few stops from a lot of places. Overall, ok but wouldn't stay there again.

Our stay at Ala's apartment has been fantastic. Her place is very spacious and Brooklyn style. It was very nice having breakfast every morning in such a New Yorker corner in the kitchen close to the window. The apartment is very well located in a nice neighborhood and very well connected. Ala is a great host, very kind and responsive, she was very helpful not only about her apartment but also providing advise and information about the city. We definitley recommend her place.
Room was so clean and Sunshine cames in nicely. easy-access to c-train and g-train subway station. Ala gave us lots of information about nice places around.

Absolutely lovely, with amazing decor. Apartment set in a Brooklyn neighbourhood. Very accessible to public transport and some nice cafes/restaurants around the area. Very good value and good location for a break in New York.

Ala's place is pretty fantastic. A spacious 2 Room appartment close to everything one needs. Metro station is about 10 min away and most stuff in Manhattan is only 20-30min away. I can highly recommand the appartment. 
Ala is a good Host. Very responsive and gives you a lot of support & tipps.

We enjoyed the stay at Ala’s flat. It was very easy to arrive and leave and Also very easy to communicate with Ala. The flat is located 8 minutes from the subway and the line is going to Manhattan and the airport JFK so very convenient. Thank you.

A very, very beautiful apartment in an older style building. Ala has obviously put a lot of thought and care into decorating and furnishing her space and it really shows. It was really hot in Brooklyn while we were there, so the air conditioner definitely came in handy! Ala was really easy to communicate with and we would definitely stay here again. All in all, a lovely experience.
Very cool pad
Ala's apartment was spacious and homely situated close to some cafes and bars, communicating with Ala and check-in was easy.

We had a great time in this beautiful apartment. Ala was very helpful and gave us big support and a lot of tips. The appartment had everything we needed and was well connected to local transport. Thank you Ala, we will come back.

It was a tad tired, but this is as described. Ala addressed our issues promptly (the internet went down and the place could have been cleaner) and we therefore felt we were always being looked after. Great restaurant suggestions. We were further away from our friends, but interesting to see another neighborhood.

It was great to stay in Alas cozy place! The Check-in was pretty easy and she really cared about us and left us some nice tips for Restaurants and Bars in the neighborhood. Thanks you for a great week!
Très bel appartement lumineux, bien situé dans Brooklyn, à moins de 10 minutes à pied d'un métro qui nous amène directement à Manhattan.

Ala's flat was great in a really nice part of Brooklyn with some cool bars, cafes, and restaurants near by. It was much bigger than I expected which was a pleasant surprise. 

Also, the flat was beautifully decorated that made me and girlfriend feel right at home from the second we entered. It was also spacious, warm, and homely and was near some well connected subway stations which made it a perfect base to explore the neighbourhood and the rest of New York too.

Ala was also very accommodating and responsive throughout our stay which helped put us at ease and relax from the get go. I couldn't recommend this flat, or Ala, more!

We enjoyed this neighborhood in Brooklyn.  It was conveniently located to the subway and there are great places to eat nearby.  The ease of access to the apartment, street parking and communication with Ala was excellent.  We hope to stay here again!

My husband and I loved staying in Ala's Brooklyn apartment! The apartment was so spacious and has a cool and unique character. The neighborhood was quiet, and the location is convenient to the G & C trains into Manhattan. Also there are several good eateries and good grocery places within walking distance. Ala left a list of helpful recommendations which was great! We would definitely recommend this for people visiting the area, and would love to stay again!

Ala is a very kind and friendly host who has arranged everything perfectly in the apartment to make your stay pleasant and comfortable. The apartment is beautifully arranged with a nice personal touch and is situated in a great and centrally located neighbourhood in Brooklyn. Reaching Manhattan with the subway was extremely easy and quick.

Conveniently located to subway and some cozy neighborhood spots. Recommendations for food nearby were excellent. Apartment had an old NY charm and is not updated but has the basics if you’re a low maintenance traveler and need a warm place to stay with a shower and Wifi. Ala was very helpful and responsive with any needs.

Ala’s place is amazing! Beautiful pre-war building in excellent location - a quick walk to the G (takes you across Brooklyn) and to the A and C (takes you into the city). Dough doughnuts and luigi’s Pizza are both nearby. Because it’s an old apartment there are some quirks, but we enjoyed these, for the most part! The one thing I’d mention is that light sleepers will need a white noise app - the apartment has thin walls and noisy heating. Totally manageable, however! thanks so much for everything, ala!
Ala has a beautiful apartment in Brooklyn that I wouldn't hesitate coming back to. She was fantastic at communicating, and made our trip so easy. Thanks again Ala!

Ala's place in Brooklyn is a great value for the amount of space and the location. She's also extremely communicative and was very helpful navigating the check-in procedure. Would definitely recommend to other travelers!
Great location, great vibe.
Very easy check in and great communication from Ala. Location just perfect and a short walk to the C line up to Manhattan. Would certainly go back on my next trip!

Alas Wohnung ist wirklich ein kleiner Vintage Traum, man fühlt sich sofort wohl. Ich habe ala zwar selber nicht getroffen, aber sie hat sich sehr darum gekümmert, dass ich gut ankomme und weiß wo der Schlüssel etc ist. Bei der Gegend selbst hatte ich zuerst Bedenken als Frau abends allein unterwegs zu sein, das war aber unbegründet, ich hatte nur positive Begegnungen mit den Leuten aus der Nachbarschaft :)

Perfect, tastefully appointed apartment in a gorgeous neighbourhood in Brooklyn. Within easy reach of two subway lines, and very easy access to JFK airport. Perfect for exploring Brooklyn or Manhattan. We would stay again and again and again.
It really felt like having our own apartment in Brooklyn! So lovely and well appointed. The most gracious host!

We loved the vintage look to Ala's apartment. It oozed trend! Easy transport from airport and close to bars and cafes in her local area. We loved Brooklyn and Williamsburg which is close by. Loom forward to returning!

We enjoyed our stay very much. It was a great location to really experience NYC as a whole. We were warm, comfortable, and had everything we needed in the home. Ala's tips for local bars, restaurants, and places to visit were great. Her place has great style with lots of interesting art, books, and records. We would definitely recommend her place to friends and would stay here again when we visit NYC!

Die Lage ist okay, nur 5min zur Metro, dann muss man allerdings ca eine halbe Stunde bis nach Manhattan einplanen. Die Wohnung ist schön eingerichtet, könnte aber sauberer sein. Die Kommunikation mit Ala hat super und verlässlich funktioniert.

Ala's place is centrally located to many Brooklyn bars and cafe's. It's a short walk to the subway station which makes getting anywhere in NYC, including the airport, a breeze. I would absolutely book this place again. Thank you, Ala!
Beautiful and charming and spacious. The kitchen is not up to par - dont expect to cook much there - but the rest of the apartment works allright, esp for a shorter visit.

Ala’s apartment was the perfect place to call home during our time in New York. 

It’s really close to the C subway line making trips to Manhattan easy.  

The apartment was beautiful and Ala responded quickly to any questions we had.

We’d love to stay here again if we’re ever back.
The host canceled this reservation 242 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Had a wonderful stay here. Elevator was a bit stinky but the place itself was very charming. Would stay here again!

Great space, super stylish and in a quiet location but also an easy walk to funky bars, good coffee, shops and the subway. 
We really felt like we were at home and had everything we needed for or stay. 
Would stay again.
Good subway access. Some really good restaurants near by

I had a wonderful stay at Ala's flat. It's one of the most well decorated airbnb I have stayed in. I think the building is rather old but everything worked fine, and the wooden floors and noisy radiators contribute to the charm of this Brooklyn flat.
 
The neighborhood was really nice, I had not been there before but would definitely come back. Ala was super kind and answered really fast. The self check-in was really easy.

The only negative points I could think of was that it is really noisy and hot. It didn't really bother me as I love NY street sounds and as I am cold all the time. 

Would definitely stay there again.

If you want to pretend like you actually live in Brooklyn, this is definitely the apartment for you! Very cool space, lots of vintage treasures and the hardwood floor of your dreams. It is a little noisy at times but you soon get used to it. Check-in was super easy and Ala was super helpful.
Nice charming apartment in Brooklyn with access to 2 metro lines. It was a good plan to start discovering NY for us.

Alas Wohnung ist in einem sehr authentischen alten Stadthaus im 4. Stock gelegen. Die Einrichtung ist stimmungsvoll - vintage pur! Besonders angenehm ist die Lage innerhalb Brooklyns und die Frühstückslokale in der Umgebung. Ala selbst kommuniziert sehr schnell und zuverlässig - ist jedoch selbst nicht vor Ort. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen!

Un lugar interesante, de tipo residencial y con buenos accesos a la red de metro. Muy buena relación precio/servicio.  No dejen de ir al Museo de Brooklyn y la zona del parque aledaña, que se sale del clásico trayecto hacia Manhattan.
Ala place is a lovely place to base yourself for an adventure. The apartment is really spacious and close to transport links.
Ala's place was easy to get to, clean and well taken care of, and the perfect jumping pad for all of our Brooklyn and New York travels. Would definitely stay again!

Apartment exactly as posted a great space with everything you need. Communication was quick from host self check in was easy. Loved the vintage decor and set up of apartment. Was great to have lots of space to relax in after a busy day of sightseeing.
Nettes Appartement mit individueller Einrichtung und altmodischem Charme.

Ala's place was amazing - thoroughly enjoyed my weeklong stay! Super spacious, felt like home. Very clean, safe area and has elevator as a nice luxury! Walking distance to multiple subways and buses plus bodegas & restaurants. Would definitely book again on my next trip to NY. Can't recommend enough!
Ala's place is great, close to lots of cool cafes, bars, restaurants and public transport. Apartment has everything you could need. Would certainly recommend

Classic Brooklyn street. Easy parking. Short walk to subway station. The charm and vibe in this apartment is so "real" the place makes you feel like you travelled back in time to a gentler time...how NYC used to be. Sitting by the window in the kitchen with the wind gently blowing the curtain, phenomenal. Ala's Moroccan/Boho décor plus her subtle accent touches truly make the apartment a gem. I don't know when I will be back in New York City, but I definitely know where I would like to stay. Thanks again Ala.

Ala’s place is a charming old Brooklyn apartment. It’s very spacious and the location is convenient. Ala is a nice host, she was responding fast to all our messages and the check in was easy too! 

Although the place is nice, cleanliness of the apartment wasn’t so nice. After we checked in we noticed some things around the apartment wasn’t cleaned properly (mainly bathroom, toilet, kitchen). We did some additional cleaning ourselves although Ala offered to send another cleaner after we reached out to her. 

At the end we had a good stay here, we just expected a lot better cleanliness for the price we paid for here.

The apartment is in a area very pleasant: and it is cosy and comfortable 
A different way of leaving New York 
I recommended it

Lovely, apartment with lots of personality and great energy. Classic details and spacious (for 1-2 travelers). Elevator building close to the train and numerous cool destinations around Brooklyn. Would be happy to stay again in the future!

Ala’s place was really adorable and in a great part of Brooklyn. Close to two train lines and several cafes, restaurants, and bars. Ala was super communicative and because the keys were in a lock box checking in and out was really easy. The apartment was kind of hot but that can be expected in New York City in August. There was ac in the bedroom so you can sleep easy. Overall pleasant stay.
Bon séjour. L'appartement est très bien placé pour visiter New York et Brooklyn. L'appartement correspond à la description.
Wonderful place to stay, fun neighborhood, clean, great apartment

Spacious Retro Moroccan/Turkish decor old non-refurbished accommodation. very basic air con in one room only.  Basic shower. Close to shops, restaurants and trains. Hard to find things around the flat. Bed is small and very creaky.  Bring your own Nespresso caps.  Easy to pick up and drop off keys.  Ala was responsive once she was back from being away.
Great neighborhood! Place was as advertised.
A very cozy appartement with nice personal touches / styles which I liked a lot. Nespresso coffee pods has been offered, very appreciated. Great and friendly communication. Highly recommend
Great spot! Ala was easy to get in touch with :)

Nice and lovely host. 
Apartment was perfect to visit Brooklyn and Manhattan (25 min with the subway to central Manhattan).

Funky and homey place is an affordable location in an otherwise increasingly pricey zone. Don't expect luxury or goofy modernist touches, but nice touches that appeal to filmmakers and artists. Easy walk to subway line which shoots right into Manhattan, plenty of nice local spots within walking distance (and not horribly gentrified yet).

The apartment was great.  It lived up to expectations of the posted description. The apartment was definitely vintage with hard wood floors, tile in the bathroom and older furniture. I was questioning the bed when we first used it, but it turned out to be OK. The shower is a little tricky, but just make sure to run the hot water for a bit and get in before adjusting the cold very slowly.  30 min ride to Manhattan. Handful of blocks from two different trains.  Overall, great home base for the week!
Nice large apartment in Clinton Hill. Subways are very close by as well as several cute bars, coffee shops and restaurants. Ala communicates very well. I'd definitely stay here again.

The space is exactly as described and served as a great home base for our work/leisure split trip. My friend and I both had business conference calls and emails to handle the first half of the day and there was plenty of room & privacy for us to do so without getting in each other’s way. The list of recommendations was super helpful and we definitely appreciated the guidance. The space was a great temperature throughout our stay even though it was about 30 degrees outside during our stay. Loved using the Nespresso every day to avoid the trek to Starbucks as well.

Ala's place is cozy, comfortable, and conveniently located (there are tons of great spots around, including Dough, Black Swan, Speedy Romeo, and more). Check in was super easy, and Ala was extremely quick to respond to communication. Would recommend!

- great location,  just 8 min on foot to metro (any of 2 branches). You can get to Manhattan in around 15 min.
- cozy apartments in style of 60-70th,  just like in old movie. You want to feel the real NY - this is where you can get it, not in modern glass and steel.

Ala’s apartment is spacious and comfortable. It’s decorated in a shabby chic meets Morroco sort of way that made us feel right at home. The location is great - an easy walk to the subway and fast access to Manhattan. Ala was easy and fast with communication. A great place to stay!

Ala's place is a charming and warm Maghrebi/Mughlai decored launchpad to the Bed-Stuy neighborhood.  She has wonderful suggestions for activities and shopping and is always qucik to respond to your messages.

The apartment was exactly as listed — it was so easy checking in and out and Ala was so courteous and quick to respond. It’s antique and old fashioned; way better than staying in all of NYC’s tacky new hotels - plus it was such a value. Transport is easy, the neighborhood was relatively relaxed and quiet, and everything was clean and comfy. We had an amazing stay!

name: Private room in Gracia, Barcelona
summary: Renting out private room with double bed in one of Barcelona's nicest neighbourhoods! Friendly flat, to be shared with one extra person. It's a comfortable size and is well located in the city, close to the centre, between parc guell and the beach.
description: Renting out private room with double bed in one of Barcelona's nicest neighbourhoods! Friendly flat, to be shared with one extra person. It's a comfortable size and is well located in the city, close to the centre, between parc guell and the beach.

reviews.comments: This flat is very nice. It's comfortable because it's big and rooms are far from each other, so you can feel free. Bed was big, is suitable for two people. There is also a small balcony, but in the morning there is can very noisy, but it wasn't a big problem for us. The only problem we had is lighting. For some reason we had no light in the room, only the table lamp.. But anyway we liked the room and the whole apartment. Ben, our neighbor was friendly and helped us with many things.

Colette was very nice, answered to all my questions and was very helpful in every way. Also the other girls living in the apartment were nice. 

The apartment and room were pretty much as described. Unfortunately the bed was rather uncomfortable and was breaking constantly. I'd would really nice if it would be changed. Also, the lightning was quite bad, only one light out of 4 was working. 

But what was nice, was that the apartment was big and there was a lot of privacy since the rooms are quite far away from each other. The kitchen had everything you need, except for microwave. 

All in all, the room was fine considering the price, only the bed was quite problematic.

name: A 2 bedroom walk to Ocean Lahaina A23
summary: You will be assigned the unit number 1 week prior to arrival. Please note that the front desk charges $20 per night to park on property.  You can park free on the street or $12 across the street
space: This is a beautiful resort setting 1 block from th ocean, beach, shopping, dining, etc. Loacted on the westside of Maui in Lahaina. A fully furnished 2 bedroom condo with 2 swimming pools on property. TheAina Nalu is walking distance to everything you will need! A favorite with families, weddings, reunions, and just a gerat hawaiian Holiday!
description: You will be assigned the unit number 1 week prior to arrival. Please note that the front desk charges $20 per night to park on property.  You can park free on the street or $12 across the street This is a beautiful resort setting 1 block from th ocean, beach, shopping, dining, etc. Loacted on the westside of Maui in Lahaina. A fully furnished 2 bedroom condo with 2 swimming pools on property. TheAina Nalu is walking distance to everything you will need! A favorite with families, weddings, reunions, and just a gerat hawaiian Holiday! Please note that the front desk charges $20 per night to park on property.  You can park free on the street or $12 across the street. The Aina Nalu is located in the heart of historic old Lahaina Town. Day or night, a short walk will bring you to Front Street where you can stroll through art galleries, sample the local fare at restaurants or hunt for treasures in quaint shops. During the day - the beach, snorkeling, or learning to surf or paddleboard are co
neighborhood_overview: The Aina Nalu is located in the heart of historic old Lahaina Town. Day or night, a short walk will bring you to Front Street where you can stroll through art galleries, sample the local fare at restaurants or hunt for treasures in quaint shops. During the day - the beach, snorkeling, or learning to surf or paddleboard are convenient for you to enjoy. Lahaina is also the main harbor town if you’d like to embark on a whale watch, dolphin sightings, scuba dive or all the other marine opportunities to surrounding areas. A boutique-style resort set on 9 acres of lush landscaping is an oasis of tranquility; an alternative to the Lahaina hotels on the busy waterfront, the perfect place to relax and enjoy the “Aloha” Spirit.
notes: Parking is $20 per night paid to the front desk if you choose to park on property.   There is free parking on the street and $15
access: Please note that the front desk charges $20 per night to park on property.  You can park free on the street or $12 across the street.

host.host_about: I am a Realtor here on Maui as well as in California.  I love to travel and assist people to find the best on Maui!

reviews.comments: I had a fantastic stay with the 2 bedroom "Walk to the Ocean Lahaina", and Carol St. John Couldn't have helped me more!!!  First I was stranded due to my previous house from a friend ( who moved out  10 days before I got to Maui) that I had reserved last year.  Carol St. John even gave me the 1st floor 2 bedroom "model" the first night, as everything was booked, and then helped me move to my second story b n b.  As I was in Honolulu for a week before that and it rained every day for my herb seminar, I was glad to get to Maui for some r & r.   The washer had to have repairs after I started it up, so she and a friend even moved my wash to a different one and finished doing it and hung it in my upstairs b n b!!!   She gave me hints on beaches, let me use beach chairs, beach towels, bamboo mats to put your towels on the beach,  and ice in the freezer to take to the beaches. She helped me move out the last day and I was very pleased with the studio bnb with fans, air conditioning ( that I didn't need) with the cooling off at night, and enjoyed the huge rock wall shower, outdoor pools, with outdoor showers, bbq cooking stations, gazebo to silt in, off street parking,  floor to ceiling windows w/screens to enjoy the ocean breezes.  Also, only 2 blocks away was the church I walked to on Sunday morning.  The kitchen was very modern, and enjoyed the refrigerator w/ freezer for food and water, stove, dilsh washer, and blender to make my morning smoothie!!    Loved the experience, and not sure if I ever want to go back to a hotel room again when I can use airbnb again on my next trip!!!    Aloha, and Mahalo,  Marcia

Carol was quick to respond to my emails, and phone calls which I greatly appreciated!  The 2bedroom condo was beautiful, clean, and a 1 block walk to all Lahaina has to offer! My friends and I loved hanging out by the pool with the outdoor lounge, and covered Bali style beds. Perfect weekend getaway, would def recommend.

What a wonderful time we had! Carole. Was so easy easy going and extremely helpful. The condo is in a gorgeous complex and so close to Front street (where the action happens in Lahaina). The pools are a great place to relax during downtime and the BBQ's are so convenient to whip up a great dinner. The condo was really spacious and felt like our home away from home. We would definitely stay here again!

This is a great rental location if you want to be close to downtown Lahaina. It is walking distance to downtown, full of restaurants, shops, galleries and the waterfront pier where many activities take place and where the tour boats leave from for whale watching, snorkeling, etc. . The condo itself was OK, with nicely updated kitchen and bathrooms. The kitchen was well appointed with blender and coffeemaker. It is smaller than it looks in the pictures, and we had a full house, so it felt crowded with 6 adults. It doesn't have anywhere to eat except the bar with only two stools. The refrigerator is extremely small, so if you plan to cook or eat in a lot to save money ( as did our group) that might be a consideration. Parking is not allowed at the condo itself unless you pay $15/day for a separate permit. We had great difficulty finding street parking especially at night, so you might want to plan to get the parking permit if you go at  popular time of year, as we did.  Also, our particular ground level condo was right on the parking lot, with full glass walls and only venetian blinds, so we had headlights shining directly into our bedrooms in the middle of the night, and noisy teenagers coming and going in the parking lot at all hours only a few feet away. Another location in the same complex might have been fine. 
Carol was very nice and very responsive as the host.  I would recommend her as a host.

Spent 9 nights in the condo.  It's located at the back of the complex.  Pros: on the end, very quiet and near the pool.  Cons: view is of the parking lot and the highway (behind a lava rock wall, so not too bad).  The condo was clean, well equipped, and comfortable.  The location is great: easy walk to town, short drive to the beaches and hikes we wanted to explore.  We never met Carol.  She left a message asking if we arrived and if we had any questions, we called to confirm that things were fine.  Our only problem with the condo occurred because our bags did not arrive with us and the airline had to drop off later.  We were told by the front desk that they would not accept our bags because we weren't staying through them, so we had to wait around for our bags.  That was fair, but not really in the aloha spirit.  Otherwise we had a great trip and enjoyed staying at the condo.

Location was awesome, so close to Front St. where all the shops are.
Unit was very cozy and comfortable! Carol was very helpful. We enjoyed our stay. :)

The condo complex is older, but very well maintained. Our unit was much nicer than I expected, nice big bathrooms, newer furniture, nice decor, and fully loaded kitchen made our stay very comfortable. Location was great, you really can just walk to town, grocery store, beach, etc.

Carol was a great host, we met her personally and she was very responsive with all our requests. The units wifi was down, for two days, but I feel like Carol pro-actively fixed it.

Her condo was perfect for our family! Love how central it was to the town of Lahaina. I would def stay again!

first off, carol was a great host, when we needed something she responded quickly and got things that we needed. the condo itself could use a deep cleaning. it's noisy being on the bottom floor opening out to the parking lot. the bed in one of the rooms is hard and uncomfortable, the kitchen was minimally stocked(which carol did bring the things we requested). but with all that said the location is great, you can walk to downtown and to the beach. the pools were great for the kids and it was low key. overall we had a fabulous vacation minus the quirky things about the condo.

EVERYTHING was just as Carol said it would be. Fantastic location in downtown Lahaina--it was literally 1.5 blocks to downtown and the beach! Condo was extremely clean upon arrival and there was even enough coffee to brew the first  morning before we could get to the store to purchase groceries for our stay. I would absolutely recommend this location to families, bridal parties, and couples. I didn't want to leave! Thank you, Carol :)

We had an amazing time staying in Lahaina at Carol's place. The place was nicely located walking distance to Front St where all the hustle and bustle in Lahaina is. It's also a 10-15min drive to Kaanapali, Napili, and Kapalua. The place itself was clean, welcoming, and had all the kitchen supplies we needed to cook dinner and breakfast. There was also a small cooler, beach chairs, beach umbrellas, and boogie boards for us to enjoy. Which was awesome because it meant we didn't have to spend anything additional. The complex it was located in was quiet and extremely easy to find. I will definitely stay here again!
Carol was great, location was great, condo was great, well done.

The Aina Nalu resort was fantastic! Our condo was even better than we'd hoped.  This is a great place to stay for a Maui vacation. We loved how close we were to Front St. and Baby beach. We were able to walk to restaurants and the harbor very quickly. The condo was very well set up for four people. We appreciated having two bathrooms and laundry available.  We would definately stay here again in the future.

The condo was great just as described, pool was very nice, condo worked perfectly for two couples, the town is only a 2 min. walk for everything that you would need. Carol was great as well she took us to a spot to swim with the sea turtles that we would of never found on our own, thanks again Carol we had a fantastic time look forward to coming back.

The condo was wonderful! It looks exactly like it does in the pictures, It was very clean and we had everything what we´ve needed for our stay. The location was perfect, in a quiet area, only a few meters walk to the beach, harbour and also to the shopping area and restaurants. Carol was a great host. She was available via airbnb messaging and also via mobile on our arrival day :-).Mahalo for everything Carol, we will be back again one day...

The place was exactly what I was hoping for.  Very clean, very comfortable, with all the amenities.  I also liked the fact that the doors used a code system rather than a key, so there was no key pickup or drop off needed.  Carol was very quick to respond to any questions I had.  Thank you!

We loved Carol's condo.  The location is perfect - walking distance to many activities, restaurants, and shopping.  I was a little worried that Lahaina would be too busy but it was perfect for this trip.  We did not actually stay in unit A203 because of a water leak right before our arrival so Carol moved us to I201 - I think they are essentially identical.    There were 2 bedrooms with king sized beds and a pull-out sleeper sofa.  Everything worked and the unit was clean.  It is great to have a washer/dryer in the unit.  My only complaint was that all the AC units are on timers with 4 hours maximum so we would wake up in the middle of the night to turn them back on (it was unusually hot and humid when we were there).

The onsite pools are nice and there are BBQs by the pools that were never all being used.  The larger pool has a lovely covered lounge area with tables and couches to relax on out of the sun. 

We also rented C104 at the same time and the only difference is that unit had 1 queen and 1 king + sleeper sofa.  The decor in C104 was a little nicer and the AC units didn't shut off in the middle of the night. 

Carol answered every question that we had and was very helpful!

This place was immaculate and not to mention, really convenient to get to the shops and restaurant on Front Street! Literally, a 2 minute walk. The pictures definitely does not do the place justice, it's a lot nicer in person. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to stay within the Lahaina area.
Pleasant older complex.  Two pools with uncomfortable chaises.  Walls are quite thin and voices from the next unit are easily heard.
Great location, good condo!

This condo was perfect for 4 adults to stay near the action of Lahaina. The beds were comfortable, plenty of space to spread out in the 2 bathrooms of our unit. The balcony overlooks the pool which was very well-taken care of. Just a 2 minute walk to the shops and restaurants. Highly recommended!

Great location to Front Street. Easy check in/out. Great response time from Carol with any questions we had. Guest wondered why we were asked to take trash out and start a load of towels even we were paying a cleaning fee. Other than that, I def recommend Carol's place.

Aina Nalu is a great place to stay.  Just two blocks away from Front St. in Lahaina.  w/ two pools and a hot tub.   This specific unit was very convenient in that its on the first floor and next to the parking lot.  Nice to have a washer/dryer in the place as well as a full kitchen.  Highly recommend for the price.  Great Value!

Have stayed at Ainu Nalu for years in multiple two bedroom units. The units are fairly standard with similar bedding and amenities. This unit had fleas! We saw two fleas and were itchy through our stay. Toilet paper holder  was broken in one bathroom and cable tv wasn’t hooked up right, cable guy had to come fix it the next day. 

Carol was outstanding! I recommend working with her without hesitation. She was immediately available and responsive, had pest and cable guy there immediately. Fleas in the unit aren’t her fault as the place has no pets.

Pros: The property is a good value for the price. 
Washer/dryer is a nice feature
Nice to have keyless system 
Beach towel, cooler and chairs were provided 
Nicely decorated unit
Good location, walking distance to Front street in Lahaina. 
Parking available at a cost or on street for free

Cons: The complex can be a bit confusing, finding your way to unit at first is challenging.
Walls are a bit thin, neighbors could be heard. 
We are required to start a towel wash yet are charged for cleaning fee.
Everything was great. Super easy check in via code, within walking distance to everything, super cold A/C, amazing showers and beds. Would stay here again on our next Maui trip.

Carols place was great. Good sized and clean bedrooms. Laundry a plus! Kitchen contained everything we needed. WiFi was fast! Located about 10min walking distance to the beach and a nice little town where you can get some local shaved ice, desserts, snacks, shopping, etc.
Great location within Lahaina, excellent host.

The unit was spotless and extremely comfortable, the beds were especially nice and the bathrooms were to die for.  Kitchen was very convenient.  The location is amazingly good!  Lahaina town's amenities are within easy walking distance and super convenient!

Aina nalu is a great place to stay but this unit needs some basic maintenance - some of the furniture is cracked, bed quilt stained kitchen equipment needs to be replaced - it wouldn’t take much to update and freshen the unit so that it warrants the cost.Also this unit overlooks the pool so it’s convenient but pretty noisy
The apartment was really great with a well equipped kitchen and a lot of things for the beach. Also the location was good. You can reach every by feet (Supermarket, Shopping Street, etc).

The proximity of this complex to “downtown”, coupled with the relaxed atmosphere and nicely equipped condo could not be beat. The kids had a blast in the pool, it was super easy to get anywhere we wanted to go, and the unit itself had many of the “little touches” covered. Boogie boards, coolers, beach umbrella.... even Jenga for the day it poured and all our excursions were cancelled. Thanks again for a wonderful stay.
Great location!
A satisfactory rental experience. The best thing about this property is the location, about a half mile walk to Front Street and the town of Lahaina.
Carol's place is centrally located in Lahaina and easy to walk to restaurants and other attractions.  It was quiet and comfortable.
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place. Smooth checkin. We could use the body boards, snorkling, and other poolware.

We stayed at Aina NALU with Carol. This is a large resort right in downtown Lahaina with those benefits described by previous reviewers. We particularly appreciated being able to walk to catch an excursion ride at the harbor or eat at one of the many excellent restaurants in the area. We very much enjoyed our time at Baby Beach and other beaches that are walkable. We especially appreciated Carol's quick response to any issue we had that came up. There are a couple of situations that people should be aware of. Carol seems to manage a number of properties and you should be aware of that the photos are generic. It is necessary to communicate exactly what you are renting. The community property at this resort seems to be managed by one company but there are a number of rental platforms including Airbnb that are utilized by the owners to rent out their units. There's a little bit of infighting that seems to be going on between these various companies. For example the pools all say that wristbands are required to use the pools. Airbnb did not provide us with wristbands but no one ever asked us for our wrist bands. As another example one would think that an owner would have an assigned parking space that you are then renting as part of the unit. However the manager for the property collects a $20 per day parking fee. So there is a little bit of expense and quirkiness going on but nothing that prevents you from having a wonderful time in this ideal part of the world.
Clear and professional response.

If you are paying 2* value, then i would suggest this place.  The unit is very tired looking and needs a serious up-date.  Unfortunately we paid min 4* rate + and were completely shocked when we walked in.   The unit looks at least 15 years old and the furniture matches.  I don't have a problem with old, i have a huge problem with cleanliness and basically a run down accommodation.  The floors were just gross, sticky and old.  The toilets take 2 mins minimum to flush, The furniture was just old and cracked and in some spots ready to fall apart.  It was advertised that there is a pull out couch and the accommodation is suited for 6 people but this couch is probably 15 years old so it is almost falling apart.  the kitchen appliances are nearly ready to be replaced at best, the dishwasher leaks and is rusted beyond anything inside, 
I believe the pictures as advertised are from 10 years ago at best.  its just an old run down place that needs some extensive renovation and furniture replacement.  Carol seemed like a pleasant lady but I would not suggest this units unless the price is completely ridiculous cheap and you don't care about the accommodations.  It was the biggest shock and disappointment to our vacation.    To put a positive spin on this place, the king bed was very comfortable (as i believe it was somewhat new) and the location was great.  other than that, the place needs a big "hug".  i would believe this place wouldn't even compare to a lower end motel unfortunately.

Great location, but the cleaning fee shouldn’t have been added to the cost since the guest is required to do the cleaning! Communication was poor as the door code didn’t work, and the owner took one hour to respond.

name: Designer's studio in Williamsburg
summary: This modern designer sun soaked studio is located in a heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn which is surrounded by lively bars and restaurants. It is only two blocks away from L Graham stop. This studio has a queen size air mattress, high speed WiFi and washer and drier in apt. It also offers eat in kitchen bar and mega size bathroom.
space: The new studio is located only two blocks away from L Graham stop on a quite tree lined street. Cute cafes, restaurants and groceries right near by yet the apt is so quite you can enjoy birds singing in the morning and evening.

house_rules: Shoes Free Home

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Fashion Designer/ New Yorker

reviews.comments: Claire communicated quickly whenever I had to speak with her. The location was perfect for easy access to Manhattan. The place was a fair price considering most other places have similar pricing, but do not offer a private bathroom and the places are usually shared with other guests. The main issue with the apartment was the couch is actually a love seat. Very small. Claire does have the measurements on her airbnb site, however I do not believe any normal size adult can fit comfortably on the love seat. Bring an air mattress. Thanks Claire!

Claire's apartment was such a nice place for my boyfriend and me to stay for New Year's weekend! The apartment was very clean and organized. We had plenty of room for an air mattress and access to a kitchen was great. The neighborhood seemed very safe, and the apartment is close to a train into Manhattan, which was convenient. Claire had everything organized for the apartment key pickup and dropoff, and all the necessities were communicated and operated clearly. Overall, I had a great experience, and I would definitely recommend others to stay here.

Claire's place was awesome!  Great location, she was easy to work with and the studio was just what we needed.  It was well kept, the air mattress was big enough for the both of us.  I would def.  come back!

Apartment was as described and quite lovely. We had some issues opening the front door at first, Claire was available by phone to walk us through the particular lock. Wifi was a bit slow/spotty. Location was great, tons of bars and restaurants nearby. Overall excellent value, would recommend.

Having grown up in this neighborhood, I can say the location was very convenient. It was next to my favorite restaurant and public transportation was easily available. The apartment itself had a lot of personality and was cosy.

I absolutely adored staying in Claire's stylish little Williamsburg pad. The cozy, clean, and tastefully decorated space made me feel very at home during my solo trip to the city, and it was conveniently located within close walking proximity to  many East Williamsburg bars, restaurants, juice bars, cafes and shops which was an added bonus. I would love to stay again!

Claire's apartment was located in a nice neighborhood, that was both quiet and well-lit/busy at night. We had some slight issues getting in at first, but we figured it out pretty quick.  The apartment is small, but clean and quiet. The air bed is comfortable, but does tend to need extra air after each night. Claire was helpful and quick to respond when we contacted her!

Claire was a pleasure to communicate with and her apartment was wonderful.  Quiet, clean, air conditioned, and comfortable.  Great design.  Location is amazing, very close to L train. Central location in Brooklyn.  15 min to Manhattan.  Would definitely stay here again.
The apartment is beautiful , loved every detail , is small, cozy , has the charm of Brooklyn. Upon arriving we had some issues , but claire solved as soon as she can. Good location thanks for all.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The pictures don't do the justice on how cute the place was, super clean and stylish! definitely recommend this place, especially since me and my boyfriend were using public transportation. L train is right around the block, coffee shops no more than a mile away, super easy and quick to get to Manhattan, times square, Brooklyn bridge, etc. 10/10 for sure!

name: Detached Wooden House with garden
summary: Detached wooden house with 200 m2 fantastic garden. Brand new toilet with hot tub. 10 minutes walking distance away from pier and restaurants. 5 minutes walking distance to forestland, Nakibey Beach and bypass road to Aya Yorgi Church.
space: A wooden House in Tepeköy... A house in romantic symbiosis with nature, retaining the nostalgic ecstasy of the past in Büyükada's unique, peaceful and relaxing island atmosphere far removed from the stress creating nature of the city. Perfect place for barbecue parties, music rehearsals and several activities.

host.host_about: playing reed flute, travelling, football

reviews.comments:
In three words: loved this place!

Aral was a friendly and hospitable host.  He lives next door in a detached house and was always happy to help us, provided spare toilet paper when we ran out, etc.  Originally, I was concerned about the proximity of the two houses as my fiancee and I wanted a private place to unwind for a few days after a hectic trip, and we didn't want to be bothered.  Totally needless worry as Aral probably guessed our intentions and played it cool =).

The house itself was fantastic and the photos don't do it justice.  It looks like a cabin on the outside, but actually it's a complete and newly renovated home with a washer, dishwasher, full bath, good wifi, brand new windows and bathtub with water jets.  Lacks an oven/range as well as a dryer, but there's a big George Foreman-style grill that you can use.  Beautiful wood cabinetry and floors everywhere, and there's even a real live tree growing in the middle of the house.  (In case you're concerned, there weren't any bugs.)

The location was also great for us, far away from the island's town center and way uphill in a completely residential area with no foreigners.  Buyukada has become overrun tourists in the past decade or two, but Aral's place is completely isolated from that.  I'd say it's a 10-15 minute walk downhill to the town center.  I think that you can use one of the ubiquitous horse-drawn carriages, but we love walking so we went by foot.

One more comment regarding the first photo that's visible on the listing as of 9/15/2014.  The photo is kind of weird and makes the house appear as if it's not detached.  I want to assure you that the building is totally separate, and to the left of the house toward the back (not visible in the photo) is the backyard of the neighboring house that Aral lives in.  There are very effective shutters for all the windows.

If you're looking for privacy and a getaway from hectic Istanbul, rest assured, look no further.

Aral, the owner of the house, is a good host who welcomed us nicely. He is so kind and helpful person who solved some of our requests rapidly. The conditions of the house are fair enough to stay for few nights. However, it is hard to take shower because of lacking the shower curtain. If you have problems of climbing the hills, it won’t be so nice for you to reach the house. It is written that there are 3 couches but one of the couch is not so comfortable. (Just for 1 or 2 nights, it is ok) Also, the cleaning of the house could be better. (I say this because of the dust on the carpet. We passed the night with windows opened and there was no problem at all) the comparison of the price over quality is fair enough. Don't forget to enjoy the garden at night!

Das Haus ist absolut zu empfehlen. Ein echter Baum wächst durch das Wohnzimmer! Im Garten lässt sich die Sonne gut genießen. 

Aral war ein super Gastgeber und hat uns geholfen, das Beste aus der Insel rauszuholen. Zum Beispiel hat er uns gemeinsam mit einem Freund auf eine Bootstour zu den anderen Inseln mitgenommen und uns ein Restaurant mit überragender Aussicht gezeigt.

Thank you, Aral!

esim ve 3 yasindaki oglumuz ile 1 gece kaldik ve cok memnun kaldik.
evin otantik dokusu ve onundeki bahcesi oglumuz ile hos vakit gecirmemizi sagladi.
Aral Bey cok kisa sure kalmis olsak da bizimle cok yakindan ilgilendi.

Ada nin kalabaligindan siyrilip kafa dinlemek isteyenler icin mukemmel bir tercih.

Adada Aral sayesinde harika bir haftasonu gecirdik. Kendisi canayakin, ve yardimsever bir ev sahibi. Evin ici konforlu oldugu kadar otantik, sirin, egzantirik ve farkli. Bahcesi barbeku partileri icin cok ideal. Merkeze mesafesi ise adanin o kalabaligindan ve gurultusunden kurtulmanizi sagliyor. Burada daha sonra uzunca konaklayabilmeyi isterim. Kisin somine de cok keyifli oluyormus. Ilk firsatta deneyecegiz. Tesekkurler Aral
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Toz dışında hiç bir sıkıntı yoktu, sanırım ahşap evden kaynaklı çok daha fazla havalandırılması gerekiyor, ama ilgilenen kişiler güler yüzlü ve samimiydi memnun kaldım
The bathroom is great and it's very private. However, the walk up to the house is grueling (almost entirely uphill). And there were a lot of mosquitoes inside during our stay.

Aral Bey ve annesi oldukça cana yakın ve misafirperver. 
Teşekkürler!
her şey güzeldi

Ev mustakil, genis bahceli, mahalle icinde, sevimli bir yer. Sessizlik ve ozel Alan isteyenler icin uygun. Yakinda okul bahcesi var, okullarin kapali oldugu zaman kaldigimiz icin Sorun olmadi. Merkezde yuruyerek indik ve aya yorgi kilisesi yoluna da Orman yolundan gittik, cok guzeldi.  Banyo ve yatak odasi cok ozenli, temiz ancak oturma odasi ve mutfak biraz ozensizdi. Yine de tercih edilebilir, Aral bey ihtiyaclar konusunda duyarli, yardimci bir kisi. Tesekkurler
En romantik ev
Tanışıklığım var diye söylemiyorum, cok yardimlari dokundu :)
Her şeyin başında sağlıklı iletişim olduğunu düşünerek kendisine teşekkür ederiz.
Ev çok tatlı ve sakin bir yerde. Konumu da oldukça iyi. Ev sahibi Aral bey gayet samimi ve yardımsever. Herkesin gitmesini tavsiye ederim.

Ev genel anlamda şahane gerek evdeki ses sistemi gerek gece yapılan ışıklandırmalar. Tek sıkıntı eve ulaşabilmek için  yokuş çıkman gerekiyor. konaklanabilecek güzel bir ev memnun kalıcağınıza eminim. Ev sahibi sıcak kanlı ve yardımsever.
Sevimli güzel vakit geçirebileceğiniz bir ev
Huzurlu bir gun gecirmek isterseniz bulabileceginiz en ideal yerlerden birisi. Misafirperver ev sahibi icinizi rahatlatacaktir.
Aral was really helpful and easy to reach. Id recommend the place for winter. The place was a little bit dusty and had only one bed.

Aral and his family were very kind and welcoming -- reflecting Turkish hospitality.
The AirBNB location itself is a good uphill walk from most activities (shopping and eateries). It makes it beautifully quiet but comes with a workout. The location only has one bed and AC in one room, however any questions we had were quickly responded to with great care. Aral is an honest host.

The house is in a remote and silent location, away from the tourists. So it is a nice area to enjoy yourself in silence.

The garden seems beautiful in the photos but during our visit it was dirty and uncared for, way different from the photos. 

The inside of the house would be much better when cleaned. There was too much dust and it was not welcoming. 

Aral is great and helpful but the experience could have been much better.
Harika bir yerdi:)

Aral is the best host. He is quite polite and he tries to do his best during our accommodation. We loved his romantic place. I recommend it for young couples because of house location :)) If you need rest and stay away crowded places you can choose without thinking
Very cosy and nice spot! i do recommend it!!
Gerçekten Çok Güzel

The place is perfect for couples as the area is very quiet and green! And we are in love with the wooden house and their lovely dog, Joy. The host, Aral bey is very friendly and helpful. Highly recommended!
An absolutely wonderful  experience!
Şöminenin karşısında sıcacık romantik bir atmosfer hayalinizi tam olarak karşılıyor ama evin diğer yerleri soğuk. Yatakodasındaki klimayı hiç kapatmamanızı öneririm.
kesinlikle çok güzel bir evdi aral bey de son derece kibar ve ilgiliydi :)
Lovely wooden house in a silent environment. Excellent place to get a real rest. It has a fireplace that you can enjoy during the cold days.

Harika zaman geçirdik! Şömine keyfi kesinlikle şahane :) bahçe, kediler her şey çok keyifli. Tam yanında yaşamalarına rağmen, hiç izleniyor gibi hissetmiyorsunuz, gönülden tavsiye ederiz! Teşekkürler her şey için. Görüşmek üzere :)

The house is perfect for couples, especially in winter time since it has fireplace and Jacuzi. It is warm and cosy and perfect for getaways. The house is on a hill so be ready to walk a 20 min hike to get there. The island does not have taxis nor cars, it functions on horses and electrical bikes and regular bikes. You can ask locals to drop you off if yoy have luggage and they are helpful. 

Aral is a great host, the house was ready and clean, he was there to help with any questions. 

The garden I think would be better taken care of in the summer since I visited in Winter time. The island is nice and detached. Everything closes at 8:30 pm (cafes, resto, shops) not a very touristic place to be for a week or so, but defenitely a great spot to clear your mind and have some quality quiet time. 

Loved it!

name: JUMP IN BED IPANEMA - DOUBLE 1
summary: Private room with cable TV, safe, minibar and work desk, WiFi (High Speed), has independent entrance, access through passwords and keycard, allowing total privacy to the guests, the bathroom is shared with another 01 room only, occupancy time, and has separate dining area with microwave, and mini refrigerator.
space: Location privileged, next to the Metro, restaurants, pharmacies, banks, exchange houses, juice houses, bakeries, between the beach of Ipanema post 8 and Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon, public transportation with routes to the whole city and tourist attractions short distances.
description: Private room with cable TV, safe, minibar and work desk, WiFi (High Speed), has independent entrance, access through passwords and keycard, allowing total privacy to the guests, the bathroom is shared with another 01 room only, occupancy time, and has separate dining area with microwave, and mini refrigerator. Location privileged, next to the Metro, restaurants, pharmacies, banks, exchange houses, juice houses, bakeries, between the beach of Ipanema post 8 and Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon, public transportation with routes to the whole city and tourist attractions short distances. neighborhood_overview: Situated 300 metres from Ipanema Beach and 10 minutes’ walk from Copacabana Beach, Best Point in Ipanema is a homestay accommodation with free Wi-Fi in Rio de Janeiro. Boasting stylish décor, this apartment comes with private rooms with air conditioning and linens and towels included. The shared bathroom features a walk-in shower and toilet. Best Point in Ipanema is just 5 minutes’ walk from Cantagalo Subway Station, 10 km from Sugarloaf Mountain and 28 minutes’ drive from Galeão International Airport.
transit: Bars, 24-hour supermarkets, shops, laundries, art galleries, theater, cinema, libraries, clubs, nightclubs, banks, pharmacies, hospitals, travel agencies, money exchange, post office, etc..
access: Meu check in é as 15:00 mas devo chegar antes...posso entrar antes?  Sim Como funciona? Você receberá um código de acesso que te dará acesso até essa cozinha neste local você encontrará um envelope com seu nome e dentro terá um cartão eletrônico de acesso com o numero do seu quarto, porém esse acesso só abrirá a porta a partir das 15:00 hrs. Sua bagagens podem ser deixada neste ambiente de espera em segurança e você poderá sair e voltar na hora mais conveniente ao seu check in.
house_rules: Certifique-se de trancar a parte superior e inferior da porta quando você sair. Desligue todos os aparelhos de corrente alternada quando você sair de casa. Desligue todas as luzes e toda a eletrônica. Lave todos os pratos que você usa. Atividades ilegais: Não será permitido o uso de drogas ilegais na propriedade. CONDUTA HOSPEDE: A Lei do silêncio começa a partir de 22:00 até 08:00 da manhã. Durante essas horas rádios e aparelhos de som pode ser escutados em um nível de não ser ouvido do lado de fora do quarto. DANOS MATERIAIS: Os danos causados pelo comportamento de um hospede, ou convidado do mesmo, será responsabilidade do hospede o pagamento dos danos. CHAVES E ACESSO AO APARTAMENTO: Encontraremos o hóspede no apartamento no momento do check-in e entrega das chaves. É de responsabilidade do hospede para devolvê-los no check-out.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, somos uma equipe de anfitriões, pronto a atender os nossos hóspedes. Gostamos de conhecer pessoas, novas culturas,  artes e gastronomia.
Seja bem - vindo !

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Marcio hosted me on my first night in Rio - another host had cancelled my booking short-term and Airbnb organized this stay for me. I received Marcio's confirmation just before I got on the plane in Paris, he was very responsive and welcoming even though I arrived quite late in the evening. The apartment is spacious and nicely decorated - I had my own room with a private bathroom. The house is located close to Ipanema beach and built around some rocks - very interesting architecture. Perfect location, nice surroundings. I can recommend Marcio as well as the room he rents out.

Marcio is a great host, really friendly and relaxed. The house is really well located in a calm corner of ipanema and is full of interesting books and records, too!

I had a great stay, highly recommended!
Marcio is a very good host. He has a great apartment, and the location is superb-exactly where you want to be in Rio.

My trip was excellent having stayed here while visiting Rio. It is a great location and you can easily get around, just down the street from the beach and busy streets you want to visit. Marcio decorated the place really well and found myself looking around given all the detail he put into it. Marcio was helpful every step of the way while I was there. He was there to greet me promptly when the elevator doors opened to his floor and had already notated the Wi-Fi password expecting it would be the first thing I’d ask for (works great by the way). I was able to easily get in and out of the apartment during my visit. The last day he personally assisted me when I was having problems with the taxi service. For me personally, it was an even better trip because I chose Marcio’s place. You may even get lucky and he may cook one of the days you are there. ;-)

The place was very nice we thought we are renting a whole apt we made a mistake with the ad, but even though we stayed in the double bad room it was still very nice, Marcio is very nice, easy going  and acoomodating. The place is in great location you really cant beat it.people their were very friendly! :)

Nuestra estadía en la casa de Marcio fue excelente. Si bien Marcio no estaba expectante en cómo nos estábamos manejando en la ciudad, siempre tuvo buena disposición en ayudarnos cuando lo solicitamos. Es un anfitrión relajado, con buen humor, nunca tuvo problema con nada. Desde el comienzo nos ayudó solucionando un error en la reserva de nuestra estadía, nos permitió hacer el check-in más temprano y siempre contestó con rapidez los mails y mensajes. 
El departamento es HERMOSO, decorado con un excelente gusto, muy moderno. La ubicación es EXCELENTE: a 3 cuadras de la playa y a 3 cuadras de la laguna. En la zona hay muchos bares y restaurantes, y es muy seguro.
La conexión a Internet funciona muy bien.
Lo único incómodo es el baño: su ubicación está lejos de la habitación, cruzando el living; el antebaño no tiene puerta y el baño tiene una puerta tipo mampara, lo cual no daba privacidad. Así mismo fue muy bueno hospedarse de Marcio, volveríamos a quedarnos en su casa mil veces.  =)

The apartment is exactly as shown on the pictures. It is a rather small room, but this didn't bother us as we were continuously outside. Further the hosts were very helpful in guiding us trough the fun activities that Rio has to offer. Additionally the room and bathroom were very clean.
Our stay at Marcio's place was just perfect. His apartment is very beautiful and clean. He was reall nice and helpful. I enjoyed it there. I can totally recommend his place.

Acabei tendo pouco contato com os proprietários devido aos horário do Rock in Rio porém estava tudo bem limpo, organizado. O quarto tinha uma estrutura bem preparada e bem confortável. Gostei da experiência e foi minha primeira vez usando AirBnb e espero voltar tanto a usar o aplicativo como a me hospedar no mesmo local
Apartamento limpo, arrumado e aconchegante. Sem contar na boa hospitalidade que recebi em toda a minha estadia.

Me hospedei com uma amiga e a nossa estadia foi excelente!!! O quarto é amplo e confortável e o chuveiro é incrível. Tem muitas lojas e restaurantes perto do apartamento, a localização é realmente muito boa, fiz quase tudo a pé. O Luan, que cuida do apartamento, foi muito gentil e nos deixou muito à vontade. Recomendo e com certeza voltarei.

Ótima localização, limpeza e comunicação.
obrigada pela estadia!

espero voltar em breve!
Excelente custo/benefício. Recomendo!

Ótima localização, excelente para qualquer turista, mas em especial para o público gay. Próximo a academias, mercados, farmácias e da praia! O banheiro apesar de ser compartilhado com outro quarto é limpo e bem espaçoso. A cozinha é compacta e o fogão é um cocktop com apenas uma boca, mas com todos os utensílios necessários. Recomendo o espaço e voltaria a me hospedar nele.
ótimo lugar!  Muito limpo, perto de tudo e com tudo que você precisa para curtir umas férias!

name: kiralık daire
summary: İstanbul'un kalbi beyoğlu cihangir'de, rengarenkliği hissedeceğiniz; meydan ve Tophane’ye  10, Karaköy’e 20 dakika uzaklıktadır. Aynı zamanda otobüs, metro ve füniküler duraklarına da aynı sürede ulaşabilirsiniz.
description: İstanbul'un kalbi beyoğlu cihangir'de, rengarenkliği hissedeceğiniz; meydan ve Tophane’ye  10, Karaköy’e 20 dakika uzaklıktadır. Aynı zamanda otobüs, metro ve füniküler duraklarına da aynı sürede ulaşabilirsiniz.
house_rules: Ayakkabı ile dolaşılmıyor maalesef

host.host_about: I am a musician. My apartment is fully furnished and it's very comfortable. I am an easygoing, welcoming host, would love to help for anything you might need while staying at my place.

reviews.comments:
My worst Airbnb nightmare came true thanks to Diğdem - she cancelled a couple of HOURS before check-in time, AFTER I had checked out of my previous accommodation, simply because she could. I cannot believe someone would do such a thing. 
After a lot of research, I had booked her place. We corresponded for a few days and each time she wasn't very friendly but I remained courteous. She asked for a lot of details, including my girlfriend's website info etc., because she didn't seem to trust us. She remained suspicious, writing on Airbnb and (Hidden by Airbnb) in the middle of the night, asking how I managed to get her phone number (apparently she isn't aware that Airbnb shares contact details once the booking is made). She was also very slow with her responses, except when she required a response from us. 
Her friend was supposed to help with the check in, but she hadn't shared her friend's number even on the day of check-in. Finally fed up, I asked her for her friend's number, since "we cannot wait to get a response from you every time". She then responded telling me to talk politely, to which I basically said "I can say the same to you."
And guess what? She immediately cancelled our reservation - because she did not like my response - regardless of the fact that we were a couple of hours from checking in! Diğdem seems to be under the impression that she is doing her guests a favour by letting them stay at her place, but this is not Couchsurfing. I don't understand how she can be so unfriendly to people but expect them to respond in an ever-polite, grateful manner. Absolutely terrible experience!

We have stayed in a lot of Airbnbs and this easily one of the best. It is a gorgeous flat in a great location, and despite being close to everything, is in a quiet street. The flat contains everything you could possibly need. The bed is comfortable and there is also a large lounge/dining room to relax in as well. We have stayed in other places in Istanbul, and we were impressed by the size of the flat and the value for money. We work online so we also really appreciated the fast WiFi and having a space to work.  It was easy to communicate with Diğdem and she is a great host. We highly recommend Diğdem’s place and will stay again on our next trip to Istanbul.
It was nice appartment in Beyoglu. thanks a lot. you are also welcome to Russia

this was the best home i've ever reserved on airbnb! i loved digdem's place, I love cihangir, it's my best place in istanbul so far, the home is located in a very nice place with old streets accessable to every thing u want, the home has very vintage stuff and decoration, and we enjoyed the little details, the bed and sofas are very comfortable, digdem is a very generous, nice and responsive host she was answering us all the time, she was very kind and lovely, she made us in love with her place! this place is recommended if ur looking for a turkish vintage musical home and a calm street, i recommend this place and would like to rent it again !

host.host_about:
Je suis une personne qui aime la vie et qui aime le monde ! 
Pour avoir moi même voyager étant jeune pendant quelques années dans de différent coin de pays , cela me fait plaisir a mon tour d'accueillir des gens qui voyage chez moi , car cela me rappelle de très bon souvenir ...
Aujourd'hui je suis copropriétaire d'un petit Resto Français  situer sur le Plateau Mont Royal que j'adore , mon travaille consiste a accueillir des gens encore encore et encore !!!

reviews.comments:
Annie's communication prior to our stay was thorough and thoughtful.  We had cell phone numbers and names of two contacts that could welcome us on our day of arrival.  This was very helpful since the time needed to pass through the border of the USA and Canada can be unpredictable.  Our welcome contact showed us around the apartment, introduced us to Momo and was very friendly.  She even walked us to the nearby street where we would find restaurant choices because eating was our priority in that moment!

Fresh ground coffee, a French Press and many bright and beautiful colors both inside and out from painted walls, kitchenware and blooming flowers welcomed us in the morning.  The deck felt soft underfoot and the privacy of the backyard extended the kitchen in an organic way. The pool was refreshing and soothing to view.  The entire space was aesthetically pleasing.

At night we slept well.  All was quiet.  The shower worked well.  The coming and going was easy and gentle.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Annie. Le logement est très bien agencé et très proche du métro ce qui est vraiment appréciable, surtout que nous voyagions avec 3 enfants. La cour est agréable nous avons pu en profiter ainsi que du barbecue !! Nous n'avons manqué de rien !

We enjoyed our stay at Annie's condo very much. It is centrally located, has a lovely garden and pool, and all the amenities we needed from towels to pots and pans. The neighborhood is peaceful and quiet, close to the Jean Talon Market and a little park for our son to play in. 
Annie was helpful in answering any questions we had, we are sorry we never got to meet her. 
Momo is a friendly cat who always let us know if he needed to get in or out.

Nous avons apprécié notre séjour avec la petite. Le prêt du parc a été super ce qui a permis de diminuer le nombre d'objet à apporter. L'emplacement, la terrasse, le logement en général étaient selon nos attentes. Merci pour votre hospitalité ! Guillaume, Annie et Maëly.

Four of us stayed at Annie's place over a long weekend and it was the perfect spot to start and end our days in Montreal. The pool and backyard were charming, and the neighbourhood itself had everything we needed. I've stayed in downtown Montreal in the past, but prefer this nieghbourhood. The flat was spacious - the four of us never felt like we were on top of each other. Annie was helpful and responsive even though she was on vacation herself. Great stay!
Lovely apartment located in a very hip neighborhood. Great restaurants and shops.

We have stayed at a few places on AirBnB and Annie's was great. Eclectic with a touch of old world feel, you will love the flow into the back yard, the proximity to the Metro and Little Italy. 

Everything you need is so close. The neighborhood is very interesting and represents a part of Montreal that should be embraced.

Annie was a great host - she took the time to make sure we felt at home!

We enjoy the place, it was cosy and comfortable.. We appreciated the closeness of shops, restaurants and metro. 

My sisters loved the pool :) 

I enjoyed the company of Momo the cat :)

Séjour parfait, au paradis pour reprendre les précédents commentaires ! Nous avions tout ce qu il faut, maison très bien placée dans un quartier très sympa, ultra propre avec tout ce qu il faut et même plus ! Merci encore Annie !

name: A PENTHOUSE WITH A BOSPHOURSE VIEW
summary: 35 smq Large, Bright and Modern Penthouse with a beatiful bosphourse view.  1 Queen size, spine friendly bed, full et kitchenette,luxury linens. 32 " tv with satellite and free wifi. Very close to metro station and istiklal revenue.
space: Serdar i Ekrem is one of the most historical neighborhood in istanbul. You will feel the culture and turkish new and old life on the street. This cosy studio is suitable for 2 people or a family with 3 .
description: 35 smq Large, Bright and Modern Penthouse with a beatiful bosphourse view.  1 Queen size, spine friendly bed, full et kitchenette,luxury linens. 32 " tv with satellite and free wifi. Very close to metro station and istiklal revenue. Serdar i Ekrem is one of the most historical neighborhood in istanbul. You will feel the culture and turkish new and old life on the street. This cosy studio is suitable for 2 people or a family with 3 . Metro station is very close to our building also very enjoyable walkting path to Galata brige and Galata tower. We meet with our guest at the check in time to show around and give the keys. Serdar-ı Ekrem is the busiest, liveliest, most popular street in Galata. It may be just one street but it is home to a wide variety of funky, fancy, and down-right quirky shops and boutiques. Just take it step by step, and spend a few hours exploring vintage shops, designer boutiques, jewelry stores and much more.
