host.host_about:
Yaş 60
Eski sanayici
Şu an emekli
Evli
Spora meraklı

reviews.comments:
Ali was a perfect host.   There to help direct our taxi driver to the location as it is in a very old/wonderful neighborhood with tiny, winding streets.  The apartment was as fabulous as described - the location and view of the Bosphorous could not be any nicer.   We spent the next three days easily walking around Galata Tower area and across the Galata Bridge to all of the key sights in old Istanbul.  It is a walker's paradise.   Also, the stocking of the refrigerator with some starter groceries was most appreciated.

I would make this my overwhelming choice for a return visit to Istanbul.

Ali was most attentive to communicating back with us on any matters needing his help.

We loved staying in this Penthouse apartment. It was the perfect end to our honeymoon in Turkey. When Ali opened up the blinds on our arrival, our immediate reaction was 'wow'!! The views over the Bosphorus are incredible and so breakfast each morning was a real treat. 

Ali was a wonderful host. So many great recommendations including a delicious local restaurant where the food was mouth-wateringly good as well as an amazing hammam experience which was definitely worth the money! Ali was on hand for our every question and booked our reservations for us too which was so helpful. 

The apartment was in a great location and so close to the Galata Tower. The cafes close by are also definitely worth a visit as the food there was delicious. 

It's also not often you find places with seriously comfortable pillows but the ones on this bed were so good you wanted to take home! Thank you Ali... We'll be back!

Ali's place was absolutely breathtaking, it was clean and tidy with the most beautiful view. The bed was also very comfortable. Ali was a great host - he had a welcome kit with recommendations and transit pass, which turned out to be very useful. I would not only stay there again but highly recommend it. The location is very desirable and easy to access.

My friend and I had a great time in Ali's place. The appartement is just perfect, very confortable, nicely decorated and the view is simply amazing ! It is very central and Ali was very helpful. We will definitely come back to his place for our next time in Istanbul.

We had a wonderful time at Ali's apartment. The view is truly breathtaking, you could spend your whole stay staring out at the view of the Bosphorus, the historical centre and the Asian side. Ali was also very helpful and welcoming, booking transport from and to the airport for us, providing a map of the city, a transport card, making a reservation at a great restaurant and providing tips for our stay. The apartment is very comfortable, including the bed, and has everything you need. It is also very well located, a short walk to Galata Tower, to Istiklal Street (up a steep road), or down to Karaköy or the Galata bridge. The neighbourhood has lots of cool shops, cafés and restaurants. Wifi was a bit hit and miss but it seems this was a temporary problem during our stay. Highly recommended!

Great studio in the best neighborhood in Istanbul (Beyoglu). Everything is within walking distance. The views from the flat are amazing and the flat itself is perfect for a stay in the city.

Ali was a kind and gracious host who was happy to help us with bookings for several activities and was eager to offer us advice and guidance  with regards to the city.

Will gladly return again to stay in the flat for the next visit to Istanbul!

A perfect base for exploring Istanbul. Firstly, the apartment is beautiful, and the views absolutely stunning! Secondly, the neighbourhood is fabulous, filled with great cafés and boutique shops, and minutes from Galata tower. It is also a short walk or tram over the bridge to all Istanbul's famous mosques and bazaars. Finally, Ali is an excellent host who was extremely helpful during our stay, even when we had to stay an extra night!! Highly, highly recommended.

Dear Ali,
thanks a lot for your warm welcome at our arrival mid night!
We had a wonderful vacation time in your charming appartment with a romantic view over the old city
best regards and see you again next time in Istanbul
Daniel

Ali was a great host. The view of the Bosphorus from the penthouse is breathtaking. The beds are very comfortable and linens of a high quality. The housekeeping is outstanding with the greatest attention to detail.

There was pouring rain and thunderstorms on the first day, and Ali provided us with umbrellas. Ali made a Turkish coffee upon check-in.

Ali is a great host! Welcoming, flexible, very friendly en helpful with useful tips. The appartment is situated only 5 minutes walking from the Galata-tower and still in a friendly, quiet and safe neighborhood. Around you will find some local shops and e few good places for breakfast. The appartment itself is well equiped. And the view.... wel the view.... Is indeed amazing. At daytime as well at night. Great to have breakfast with such a view! All in all we had a good time in Istanbul and would, although the appartment is a bit expensive, surely recommend to book this place. Thanks Ali!

Ali was very helpful and prompt with his communication and directions. The apartment has stunning views and is in a highly convenient area to shops and the sights in a very funky area. Would highly recommend the stay and Ali.

This unit is in a cool neighborhood "across" from the Old City.  It has specialty shops and is near the historic Galata tower which offers an amazing view of central Istanbul.  Ali did a good job of arranging transport for us.  The unit was spotless and had everything as advertised.  The view out the large front windows was amazing.  We were very comfortable and would definitely recommend this location and unit.
Nice apartment in superb location near Galata tower and Istiklal st... Very nice gesture from Ali to order us a taxi on our last day, thank you so much!
Apt is in an ideal location, close to Tram  & shops.  Ali was easy to get in touch with and helped us make arrangements before arriving.

Great place in a great area... The apartment is beautifully furnished, there is a lift which comes in handy given it's the penthouse. The view is also stunning. It can get very hot, but turning on the AC and briefly opening the windows to let the hot air out soon cools the space down. Ali was very friendly and super helpful, a great host.

Amazing and quirky neighbourhood with plenty of great cafes and restaurants to have anything from breakfast to dinner. The flat was in a very nice complex (Ali was kind enough to give instructions to the cab driver) and had amazing views of Istanbul.

I was admittedly skeptical upon booking the flat as such a low price for such a great view and location couldn't be true...but this place is spectacular.  The room is very nicely sized for 2 quests; the bed is quite comfortable; the bathroom modern and nicely lit...and the view is just amazing.  A true panoramic view of the Bosphorus and Topkapi, the Blue Mosque, etc... and you see it from sunrise to sunset.  The south facing floor to ceiling windows slide open and the west facing bamk of windows open to provide a nice cross breeze (but it's nice there's an ac unit as the sun heats up this top-floor room).

And Ali is a wonderful host.  He made check-in rather quick and was very available when needed.  (The elevator didn't work one morning and upon telling Ali this he hopped on the phone and we arrived back to the flat after lunch to a working lift.)

And the location is fantastic.  There are several nearby restaurants and cafes and attractions...and it's a great jumping-off point for those who like to walk.  That said, it's difficult to find if you don't know the area, but once there it's easy to arrive at.  Also, it is a place for walkers as it rests at the bottom of a hill on a cobble-stone street.

I cannot recommend this location enough and I hope to be fortunate enough to return.

Excellent communication from Ali who, in addition to providing information on the neighborhood, graciously assisted us in solving an issue with our taxi when the road was temporarily blocked.  He walked some blocks away to find the cab and suggested a detour to the driver so we could make our flight.  Neighborhood is quiet and safe, filled with coffee houses, family groceries, and small restaurants.  Outstanding location, very close to Istiklal Caddesi, Galata Tower, 11 minute walk to the Galata Bridge, and short walk to public transportation.  Flat is quite comfortable and the view is amazing.  Highly recommend!
The view from the flat is beautiful. It is a good space for two people, and the neighborhood is very well located near lots of restaurants and transit options.
I warmly recommande the place: near to transfers, near to shops, bars, clubs .... Clean, easy to approach. The view from the flat is amazing!!

First off, the view from the floor to ceiling windows in the penthouse apartment was spectacular, amazing views over the Bosphorus to Asia and across the Golden Horn to old Istanbul. Absolutely fantastic. 
The neighbourhood is great, a really hip and young area with great bars, restaurants and shopping all within 5-15 min walk from the flat. Loads of quirky boutique shops for clothes, accessories etc on the same street, and some great little coffee shops that do lovely breakfast. 
Definitely the less tourist end of Istanbul, and a short (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) min uber ride across the Golden Horn to all the major tourist sites. 
Ali was a great host, perfect comms, came out to meet us when (Hidden by Airbnb) maps and the taxi driver could only get us to within 50m of the apartment. Had some good recommendations, very approachable and friendly and charming.
Apartment was an open plan area, perfect space for a couple for a long weekend, had all the amenities needed for a pleasant stay.

Thanks very much Ali for the very comfortable apartment and especially for your availability to the late check-in on Tuesday night. It was a very nice flat with a beautiful view, we've enjoyed it! The coach and the bed were comfortable, the shower was perfect, the decoration was nice. The location was perfect in a very cool street in an authentic neighborhood with different kind of boutiques and cute little coffee places. Thanks again and I will definitely recommend your flat! Best, Pauline and giacomo

Thanks so much for a wonderful stay! The view really is as good or better than the pictures, exactly what we were looking for.

Details are so important, and this place has them - no dust, lovely selection of soaps, clean fridge etc...was very pleased overall.

Ali Bey was there to warmly welcome us and was extremely helpful. How do I buy this apartment?! :)
Nice STUDIO, please note that there is only 1 room for the whole apt. Super nice views and comfortable apt! Thanks for the stay!

Ali was very correct and pleasant host. He asked us for arrival information beforehand, recommended how to get to the location with minimal expences.
The flat is not very high in cellings, but spacy enought for couple. We concider it to be a true romantic place. The panoramic view of Bosphorus, location near Galata Tover and metro are worth to come back here again. Very positive impressions from both of us!
The host canceled this reservation 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Beautiful location. Unbeatable views of the Bosphorus. Would definitely stay again! Thanks for a wonderful stay and great hospitality.

I have had the pleasure of having stayed in here. ALI is a wonderful host and the location is fantastic. Loved the fact it is peaceful - yet so close to everything. It is my first time in Istanbul and definitely God willing not my last. Recommending anyone looking at places to have a peak at this place.

We have great time in Istanbol and this place was wonderful with great view have nice balcony.
And Ali was great man very very kindly , he always help us when we need a help.

This is a nice little place very close to Istanbul's main shopping street with fantastic views over the Bosphorus. The bed is comfortable and supportive. Would have been nice to have a proper duvet though. The aircon works well - and is needed as relief from the August steam outside. Just missing a nice balcony but generally good value for money.

We enjoyed the amazing view from high up and that we could open the window doors. Sadly there is a lot of trash and construction stuff right outside. And some men were working there. It really scared us when we had one of them on the roof right outside our window door, since we didn’t know they would be there. We felt our privacy was completely invaded. We wished Ali told us about the construction and the men being there. 
The kitchen was well stocked and equipped, however we were missing dish soap. After telling Ali that there was no dish or hand soap, the cleaning lady brought us some hand soap the next morning but no dish soap. Some other things that were disappointing was the weak wifi, low water pressure in the shower, the last day of our stay the water and power went out altogether and one of the blinds broke.
Clean, great view, fantastic host, central location! Highly recommend it!
Everything is great
Super locatie en echt adembenemend uitzicht! Het appartement zelf is heel schoon en heeft alles wat je nodig hebt :)
Location is perfect... and what a view!!!

5 stars cant even begin to describe the view from this apartment. Beyond amazing, it took this trip to the next level. 

The place was clean and perfect for our stay. And the bed is ultra comfortable for those long hill walks. Great location and easy to find. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking to travel to Istanbul.

On the plus side, the flat is very nicely located near Galata and the view is amazing. Sadly, on the downside the host was not comprehensive at all as regards our delayed flight (we had to book a hotel for the first night) and the constant noise in the ceiling of the flat because of mice (or birds according to the "expert" who came to check). This was my first lower than average experience in Airbnb. I would still recommend the flat if these elements change in the future.
A unos pasos de Galata y de zona comercial con tiendas y restaurantes, muy cerca del metro con una vista increíble a 10min del centro en taxi.

Ali’s apartment offered a beautiful view of the Asian side of Istanbul as well as the main sights. The apartment was nice and served us well for our 3 night stay in Istanbul. Ali was q great host and responded quickly to all messages.

The view from Ali’s Apartment was even better than anticipated! Absolutely stunning and is an outstanding feature of the studio with views of the Bosphorus as well and the Blue Mosque! The studio is spacious and very contemporary. Perfect location a mins walk from the Galata Tower and close to shops. Highly recommended!

What can I say, great apartment with the most amazing view!  The apartment is stylishly decorated and the bed very comfortable. Ali was so accommodating and made checking in so easy.  Very close to Galata tower and great coffee shops and of course our favourite bar the Tower Pub!  A great stay, thank you Ali.

We have truly enjoyed our stay in Istanbul in Ali's apartment. It is located in a quiet, charming, picturesque, delightful and well-connected area. The flat is clean, comfortable and provided with all required facilities. In addition, it has a breathtaking view of the city; one can see the Bosporus, Uskudar, Hagia Sofia and the Blue Mosque, among others, all at the same time.
On top of it, Ali is a wonderful host; he is always available, easily reachable and ready to help with any inconvenience one may encounter.
We fully recommend Ali to anybody who wants to enjoy Istanbul to the fullest.

A dream come true. 

If you like mainstream anonymous package TOURIST hotels, this is not for you. 

If, however, you are a TRAVELLER with a soft spot for comfort and modern style in an authentically renovated historic building, you will LOVE this place. 

I will come back if I may.

We stayed here in July 2018. The location is excellent (it is hilly though) - <5min to the metro underground and 7min to the tram. The neighborhood is stylish and filled with cafes and cute shops. The closest market is 2 min away and will have everything you need (water, coffee, drinks, snacks). It's a 10 min walk from one of the nicest hamams in the city. As everyone has already said, the views are truly unbelievable. The a.c. works well. There is a 5 star hotel nearby with the same views that charges 2-3x so amazing value. Ali is really nice and responds super quickly.  I'd definitely recommend this space

Could not have stayed in a better place.  The view from the flat is incredible and the memories of sitting out on the window ledge overlooking will sit long in the memory.  Add to that an amazing location and an excellent host.  Highly recommended.
Perfect location, super nice little flat with million dollar view! I recommend! Thanks a lot Ali
The apartment is perfect for a single our couple stay, with magnificent view!

We felt like we hit the jackpot with Ali’s place. Every day we would look out at the view and think how beautiful it was. And the neighborhood is great. So many cute and stylish shops and restaurants, and very walkable to galeta tower, karakoy ferry, subway, istiklal street. Ali was there to let us in, and was quick to respond to any communication.  He’s a very nice and genial guy. I would highly recommend this place.
Beautiful apartment in an excellent location!

Upon arrival and first stepping into the studio apartment the view takes your breath away.  The bed is very comfy. We sat for hours on a night time watching the ships travel up and down the Bosphorus. The photos of the apartment do not do this airbnb the justice it deserves which is very beautiful. Local area of the apartment is very friendly with some great breakfast locations nearby. The location is very centralized for most attractions in Istanbul. Thank you for having us and hope to be back in the near future.
Great host I will go back again if I'm ever in Istanbul
Great city, great apartment, great location and nice host. I will book again when I am in Istanbul.

Amazing location and amazing host. Near Istiklal, near Galata tower, and near key transportation ports. Most of all, the neighbourhood is an up and coming hip area. There are amazing local shops selling unique art and goods. Also, there are some great local places to grab a traditional Turkish meal with a modern twist. I'll definitely stay here again when I return to Turkey!

My husband and I stayed at Ali’s place for 4 nights. This was our first time in Istanbul and Ali’s place made the stay exceptional with the breathtaking views, elevator, A/C etc. From Ataturk airport to Ali’s place it took about 40-50mins due to rush hour (7pm). Ask to use the meters as the taxi drivers will give you a fix price which is much higher than the meter price. Once we got to Ali’s place there were a lot of shops/restaurants/cash exchange offices nearby. His place is near the Galata Tower. It’s pretty easy to get around in the area and walkable. We definitely recommend this place and will stay here again.

A very comfortable apartment, in a great location close to Galata tower and lots of restaurants. The highlight of the apartment is the fantastic view. The lift was good so we didn’t have to carry heavy bags up the stairs. 
Ali was very helpful organising transfers to and from the airport.

Ali’s apartment is located within 3 minutes from the Galata Tower. Panoramic view of the Bosphorus, Topkapi Palace, Haghia Sophia, the Golden Horn, and the Blue Mosque was breathless from his living room. Located close to shops, restaurants and cafés. Taxsim Square is a hop with the street car, too. Ali is an excellent host, gentleman and punctual. I will definitely be back again.

Despite our extremely late arrival to Istanbul, Ali went out of his way to meet us at the apartment at approximately 0100AM. Great communication and always available since he typically works out of an office adjacent to the flat. The view from the penthouse apartment was incredible. The location is also prime as you can easily walk (10 min or less) to all the restaurants, cafes and shopping on Istiklal and Karakoy (port/down by the water). It is at the same time a quite residential area. Also if your up to it, walking to Old Town isn’t terrible and takes about 40 minutes across the Galata Bridge.  While we never used the kitchen, you could easily make breakfast or sandwiches as there are electric kettles, pans, cooktops and dish sets. Very enjoyable and a great value. Will stay with Ali the next time we visit Istanbul. Also, if you are just thinking about a Turkish holiday my advice is to do it. Amazing ancient sites, museums, food and people. More importantly, I always felt safe, just use common sense. Cheers and safe travels.

A stylish, studio apartment with truly spectacular views.
Well equipped kitchenette and good shower room.  Very useful lift up from ground floor. Really great location, convenient for transport, bars , cafes and restaurant.

the location is perfect as there are many options to help you seeing Istanbul (walking distance to Galata Tower & Istiklal Cad.). Viewing Bosphorus from the apartment is fantastic, esp. at night, plus the elevator helps a lot. The host is also a nice guy.

这个位置和楼层很棒,可以看到博斯普鲁斯海峡,无论是日出还是日落都无与伦比的美丽｡而且有电梯,省去了搬运上下楼梯的辛苦｡有基本的厨房用品,自己买点煮煮吃吃,很舒服｡
有两个我个人认为略有不便的地方,一个是因为房子地处高处,这里都是台阶路,最好出租车送你到门口,不然自己带行李爬坡很辛苦｡另外一个是房间里没有洗衣机,如果你住多日,还是要找房东楼下办公室去洗衣服,不太方便｡还有床太软了,不过床品很舒服｡

As others have said, it’s an amazing view. I say stay for the view if nothing else. It’s spectacular. 

The apartment is on a very steep hill which leads to a vibrant area with lots of cafes and shops.

Be careful when you depart the metro station as there are several exits, some far from the apartment and it makes it difficult to find if you take the wrong exit. We had the address but no one we asked had ever heard of the street so it took us some time to find. We are long time world travellers so it’s not like we are new to finding remote places. Do be sure to get detailed directions from the host in case you take the wrong exit. If you take the right one, it’s very easy to find the flat.

Both metro and tram are close by but we preferred the tram as you get to see where you are going and it’s at the bottom of the hill as opposed to a steep climb to the top for the metro!

Istiklal is very nearby and an exciting street for strolling in the evening.

Lastly, the bed is extremely comfortable and this is not always the case when you are travelling!
Ali was extremely super host and he was very helpful
This a great flat, close to Galata Tower. Well appointed, beautiful views, in a lovely building. Ali was super helpful and very welcoming. *****

It's hard to imagine there's a better spot in Istanbul than Ali's apartment. Not only is it extremely well located in (much less touristy) Galata, but the view alone is worth every penny. Too bad we wanted to do so much exploring around Istanbul, as looking out at the Bosphorus from this top floor apartment is entertainment in and of itself. 

The apartment is the perfect size for two, and is super well equipped - just such a lovely, well-designed space. Ali was so helpful and hospitable (amidst our changing travel dates), and made check-in a breeze. 

Can't say enough about this place; I've rented innumerable Air BnBs around the world at this point, and this might be my favourite of all.

Excellent location and lovely view. Great base from which to explore Istanbul. Would recommend getting Underground from airport to Sishane whence Ali’s apartment is a short walk. The Big Bus tour is worth doing as is a bike tour.

Este es un apartamento muy agradable para 2 personas, con una vista inigualable, igual que en las fotos. La parada del tranvía está a 3 cuadras y este lleva a los principales lugares que ver en el centro de Estambul. La calle súper turística İstiklal Caddesi está también a un par de cuadras, con restaurantes, cafés y tiendas de todo tipo. Ali, el anfitrión, estuvo pendiente de nosotros todo el tiempo. Alojamiento muy recomendado.

Great location with easy access to the Metro, great restaurants nearby, close to Istiklal street and really easy to get to the old town. 

 Amazing view from the flat, comfy bed, well equipped kitchenette. We loved the call to prayer from the neighbouring mosque, very beautiful.

Would definitely stay again.
Ali's place is in the perfect spot to explore the area - shops and restaurants and Galata Tower at the doorstep.  And a beautiful view over the Bosphorus, incredible to watch the sun rise.

The view is incredible. If you are looking for a view then look no further. Whether it’s the morning or evening, the view from Ali’s apartment is stunning. The location is wonderful with easy access to the ferry, public transport, shopping areas and cafes. Ali was very kind and responsive. He was so helpful with arranging a taxi for me to the airport and answering any questions I had. The space is sparkling clean. I would highly recommend staying here!
great stay
You must visit this place

Appartamento fantastico, a 5 minuti a piedi dalla metropolitana (facilissimo arrivare dall'aeroporto Ataturk). 5 minuti a piedi anche dalla Torre di Galata. La vista è spettacolare (Bosforo, Corno D'oro, Sultanahmet: si vede sia la città in Asia che l'antica Costantinopoli) e tutto nell'appartamento è perfetto per passare qualche giorno tranquillamente. Consigliatissimo, di sicuro a tutti i nostri amici!

The view from Ali’s apartment is to die for! You will not be disappointed day or night, cloudy or sunny-  it is simply perfect. The apartment is modern and tastefully decorated with a few stylish pieces. Everything you need for a short stay. The location is also super. Right in the heart of the artists’ quarter and a few minutes from either the main shopping area or the Galata Tower. The tram (which is very cheap) is also near and the metro so it couldn’t be easier. Lots of restaurants nearby and thanks to Ali we would recommend the terrace at the top of the Radisson Blu Hotel, which is also in easy walking distance . This was a great stay made even better by a welcoming and hospitable host. Thank you so much Ali!

This apartment is the perfect base for exploring Istanbul! It was clean and comfortable, and the view was absolutely amazing - waking up in the morning to the sunrise over the Bosphorus is a great way to start the day! The bed was comfortable, and no loud noise at night. Ali was an excellent host, check in was quick and simple, and he was very responsive to all our communications. 
Regarding directions If you are taking the metro from the airport - make sure you look for the Istikal Cadessi exit as soon as you get off the train (don't just pick any exit!). It is a straightforward walk down the hill if you get the right one:)

name: Galata Junior Suite street wiew
summary: 35 smq Large, Bright and Modern Studio.  1 Queen size, spine friendly bed, full et kitchenette,luxury linens. 32 " tv with satellite and free wifi. Very close to metro station and istiklal revenue.
space: Serdar i Ekrem is one of the most historical neighborhood in istanbul. You will feel the culture and turkish new and old life on the street. This cosy studio is suitable for 2 people or a family with 3 .
description: 35 smq Large, Bright and Modern Studio.  1 Queen size, spine friendly bed, full et kitchenette,luxury linens. 32 " tv with satellite and free wifi. Very close to metro station and istiklal revenue. Serdar i Ekrem is one of the most historical neighborhood in istanbul. You will feel the culture and turkish new and old life on the street. This cosy studio is suitable for 2 people or a family with 3 . Metro station is very close to our building also very enjoyable walkting path to Galata brige and Galata tower. We meet with our guest at the check in time to show around and give the keys. Serdar-ı Ekrem is the busiest, liveliest, most popular street in Galata. It may be just one street but it is home to a wide variety of funky, fancy, and down-right quirky shops and boutiques. Just take it step by step, and spend a few hours exploring vintage shops, designer boutiques, jewelry stores and much more.
neighborhood_overview: Serdar-ı Ekrem is the busiest, liveliest, most popular street in Galata. It may be just one street but it is home to a wide variety of funky, fancy, and down-right quirky shops and boutiques. Just take it step by step, and spend a few hours exploring vintage shops, designer boutiques, jewelry stores and much more.
access: Metro station is very close to our building also very enjoyable walkting path to Galata brige and Galata tower.
interaction: We meet with our guest at the check in time to show around and give the keys.
house_rules: Misafirler bulaşıkları yıkamalı, çöpleri atmalı

host.host_about:
Yaş 60
Eski sanayici
Şu an emekli
Evli
Spora meraklı

reviews.comments: Outstanding host! Ali is very accommodating and communicative. The flat is well-appointed and very charmingly decorated.

We had a very great stay at Galata Junior Suite. The apartment was exactly what it's look like in the pictures. Our host Ali was always answering rapidly and was accomodating. The location is very great, with a lot of cafe and shops nearby, but also quiet at night. The tramway station and metro station are also very close. Thank you Ali!
I had a great time at Ali's place! It was clean, cozy, and located near metro stations. Would definitely recommend
This flat was perfect for me, and the neighborhood has charm and convenience. I'd stay here again with pleasure. Ali was very understanding when I arrived late.
Ali was a great host! The place is exactly as advertised. super central, super clean, cozy and Ali was very helpful! Would stay here anytime.

Ali's apartment was perfect for our first trip to Istanbul. The location was central to other neighborhoods Ortakoy, Kadikoy, Eminonu, Sultanahmet, and close to the public transit to get you there. (you can also take the nearby M line to Ataturk airport). Galata is quite hip with great cafes and coffee shops. The apartment was beautiful, clean, and quiet, and just a great place to relax for a few hours or enjoy the city. Ali went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. Can't say enough about our stay! 5 stars for everything.

Ali's place was beautiful, comfortable, and clean. It looked just like the photos. Ali was very accommodating, going beyond necessary service for my stay. It's also very near to the metro and some great cafes.
Great host and very accommodating! Stylish room was very clean and comfortable - great place which was super close to the metro and galata tower - Thanks Ali for a wonderful stay in Istanbul
Ali is a great host. The building is in a perfect location and the apartment is complete and comfortable. Highly recommended!

I almost felt like I didn't need Istanbul Card for public transport. Grate location...!!!  However, if you are light sleeper be aware that you could experience some noise from people staying in a flat above your apartment and flat in back yard...
Excellent stay. Central location, the room was in excellent condition and the host very responsive and helpful. 5/5

Ali's place is lovely - a great location and a comfortable space.  Ali was very kind, and was easy to work with when we needed to coordinate with him to use the laundry machine in his office.  We would certainly stay here again.

This place is amazing. It has everything you want: really clean, very nice shower, the bed is just great, much little cosy details to feel at home, perfect location. Ali responded very quick everytime and was flexible. Thanks for the great stay.
Very stylish apartment, in the center of the town, near Galata towel.
Ali has been very professional and welcoming. The apartment is clean, quiet and very comfortable, and is located in one of the best neighbours in Istanbul and everything was perfect.

This apartment is same as on the pictures. Very clean and nice for two people.
Positive: LOCATION is super nice to visit istanbul. Ali is a good and responsive host. Apartment clean, good bedding.
Negative-improvable: Internet is slow, especially in the evening, we had 1 day internet totally out. Bathroom is small, no shampoo, only bath gel provided. MISSING LIGHT, the appartement is very dark. 
Overall, we recommend staying in this place.

Ali's suite, was extremely stylish. Its was extremely well located, and was both near the main shopping street/area with the most restaurants and was on a quite street. It was 5 minutes of walking to whichever type of cuisine  you could imagine.
The apartment itself was very stylish, with beautiful exposed bricks and a nice lighting. The two seats featured on the photos were actually for the hall area rather than the room, but everything else matched perfectly. The bed was one of the most comfortable ones I have slept in. I renewed my stay twice.
Άψογη φιλοξενία...πολύ όμορφος και περιποιημένος χώρος σε ιδανική περιοχή! Ο οικοδεσπότης εξαιρετικός και πολύ συνεργάσιμος!

Ali is a warm and considerate host who did his best to make us feel welcomed. The studio is uniquely furnished with a distinct character, clean and has all you need for a short trip. The apartment is located in the most charming area in Beyoglu, with cozy cafés and sophisticated restaurants nearby. It is close to the shopping mile Istiklal Cd., the metro station Sishane but you can also easily walk to the main attractions from Karaköy through the Galata Bridge to Eminönü.  We had a wonderful time here and the apartment definitely enhanced our Istanbul experience. We would come back.

Thank you for your hospitality, Ali!
These are very nice and cozy apartments. Very stylish design, Furniture and equipment are in good condition. Maybe the area of the room is a little less than I would like, but it also gives a kind of charm))). I will recommend it to friends!

(Website hidden by Airbnb) location. Stone throw away from subway, Taksim main shopping street, Galata tower and the restaurants and bars nearby. Ferry stop to cross Bosphorus 15 min away by foot. 
Stylish, clean and cozy apartment. Comfy bed and quality shower. 
We would stay again!

Beautiful little apartment in possibly the best location in the entire town. Loved Ali (our host) and our stay, however unfortunately had to knock the review down a couple of notches for one reason - the noise! The street noise was one thing (noisy sellers yelling walking past, traffic over cobblestones, call to prayer) but the noise from our upstairs neighbors was unbearable! Constant thump thumping as they walked around at all hours of the night. I’d recommend the building, but make sure you get one of the apartments on the higher floors.
Mycket trevlig och hippt inredd lägenhet, nära till det mesta. Ali var väldigt trevlig. Rekommenderas varmt!

Stylish and quiet apartment near Tunnel and Galata tower, 3 minutes to metro station. It has everything for traveler needs. There are many nice cafes/pubs/restaurants with great food within easy reach. We had a good time there.
Ali is very helpful host, he quickly responded to our questions.

I loved this place! Near Galata tower, but very quite street. ALi very nice man, i wish i will come back to his apartment! Ali, i wish you good luck and it was realy nice to meet you! I recommend this place! !

Apartamento muy bien situado cerca de Galata y de la calle Istiklal. Si no os perdeis, está a cinco minutos del metro, eso sí, en una calle en cuesta, como casi todas en Estambul. 
Olvidaros de cocinar. Solo hay una placa portátil, un horno mini encima de los armarios de la cocina (imposible alcanzarlo sin una escalera. Y para comer hay una mesa con una única silla. 
No hay nada (ni planos, ni información y tampoco las típicas cosas básicas que pasan de unos huéspedes a otros (sal, azucar y cosas así). En los alrededores hay pequeñas tiendas donde comprar leche, agua y poco más.
Antesde nuestra llegada, Ali nos respondió siempre puntualmente, pero el día de la llegada fue un poco caótico: tuvimos problemas de cobertura y contactamos mas tarde de los esperado con Ali; nos perdimos y no nos supo indicar como llegar al apartamento y despuñes de tres llamadas. se enfadó y nos dijo que nos espabiláramos y que cuando llegáramos le avisáramos. encontramos un coche de policia que nos ayudó a encontrar el camino y cuando llegamos al apartamento nos tocó esperar 20 minutos en la calle a las 11 de la noche.
Aún con los pequeños inconvenientes, es un buen apartamento.

Ali is very helpful, friendly and a great host. We have had a very nice stay in his place. The best location! near to the Galata Tower and Sishane. Really easy to go everywhere in the city.
We want to say thank you to Ali!
100% recommended!!

Appartement cosy, bien situé, propre mais le seul bémol c’est l’acoustique et le rdc. On entendait les voisins même si ils n’étaient pas bruyant...
Je recommande quand même
Evimizde hissettik, her yere yürüme mesafesinde çok sıcak bir ortama sahip güzel bir ev. Ali bey çok kibar ve her zaman yardım etmeye hazır. Teşekkürler.

Ali is an awesome host. He was ready with instructions to get me from the airport to the flat, waited to meet me at the location, and was available all week to support me with answers to my questions about the sites, transportation, etc. The location is ideal--this is probably the hippest place you could stay, not only  in the Galata/Beyoglu area, but its on a side street that seems to have some of the newest cafes/shops/restaurants even by the neighborhood's standards. The space is cool, it has high ceilings, modern decor, strong shower. Highly recommended.
Gayet guzeldi. Memnun kaldik.
非常优越的地理位置,靠近轻轨与地铁｡距离加拉太塔以及Taksim都非常近｡周边街道很时尚,非常适合年轻人

Absolutely amazing place, Ali was an incredible host and if you're looking for a place to stay in Istanbul this is it!

The apartment is located on  quiet street in the Galata neighbourhood a short walk away from Şişhane metro station.  After a delay at the airport, Ali greeted me warmly at the front door and showed me the space which is very accurate.  Probably the best Airbnb I have stayed in this entire trip.  He also provided me with suggestions on where to go, what to see, places to eat, where the grocery store was and where the catch public transportation.

Ali was very responsive and accommodating, I couldn't have asked for a better host.  When I return to Istanbul, and I will, I will hopefully be able to stay at Ali's place again.
Great location near İstiklal and Karaköy. A few minutes walk from Yeni Lokanta, one of the best restaurants in Istanbul

Great location. Great apartment. Even though we never met Ali  everything was smooth and handled well.  Ali was still very responsive and helpful. It is a bit noisy as it's the ground apartment but it's just becomes part of the atmosphere and the bed is just so comfortable you can sleep through anything.

The biggest merit of Ali’s place is its location- away from crowds and noise but still close to Galata Tower! The room itself is spacious but also with every amenity that one might need. Close to eat are many nice cafes, restaurants and multiple shops! I also found it to be a great value for money especially considering it’s location. Definitely recommended by me!

Ali is a good host. Very friendly and very helpful. The apartment is perfect to escape from trouble in Istanbul and perfect for exploring Istanbul. We were very happy with our accommodation and with our host.

My boyfriend and I stayed for a week at Ali's apartment, and cannot recommend it enough. The location is perfect - so close to the Metro station and super easy to get to/from the airport. But most of all, it is located in such a cool neighbourhood surrounded by beautiful boutiques and close to great restaurants. The apartment is on street level, but it is so quiet at night! Everything was immaculately clean and had all the amenities we needed (fridge, coffee machine, air conditioning, good wifi, toiletries etc). The bed was really comfortable and had good pillows. Ali is a fantastic host - great communication, check in and out was super easy, and he is a lovely guy! We really wanted to eat mezze at a restaurant called Asmali Cavit (5 mins walk, just off Istiklal Street) but you can only book by phone - we messaged Ali and he messaged back a few hours later saying he'd dropped by and booked a table for us :-) we had such a delicious dinner there (definitely recommend), and we are so grateful to Ali for going out of his way for us! We would recommend Ali's place to friends and family, and would definitely stay again.

Great place to stay. It’s in the heart of Istanbul. It is close to public transport which takes you to all the tourist attractions you need to see. It is also close to a shopping district which has shops, restaurants and entertainment. The host is great and really helpful and kind. The apartment is perfect for any couple. It was clean and had all you need for a holiday. It is located on a hill. I would recommend this place to anyone

ali's place was fantastic
my flight got in VERY late and ali had no problem waiting for me to show up
it was much bigger than it looks in the pictures and also more comfortable than i was expecting
the bed was extremely comfortable and the shower was AMAZING 
the location was perfect, just a few minutes walk to Istiklal Street and Galata Tower and tons of restaurants and shops
i've seen some comments on here about the amount of noise from neighbors and such and the fact of the matter is that there was quite a bit of noise but, i just brought some earplugs with me for sleeping and had no problems whatsoever 
all in all this was one of the best airbnb experiences i'v ever had
i would definitely recommend ali's place to anyone visiting Istanbul

The apt is really beautiful and stylish. There are Cafés everywhere around and the Galata Tower is in 3 min walking distance, hence the apt is super close to the end of the taksim square!
There are cats everywhere in the streets, so bring some cat treats for a daily cuddle session! :-)

The communication was super! All questions where answered immediately and we were helped with whatever we needed help with.

We would definitely stay in this apt again!

The place is elegant, stylish, romantic and cozy. The location is perfect, close to the Galatea tower, in a street full of bars and nice shops. Close to public transportation to reach the main monuments. Ali was very kind and helpful. Thanks a lot! We had a great stay and we wish to come back. Highly recommended!

The apartment is very well located, tastefully decorated and there is everything yo need to have a good stay. We appreciate the cleanliness and the fact that is well heated!
Ali is adorable and does everything to please his guests. He really deserves the term of super host!

Thanks to Ali.

It was a good experience, nice design studio, perfect location, just 2 minutes from Galata tower, 1 minute from metro station, many nice shops and cafes around)

The stay at Ali's place has been nothing but perfect. Ali was always available for help, arranged for airport transfer, found a babysitter, baby bed, honestly it felt like an uncle. I not only recommande Ali's place. I also recommande the Galata area. Go there with closed eyes... Ali... We'll be back...
Ali's place is wonderfully located and beautiful inside. Can't recommend enough!
Great and stylish place. Ideal location in Galata. Ali was very quick in responding and helpful. My only suggestion would be to have better insulation in the windows for noise. Otherwise, all great.

name: Heart of the Mile End
summary: My apartment is available for rent. It has two bedrooms with double beds and a sofa in the living room.  There is a front and back terrace and it is situated in the heart of the Mile End with loads of cafes, etc. This is a non-smoking apartment.
description: My apartment is available for rent. It has two bedrooms with double beds and a sofa in the living room.  There is a front and back terrace and it is situated in the heart of the Mile End with loads of cafes, etc. This is a non-smoking apartment. Internet (wifi) Washing machine and dry rack Fully equipped kitchen Everything. It's a very special place. Bus are everywhere and metros are about a ten minute walk. No smoking inside.
neighborhood_overview: Everything. It's a very special place.
notes: No smoking inside.
transit: Bus are everywhere and metros are about a ten minute walk.
access: Internet (wifi) Washing machine and dry rack Fully equipped kitchen
house_rules: Like they would in their own homes.

reviews.comments: Thank you so much Geneva for letting us stay in your lovely home. The location is very close to all of the fun activities Montreal has to offer. The detail, and care you put in to your home was outstanding. Our group would like to thank you for your hospitality! Definitely would come back.

Don't be discouraged by the outside of the building. Geneva has a charming apartment with nice pieces of furniture.  She was out of town when we arrived but answered questions quickly. In fact, when we were there she had been away for a while and had had some AirBnB guests staying, so the apartment wasn't as clean as you might want. We liked the neighbourhood and the great cafes nearby. The Korean restaurant was nice.
Geneva was a great host.  She was very flexible with our check-in time.  The apartment was as pictured and very clean.  The location was wonderful and had a great neighborhood feel.
Great comfortable apartment. Very close to stores, bars and transportation.
We were very happy with our stay at Geneva's apartment! It was in the perfect location (close to Drawn & Quarterly and many other wonderful spots) and it was very comfortable.
Geneva was very welcoming. The apartment is surrounded with lots of tasty cafes and restaurants around the area. Will definitely go back to this place again if i ever visit montreal again. =)
Geneva was nice. The apartment was as presented. The neighbourhood is great. No complaints!
The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We loved Geneva's place, it was perfect for our small family. She was helpful via text for finding parking and quick to respond to questions. Great neighborhood too!
Thank-you Geneva!

We had a nice time in Geneva's apartment. The apartment was basically as described, and we enjoyed time in the apartment's two outdoor spaces. All in all it was a great base to use to explore Montreal.

Had a really great time staying at Geneva's in the mile end. Apt was very cute and cozy and Geneva was very communicative during the whole process. For my first time using airbnb it was overall a great experience!
Geneva's apt was great to stay in for our Osheaga adventure!  We thoroughly enjoyed the two porches and the neighborhood was very fun to explore.

Geneva's apartment is super well located, huge and generally overflowing with good vibes - from the aesthetically great kitchen with creeper vines around the walls, to the living room-dining room with a huge table to spread out on and soft couch, the whole place was generally excellent. 

It's also in a great, convenient spot in the Mile End, well served by public transport.
Geneva n'a pas pu nous accueillir mais nous avons trouvé un appartement agréable bien situé pour toutes nos sorties.

Geneva’s place was definitely our favorite AirBnB in Montreal.  It’s in an older building and has a nice quaint, classic feel to it: natural light, wood floors, some neat plants in the kitchen, and a perfect layout.  Their’s a small back porch with a fantastic view of the alley behind the house, which was covered in plants, vines, and people enjoying the air on their decks.  The mile end area was such a lively, picturesque place.

Geneva was friendly, helpful, and spoke fluent english (and Spanish!).  We enjoyed our stay!
The host canceled this reservation 126 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: 1 BR in Great NYC Neighborhood
summary: Enjoy a cozy 1 BR  in a convenient Manhattan location. A full size bed is perfect for a lone traveler or couple visiting the NYC. Walking distance to Soho, Little Italy, East Village and close to trains that can get you anywhere you need to go.
description: Enjoy a cozy 1 BR  in a convenient Manhattan location. A full size bed is perfect for a lone traveler or couple visiting the NYC. Walking distance to Soho, Little Italy, East Village and close to trains that can get you anywhere you need to go. - No additional guests without approval.  - No Parties.
notes: - No additional guests without approval.  - No Parties.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Living in NYC as a freelancer in the production world. Enjoy hosting and traveling!

reviews.comments: We had a great experience staying at Ted's place. He made getting the key a simple process and everything was clean, tidy, and ready for us when we got there. The room is small, but not for NYC standards. Don't expect to have someone sleep on the couch if they need a lot of room. If you want to sleep on the couch and can handle NYC living, however, it should be no problem. The neighborhood is the best part of this apartment, as it is 2 blocks away from some of the best dining (especially brunch, try beauty and Essex or Hotel Chantelle!) the city has to offer.
Accurate description, well located, lovely hosts, good value, close to all the good eateries and 5 mins to subway.
Had a lovely stay at the apartment. Everything was as advertised and awesome location.

Edward's apartment was great for my girlfriend and I to stay in while in NY for New Years Eve. The area is great and the apartment really gives you the real feeling of living in the city, with all the aspects that come with that. The location is superb and we were able to walk easily to great bars and restaurants. 10/10, would stay again.

name: Very sunny 3 bedroom in Rosemont
summary: A great and sun filled 3 bedroom with 2 balconies, in the heart of Promenade Masson (on a quiet side street). All amenities within a minutes walk. A great array of restaurants, bars and the cities best poutine are all within a 10 block radius.
space: Located on the 3d/top floor of a triplex, this 3 bedroom apartment was designed with sunlight in mind. 3 bedrooms, one with a queen-size bed and another with a very comfy pull-out. The 3d room is our baby's room, equipped with a crib.
description: A great and sun filled 3 bedroom with 2 balconies, in the heart of Promenade Masson (on a quiet side street). All amenities within a minutes walk. A great array of restaurants, bars and the cities best poutine are all within a 10 block radius. Located on the 3d/top floor of a triplex, this 3 bedroom apartment was designed with sunlight in mind. 3 bedrooms, one with a queen-size bed and another with a very comfy pull-out. The 3d room is our baby's room, equipped with a crib. Full access to the whole apartment, with it's 2 balconies, bedrooms, office space, et al. Plus the washing machine. Although we have no dryer, there is no need for one, as on a sunny day your clothes will dry within an hour when set out on the extremely sunlit back balcony. You will have the entire place to yourselves, therefore complete privacy. You might run into our very friendly neighbours once in awhile. As stated before, everything you'll need or want is within a few blocks. Grocery stores of many sorts (large
neighborhood_overview: As stated before, everything you'll need or want is within a few blocks. Grocery stores of many sorts (large, fruit + veggie stand, organic, health food), restaurants (french, sushi, asian fusion, pho, etc. Plus the bonus of best poutine in town!), and bars. It is located on a side street off Masson street, so while still being in the heart of the action, the apartment is very quiet.
notes: We would very much appreciate our guests to water our plants (this will take literally 3 minutes out of your day).
transit: There is the 47 bus 1 minute walk from the front door, which will take you to Laurier Metro station (heart of the Plateau Mt-Royal) in 15 minutes. But for summer, I'd go with a Bixi (Bike sharing), which will take you anywhere you want to be very quickly.
access: Full access to the whole apartment, with it's 2 balconies, bedrooms, office space, et al. Plus the washing machine. Although we have no dryer, there is no need for one, as on a sunny day your clothes will dry within an hour when set out on the extremely sunlit back balcony.
interaction: You will have the entire place to yourselves, therefore complete privacy. You might run into our very friendly neighbours once in awhile.
house_rules: No smoking inside, but feel free to smoke on either the front or back balconies.

host.host_about: Married musicians from Montreal.

reviews.comments: Staying at Simon and Erika's apartment for a week was our best Air BnB experience yet! Their home is a beautiful gem. Gorgeous, clean, comfortable, inviting, interesting, accommodating—staying here was everything one could ask for in a vacation space. They left us informative instructions, great recommendations to the neighbourhood, and were easy to contact during our stay. Rosemont is a great little neighbourhood; it had an excellent bakery and every basic amenity nearby. Despite being further East, it's only a quick bus away from two different metro lines. Would love to stay here again!
Very nice, big, comfortable and stylish flat. Simon is very nice and gave us plenty information. We highly recommend it.

name: Kowloon Mongkok 1812 Quadruple Room A,near station
summary: Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area – Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi. Free luggage storage service: starts from 9:30am on check in day / until 6pm on the check out day.
space: Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area – Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi. Free luggage storage service: starts from 9:30am on check in day / until 6pm on the check out day. Please feel free to ask for if you want to explore Hong Kong in local way, I have many suggestions for restaurants and places to go. Public Transportation  Mongkok railway station, bus stops are nearby, you can go anywhere easily. Getting here from Airport:  Airport Bus (recommended): Take A21 bus, get off at Nathan Road, our place is opposite to the bus stop. Railway: take airport express to Tsing Yi Station, then take Hong Kong Line to Lai King Station, then take Central line to Mongkok Station. The nearest exit is E1 Exit. *photos are references, room decoration will be a bit different, but generally similar. And all the facilities are the same.
description: Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area – Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi. neighborhood_overview: Mong Kok is one of Hong Kong's liveliest districts and includes popular markets, shopping streets, stalls and malls. The neon-bathed historic streets that wind through one of the densest parts of the world are worth visiting.  The neighbourhood includes one of Hong Kong’s most popular markets, the Ladies' Market, and also has a ton of shopping streets, which are a common feature in southern China. Conveniently, these are where a cluster of merchants sell one type of product on a single street. Mong Kok has entire streets and street sections dedicated to the sale of goldfish, flowers, birds, sneakers, and kitchenware. ･Sai Yeung Choi Street sells electronics, cosmetics and clothes. ･Shantung Street and Dundas Street are where you can pick up the latest Japanese and Western fashion and accessories. ･Langham Place is one of the many malls where you can do your Mong Kok shopping in air-conditioned comfort.
transit: The nearest railway station is Mongkok station (3 mins walk). And there are lots of bus routes running near my place. (Airport bus to Airport is just downstairs of my place). You can go anywhere in Hong Kong easily.
interaction: Please feel free to ask if you want to explore Hong Kong in local way, I have many suggestions for restaurants and places to go.
house_rules: Please keep quiet after 11pm. Thanks.

host.host_about:
I am from Hong Kong, I love travelling to explore something new. I am a web-editor of a women website in HK, i also have a personal blog, and i love to share my travel experience with my readers and friends.

as a host, i have private rooms to rent (where in Mongkok), and i am familiar with food & beverage & beauty products, please feel free to contact me for suggestions on dining and shopping. hope that i can help u to enjoy more during ur stay in Hong Kong. =)

reviews.comments:
房東人很好且熱心,提供我們一些餐廳資訊,住宿上有任何問題也回覆迅速且幫我們馬上處理好｡
房間很乾淨,盥洗工具與吹風機等都有,很推薦來香港玩的朋友住這裡:)
房间都挺好的,就是隔音太差,可能跟我们挨着进门的位置有关｡其他都很好!
Very good location and friendly host! Room is tidy and there is room keeping service. Definitely recommend this guesthouse to everyone!
房间位置很好,购物吃饭都很方便｡房东人也很好,很热情｡另外房间很干净｡

위치는 아주 좋아요.
근처에 야시장도 있고 지하철도 걸어서 5분거리라 이동성은 뛰어납니다.
냉장고가 없는 것은 좀 아쉬웠어요.

1､交通便利,距离旺角地铁口只有2-3分钟路程｡
2､房间干净整洁,房东服务周到｡
3､宾馆位于物业高层,虽深处闹市,仍可安静入眠｡
非常满意的一次家庭旅行,下次还会光顾｡

Nice place to stay for my family, in mid of Mongkok, Bus A21 directly from Airport paid HKD33.  Shopping and Food excellence.   Clean and comfortable room.  Bigger than we thought.  Highly recommendable

친절한 호스트, mtr과 버스 집근성이 아주 뛰어나 이동하기에 용의합니다. 주변에 park&shop, welcome과 같은 슈퍼마켓, 맥도널드, 음식점이 있어 편리합니다. 다소 아쉬운점은 게스트 하우스가 건물을 단독으로 사용하는것이 아니라 다른 주민과 한층을 공유하기 때문에 방음이 되지 않아 게스트 하우스나 같은층 이웃집에서 나는 소리가 들리거나 같은층 주민들이 복도에서 담배를 피워 담배 냄새가 나는것이 아쉽습니다. 홍콩 특성상 건물안, 길거리 어디에서나 흡연을 하기 때문에 이점은 게스트 하우스의 문제라기 보다는 일반적인 문제입니다.
Location of Athena's place is in the center of Mongkok which is nearby MTR station.

The place is very strategic as it was nearby the Ladies Market. It is also nearby the Langham place for shopping. The place is surrounded by nice local foods/ kopitiams where we get to experience the nice typical Hong Kong breakfast, lunch and dinner. The room space was okay and very clean as well. Mr Yiu was so friendly towards us and the check-in and check-out process were easy and fast. Thank you Mr Yiu for giving us some suggestions on famous local foods surrounding the guesthouse. The host is also very responsive towards my questions. Thank you so much for your hospitality and if we're back in Mongkok again, I'll definitely stay here again ^^
住宿的地方,离地铁很近!交通方便,热闹,老板人很热情,帮我们解决了行李存放的问题!
交通方便,房间整洁,房东应对快速

A small place but best bang for your buck. It is along shops, mtr & bus stops. Best starting point in any tourist attraction in hong kong. Staff are friendly and hospitable and helps you in any problem you encounter.
The host was very accomodate .
离旺角站很近,蛮好找的,也干净,安全｡

The location is highly recommendable.  Lots of places to explore around the area and close to public transpo such us MTR and Buses.  Easily accessible to   Disneyland, Macau by ferry, Ocean Parkamd evenNging Ping 360, and airport either by bus or MTR.
Everything goes perfectly. The host and the care taker was very nice people & very quick to respond. I will come back again.

As the pictures tell so that how it is for the room. Cleaned everyday. A kettle for hot water and sandals are a plus point. Beds are enough for 4 of us (we are just medium size asian). Toilet is so small but I guess that is normal in hong kong. The place is easy to find in a nice and secure environment too. We were served by hospitality from mrs joey & mr yiu.  It was a perfect holiday. Highly recomended for this place.
The best location near to MRT stations, airport bus is right out of the building. Good restaurants and shopping in a few steps
还不错
房源位置交通很方便,附近非常熱鬧

Easy to find the location, convenient for getting around by bus, mtr. The room is very clean, not to small, enough for my family ( 4 pax). Perfect location in the heart of mongkok, there are a lots of restaurant behind and around the building, lady market is just 3 minute walk from the building. I will be back here when I arrive at HK in future
香港,一个寸土寸金的地方住宿确实是一个大开支｡这次选择的这里性价比很高,就在旺角繁华地段,下楼就可以满足你的吃饭,逛街,购物,宵夜等需求,地铁站步行350米即可,可以把你送到香港大部分主流地段,十分方便!下次过来香港大概率还会住这里｡
真的比想象中好太多了,我们上午去的很早就先寄存了行李,地理位置很好,距离朗豪坊,女人街,波鞋街都超级近,走路几分钟就到了,住的很舒服,房间比想象中的大很多,沟通也完全没有问题,超级适合旅游居住,性价比很高,谢谢房东先生及房东太太
床比预计的小一些,是1米2的床两个,其他都很好,房东还准备了转换插头很贴心
还不错,地理位置很好,附近逛吃都很方便,很不错的一次旅游体验｡
位置好,商业区很方便,房间都好干净,就是花洒同马桶同一个位置,冲凉没那么方便,其他都很棒,房东也很好人,入住退房什么的都非常快,性价比很高
机场和地铁的交通便利 但是热水系统不是很好 需要错峰洗澡

The place is OK, what you see in the picture is accurate. It’s a small place but fits the price we paid for. Near to MTR which is Mong kok station and almost middle of all attractions. Also near to the mall and to the night market. Host are nice!
这里的房间很干净  地理位置已经很好了在这里你可以买到你想的化妆品因为距离很近

It’s a good place to stay. Very accessible, Affordable and comfortable. The host Mr Yui is very accomodating and nice. On our third day we needed to transfer room but Mr Yui helped us and we’re really happy
非常不错的房间,干净｡新兴大厦位置好,每次来香港都住在这个大厦里面｡
A very spacious bedroom but space for toilet is small. WiFi can be slow at times but can be resolved once informing owner to reset. Overall, it's good.

We had a wonderful stay at Anthena's place.  The location is superb, very near to MTR and bus stops.  Bus A21 to airport is very convenient and we just paid HKD33 for 1 trip. This place is surrounded by many eateries, famous roasted goose, Hong Kong style cha canting, fish ball noodles, wantan min......  The check in and check out were very smooth. The room is clean and comfortable.  Quick response from Anthena and her team, Mr Yiu and Ms Loke. They were very kind and helpful to answer our questions immediately. The cleaning lady also very kind and accommodating.  Highly recommend this place and wish to stay again in future!!!
great location in mongkok
比預想的要好的,唯一床比較小,實際上兩個人住更好一些的

name: Double 02 CasanovaRooms Barcelona
summary: Room at a 4 rooms apartment. Kitchen and 2 bathrooms to share. Free self service breakfast. Free wifi,  TV, towels, bed linen, Ceiling fan, desk and balcony to the back of the building. We also have at our guests disposal vanity kits and hairdryers. Washing machine, iron and printer on request.
space: Our Bed & Breakfast is located in the Eixample quarter close to the commercial area and the centre of town. We provide private rooms: two single rooms and two double rooms with self-service breakfast. You can also use the kitchen to cook your meals. We also provide free wifi connection.  All rooms are equipped with a tv set, clean bed linen, fresh towels, heating and a ceiling fan.  Were you needing to rent the whole apartment, please contact me first to arrange it. We are on to the blue line (L5) and our underground station is “Hospital Clínic”. Make sure you take the exit marked as “Sortida Villarroel/Clínic”. From there on, you only need to walk 1 minute to “Carrer Casanova”.
