host.host_about: Hi im Oriol
host.host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

reviews.comments: This was my first time using airbnb and couldn't ask for a better service! Communications between us and the hosts were very quick and the apartment  felt like a second home and was in an amazing location, walking distance to some of Barcelona's historical landmarks and only a short walk to Las Ramblas, Gothic and the beach. Defiantly will be visiting again and staying here, If you are going for a short break/weekend, I would strongly recommend this apartment. Great bakery next door too!

We had a great time! Superb location, apt perfect for our needs, very well kept, very clean! The host was Very attentive to our needs and was flexible and so nice. The apts location could not be better: a yummy bakery downstairs and a 24/7 supermarket across the street, a metro station with 2 central lines less then 1 min, 5min from La Rambla, El Born... And the area itself has it all! From small cafes and resturants to department stores and more. 
To sum it up, would stay there again, and would reccomend for couples, friends and families!
Just to be fair, the cons of the apt: when opening the windows there is noise (was not a big deal for us, just saying) and in some cases a slight  feeling of a metro passing was felt, even though we where on the6th floor (agian, fishing for a con ;)).

Excellente expérience ! La description et les photos sont parfaitement conformes et l'appartement est placé à proximité de la place cataluña et a seulement quelques mètres de la station de métro Urquinaona. Très pratique pour découvrir Barcelone à pied ! Même s'ils n'étaient pas présents a notre arrivée le dimanche, les hôtes sont disponible au besoin et la remise de clefs était une formalité. J'y retourne sans hésiter, 5 jours c'était trop court !

Ótima estadia, apartamento de acordo com anunciado, limpo e organizado, bem decorado e prédio possui elevador. Check-in e check-out pontuais. A localização é excelente, próxima a Plaza Catalunya.  Recomendo!

Appartement très bien situé, parfaitement équipé, accueil ponctuel et agréable, rien à redire, nous y reviendrons volontiers !
Situé sur une rue passante (donc un peu de bruit fenêtre ouvertes) mais il y a la clim si besoin. 6ème avec ascenseur. Franchement : très bien.

Thank you, we had a great time! I spent a weekend with my husband in Barcelona. The location of the apartment is great. Clean, nicely decorated, everything there you could need. From here you can discover Barcelona on foot well. However, a Metro station is just around the corner. There's a bakery next door and a small supermarket on the opposite of the street. Even the checkin and checkout process was very good and great solved. I would not hesitate to stay there again and recommend the Apartment.

Appartement très central, bien équipé, moderne et accueil ponctuel.
Rue un peu bruyante.
Pas de gel douche ni de shampoing dans la douche.
Douche pas très propre, et poubelles non vidées à l'arrivée.
Bref, un peu cher pour 150€/nuit (hors frais de service).

Everything was perfect. The apartment was what I expected from the pictures. The location was really great because it was right next to the metro and near Las Ramblas. Our host was really helpful and accommodating. When we left a passport in the apartment, the host was quick to help us get back into the apartment.

Bonjour Claudia,
A l'occasion de ce séjour à Barcelone, nous avons découvert Airbnb sur les conseils de nos enfants. 
Nous avons ainsi trouvé votre appartement qui a contribué pour une grande part à la réussite de ce séjour. 
Il offre toutes les qualités que nous recherchions avec en plus celle de pouvoir acheter ... des croissants chauds le matin à moins de 10 mètres sur le même trottoir. Vous avez aussi toujours été disponible et nous vous en remercions. 
Merci encore et ... peut-être à bientôt.
Cordialement.

Merci aussi pour les parapluies, mais il ... n'a pas plu à Barcelone durant notre séjour !!
Very good and clean place, helpfull services when needed (car park...)

Koni's place was perfect to stay in Barcelona. Walking distance to main sites; Ramblas, Catalunya pl, Gracias st and very close to Urquinaona station.

 I can feel that Koni tried a lot to make the place comfy and convenient, total 5 people were staying we all satisfied with clean and well organized house. Even she was helpful as help me in any matters such as booking taxi and recommend to eat and drink! 

For the last but not least, the place was quiet at night, no problem to even light sleepers.

The apartment is lovely, clean, and spacious. Location is perfect for our needs - the Metro (subway system), bus stop, and taxi area are around (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) meters from the main door. The shopping area, Las Ramblas, is a very pleasant walk (2 blocks) from the apartment. There is a 24 hour convenient store in front of the building, lots of restaurants, a pharmacy, and coffee shops in the neighborhood. Though I did not see either Claudia or Oriol, they were always in touch with me through text message and (Hidden by Airbnb) and were very helpful. The place is worth going back to.

A very nice apartment in a great location. Checking in was easy as instructions given were clear. Prompt follow up to any queries, made the experience easy and relaxed. Would definitely recommend this apartment for a nice getaway in magnificent Barcelona.
What a perfect apartment! locate, clean etc... If I go to barcellona again, I will stay this apartment.

The apartment was very nicely decorated,  cosy and clean with an excellent location.  Good size for us (family with two small children). The host was very responsive to all our questions and we got excellent information before check in. Easy check in and check out. Definitely recommend it!

The flat was very nice, very well located in the between to the beach and the city center. 
At the 6th floor of a beutiful palace, very quiet, clean and modern furnished.
Enter in the house is very easy through codes so you don't need to bring keys when you go outside, 
Just a note on the shower with a few water. 
SHe is always answering to your question by telephone or sms.

What we liked about the place is that it was clean - it's as if we were the first ones to occupy the unit. It had everything we needed, including towels, plates, utensils, air conditioning etc. The apartment is also located in the heart of Placa Cataluna, so it was easy for us to search for nearby restaurants, churches, and beer joints. Given the chance, we'd be happy to go back to Barcelona and to this appartment!

Μείναμε στο σπίτι για δύο νύχτες στα μέσα Μαΐου και ήμασταν πολύ ικανοποιημένοι. Το σπίτι ήταν καθαρό, αρκετά ευρύχωρο για 3 (ακόμα και 4) άτομα και πολύ όμορφο διακοσμημένο. Το καλύτερο πράγμα είναι η τοποθεσία του. Είναι πολύ κεντρικό και σε κοντινή απόσταση με τα πόδια από το ιστορικό κέντρο, την Placa Catalunya και τη Las Ramblas. Το μόνο πρόβλημα ήταν το ασανσέρ, το οποίο μπορούσε να λειτουργήσει μόνο με 2 άτομα κάθε φορά. Συνολικά, είναι σίγουρα μια πολύ καλή επιλογή.

The place is amazing, located in a nice part of Barcelona and close to all touristy areas. 

Claudia and the Koni team are top notch! Continuous and fast communication and they try to accommodate your needs regardless! The bakery underneath the building is by far the best and the cheapest... Continues queue all day, what does this tell you?

My wife and I will definitely go back again to Barcelona and especially this unit.

Koni team - thanks again!!!!
Apartment very well located and comfortable.
We had a great experience at this flat! It was very spacious and in an amazing location!! We would absolutely recommend this flat.
The apartment was perfect! It was clean and spacious. Conveniently located in the center of the city. We would stay again!

I had a very good experience at the apartment. It is in very central location, close to public transport and tourist sites. Apartment is as described on the website and Koni was very prompt in communication.

Merci. 
Super appart avec tout ce qu'il faut et situé dans un super emplacement ! 
Très bonne organisation en ce qui concerne la remise des clés pour l'appartement, le départ... aucune contrainte ! 
Merci pour votre réactivité, votre disponibilité (par mail, par téléphone). 
Je recommande fortement.

Great stay in very central location.  Host had a great recommendation for nearby tapas restaurant and was able to work with our early arrival.
Flat is clean and well maintained.  Wished we had noticed the air conditioner a little sooner.

Un grand merci à nos hôtes  pour nous avoir laissé cet appartement juste parfait le temps d'un séjour barcelonais entre copines! 
L'emplacement est idéal, la propreté irréprochable et la communication avec les hotes a toujours été facile et efficace. Merci d'avoir rapidement remédié  au troisième lit et merci de nous avoir permis de passer ce séjour dans un lieu si confortable et agréable ! 
Belle continuation

A central apartment very close to the metro and bus stops. The apartment was very clean and tidy, and the check in was smooth sailing. Even provided everything including washing liquid for laundry. Communication with the host was easy as well which was a plus. We very much enjoyed our stay.

We had a wonderful experience in Barcelona, due in part to this beautiful apartment.  It is well decorated and very spacious,  but the best part is how close it is to Placa Catalyuna and Las Rambla!  Being on the 6th floor, the small elevator was a great bonus.  Our dealings with Claudia & Oriol were very efficient.  Although we did not get to meet them, they provided us with all of the information on how to get into the apartment, wifi password, etc.  It worked out great!  I would not hesitate to book with them again.

Our stay was wonderful! The apartment was everything that we had expected. The location was PERFECT for what we wanted, within walking distance to the major areas we wanted to visit in our time in Barcelona. The apartment was clean, and had everything we needed in it. On the top floor there is a terrace where a beautiful view of the city. We did not see the owners, but they were very responsive by email and (Hidden by Airbnb) . They prepared for us the map of Barcelona and tourist information. We would like to stay here again and wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to our friends! Thank you so much Claudia and Oriol for fantastic holiday!!!

Muy lindo departamento, bien ubicado, comodo y equipado tal cual estaba en el anuncio de la pagina. Se  nos hizo corta la estadía en BCN. La próxima seguro nos quedaremos mas tiempo. Tuvimos un inconveniente con el ascensor cuando llegamos pero fue subsanado al otro dia.
Location was excellent and very central. Host was organized and made sure we had everything we needed. Apartment was clean, modern and well equipped. Would definitely recommend

It was a great apartment! Clean and tidy with all essentials you will need. Comfortable beds. Nice and elegant interior design, stunning view at the balcony. Great location, less than a minute walk to the metro station Urquinaona, a few supermarkets near the building, many restaurants and cafes in that street and the street behind. Very close to most of the sightseeing points such as Sagrada familia, casa mila and casa batllo, and the central of barcelona.(you can walk if you want, like 10-20 mins)

We already loved it on the first day we arrived the apartment. But what makes us love it even more now is that on the second day I made a huge mistake, the door was locked by accident and we were unable to get into the flat. At the same time we were running late to Sagrada familia as we bought the tickets already. After I told Claudia and Oriol what happened, they were not worrying about the difficulty to re-open the door again, but asking if we have left the tickets in the apartment. Thank god tickets were in the bag already.

We would love to come back again to barcelona may be after the Sagrada familia is finished haha and if we did, we will definitely book the same apartment again!! Thank you Claudia and Oriol for everything! Gracias!

Appartamento con un'ottima posizione, pulito, in condizione perfetta cosi' come appare dall'annuncio. Oriol e' stato gentilissimo e ha risposto ad ogni nostra richiesta su (Hidden by Airbnb) . Ideale per quattro persone. Lo consiglierei sicuramente ad amici.

Pisos Koni: What a great place to stay in Barcelona! The appartment is situated near the Urquinaona metro station (50 meters) and about 150 from the Placa the Catalunya. Basically the center of Barcelona is at walking distance. All comfort you wish for is in the appartment, great beds, quality furniture, Wifi and airco. 
Ideal is the 24/7 open small supermarket just opposite of the street
The communication with Oriol and Claudia was always nice and their responsetime is fast! We absolutely recommend this appartment for people who want to explore Barcelona with all its beauty: Sun, Beach, History, Parks, Architecture, wonderfull Food and great Football.
El departamento es muy confortable, está muy bien ubicado y tuvimos muy buena comunicación con el anfitrion
All the information was texted before hand. Very helpful host Claudia. Apartment was clean and well presented.
Nice apartment in the center of Barcelona.

Bellissimo e pulitissimo appartamento, a 30 metri dalla metropolitana.
Tutto comodo e facile
Grazie mille a Claudia e Oriol x le spiegazioni e tutto il resto
Torneremo!
P

We did not see the owners of the flat, only their cleaning lady, who was there finishing tidying up. She was pleasant and helpful with the key-box issue, which I had misunderstood. We did not contact the hosts either, as there was plenty of info inside the flat. The flat itself was well equipped and comfortable, although it would have been nice to find some tea, milk, mineral water, etc., rather than just the single pot of nescafe. A detail but nonetheless in need of fixing: the shower "holder" is broken, so one has to manually hold the shower set, which is a bit annoying if you want to relax in the shower after a day walking around the city. The area was noisy until the early hours of the morning (4-5am), but we were there Friday and Saturday nights, so I think this is quite normal for Barcelona and there are certainly much noisier places and far less well insulated appartments.

Appartement propre, très fonctionnel, bien équipé et correspondant tout à fait à la description. Situé à deux pas du Passeig de Gracia, sur une artère centrale donc un peu de bruit si on veut dormir fenêtres ouvertes ! Mais très bien, à louer sans hésiter !

This tidy little place is in a great location, footsteps from plazas, museums, and good restaurants, yet surprisingly quiet with the dual pane windows. Don't miss shopping at and dining at nearby Santa Caterina Market. World class. Even the sofa bed was easy to open and super comfortable. Any questions were resolved on the spot by the host.
Buena ubicación y cómoda coordinación con los dueños aunque no les conocimos. El apartamento está muy bien, como en las fotos. Facilidades para el parking. Cerca de todos los lugares de interés.

My host prepared the apartment in good condition and left a clearly massage how to access to her apartment ( door code & the place to take door key. 

The sofa bed also prepared well for us even thought is small thing, Koni also pay the attention about it, we felt so warm & luckily get the good first expression for Barcelona is not that bad as like others saying before that. 

We love the Barcelona people and living culture. Good respond, kind and enthusiasm.

The flat is just perfectly well located ! 
Claudia and Oriol very helpfull !
Thank you !

Excellent location and close to the metro station. The apartment is really nice, clean and perfect for spending a weekend or even longer in Barcelona. 

We had no problems at all - everything was perfectly organised and well communicated.

We would definitely come back again.

L'appartement est très bien situé, à deux pas de la place Catalunya, et du passeig de Gracia. C'est très propre, confortable et bien équipé. La rue est un peu bruyante mais ça va car 6 ème étage (avec ascenseur). C'est un très bon rapport qualité prix pour Barcelone. L'hôtesse est très serviable et disponible pour nous accueillir. Elle nous a trouvé un parking en face du logement pour 45€ les trois jours, ce qui est bon marché.
The apartment was well located and furnished. A great stay overall.

Superbe appartement très bien situé dans Barcelone.
Très bonne communication avec les propriétaires.
Encore merci pour tour nous avons passe un séjour très agréable.

We had good communication with host prior and during our stay. They gave us good instructions on how to get to the apartment.
We were not met by the host in person. They gave us instructions  on how to access the building and apartment which worked out fine. Apartment was on the sixth floor with elevator. Apartment was spacious, clean, and well furnished. Comfortable enough for four persons. Bed was very comfortable. There is also a sofa bed in living room, but we did not use. Kitchen was well equipped and had washing machine, but we did not use. Bathroom had a walk in stall shower. Unfortunately, the hand shower holder was broken which was an inconvenience since we could not shower hands free.  Ran out of liquid hand soap for the sink and a box of tissue would have been appreciated. Towels could have softer. They were rather hard/stiff. Otherwise, the apartment was very good. The only other drawback is the traffic noise even though we were on the 6th floor. The window doors shut out most of the noise and the shutters blocked any bright sunlight. The air conditioner worked fine, but was hardly needed. Location was great - near bus stops, metro station, shopping, and     eating places. Would recommend staying 
here.

We really enjoyed our stay at our apartment. Check in was very simple. Location was perfect. Near metro stop and airport bus stop.  Claudia checked on us to see if we needed anything. Bars and restaurants very close. Couldn't ask for anything better

Logement à la hauteur de nos attentes : fonctionnel, bien placé et agréable. 
Salle de bain spacieuse, chambre très confortable.
Excellent contact avec l'hôtesse qui a su répondre à nos attentes. Nous le conseillons !

We had a fantastic time at this apartment for my husband's 40th birthday. Claudia was the perfect host, she was so helpful and answered all my questions promptly and even booked us a table at a lovely restaurant and left a bottle of Cava for us in the fridge. The apartment itself is very central, only a 10 minute walk from the Aerobus stop In Placa Catalunya and had all the amenities we needed for our  stay, it was really well furnished and the bed was extremely comfortable.  I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone wanting to be able to walk to just about everything.  There is a supermarket straight across the road and plenty of bars for  drinks and tapas within a few minutes. It was perfect for our weekend break! Thanks for everything!

Ronda San Pedro 26 was the perfect apartment for my short stay in Barcelona. Modern. Clean. Spacious. Quiet area. Well priced. And a great location handy to the sights I wanted to take in, surrounded by great restaurants and coffee shops. Claudia was a wonderful host, helpful in every way, from providing information to ordering an airport taxi on departure. Highly recommended.

Quando chegamos, já tínhamos todas as instruções de como chegar e abrir o apartamento. 
Como viajamos com um bebê, já tinha um berço e uma cadeirinha de bebê prontas para ele sem nenhum custo adicional.
A todo momento mandando mensagem para saber como estava tudo.
Apartment was as listed. Nice updated bathroom, bed was comfortable. Neighborhood was fine, felt safe, could walk to most major sites and restaurants.

The apartment was very nice and very new. The hosts were very keen  as they allow us to leave our luggage before check in time.
The location is very good, just 5 minutes walk from Pl. Catalunya and few steps away from the metro. Communication by the hosts was excellent as they answer very quickly to our request. Very good experience.

El apartamento es tal cual aparece en las fotos, limpio y muy bien localizado. Los anfitriones dispuestos a ayudar en cualquier momento, tuvimos algo de frío y en pocas horas nos llevaron dos calefactores.

Great apartment in a great location! Comfortable, quiet and clean apartment close to lots of sights and metro stations. Clear and easy instructions to get into the flat from the owners. Couldn't have asked for better- would definitely return to this apartment in the future!

L'appartement est propre, fonctionnel et agréable. Il est également très bien situé ! Tout près du métro et de la place Catalunya (pour prendre le bus direction l'aéroport). 
Claudia est une hôte très réactive et sympathique. 
Je recommande vivement :)
Nice flat well located, on the metro station. The house is clean and confortable. Communication was great and clear. I reccomend this place

The location is fantastic. Everything was within a walking distance and we didn't even use metro/bus throughout our stay in Barcelona. Lovely cafes and market nearby the flat (nomad cafe for excellent coffee) The flat has a relatively modern design and comfortable for the 3 of us. For those with big heavy luggage, the building has lift!

Great place to rest after a long day exploring the city. Also very accommodative host, always trying to make our stay better. Recommended!
The best apartment ever! Very clean. Well located. There was everything we need. This place is definitely enough for our 4 family members.

Place was centrally located. Apartment is as seen on the photos online. Can be a bit noisy due to the night club across the street on the weekends. Easy communication for check in and out. Will recommend.

We have a lovely time in Barcelona, our host couldn't be more helpful.
The flat was exactly as described very cosy and clean. 
Location was great.
We highly recommended this flat.

El apto es acogedor, la limpieza excelente, es un lugar tranquilo. Tiene el Metro cerca y un restaurante muy bueno justo al lado. Frente tiene un Mercado para cualquier necesidad de último momento. Las instrucciones de la lavadora fácil de entender. Algo que me encanto!: es que tiene una canasta llena de información de todos los lugares turísticos a visitar y mapas para poder conocer más el Metro. La comunicación con Claudia es excelente. La recomiendo 100%

가족 셋이 2박3일간 머물렀습니다. 카탈루냐 광장과도 가깝고 숙소 바로 옆에 urquinaona역이 있어 교통이 편리합니다. 더블 베드와 소파베드가 있어 4명까지 머물 수 있으며 기본적인 모든 물품이 갖추져 있습니다. 관광가이드북 할인쿠폰까지 구비되어 있습니다. 바로 길건너에 24시간 운영되는 샵과 바로 옆에 아침마다 붐비는 빵집도 있습니다. 다만 길가이기에 약간의 소음이 있는 점과 침대가 호텔만큼 편하지 않은 점이 아쉽습니다. 하지만 크게 예민하지 않으면 큰 문제가 되지는 않을 것입니다.

Altought we havn't meet any of the staff in person they have been always easy to reach by phone and keen to deal with any problems we could have had during our stay.
The apartment is located at the sixth floor and the noises from outside can be barely heard.That's guarantee a very good sleep through the night.
Everything is just as shown in the pictures and we had a great stay at the apartment.
Definitely a good option for those willing to spend a few days in the fantastic city of Barcellona

Passei dias maravilhosos nesse apartamento! Localização excelente,equipe de apoio perfeita desde minha chegada ao aeroporto .todos os equipamentos de cozinha e eletrodomésticos (Website hidden by Airbnb) senti em casa!Recomendo sem dúvida aos amigos.Nenhuma crítica .

Jättefin lägenhet som ligger centralt och nära till det mesta i Barcelona. Närmaste metrostation ligger alldeles intill och mitt emot lägenheten finns en butik som är öppen 24h.
Ägarna svarar snabbt på mail och sms och in- och utcheckning gick mycket smidigt. 
Vi hade en mycket trevlig vistelse i Barcelona och jag kan rekommendera boendet.

Mi experiencia en Barcelona ha sido excelente! El departamento es súper cómodo, lindo, amplio y limpio! Si bien esta en una zona céntrica es súper silencioso por lo que el dormir ah sido un placer! Tanto el check inn como el check out han sido fácil y prácticos! Para recomendar! Volvería sin pensarlo!

The apartment was nice.  Very convenient location with good cafes around.  The host was very responsive and flexible.  A little cold in the apartment so bring slippers and an extra layer.  There is a night club across the street, when it let out on Sunday & Monday at 5 AM there were a lot of loud people but they cleared out in 15 minutes. The TV didn't work and we wanted to watch the FC Barcelona match one night.  Comparable to a 3 star hotel.

We had a great time in Barcelona. :) the apartment is in the perfect location and our host were really friendly and helpful (even though we didn't get to meet them in person). The apartment is exactly what the pictures portrait (small, clean, pretty and  good for a small group). Whenever we go back to Barcelona I won't even look into other places!

Really nice apartment in the centre of Barcelona! Excellent communication with Oriol & Claudia and perfect information on how to collect the keys.
Some overnight noise from the street but this is to be expected in any lively city. It is not a problem and the central location more than makes up for it!
We would recommend to anyone and would like to come back in the future!

The appatment was excatly as described. Very tidy and nice.
We didn't see anybody but getting/leaving the keys was easy.
The apptment is very central to any touristic spot or point of interest. Near from bus stop from airport too.
I recommand it I would stay there another time.
Easy communication, nice place, great location. Would happily stay there again.
位置十分便利,有超市､食店､地鐵站,房間舒適,有陽台,十分推薦!

me encanta pisoconi

me lo ha pasado genial 

era muy comodo y limpio
Great apartment in the centre of Barcelona. Modern, clean and comfortable! Great communication with the hosts. Can't recommend enough. We will definitely be back!

Had a great experience in Barcelona! The instructions for this place were very clear and easy to follow and location was excellent, walking distance to pretty much everything in the city center. Apartment was just as in pictures.

The apartment is fantastic, with all we need inside and very well located. The hostess is amazing, she gave all informations we needed to have a nice time in Barcelona. I strongly recomend this aparment.

Logement qui correspondait parfaitement à la description et aux commentaires.
Bâtiment ancien très agréable (ascenseur minuscule et capricieux par contre). Appartement propre, très pratique. 
La quartier est assez central, joli et très bien desservi.
Claudia et Oriol sont très disponibles et sympathiques.
Je recommande ce logement.

The apartment was very clean and beautiful! It is located in central area of Barcelona that really gives this apartment a plus one. The host was very nice and everything was well organized. I would definitely recommend this place.
Great apartment in great location. Clean and well maintained. The only drawback was the noise from the people lining up for the nightclub across the street in the early morning hours on the weekends.
Our stay was wonderful. The apartment was in a great location very close to bars and metros. The living areas were all very comfortable.

Great experience! The apartment is very clean and well equipped, really close to Plaza Catalunya. Oriol and Claudia were very kind with us, they gave us useful tips such as the aerobus from the airport which stops very near the house. Recommended!

Nice Apartment, perfect location, apartment and fotos are as in the description...
As the apartment is located at one of the main streets, it could be noisy.
The contact was very helpful, with a perfect organisation and always taking care.
We had a great time in Barcelona!
And we would surly book again...
The apartment was comfortable and had everything we needed.  I appreciated being able to check in ourselves thanks to combination locks.  Convenient location.

Excelente departamento!!!
Muy bonito, acojedor, limpio; tiene todo lo que necesitas.
Muy centricamente ubicado, muy comodo para una estancia corta o larga, es muy recomendable.
Si regreso a Barcelona, solicitare de nuevo mi estancia ahi!

따로 주인과 만나지는 않았고 비밀번호 코드와 키박스 비밀번호를 받아서 체크인했어요! 시간 맞춰서 연락하지 않아도 돼서 개인적으로는 이렇게 체크인하는게 더 편한 것 같아요.
집은 정말 깨끗했고 사진으로 보는 것과 같았어요.
그치만 제일 중요한 와이파이가 됐다가 안됐다가해서 약간.. 아니 조금 많이 불편했어요. 메세지로 잘 안된다고 했더니 이런 경우가 제가 처음이었는지 다른여행자는 작동안된다고 말하지 않았다.라고 말하고 따로 조치는 취해주지 않았어요. 안그래도 3명다 유심이 없이 여행하는 거라 숙소 와이파이가 중요했는데..! 
세탁기가 있는 것과 다리미, 에어컨, 부엌 등은 편리했고 
숙소 위치도 카탈루냐 광장에서 걸어서 5분이라 좋았네요 :>
비싼 가격대비 좋은지는 잘모르겠어요 다른 지역에서는 훨씬 저렴한 가격에 더 좋은 숙소를 경험해서 그런지 ㅎㅎㅎ

It was really cozy and comfortable to stay in the place. The only mattter was the elevator which only carries 2 person. The location to downtown was great, interior was fantastic, lobed the terrace. :)
Centraal gelegen, nette ruimte
El ubicacion es perfecta para visitar las zonas turisticas a pie (la rambla, el barrio gótico, plaza catalunya, etc.) El apartamento es amplio y cómodo. Fuimos recibidos amablemente. Lo recomiendo !
Todo muy bien. Excelente atención, comunicación y el departamento está perfecto. Pasamos muy lindos días. Gracias.
un bonne accueil, une place de parking a prix réduit et un logement conforme a la description

The apartment has one bedroom, a kitchenette and living space. It is exactly as pictured. It was very clean and attractive. As there were five of us the living space was taken up with pull out beds but we knew to expect this, it would be more suited to 2 or even 4 people. Location was great! It was less than a five minute walk to Plaza Catalunya. We were extremely close to a metro stop. There was a bakery, convenience stores, pharmacies and a couple wine bars/pubs very close by. We contacted the host via (Hidden by Airbnb) which was great. The host responded to any questions/queries we had in a matter of minutes.

Du côté de la localisation, rien à redire : l'appartement est très bien situé, juste en haut des Ramblas, à 5 minutes de l'aérobus, des métros à gogo aux alentours. Bien sûr, situé sur une avenue à passage, il faut s'attendre à un peu de bruit la nuit.
Le seul défaut de celui-ci a été le lit convertible : il grince au moindre mouvement, et il grince tellement fort que ça en vient à nous réveiller et même réveiller les gens dormant dans la chambre… Et bien sûr, il n'est pas très confortable. D'un point de vue personnel, les oreillers sont fins et durs, ce qui n'a plu a aucun des 4 personnes dans le logement.

We had an excellent stay at this apartment. The location is great with walking distance to most of the city and the hosts were very helpful and kind. There is a metro station 30 meters from the door and a lot of restaurants and cafes in the area.

Appartement très propre, correspond à la description annoncée.
Merci à Oriol pour sa disponibilité et sa gentillesse.

The apartment was clean and easy access, just like listed in the description. When we arrived it smelled slightly like smoke, but we aired out the apartment and it quickly dissipated. 
We were promised a map and info about locker storage when we arrived. Good experience.
The location was great, the AC was a plus and the place was clean and comfortable.

Todo perfecto. El departamento es muy lindo, está bien representado con las fotografías publicadas y está muy bin equipado. La ubicación es inmejorable, a escasos 300 metros de Plaza Catalunya, a la que se arriba del aeropuerto con Aerobus en solo 35 minutos y a un costo de solo 5,90 euros. Regresaría sin dudarlo.

Great place in the heart of Barcelona,  a few steps from the Metro,  6 /7 mins from airport bus, 3 mini marts in close proximity, awesome bakery next door, easy walk to the Ramblas/Barri Gotic.    Quick and precise info from the hosts.  Couldn't want any more

Claudia and Oriol were great. Our arrival went very smoothly, and they are very responsive. Any questions we had were answered right away. The location of the apartment is very central and close to all of the major sites/areas of Barcelona. Also, a metro station is literally on the corner should you need to get to a further part of the city. Apartment/building was very secure and has everything you need. I would recommend this apartment to anyone looking to spend time in the Barrio Gothic/Las Ramblas/Barceloneta areas of Barcelona.

Nos alojamos en Barcelona durante 4 dias, 4 personas mayores y no tuvimos ningún inconveniente. El departamento tiene lo necesario para la estadía.
Su ubicación a sólo 200 metros de la plaza de Catalunya hace que sea la ideal para quienes visitan Barcelona. Sus ventanas dan sobre una avenida de mucho transito, con el ruido propio, pero si se cierran las ventanas se consigue una buena aislacion.
Oriol estuvo permanentemente en contacto con nosotros y disponible para nuestros requerimientos. Recomiendo este alojamiento.
Trés Bien situé
The apartment was very well located...just a few minutes walk from placa catalunya. Very spacious and comfortable.   Oriol was very good with communications and answered all our queries promptly.

What a beautiful apartment in the heart of the hippest spot in Barcelona. Less than a 4 minute walk to Placa de Catalunya. You'll never go hungry! Restaurants and attractions within walking distance. The apartment was perfect, exactly as described with all the amenities you could need. Great communication. Clean, well located and enjoyable. I'd highly recommend this apartment to anyone.
L'appartamento era come descritto nelle foto, l'ubicazione è ottima per metro ma sopratutto per spostarsi a piedi. L'host è stato preciso e gentile. Ottimo
Very nice apartment, in the downtown, closed to shopping malls,  if have chance will come again~
Very good location, perfect little apartment. Absolut recommended!
Really nice. Just looks like Pics and Good location to anywhere.  Had a good memory in BCN

The apartment was a little difficult to find as the way the numbering system on the streets in spain works is a bit confusing! We were given lots of help to find it from the host so thank you so much for all the directions.
The apartment was fantastic. Everything is close to you. I recommend it.

Photos were taken sometime ago. There was a bit of dust. Towels were a bit shabby. Shower could do with a deep clean. All in all a great place. Great location (The Bunker didn't disturb our weekend). Shop across the road and bakery/cafe/restaurant by the front door. Fantastic to be 5 minute walk from where the airport bus drops you off.
Posizione veramente perfetta per esplorare la città, appartamento pulito e ben arredato. Ottimo il ceck-in H24.
Buen departamento. Excelente ubicacion. Tiene la dependencia de un pequeño ascensor. Equipamiento razonable para el destino de uso buscado.

Ottimo appartamento, carino e pulito, situato a poche centinaia di metri da Plaça de Catalunya, luogo di arrivo e partenza degli autobus da e per l'aeroporto. Sotto casa ci sono metro, bar, e supermarket h24. 
L'host è stata gentilissima e ci ha fornito tutte le indicazioni per raggiungere l'appartamento.
Very central neighbourhood and next to the metro. Many shops and restaurants as well as walking distance to many places.

It was a great location, easy to get around and close to grocery stores and restaurants. However, it was a little smelly in the room and the air conditioning wan not working. We were cold at night. Oriol promised to come to fix it the next day but she did not come and did not tell us either.
Cozy, clean apartment. Host is very attentive and nice. Great location, very close to Las Ramblas and Passeig de Garcia and many great things to see within walking distance. We had a great stay!
perfect

Overall a very nice place and it is in a central location. However, the wi-if was very slow and the elevator was broken most of the time we were there, which was inconvenient considering that we were on the 6th floor and we had luggage. At one point a group of people was stuck in the elevator and we had to call someone to get them out.

The location was more than perfect. You should stay here if you want to visit the well known places in barcelona. Most of them is within walking distance. Also the apartment was clean and cozy. Enough for 3 people to stay.
Muy buena localización,apartamento renovado,nos quedaríamos de nuevo.

Great apartment, walkable to everything.  5 minute walk to Placa de Catalunya (and Aerobus to/from airport) and Las Ramblas.  Very close to the gothic quarter and other sights.  Couldn't get the heater to work (broken ac/heater wall unit) and the small space heater provided was inadequate to heat the entire apartment, so it was cold.  Also the elevator was not working the last day of our stay and we had to carry our luggage down 6 flights of stairs.
Great location within walking distance of the sites in the city. Comfortable and good for a weekend away!
Piso muy bien ubicado, se puede ir andando a muchas zonas de la ciudad. Bien comunicaco por el metro. Muy limpio y acogedor. Recomendable para amigos o familias

Nous avons vraiment passé un excellent séjour notamment grâce à l'appartement qui est vraiment comme sur les photos, tout est propre bien rangés et très moderne ! L'emplacement est idéal à 30 secondes du métro Et à 5minutes de la place Catalunya. Vraiment je n'ai rien à  redire la personne est très à l'écoute Et à disposition si besoin donc j'y reviendrais à coup sûr !
Molto confortevole e attrezzato
The best location we could think of, nice clean apartment, in overall a very good experience. Worth to recommend.

Appartement très bien situé : presque toutes les visites peuvent se faire à pied.
Très bien desservi par les transports en commun.
L'appartement est agréable. Très propre. Idéal pour un couple.
Au 6ème étage, le bruit de la rue n'est pas gênant si les fenêtres sont fermées.
Todo muy bien

Excelente escogencia, de verdad nos sacamos la lotería sin saberlo con este lugar. La ubicación idónea, mini super enfrente 24 hrs, y la plaza catalunya a 200 metros que de ahí te puedes mover en bus metro o lo que desees a cualquier lugar! Por la ubicación es un diamante!

Con respecto a la atencíon y el servicio fue de 5 estrellas, muy serviciales y repondieron a mis consultas casi de inmediato, haciendo que la experiencia fuera muy tranquila. Nos ayudaron con la hora de entrada ya que llegamos antes y fueron sumamente comprensivos y preocupados que llegaramos bien. La señora que hizo la limpieza antes de entrar muy amable y buena gente de igual forma nos ayudo con lo que ocuparamos!

Por último, con respecto al lugar propiamente, bonito, acojedor limpio y con todo lo que uno necesita, hasta para cocinar. Totalmente recomendado y espero que este disponible cuando pueda volver a Barcelona!
We had a great time and the apartment was really good.

Positive review after staying for 2 nights here. Host was available via chat and entry instructions were clear. Location was central to all sites. The apartment was spacious for 3 people. The shower stayed hot. I would recommend bringing your own facial towel. The elevator is small but worked well.
The apt is very good, location perfect. Comunication good and easy. Only problem was noise friday night from the other airbnb apt at the bilding. In General recomanded

Logement très propre (ça sentait bon en arrivant), les lits faits, joliment décoré et bien équipé. Le wifi marchait bien, l'emplacement est idéal pour pouvoir tout visiter à pied et sortir le soir, tout en ayant un accès facile en voiture. Et nous avons même pu avoir une réduction sur le parking à proximité. Oriol et Claudia qui gère le logement ont été toujours disponibles et à l'écoute. Je recommanderai ce logement sans hésiter !

This is an amazing apartment in a great location. The metro is 45 seconds away. There is a parking garage around the corner. 24-hour shop across the street. Restaurants all around. Simply perfect location. The elevator is small, but it worked. You will need it since you are on the 6th floor. There is plenty of space and the decoration is great. 
I needed to print some documents and a print shop (Workcenter) was right next to the parking garage 2 minutes away. Oriol answered all of my questions right away and I had plenty of them. I will definitely stay here again if I am back in Barcelona.
Excelente ubicación. El anfitrión siempre respondió y mantuvimos una buena comunicación. Limpio , ordenado y bien equipado. De regresar a Bcn, no dudaría en alojarme aquí.

El apartamento es tal cual las fotos, muy lindo, luminoso y excelente ubicación! Está todo cerca, muy fácil para llegar desde el aeropuerto y para ir. El anfitrión estuvo en contacto conmigo todo el tiempo por (Hidden by Airbnb) , nos recibió muy bien y atendió todas mis consultas sin ningún problema. Muy recomendable.
La casa è bella, ci siamo trovati benissimo e l'host è stata molto disponibile
Beautiful place in a very central area . The apartment is great , very well equipped and has a nice ambience. We enjoyed our stay a lot and didn't want to leave .
Great place to stay, location is awesome and easy to find. Our host was so helpful!
The flat is perfectly situated and fonctionnal to discover this magnificient city ! We recommend it !

Ubicación excelente. Muy bonito departamento, muy limpio con todo lo necesario!
Excelentes anfitriones!
100% recomendable

Hermoso apartamento en un lugar privilegiado de la ciudad . A 2 cuadras de plaza Cataluña! Lo mejor la coordinación para la llegada y la salida! Todo súper ordenado para poder ingresar y salir fácilmente! Sin duda volvería!

Absolutely perfect!! Gorgeous from the moment you open the wooden door into the apartment. Modern clean and you instantly feel at home.  We have stayed in MANY Airbnb scans are host ourselves and this was by far our favorite. You can't go wrong with this apartment.
Muy bien ubicado

Appartement agréable, correctement situé dans le centre et proche des transports. Attention la rue est bruyante (circulation et boîte de nuit), il est impossible de dormir la fenêtre ouverte. Tout le strict nécessaire est fourni. À recommander pour ceux qui recherche un hébergement simple et basique.

This place is very centrally located in Barcelona.  As a result, it can be a bit noisy in the evenings.  We were only in Barcelona for 2 days, so the trade-off between location and noise was well worth it.  If I were returning to Barcelona for a longer visit, I would likely stay a bit further out.  However, if I return for a short visit, I would definitely stay here again. The host stayed in touch from the time we booked through our departure and the check-in/check-out process could not have been easier.  Here's a hint if the elevator doesn't appear to be working during your visit:  it may just be stuck on a particular floor.  When we arrived with 2 large bags and discovered the elevator remained at the 6th floor, my son walked up the stairs (minus the bags, of course) and just sent the elevator down to the ground floor - so no hauling heavy bags up six flights of stairs.  Incidentally, after reporting this to the host, it was immediately corrected and the elevator worked fine for the rest of the trip.

El departamento es tal como se ve en las fotos con todo lo necesario. Buena comunicación.El wi fi por momentos funciona lento. El inodoro se daño y estuvimos nuestras 2 ultimas noches con este inconveniente. Claudia se mostro amable en resolverlo pero al ser findesemana no pudo conseguir quien lo repare,cosa que entendemos. Igualmente dado que abonamos la estancia con anterioridad y por un servicio,nos hubiera gustado se nos haga un reembolso o reitegro por dicho inconveniente.
Very nice appartment in best location.Recomend very much!

The apartment is very central, within walking distance to La Rambla's. There is a metro right next to the apartment and a lovely bakery just downstairs. Prior to out trip the host was very informative, which made check in so much easier. Overall really enjoyed our stay here.  Would recommend !

The apartment is great, in the central, close to the metro station, and very clean! 
I recommend this apartment for you!

Excelente experiencia! La comunicación desde el primer día fue impecable, dándonos información y servicios de la zona. El departamento muy lindo equipado y súper limpio! Volvería y lo recomendaría sin duda!

Hermoso y funcional apartamento en la mejor zona de la ciudad, sobre una animada y bonita calle. Muy bien equipado. Un detalle no menor para recomendarlo: está a 100 metros del único supermercado de la zona y un autoservicio pequeño abierto 24/7 enfrente. Este apartamento es imperdible

The location of the apartments is perfect, everything is in easy walking distance. Extremely cheap bakery underneath if in need of a quick breakfast. If you have problems with small spaces I'd suggest sticking to the stairs in the building as the lift is made for 1-2 people. Lovely apartment, everything we were looking for.
We really enjoyed this apartment and everything is there that you need. Great location and wonderful communication from the host.

This property is very good. Location is perfect, close to most top places to visit. You can walk to several of them! 
You have supermarket, bakery, bars, restaurants right on your door. 
Metro and bus stations are one block from this property. 
Cleanliness was great! Nothing to complain. Towels provided were fluffy, very new and smelling good. Better than several hotels! 

I surely recommend this property.

Great apartment , as described on the website ! Classy and beautiful building with all commodities around. We had a very good stay with our 2 young kids . In downtown of Barcelona closed to subway station and major transport hub : plaza de Catalonia. No need to take transport for sightseeing . Very very good place to recommend .
Perfect apartment great for 3 people. Very centarl and close to everything.

Appartement superbe !!!!! À louer d'urgence l'organisation de l'hôte est top ainsi que l'emplacement !!! Metro parking bus à coté !! Bref on a passé un excellent séjour grâce à ce lieu

Idéalement placé pour faire du shopping ou des visites historique. Merci pour l'accueil, le logement aussi est idéal.

This was a great stay!  The place was spotless, in the middle of everything, and the check-in/out process the easiest and most efficient I've encountered to date.  We would definitely stay here again.
Muy buena ubicación, limpieza y buena comunicación
Quite centric, super clean, child friendly you have everything around. A lot of nice restaurants around and a great place to have coffee just next door.

Koni's apartment was very clean and in a perfect location! The check in instructions were clear and simple and Koni checked in with us regularly during our stay to make sure everything was going well! We enjoyed our stay

El piso estaba bien, contaba con todo lo necesario, limpio y en ubicación para caminar a muchos lugares.
La comunicación no era tan fluida, tardaba en recibir respuesta.

Lindo departamento. A la noche de un sábado hay algo de ruido abajo en la calle. Pero está cerca de todo, a 200 mts de Plaza Catalunya y la parada del Aerobus al aeropuerto. Hay supermercado enfrente y abajo panadería y bares. Adentro es cómodo y completo.
There was a little bit of street noise at night due to a bar very close by but overall a very great value not far from la rambla.
Einfach super. Sehr gute Lage, schöne und moderne Wohnung!

A wonderful experience! Koni was a great host. She provided very detailed instructions on how to access the flat and keys. The flat itself is centrally located and very well appointed. Every morning we walked downstairs and enjoyed coffee and pastries at the local shops. A really great flat for 2-3 people.
Limpio, céntrico y acogedor. Es un alojamiento elegante sin ser complicado cuando viajas con niños.
Respuestas lentas por parte del anfitrion. El depto muy bien, pero si van 5 personas queda muy pequeño
번화가와 가까운 위치. 간편한 체크인으로 편리함
Un piso muy bien cuidado, limpio agradable  con todo lo necesario. La logistica para las llaves perfecto comunicacion muy clara. Me guardo la direccion para volver ! Lo recomiendo! Gracias por todo

Excelente ubicación, cercano a muchos puntos turísticos, y en la esquina una entrada de metro. Muy fácil llegar del aeropuerto y estación de trenes. El apto es súper cómodo, limpio y tiene todo lo necesario. Incluso un mini super en frente 24hs. Muy buena la atención e informaciones que nos brindaron.

Host was brilliant - resolved all issues and communication was five star.  

Location was superb - 2 mins from the nearest metro plus you could walk to Ramblas and gothic areas very easily. 

Plus lots of coffee shops on your doorstep so breakfast was great too!  

Will stay again.

Koni was very thorough in sending through instructions, together with pictures and map of the apartment and how to get in.
Location is within easy walking distance to most of the tourist sights in the centre of town, and is also close to a metro station.
Having a lift was great, being on the top floor.
The apartment was a comfortable home in the centre of town.
great locastion cute aspartmen Check in very easy
Хорошая квартира с удачным местоположением

Great & caring host, made our stay lovely and kept checking on us we're doing ok. For any problem that arised she was quick to react and help.
The apartment is located in a really cool area. It's stylish and super clean.
Bed is comfortable!
위치가 너무좋았습니다
This is a comfortable apartment in a great area. If I ever make it back to Barcelona, I would stay here again.
Nice clean apartment. Communication with Koni was seamless. Would recommend 100%.

O apartamento em si é bom e tem uma localização top.

Mas a sujidade é muita foi impossivel utilizar qualquer coisa na cozinha. Lençois sujos etc etc.

A cama é muito mole sente-se as traves da cama.

very pleased with the location! tons of restaurants nearby and a cheap bakery just outside of the apartment. the place is very clean and definly big enough for 4-5 people. Lots of local info and helpful guidebooks to use as well! Although I never met the host, they reply to my request promptly and was able to.answer all of my concerns. Highly recommended! Thank you

El piso está ubicado muy céntrico  a pasos de la Plaza Cataluña. 
Es cómodo, luminoso, seguro y posee ascensor. Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar vacaciones en Barcelona. 
La atención vía telefónica es inmediata y eso hace la estancia más cómoda y agradable.
I love this apartment.
Evin konumu Harika temiz imkanlar iyi apartmanın girişinde fırın ve kafe çok iyi . Önemli not karşıdaki marketten sakın alış veriş yapmayın market sahibi gerçekten tecrübeli bir dolandırıcı.
El wifi del apartamento nunca pudo usarse, aparte a eso el alojamiento estuvo bien, limpio y la zona en la que se encuentra permite llegar a cualquier rincón de Barcelona.
Fabulous apartment and a great location.
방이랑 화장실도 깨끗하고 까탈루냐 광장이랑 가까워서 위치도 좋습니다. 호스트랑 연락도 잘되고 지내는 동안 아주 만족스러웠습니다~

El departamento es muy cómodo.
Está ubicado en una zona estratégica de Barcelona para visitar todo a pie.
El barrio se encuentra  repleto de comercios de todo tipo.
Destaco que el departamento  tiene la entrada de subte en la esquina.

Great apartment in an amazing location right off the ramblas- in the middle of everything with a 24/7 grocery right across the road! Couldn’t have asked for more, as any problem we had was quickly solved by koni!

Apartament jest bardzo śliczny, ma super widok z balkonu, wyposażony jest we wszelkie potrzebne rzeczy. Lokalizacja tez bardzo dobra, a dodatkowo sklep całodobowy na przeciw apartamentu. Kontakt z właścicielem bardzo szybki, wskazówki bardzo dokładne. Jesteśmy bardzo zadowoleni z pobytu.
Todo excelente!

Ubicación óptima, está cerca de las zonas más interesantes, a metros del subte. Muy buen departamento, equipado con todo lo necesario. Destacamos que tiene un colchón muy cómodo. Buena limpieza y calefacción. Recomendamos mucho este depto.
Très bien situé, propre, un peu bruyant le matin ( grasse matinée et grand boulevard ne font pas bon ménage...) et Koni toujours à l’écoute
We enjoyed the place (and the city) very much.
The appartment is very well located. The pictures don't describe it very well. It is far better that what you expect.

Great little apartment, we stayed here after staying on Las Ramblas and liked it better, as it's off that touristy strip and closer to the Born district. Close to the metro, nice shower, nice furnishings. Elevator is narrow and limited to 1 person with luggage. Place was very clean and host was responsive to our last-minute booking.
Accurate on all counts...comfortable bed, hot shower, great location for night life!
Appartement idéalement situé, propre et en adéquation avec les photos. On s'y sent tout de suite bien ! Communication fluide avec le propriétaire. Je recommande fortement !
Amazing location, beautiful apartment = outstanding vacation! That's what this place was. Very close to the train station and easy to get around anywhere.

La ubicación es excelente! El departamento pequeño pero cómodo, muy completo y acogedor! Lo recomiendo ! La facilidad de no tener desencuentros para el check in y check out es espectacular ... a conocer Barcelona en el dpto de Koni!

The places was really good. The check-in was very easy and the owner was very helpful and also had baby bed in the apartment which was useful. The location was very close to metro and other local transport. There is a night club in front of the apartment which might be noisy at night, but overall it was a nice stay. I would definitely recommend Koni’s apartment.
Amazing apartment in the best location, everything within walking distance and right next to the metro! Would definitely stay here again!
Einfach TOP✅

the apartment is ok for 2 or max 3 persons. for a group of 4 or more people is to small. location is very good. it's clean. only one bad thing, the mattress of one of the beds, is bad and you can not sleep.
Muy buena ubicación a sólo 15 metros de la entrada del metro

LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION!!! Loved this unit because of where it is located! Host was extremely responsive whenever a mesaage was sent, there was a small glitch with the wifi but they resolved quickly. Place is small for american standards but who wants to stay indoors all the time in barcelona! I thought it was in perfect walking distance to everything, we walked most of barcelona. They were great enough to accommodate my family and my almost 2 year old! I really would stay in the same unit in my next visit to barcelona!
Nice place with great location ! The host was also really responsive.

Estuvo todo excelente salvo lo del wifi que funcionaba mal y era importante para nosotros. Lo demás, perfecto. Cómodo, limpio, con toooodo lo que podíamos necesitar. Nos dejaron mapas de la ciudad y del metro para que pudiéramos pasear. La ubicación es inmejorable. A pasos de una estación de metro y menos de 300m de Plaza Cataluña, nos permitió caminar a la mayoría de los lugares turísticos. El departamento es exactamente como se ve en la foto!
L appartement est tout simplement parfait! Il est situé au centre de Barcelonne. Tout est accessible à pied. L appartement est super fonctionnel et très accueillant. Encore merci !!

Host provide precise details on location of apartment and how to obtain access. Apartment was very clean,  comfortable and in the heart of Barcelona. I would recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Barcelona.
Departamento perfecto para visitar y disfrutar a pleno de Barcelona. Casi todas las atracciones caminando. Altamente recomendable.
A very good location and public transit, the place is clean with a touch of spa feeling. I would recommend to stay here.

Nice flat 
Great location 
Easy communication
Recomended !!

El lugar es lo que necesitamos si estamos de vacaciones, cerca de todo, tres pasos el metro, buses en todas las direcciones, y lo mejor, lo usarán pocas veces porque todo esta solo por abrir la puerta, restaurantes El Barrio gótico y todas las atracciones 
Cultura se puede alcanzar caminando por museos , sala de conciertos y mucho más

Location cannot be beat and the amenities in the apartment were perfect! Would gladly stay again!

es muy simple el departamento tiene una ubicación excelente, es muy lindo tiene absolutamente todo lo que uno necesita, está impecable de limpio, anfitrión excelente.Ojalá todos los airbnb fuesen así.
felicitaciones koni y muchas gracias.

We loved our stay in Koni’s apartment, it was very clean and had everything we needed. The location is amazing, nothing was too far away as we was very central! Would definitely stay again if returned to Barcelona
Great location, efficient communication, easy check in, great view from the flat, very clean
This place was nicely located.   Our hosts were quick to reply to questions and provided information in apartment.     Very much appreciated as this was our first trip to Barcelona.     I recommend.

We really enjoyed staying at Koni's place. Check-in was easy with clear directions, and the location is excellent. In particular, we really appreciated the booklet that Koni put together with suggestions for things to do in the area, including restaurants, attractions, and the best mode of transport to get there.
Perfect location able to walk everywhere or nowhere as it’s all on your doorstep!
Brilliant location, great tips on places to eat/how to get around and a very clean and comfortable stay. Would definitely recommend.
Le logement est très bien situé pour la visite de Barcelone.
Appartement très bien pour un séjour
Excelente anfitrión,  excelente apartamento con una ubicación espectacular con todos los servicios al lado,  a pocos metros de la rambla,  totalmente recomendable
Apparemment génial, près de tout au centre.

Koni's place was great for our short stopover in Barcelona.  Check-in instructions and communication was top-notch! The location couldn't have been better! So handy to so many Barcelona highlights. Wifi was great, elevator was wonderful since the unit was on the 6th floor.  Very nice balconies overlooking the street. Overall, very tidy and clean, however, shower could have used a scrub down to get it online with the rest of the unit. That being said, I would stay here again!

The place is really nice, the issue whit the batroom and the A/C is in the living and never cooled the room .
The room is all day to hot!!
For that reasons i give 4 ⭐️

The rest was excellent!!!
Great location and spacious 1 bedroom place. I highly recommend staying here when visiting Barcelona!
Muy cómodo, con todo lo necesario.  y una ubicación perfecta cerca de todo y con el metro en la  esquina. Pensamos regresar pronto.

El departsmento es muy lindo y cómodo para tres o cuatro personas y sobre todo está muy bien ubicado. No tuvimos contacto personal con el anfitrión pero de todos modos la comunicación fue muy buena. Lo recomendaría

This was our first time to Barcelona and it was amazing! The location of the apartment was excellent for seeing the city, with lots of great restaurants and shopping nearby. The check-in process was smooth with very clear details provided. The apartment was well-equipped, and very comfortable. We would stay there again and would definitely recommend it to our friends.

This place is beautiful! It is in a perfect walking location to almost everything. It is cute, clean, and Koni is so great to work with. The wi-fi was  bit slow, but other than that we loved everything about it.
Great location!  Clean, easy check in, great communication.  Thanks Koni

Un 10 en ubicación, conectado con todo barcelona, a pie o metro. Beautiful place!!! Highly recommended for a great stay in Barcelona.

El departamento está muy bien , salvo mínimos detalles muy mejorables, estuvo estupenda nuestra estancia.

We stayed in 3 different  Airbnb’s during our week long trip and this flat was our absolute favorite. It was very clean and had two balcony’s to enjoy a nice view. The location is as great and we felt safe.The booklet of tips and tricks he left us was so helpful. We wish we had stayed there to begin with. What a great way to end he trip. Thanks Koni!
Wonderful apartment in an excellent location. Would definitely recommend staying here if you’re headed to Barcelona.

La cama de la habitacion principal estaba sucia,la ropa de cama tenia manchas sospechosas.En la cama habia algun tipo de insecto que nos ha dejado unas picaduras dolorosas.El sofa cama tiene una lado que esta hundido ,y para colmo nos ha tocado un vecino roncando a decibelios (Website hidden by Airbnb) ubicacion es perfecta,y la comunicacion por parte de anfitrion es buena.

Great Great Great place! Perfect location, close to everything and metro is down the street. Great food just a step away. Place was beautiful and easy to check in, everything was great would definitely come back.

The apartment is just on the edge of the old part of town, so easy to walk to those districts and also very handy for El Corte Ingles. We walked back from the Sagrada Família, which took about 20 minutes. It’s nice to be so high up on the sixth floor, as it was quiet for a city location, and the lift takes the slog out of getting up there. We had a great stay.
отличное местоположение

ottimo...  posizione strategica, per visitare la città a 360° ... metro vicinissima bus da è per l'aeroporto a 500 mt .... la cordialità e la disponibilità dell'host eccellente ... molto ben curato qualche piccolo dettaglio a cui prestare maggiore attenzione pulito e molto tranquillo  torneremo ancora  ... Grazie ...

Koni’s apartment was in a perfect location in Barcelona. Walking distance to EVERYTHING! I could walk to the bus stop, the subway station, to the grocery store and to tons of restaurant options. I would gladly stay here again for that reason alone. Koni was very responsive when I reached out to him during my stay.

Mi experiencia fue buena. El departamento es como en las fotos. No tuvimos problemas para llegar ni para irnos. El parking en frente muy comodo. Lo unico es que tuvimos problemas con el wifi que se cortaba y no dejaba trabajar ni comunicarse con la familia por (Hidden by Airbnb) . Todo lo demas bien!

Excellent appartement situé au 6eme étage, à côté de la place Urquinaona. Emplacement idéal pour balader . Très bien équipé, cosy avec 2 balcons. Il faut savoir que la Ronda Sant Pere est une rue très passante et du coup, bien que l’on soit au 6e étage, on entend le bruit des voitures. Pour les touristes, un petit guide est à votre disposition avec les lieux à visiter ainsi que quelques adresses sympas à proximité. Une belle expérience.

You can expect a clean, comfy room with all the basic amenities you’d find in your own house. Very well placed in the city that my wife and I were able to see a lot in a short time. We loved our stay to say the least!

All in all, the place was exactly what we expected! Amazing location, very clean and comfortable! It is perfect for a short stay. The only reason why we decided to rate it 4 stars is the fact that it feels more like a hotel suite rather than an Airbnb. If you are there for an extended period and want to cook, there is no oven (there is a stove though). However, I would definitely recommend this place! Great communication during our stay.

Un appartement idéalement situé et très bien équipé. Calme et cosy.
Je recommande.
Excellent Location. easy access to public transport (metro, buses,...). Walking distance to most central touristic locations. Very secured.
Appartement très bien situé calme, je vous le conseille, par contre connection au wifi laisse à désirer très mauvais .
Very good place. Location perfect. Everything as described. Will stay here again.

Excelente hospedaje!! Además de una excelente ubicación el piso es maravilloso, impecable, confortable , lleno de detalles que hacen q la estadía sea increíble. Muyyyy (Website hidden by Airbnb) dejen de reservar, si lo tienes es una oportunidad!!!!
Very nice flat, with a super location

cozy nice place at the heart of Barcelona!
practical and a must to have
Great location. Easy check in.  Everything was as shown. Bed was comfy.

Koni's place was so perfect.  It was so close to everything we wanted to see and do. Metro right around the corner. It was clean and check in was a breeze! We felt so comfortable there. Koni was great at communicating with us. Please try Salamanca for the BEST paella! Thanks for hosting us!
Appartamento molto carino. Pulizia e disponibilità buone. Posizione ottima.
All of thing is perfect

Oriol was super easy to communicate with. place is conveniently located with both walking and metro as viable options to get around. apartment looks as pictured and is stocked with linens, cups, and other items you might need. Highly recommended for tourists who want easy access to Las Ramblas and other sites by foot.
Very nice place in a perfect location. Everything was super comfortable and great communication. Recommend :)
까딸루냐 광장에서 가깝고 엘리베이터도 있는 깔끔한 건물이라 편안하게 잘 지낼 수 있었어요. 셀프체크인이라 늦은 비행기로 도착할때도 부담이 없어서 좋았고요. 추천합니다!

name: Private terrace and bathroom & WiFi
summary: Simple and private. The room is small but has lots of natural light and the terrace is right of the (Website hidden by Airbnb) you can enjoy the view, your breakfast, the afternoon sun and relax. Please note that the kitchen is only for making breakfast and that the private bathroom is an older model but clean of course! ;)
space: The room is located on the upper floor of my duplex apartment and this floor is for exclusive use by the guests. It has two beds, one is 80x190 and the other is 135x180, so you can either sleep together or separated if you wish. Please note that it is a SMALL room, but from it you step directly out to your own private terrace with a beautiful view to the Tibidabo mountain. There is sun all afternoon (during the summer months) so you can enjoy a cup of tea, coffe, a cold beer or a glass of wine after a days walk in Barcelona. On the same floor you have your own private bathroom, with a shower, toilet and bidet. Please note that the bathroom is an older model, but clean of course! ;) You may use the kitchen, which is downstairs, to make breakfast and the eventual tea, coffe and so on the rest of the day - PLEASE NOTE that no cooking however... I have a very docile cat, I try to keep her downstairs with me, but she just might go upstairs for a visit ;) My apartment is located in the Nova

Please note that it is a SMALL room, but from it you step directly out to your own private terrace with a beautiful view to the Tibidabo mountain. There is sun all afternoon (during the summer months) so you can enjoy a cup of tea, coffe, a cold beer or a glass of wine after a days walk in Barcelona. On the same floor you have your own private bathroom, with a shower, toilet and bidet. Please note that the bathroom is an older model, but cle
neighborhood_overview: There is a really nice bar/restaurant called Malasang  closeby, good atmosphere, tapas, wine, gin tonic's... They close on Sundays - and now we also have a small Thai restaurant - not fancy at all but their food is not pricy and very decent - it is right next to the Domino's Pizza on the corner across from my place ;)  You can grab a good artisan draught beer at Mikkeler's on c/Valencia or sit on La Guapa's terrace just one block from home on c/Urgell.  If you are into japanese streetkitchen - try out Yatai on c/Urgell - a couple of blocks from my place - good food at reasonable prices in interesting manga-surroundings. If you are looking for breakfast out and about I can definitely recommend the "El Ninot" bar at the local market - they offer good produce, a very nice and spacious setting within the local food market - and good WiFi as well ;)
notes: The room as mentionned is SMALL - but it now has aircondition working with both cooling & heating, so you should be able to adjust to just the right temperature for you and be at ease. Please note that you are staying in a big city and that the level of noise from cars, ambulances etc of course is different from a smaller town ;)
transit: The apartment is located in a more residential area, with less turism and more family life - but it is well connected both by metro and bus. The H10 wich leaves 1 block away will take you all across town and then you have the Bus 59 just 2 blocks away which takes you down to Las Ramblas and all the way to the beaches (and back) although I find that most places are within walking distance - of course always depending on your tolerance for walking... You have two different metro lines close by - the red and the blue one which can also come in handy if you want to move faster than by foot or bus. Closest stops are Urgell on the red line (just two stops from Las Ramblas) or Hospital Clinic on the blue line.
access: Shared kitchen (for breakfast,tea and coffee  / no cooking), private bathroom, private terrace.
interaction: I am very respectful of peoples privacy and leave them their space to feel at ease in my home, never intruding unless invited to.
house_rules: The apartment is a non-smoking apartment, but you can smoke on the terrace if you wish.  All I ask is that you treat my home as if it were your own, and that you leave the common areas as clean and neat as you found them  ;)

host.host_about: I'm a quiet person, respectful of my guests privacy, helpful and positive.  I speak english, french, spanish, catalan, german, danish, some greek and I understand norwegian and  swedish, so I´m sure we will find a language that suits us all ;)

reviews.comments: Katja is a great hostess. She gave me detailed instructions to get to the apartment from the airport as well as help with restaurants. The apartment was clean and central with great views from the terrace. The room also has its own bathroom with shower and the wifi connection was great. Would certainly recommend a stay here.

To put it simply - staying with Katja was great. As promissed you get your own floor within her flat. The room is small but nice. The view from the terrace is nothing short of awesome. The bathroom is clean and nice.

Katja has been a great and welcoming host. She was there for any questions we had.

All in all it has been a very pleasant experience.

We really enjoyed our time in Barcelona and the appartement was exactly what we needed. A nice place to get back after a day of walking. Katja was an excellent host, very friendly, helpfull and accomodating. The room on the top floor and the bathroom was clean and well equipped, and we had a very nice private terrace with a great view. This place is like a little oasis on roofs of Eixample.
There are many restaurants, bars, supermarkets and tapas places around, so you can manage quickly your daily needs, however there are also different public transport opportunities, so that you can easily get to the downtown as well. 
I totally recommend staying at Katja's place, we will definitely come back.

I really had  a fantastic stay at Katja's place!!! Everything is as shown on the fotos and very clean. The kitchen is well equipped, the private bathroom has its own window and is big. The best thing for me was the large terrace which has a great view.  Wifi worked very well and the connection to the airport is very good. 
Katja is a very friendly and helpful person, unfortunately we haven't met personally!!!!  We communicated via Email and sms and she helped me with everything I needed. I would definitvly like to come back to her place and would be very happy to meet Katja!!

Katja's place is a nice penthouse with a beautiful view from the terrace. We could not use the terrace much as it was peak winter but would be an perfect place to sit when weather is good.  The room is slightly small but good enough for a couple. It is in an ideal location walkable distance from city centre.

Katja is a wonderful host. Though we could not meet in person she left no stone unturned to make us feel at home and she was very quick in responding to our queries though she was in Denmark at that time. 

Last but not the least her cat compensated for Katja absence. We fell in love with her!

We highly recommend this place.

Katja es una anfitriona muy amable y preocupada por todos los detalles. Fue un placer estar en su departamento. Siempre fue muy gentil y atenta a nuestras consultas. La ubicacion fue perfecta para nosotros.  Muy recomendable.

When i was looking for my parents for a place to stay while they were visiting me, i found katjas wonderful place here in airbnb. Her place is really tidy and comfortable and her cat makes the place even more alive :) The first days we couldnt see each other but when we had any questions katja helped us out and responeded really fast. We even stayed in contact through messages on the wall in the kitchen what was really nice. She is a great host with a good humor and i would defently recommend you to stay at her place. 
Thanks Katja my parents had a wonderful time :)

The room, its private bathroom and the stunning view from the terrace, everything was perfect. At only 15-20 minutes walk from Plaza de Catalunya. Last but not least, Katja our host, was adorable and very helpful. I will definitely come back.

It was the first time we travelled with AirBnb and it was a very good experience.
We were so lucky to stay with Katja!
Despite the fact that our flight arrived rather late Katja was waiting for us. We felt very comfortable while staying at her flat. Flowers near the bed, bottles of water –all these little things show that Katja is glad to host you:).The location of the flat is very convenient and it is easy to get to all the attractions of Barcelona. We went practically everywhere on foot. It took us about 15 min to get to Casa Batlló, 20 min to Plaça de Catalunya and 15 min to Estació de Barcelona-Sants (the main railway station of Barcelona). 
The flat itself is very nice, cozy and quiet. We had a private bathroom and a terrace. From the terrace  you can enjoy a wonderful view over Tibidado Mountain. We were also allowed to use the kitchen. Wi-Fi works very quickly:)
Katja is a wonderful host, she is very nice and considerate. Her cat is also very polite. We didn`t mind staying her cat in our room but the cat is so clever and delicate that she always stayed at her place.

Katja is a helpful and easygoing host and we had such a nice stay at her place! The room is a bit small but then you have your own big terrace with a nice view over the city and we had a some nice sunny afternoons there. We also liked the area which had a more calm and local atmosphere than the city center, and still you could easily reach the center with a few stops by metro or a good walk (25/30 min).
We would highly recommend the room to others who search for a nice and relaxed place to stay in Barcelona!

Really loved it, and the feedback is nothing but positive!

The house/room is good. The room where you sleep is not very big, but it is good enough since you only sleep here! You have your own bathroom, which is very nice, and the kitchen is shared with Katja.
Also the neighorhood is nice. There is a supermarket and a domino's pizza really close by, and the house is about a 15 minute walk from the metro station Urgell, from there you can get to all the places you like!

Katja was a very good host, really helpfull and sweet!
She left the second day (to visit her dad), so we had the house to ourselves, but even after her leaving she kept in contact with us over (Hidden by Airbnb) , which was really nice!

Also, the terrace was even bigger than it seemed on the pictures, with the amazing view and sunshine all day, you could eat breakfast there, drink wine at the end of the day, or just enjoy the view!
We are definitely coming back to Katja when returning to Barcelona!

Katjas place in Barcelona is very nice, I have only positive things to say. The place is quiet and the big terrace gives you a stunning view. Nice location with easy transportation all over the city. Katja was very helpful the entire stay, a super host.
Katja havde jeg stor tillid til fra den første mail.

Katja is a fair and dependable host, we booked the accomodation one day before, and even if she wasnt at home, she arranged us someone to give us the keys and she is even flexible in the time for check out. Easy and fast communication, always friendly.. Beautiful terrace on the roof top!

Katja was a lovely host, although she was not at home she was more than happy to answer any questions we had about the city and plenty of advice for getting around on the metro and buses. 

The apartment was beautiful and easy to find, with a great view looking out over Mount Tibidabo. 

I couldn't recommend this place more.

We spent a wonderful week in Katja's apartment!
Katja is a very nice and friendly person. She gave us a city map and lots 
of useful information about Barcelona and places that are worth seeing.
Most of the time we were alone in the flat (except for the company of a cat ;)) because Katja had left for a couple of days.
We lived in a private room upstairs, with a bathroom and a terrace for 
the exclusive use (with a great view of the Tibidado hill).
The room wasn't large nor modern, but it was clean, nice and perfectly 
suited for our needs.
A ten minute-walk to the metro station, 15 minutes to the train station. 
Shops and pubs nearby.
Highly recommend!

Præcis beskrivelse af værelset og det var et skønt sted at bo. Katja er utroligt venlig og blev oppe for at tage imod os, selvom vi kom sent :)
Har kun positiv omtale omkring dette værelse og vil anbefale alle at booke hos Katja, hvis de skal til Barcelona.
Everything was by nice indeed, Katja is a perfect host and I would definitely recommend this place. Nice location, lovely terrace and the description is very accurate. Thanks again for a lovely stay)

Katja is a great host, and made for a delightful AirBnB experience. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay! It's a delightful room, well-located, and with such a beautiful terrace. Now that I'm back in snowy Boston, I already  have many fond memories of my time Barcelona.
Meget positivt at bo ved Katja., som er meget imødekommende og kommer med gode råd og anvisninger til besøget i Barcelona. Vi følte os godt modtaget og meget velkomne.

Een superfijne plek bij Katja, schoon en je voelt je gelijk welkom! Een toplocatie als je in Barcelona rond wilt toeren. Een leuk klein balkonnetje en kleine kamer in hartje Barcelona. Katja was super behulpzaam en kent de stad binnenstebuiten, dus voor de eerste adviesen hoef je niet naar het toeristenbureau. Wat ons betreft voor herhaling vatbaar!

Hat alles super geklappt, Katja ist eine sehr nette und ruhige, aber allzeit ansprechbare Gastgeberin. Bei Ankunft erhielten wir wertvolle Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt. Eine sehr schöne Terrasse mit einem super Ausblick. Alles in allem ein wundervoller Aufenthalt.

Katja made us feel very welcome and was helpful with maps & information.
The room isn't large but the balcony is, and the weather was brilliant all week so we were able to make the most of it and enjoy breakfast & drinks outside.
The apartment is quite well situated but you would need to enjoy walking to make the most of it.
