Katja was a very friendly and helpful host. The room was flooded with light and the terrace was a treat to relax on. And the location was brilliant for transport.

As promised Katja was at home waiting for us to ring her door bell once we arrived at her address.
We found Katja very welcoming providing us with a city map and other information needed by tourists to the area. This was most helpful.
The apartment was clean and tidy and we loved the balcony. Katja made sure we were aware we could use the kitchen, refrigerator, dining room and washing machine. We were also able to hang our washing out on the balcony.
The apartment is very central to the centre of the city as well as being quite close to the train station.
All this made our stay in Barcelona very comfortable and we would recommend Katja's apartment to anyone requiring accommodation in Barcelona.
Peter and Jan from Australia.

This was a fantastic location and wonderful facility. I travelled with my adult daughter and it was very comfortable. Wonderful terrace where we had breakfast and evening drinks. Plenty of storage and modern bathroom. Would love to come and stay again. Thank you very much.

We loved staying at Katja's place!  Everything was as described on her listing.  She was there to meet us when we arrived and was lovely.  She had a map all ready marked for us with easy bus routes etc. She made us feel welcome in her kitchen-which was very clean, well-organized and had everything we needed.  The bedroom is small, but clean and comfortable; it was great to have our own bathroom. The terrace doors framed the sky and it was a treat to lie in bed and look out.  The terrace was a highlight--perfect for morning coffee and evening wine.  The neighborhood is great--easy to grab a bus, or walk to wherever you are going.  Nice grocery store right across the street, fruit stalls...easy walk to great bars, cafes, restaurants. When we go back to Barcelona we will definitely stay again.

Un grand merci à Katja pour son accueil, ses conseils et ses bonnes adresses ! La chambre et la terrasse sont très agréables, le logement est bien situé et l'accès au bus facile. Nous avons passé un excellent moment à Barcelone et nous reviendrons avec plaisir chez Katja !

Awesome room with an amazing deck. U have a private floor with the deck, a beautiful room with 2 beds and a nice bathroom. We appreciated the fan :-) 
Remember that u are not allowed to use the kitchen, because we did not noticed it before. It's not near the beach but near the city centre and with the bus or metro u can reach everything in 20/30 minutes

Katja er en meget hyggelig jente som hjalp oss til på rett vei til leiligheten. Hun ventet på oss selv om vi kom litt sent. Katja ga oss gode tips om reiser og ting og se på , metro , busser og kart over Barcelona. Kjøleskapet var også fullt med vann og andre goder ,
for kaffeelskere var det en overraskelse med nespresso.

The apartment was very welcoming, the bedroom was small but just as mentionned by Katja in the description, as well as the directions to and from the airport with the AeroBus. 
Comfortable beds, clean private bathroom and the terrace was cosy, especially when the sun was shining with a nice view on the Sagrada Familia in the background. Main metro station 15 minutes walking. 
We didn't see Katja a lot but she is a very welcoming, friendly and kind lady. 
I strongly recommend this address, well situated to visit most of Barcelona's must see monuments and museums.

Semaine géniale chez Katjia. Idéalement située. Terrasse avec vue sur tibidabo & la Sagrada. Couchers de soleil top !! Accueil chaleureux. C'était difficile de repartir... Nous en avons loupé l'avion !!! Et avons dû revenir....

Die Wohnung war anhand der Wegbeschreibung gut zu finden. Wir wurden von Katja und ihrem Kätzchen herzlich empfangen. Wasser, Nespresso-Kapseln für die Kaffeemaschine, Stadt-, Metro-, Busplan und Prospekte zu verschiedenen Sehenswürdigkeiten lagen für uns bereit. Katja gab uns Hinweise zu Restaurants, Geschäften und den nächstgelegenen Buslinien. Auch die Kommunikation im Vorraus klappte perfekt. Schlafraum und Bad waren klein, aber zweckmäßig und bequem eingerichtet, so dass alle persönlichen Dinge gut untergebracht werden konnten. Das Highlight war die tolle Terasse über den Dächern der Stadt mit direktem Blick auf den Tibidabo. Die gemeinsame Küchennutzung funktionierte völlig stressfrei. Alles war sauber und liebevoll eingerichtet. Danke für die schöne Woche, Katja.
Très bon accueil de Katja qui nous a donné tous ses "tips and tricks" de la vie barcelonnaise. La chambre est très agréable, lumineuse avec une belle terrasse ensoleillée.

The stay at Katjas place was wonderful from beginning to end. Communicating with her before & during our stay was very easy.

The room as well as her whole apartment is a gem. It is furnished in the most lovely way, with every piece of furniture and accessory you can feel how much thought went into furnishing the place. We felt very comfortable. The mattresses were perfect to sleep on and the view from the rooftop is breath taking, ideal to relax after a long day in Barcelona. I wouldnt hesitat for one second to dtay with Katja again!

Wir haben uns sehr willkommen gefühlt, Katja war sehr nett. Das Zimmer war liebevoll dekoriert und sauber. 
Außerdem war die Lage der Wohnung super. Wir hatten 2 U-Bahn Stationen in der Nähe, sodass wir in kürzester Zeit überall hinkommen konnten.
Very much a welcoming host, going out of her way to make sure her guest is comfortable, next time im in barca i know where im staying :)

Katja is a lovely host. She made us feel really welcome, gave us great tips on getting around and a map and even an umbrella on a rainy day. The room is cosy, and we loved having breakfast out on our own terrace. The place is in a great location, handy for the areobus, Barcelona train station and getting anywhere by metro or bus. We had everything we needed for a great stay. Mange tak Katja!

We had a very nice time at Katja's place in Barcelona. Her early communications were very friendly and helpful. On arrival, our flight was over 2.5 hours late, meaning we arrived after midnight, but Kayja could not have been more understanding and graceful, when we arrived - she even offered us a late night beer which was appreciated! The suite is cozy, clean and private - we appreciated having our own little bathroom and especially the terrace. As we had sunshine for our entire visit, we made good use of it to eat our meals and relax. The location is excellent - it felt like a safe, family-oriented neighbourhood with stores and restaurants nearby, also close to everything we wanted to see, with good walking, cycling and transit. Katja was very helpful with maps and advice that made us feel welcome and saved us time. Thank you, Katja!

We had an amazing stay at Katja's home. She made us feel welcome, and gave us some tips when we arrived (e.g. busses, supermarket,...).
Although the bedroom is not big (as is described), there is a good vibe, with lots of light, and the terrace is wonderful. The apartment has a bohemian feel (perfect for Barcelona), but is clean and tidy. You have a lot of privacy, as the apartment is at the upper floor, with it's own terrace and small bathroom. The metro is around 4 blocks away, with a direct connection to placa catalunya.
We recommend it!

Nous avons passé un  très bon séjour chez Katja. L'appartement est très bien placé,  assez central, proche des bus, du métro et facilement accessible depuis l'aéroport.  Il y a plein de magasins et restaurants autour.
Katja est très accueillante, sympathique et toujours prête à donner des renseignements. La chambre est petite mais mignonne et la terrasse est vraiment très agréable. Petit bemol: en été,  il doit y faire très chaud, même s'il y a des ventilateurs. C'est un endroit que nous recommandons!

Katja's place is very nice and cozy. The room and our private bathroom was nice and clean and the terrace is just terrific! Katja took a lot of effort to make us feel at home, little flowers and water by the bed, Nespresso for us to use. Her being so easy going and warm made us feel at home right away. The street is a quite noisy but during our stay an airco was installed so we could close the doors and sleep. Katja's tip on where to go brought us to the very beautiful Hospital st. Pau.

Accueil très symathique. Katja a du partir précipitamment auprès de son père malade le jour de notre arrivéé.
Mais tout était en place pour que  notre séjour se passe au mieux
le seul bémol est le bruit de la rue ...mais c'est Barcelone
We had a very good time at Katja : the room is very cute with its private terrasse, the apartment is also very clean. I recommand this host.

De verhuurder heeft er alles aan gedaan om het ons naar de zin te maken. Ze heeft ons goed voorbereid door heel goed uit te leggen hoe wij bij het appartement moesten komen. Het was een heerlijke plek met een balkon waar je zo over de stad kijkt, vlak bij het centrum.

We were very happy with our stay at Katja's appartment! The location was very good 10 minutes from the metro and not too far from the main attractions in Barcelona. The room was also very clean! We would definitely recommend to stay here!

Me and my daughter Vanessa stayed one week in Katja`s apartment and it was really great. Katja could not be there when we arrived, but she  managed very well that we came in and felt comfortable. She is very warm-hearded and friendly. The location of the apartment is in a area with many little bars , supermarkets and a short distance to the metro station. Also it is very simple to reach the airport. If we visit barcelona again, we will stay at Katja's place if possible!

Katja was extremely welcoming and friendly! Staying here was a great experience - a bit more of a walk from certain neighborhoods than we were expecting, but generally very easy to get around and the room, bathroom and balcony more than made up for it.
Small, but lovely space with a central location and great view from the balcony. Katja was a great host, I highly recommend this place to anyone staying in Barcelona.

Very nice stay at Katja's apartment, and friendly welcoming from Katja when i arrived.
The room is perfect, clean, bright, a bit small but it has the big advantage to have its private terrace and bathroom.
Will definitely stay here again ;)

Det var en stor fornøjelse at bo hos Katja, lige fra jeg bookede var hendes svar hurtige og præcise. Hun sikrede sig at jeg vidste at det var et lille værese, inden jeg accepterede og hun har en præcis vejledning til hvordan man finder hendes hjem. Hun var hjemme og tog godt imd os. Værelset er lille , men fint og der er hvad man skal bruge til at sove og slappe af. Badeværelset var også fint og rent, men en smule slidt:-). Dejligt med balkon og gode senge. Katja var hyggelig og meget hjælpsom med at foreslå hvad vi skulle se og hvordan vi kom rundt. God placering centralt i byen, hvorfra man nemt kan komme rundt. selve gaden/nærmeste område var ikke meget spændende, men af samme grund også mest for de lokale. Vores allerstørste anbefalinger til Katjas værelse, hvis man har brug for et stille sted at sove og sidde i solen og ikke stiller krav til køkkenfaciliteter (hvem gider lave mad i Barcelona:-).

We really enjoyed our stay with Katja. The room is cozy and clean with an amazing terrace. The location is great with reasonably walk distance to the metro station and close to the restaurant and city center. We will definetly come back again if we visit Barcelona again.
Katja was great. She was there to greet us and provided us with recommendations on places to go. Eixample is also a great location to stay

Katja is a wonderful person, very respectful of your private space and her house is full of personality. If you enjoy traveling and having a more personal experience than your average hotel, I recommend this place. The room is spacious enough for 2 people and the terrace is very beautiful. We had water, tea bags and coffee tablets in our room - little things that make you feel more welcomed. We  walked to the tourist attractions because we wanted to discover everything the area had to offer, but if you prefer transport there is a metro and buses in the 100m vicinity. The neighborhood also has a lot of small bars and restaurants  hidden from the main street.

Parfait, merci à Katja. 
A refaire.

Super zentrale Lage der Wohnung. Leider war Katja selber aus privaten Gründen nicht vor Ort. Sie hat uns aber einen Stadtplan mit vielen Verbindungen des öffentlichen Nahverkehrs und den Sehenswürdigkeiten mit ihren eigenen Notizen versehen, die für uns sehr nützlich waren. Der Check in war auch sehr unproblematisch, da ein Freund von Katja vor Ort war. Wir hatten das Glück, dass das Wetter gut war und die Dachterrasse immer nutzen konnten, sonst wäre es in dem Zimmer vielleicht eng geworden. Bei unserem nächsten Besuch in Barcelona würden wir gerne wieder bei Katja übernachten. LG Christiane und Frank
Good place and location with ease of access to Central Barcelona!
Muy accesible. A pesar de que la habitación no es muy grande teníamos todo lo necesario, fue una estancia muy agradable y con total privacidad.

非常美的旅行经历!家里的大阳台非常大,早餐和晚上都会在上面坐一会儿!房东人非常好,总之非常美好的经历!

Sehr wunderbare Erfahrung! Schön und sehr groß Balkon! 

Very nice experience in the house! There is a very big and beautiful Balkon,I like eat breakfast and in the evening to seat here, katja is also so nice and careful!

Excellent accueil de Katja. 
Tout est conforme à la description. La chambre est très petite c'est vrai mais indépendante, avec sa salle de bain et sa terrasse (il faisait encore un peu frais le soir pour qu'on puisse en profiter mais ça doit être bien agréable quand il fait chaud de s'y poser au retour d'une bonne journée de visites !). 
L'accès à la cuisine est appréciable pour une boisson fraîche, un thé ou un bon café. Merci Katja.
A good place to stay to sample Barcelona. Easy access to the main attractions, nice local cafes nearby and generally quiet at night.

We had a great stay at Katja's place! Everything was in walking distance, and Katja is very nice and helpful. The area felt safe, and was quiet. There are a lot of restaurants and bars nearby. The room was nice and clean, with a great view of the city from the balcony. Coffee, tea and water bottles by our bedside, nice touch. All in all, we're very pleased with our stay, and with Katja as a host!
Perfect location to visit Barcelona without being in a touristic area all do you are everywhere in less then 30 minutes.
Katja is a great host and her house is lovely, comfortable and clean. Her house is in a very good location.
Katie's place is exactly as described. Katja is a very friendly and uncomplicated person. It was very nice for us to be able to stay at her place :-)
Central, clean, nice decoration, nice terrace! She left us coffee and water for the mornings. We had a very nice stay.

Great place to stay! Very central which makes it easy to wander in different directions off the city and Katja is really helpfull and a great host. Even though the room is small it does´nt matter as the terrace acts as an extra room. Especially when it´s sunny :-)
I can highly recommend booking this room!
enjoyed my stay
katjas place is very central, small and cute! owb bathroom and a beautiful tarrrace with a view over barcelona. i highly recommend this place!
Lovely room with a view. Description is 100 % true. We had a very nice weekend.

Katja was away but her friend Hector was around to pass me the house keys. The room was as advertised and the outdoor terrace adjoining it was wonderful to have drinks; with lovely view of cityscape and the mountains. Location wise it's unbearable - buses and metro stations close proximity. Supermarkets and cafes/restaurants just across the streets.
Highly recommended for solo traveller and a tight squeeze but still do-able for a couple.

很可爱的房间,有个可爱的小阳台｡
房间的装饰很小清新,蓝色,还细心的准备了水｡出机场坐大巴很方便,跟着Katja给的指示很快就能找到,不要看Airbnb给的 (Hidden by Airbnb) 定位哦｡房间在apartment的二楼,卫生间也是,很私人的｡除了房间确实小了点一切都很完美｡虽然房东有事不能接待我们但是没有任何不方便的地方!Katja是很好的房东｡水果店,餐厅都在附近很方便｡还有附近一家韩料叫soban的很好吃!大家可以去试试!

Meine Freundin und ich verbrachten 3 Nächte in Barcelona und hatten bei Katja die ideale Unterkunft mit zwei getrennten Betten, einer schnuckeligen Dachterrasse und einem eigenen Bad. Die Metrostation ist nahebei und Katja, die nicht persönlich anwesend sein konnte,  hatte uns nützliche Tipps für die Umgebung aufgeschrieben. Es war Mitte Juni sehr heiß und wir waren SEHR dankbar für die Klimaanlage im Zimmer. Der Aufzug im Haus ist auch eine Attraktion! Wir kommen gerne wieder!

Katja's place is so lovely! It's in a great location for walking (or getting the bus/ train) to various tourist sites, as well as local restaurants and shops. The flat was very homely and clean; it was a super stay. Our favourite part was the private roof terrace giving views across the city. Thank you Katja!

The accommodation was perfect for our stay in Barcelona.  The apartment has so much character and is lovely and airy and light.  The roof terrace is wonderful we spent every morning and evening admiring the views of Barcelona.  The air conditioning works really well and is very quiet.  The provision of a hairdryer and shampoo is great for when you are travelling light.  There are lots of mirrors perfect for ladies who want to do their hair.  Katja was so helpful with directions and information.  We found the public transport so good and so close to the apartment.  We used the Aerobus from the airport and back at the end of our stay and it is only a few roads away from Katjas apartment.  It was great being able to use the fridge and kitchen to prepare breakfast and a hot drink. Katja was the perfect host.

Katja's apartment is fantastic.  The space is comfortable with two beds, bathroom, an air conditioner and an incredible terrace with outdoor furniture, plants and a great view of the surrounding hills and much of the City of Barcelona.

The space is wonderfully private. The whole upstairs: bedroom, bath and terrace makeup the rental so you get a great space to yourself.

Katja is a terrific host! She went out of her way to accommodate our somewhat complicated travel schedule and we will never forget that. She is also extremely knowledgeable of the locality and more than willing to help and give great advice. She provided us with water and espresso pods for her Nespresso, which made for great coffee in the mornings.

We can't wait to come back!

Estancia perfecta , la habitación es como se describe , y la terraza, el baño privado y el aire acondicionado la hacen realmente fantástica. Alojamiento para repetir!! Gracias a Katja por su hospitalidad e indicaciones.

Katja is a very good and nice host. We had a wonderfull stay at her room with nice view from the balcony. The room is clean and there is also a good airconditioning. Fine when it is hot in the city. We had our own bathroom. If you want to visit Barcelona for a few days, I really recommend her place.

Katja's place is close to sants main railway station (12 minutes walk) and about a 5 minute walk to closest metro. 
The patio is a nice to sit on during the evening (we played cards, ate pizza!) Katja kindly gave us a map and marked on it and explained bus/metro routes.
Even though we had no problems during our visit, we knew we could ask or leave a note on table for her. We used kitchen to make coffee but ate meals out. Can recommend Veggie garden, even if you're not a vegetarian and Bacoa burger right on sea front (meat and vegetarian). 
You must book in advance online for basilica sagrada familia,  probably a week in advance or you won't get in, and Sant Pau hospital is definitely worth a visit and is just a 10 minute walk away from sagrada. 
Enjoy
Katja is a very friendly host and we really had some nice days in Katjas home. We can strongly recomend it / Sandra and Marcus
Koslig og fint rom med takterasse. Hadde en super uke hos Katja!

Stayed at Katja's place with my BF and we loved it! It's in a great part of town that's extremely walkable to all the tourist sights (or you can take an easy bus) and also has a ton of cute restaurants. The room itself is small but Katja communicated that beforehand and it was 100% what we expected when we walked in since she did a great job of conveying the size online. With the terrace and the extra twin/day bed, it didn't even feel small at all. It also felt like our own apartment because of the private bathroom and the fact that Katja herself is super quiet. (Also, the AC was amazing to have a couple of nights!) Overall, we loved Katja's place (and how helpful she was) and hope to be back soon!!

Katja is an amazing host and her place is absolutely stunning. My boyfriend and I ended up not using busses besides getting from and to the airport so it is absolutely in the walking distance to most major attractions. It has a beautiful view with a really nice terrace. The room itself is small but for us it was more than sufficient enough, everything was really clean and very well prepared. The flat is filled with loads of beautiful art and it is done in a very charming but stylish manner. Barcelona itself is definitely worth seeing and I do recommend walking around as you can find loads of good places to see that way. Besides the obvious attractions like the museums, beaches etc. I strongly recommend going to one of the magical fountain spectacles in the evening (just 20 minutes away from the flat).
Amazing location if you want more a local experience.

Katja is a great host. We definitely enjoyed staying at her place and we highly recommend her. When we visit Barcelona again we'll for sure stay again at her place. Everything was as described. Location is very handful everything is in distance by foot or you can use public transport which is really nearby.

Looking forward to come back!

David & Mia
The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Io e la mia amica siamo state ospiti di Katja per tre notti. Lei è una persona fantastica: solare, gentile e premurosa. Appena arrivate ci ha accolte e ci ha spiegato nei minimi dettagli come muoverci in città. Subito dopo ci ha mostrato la casa: la nostra stanza era essenziale, ma perfetta! Letto

Katja's home is a treasure, charming and inviting, in a wonderful area of Barcelona with so many restaurants and shops close, and easily navigable to the centre and its sights. Katja is a wonderful host, and will make you feel very welcome and comfortable! Waking up to the balcony and the view is just magic!

Katja has a wonrful place with a terrace overlooking the city. Montjuïc is right in front of it and La Sagrada Familia to the right. 

The longest walk we took from her place was 35 min to camp nou, all the other ones to Sants station, Barrio Gotico, Magic fountain and Sagrada familia were shorter walks. 

As far a Katja we could have asked for a better host, she was simply amazing. Great personality l, warm,  welcoming and always with a smile.

On a passé un agréable séjour dans la chambre/studio.  On se sent vraiment indépendant, et la vue de la terrasse est juste magnifique. La chambre est petite mais confortable avec une salle de bain attenante. Tout est soignée avec beaucoup de détails. Le logement est situé dans un quartier sympa, plutôt calme par rapport au rythme de Barcelona, avec pas mal de commerces aux alentours et à seulement +- 15  min à pie du centre ville. Katja s'est montrée très sympa et disponible pendant tout notre séjour. Sans doute un très bon rapport qualité/prix. Muchas gracias Katja!!

We loved this place! Katja gave us the warmest greetings along with a map and directions to places we wanted to go! She was so helpful and nice :) The place was great with an amazing balcony that over looked Barcelona! We were about 25 min walk from the Ramblas but busing was very convenient and safe.  The room had air conditioning and was private! Katja was an amazing host and her cat is so cute! We recommend staying here.
Thanks again :):) 
Olivia and Greg

This is a wonderful apartment with a gorgeous private balcony and private bathroom!! The location is perfect, walking distance to downtown Barcelona but also just far out enough to feel homey. And Katja is a gracious and thoughtful host. a perfect place for one or two people traveling!
El sitio es muy privado, limpio, acogedor, familiar y con todo lo que necesitas, además de central y seguro. Lo volvería a utilizar
Chambre très agréable avec terrasse et salle de bain prive, très bon enplacement

We can highly recommend staying at Katja’s place. Everything was perfect throughout our stay. Katja’s communication and instructions on how to find the apartment were accurate and concise. With good advice on which transport to use from the airport. The apartment was spotlessly clean and everything you could possibly need was provided, including some complimentary coffee. Although Katja described the room as very small it was plenty big enough with the added bonus of a fabulous terrace with great views of the city. Barcelona was an amazing place to explore with fabulous cafe’s and restaurant’s in abundance. We particularly loved the cafe directly outside the apartment which offered  good food and drinks at very reasonable prices with a very friendly service. We had a fabulous time and will certainly return ....x x
Katja is a wonderful host, the apartment is lovely and AC was very welcome. It is well placed in Barcelona, we stayed 3 days to visit. We recommend it !

Our stay with Katja was wonderful. Her apartment is quirky and cozy - uniquely appointed and well situated in the city. Quiet too! The balcony is big, and was a highlight of our week long stay in the city.
Katja's place is very cosy and as described. We could enjoy the nice terrasse and the location is really good. I would definitely recommend Katja's place.

The apartment was very cute and in a great location for seeing everything in Barcelona. The place felt like it was our own for the weekend, having a private bathroom and own terrace was really nice. There were some really thoughtful items for you to use in the apartment, all the toiletries you need, water and umbrellas as we got caught in it on our last day! I would definitely recommend Katjas place to other travellers. Very good value for money!
posto molto bello ,terrazza impagabile e posizione ottima. consigliatissimo

Die Gastgeberin ist sehr nett und zuvorkommend. Die Lage des Zimmers ist super, man ist gleich bei den Bus Stationen und in wenigen Minuten erreicht man die wichtigsten Sehenswürdigkeiten. 
Auch der Balkon im Zimmer ist großartig, das Zimmer jedoch ist sehr klein, das Bad sehr alt und renovierungsbedürftig. Aber für eine Städtereise und ein paar Tage optimal. 
Kann es weiter empfehlen!!

We stayed at Katja's place for our 10-year anniversary and it was lovely. The room was cosy, private and clean with a wonderful view - it was like sleeping in the clouds! Katja also kindly added nice personal touches like a bottle of cava and card. It was easy communicating with Katja who was very friendly and flexible. Thanks again.
The room is cozy although is not spacious. Good for 2 people. Katja is really responsive and generous. Great location! Highly recommend

name: Park Slope beauty
summary: Quiet block not far from prospect park. Near : Train, restaurants, manhattan
space: Walk down apartment,private entrance, Italian tiles and amazing bar/kitchenette/stove all modern including cabinets, granite and gorgeous bathroom and shower, with heated floor.
description: Quiet block not far from prospect park. Near : Train, restaurants, manhattan Walk down apartment,private entrance, Italian tiles and amazing bar/kitchenette/stove all modern including cabinets, granite and gorgeous bathroom and shower, with heated floor. NO Access to Boiler Room, Laundry Room and Back Yard. Available by phone text or email. PARK SLOPE is One of the most beautiful zones of Brooklyn Easy walk to R train must switch to N train at Atlantic Avenue/Barclays Center for express 20 minutes to Manhattan , PROSPECT AVENUE train station located at prospect Ave and 4th Ave, 3 block walk, less than a five minute walk. Need to clean stove and dishes after use, and any mess you make. Have to separate all trash for recycling including separating: bottles/cans, paper, and regular trash.
neighborhood_overview: PARK SLOPE is One of the most beautiful zones of Brooklyn
notes: Need to clean stove and dishes after use, and any mess you make. Have to separate all trash for recycling including separating: bottles/cans, paper, and regular trash.
transit: Easy walk to R train must switch to N train at Atlantic Avenue/Barclays Center for express 20 minutes to Manhattan , PROSPECT AVENUE train station located at prospect Ave and 4th Ave, 3 block walk, less than a five minute walk.
access: NO Access to Boiler Room, Laundry Room and Back Yard.
interaction: Available by phone text or email.
house_rules: No shoes,Absolutely no smoking need to clean all used utensils and cookware used

host.host_about:
Punctuality, honesty, respect, kindness, are my traits and i expect the same
Attitude will determine your Altitude.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is in a good neighborhood and location is good as well - it takes around 30minutes to get to the Time Square. The place has a high speed hotspot which was very important for us while working remotely. There are a lot of nice restaurants, bars and groceries around. Thanks for hosting us, Domenick!
Very clean. Highly recommended. Landlord very responsive with questions / help.

Appartement qui correspond très bien à la description , propre, très bon emplacement, métro a quelques mètres, je recommande vous serez pas forcément déçue, seul hic une autre housse de couette serait pas de refus sinon séjour merveilleux merci à vous

Domenick's place was located very close to the R line, extremely convenient going to and from Manhattan! It was also very close to the Brooklyn Botanic Gardens, which was phenomenal. It is also located near a grocery store should you need anything. Furthermore, Domenick was a very hospitable and friendly host, and I had a very great time in New York as his guest. Highly recommended to other travelers intending to visit NYC.
Very clean nice place. I like the location as well, 20 minutes to Manhattan

Amazing communication prior to our visit. Domenick definitely keeps the place spotless! Check in was a breeze as well as checking out. This is a good location to quickly get to downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan. Thank you again for hosting us!

O apartamento fica no porão do prédio. Não é ruim, mas saibam que não há janelas. Talvez no verão isso faça falta. É espaçoso e tudo novo, porém a cama não é tão confortável para os padrões americanos. A roupa de cama é algo que pode melhorar muiiiiiito. Duas quadras para o metro. O Expresso te leva em meia hora a Manhattan, linha D. A linha R local demora uns 50 minutos, vc tem que fazer baldeação pra linha D. Tem um café a uma quadra (use o (Hidden by Airbnb) maps) Bagel Factory 1 (orgânicos) e um pub incrível pra jantar, comida farta, cerveja boa, Freddy's. Tem um mercado em frente ao Bagel. Vc pode pedir comida a noite no Muscle Maker, pelo app Seamless. O bairro é recheado de cafés, bares, restaurantes. Tem um Starbucks a 15 minutos a pé com uma estação de metrô colada a ele. Usem o (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. Chip de celular na T Mobile 30usd para um mês com 4g, plano turista. Otimo. O apartamento não tem lavanderia, infelizmente, mas tem uma a duas quadras próxima ao metro. O bairro é residencial e muito bonito e tranquilo. Tem Internet. Mais dicas estamos a disposição.

We stayed at Domenick's apartment for almost two weeks while in town for work. The space is very large and everything as you see in the photos. We stayed during an extremely cold period and the closed off bedroom area stayed very warm the entire time. The kitchen has the basics but with so much good food around you'll probably be eating out every time anyway. The wifi was super fast (21 Mbps down, 12 Mbps up). Easy walk to the train and lots of cafes, bars, restaurants. You can't beat this apartment and location for the price. Highly recommended.
we are very pleased with the stay in your apartment very clean everything new, thanks Dmineck for answering our questions quickly, 100% recommended, we hope to stay again!!

Lovely place, open space which I loved. All the basic amenities is there besides an oven or microwave. Location is perfect, great bars and restaurants near by. Beautiful local places to go for a walk. Dominick’s communication was admirable. I will say, if you aren’t familiar with NY parking etiquette, keep in mind for the street cleaning signs.

Place was awesome and clean! It was my first airbnb experience and Domenick was great with communication and very quick to respond! THE BATHROOM HAS HEATED FLOORS, I loved it! The only thing that made this stay 4 stars rather than 5 was the loud noises and footsteps from the rooms above, but I'm also a light sleeper. However the room is located in the basement, so the noise was expected. Lastly, the location was great, it's right next to 5th Ave, which has plenty of bars and cool cafes.
This place is really great! Great location, super clean, cool neighborhood and the host is very responsive and very helpful! The price is amazing too!
Good travel in the perfect emplacement

Nice place with all the basics. Location is great with nice restaurants and bars in the vicinity, 5 min walk to R train and then 25 min to Manhattan.  Domenick is very responsive and keeps the place very clean.

La communication avec Domenick est simple et rapide. C’est très appréciable. 
Lors de la reservation, je me suis trompée de dates. Domenick aurait pu refuser ma demande de changement de date et empocher la totalité du paiement, nous avons apprécier son honnêteté remarquable. 
L’appartement a des points forts et points faibles. 
Pour les points forts : Proche des transports et commerces, grands et spacieux et à 20 min de downtown Manhattan. 
Pour les points faibles : Un seul majoritairement, Le bruit ! L’appartement se situant dans le sous sol, nous pouvions entendre tous les bruits de pas des personnes au dessus, nous étions même réveillés parfois très tôt le matin. C’est vraiment le gros point faible de cette appartement.

Nice place, every thing as promised.
No much sun and day light but the advantage is that  in the NYC summer this room is cold.
Domenick, it was nice to meet you, I hope to come again.

This is my second time staying at Domenick's place and once again I enjoyed the stay and have no complaints! Domenick is very flexible and super responsive whenever I had a question or concern. Thanks again for the amazing accommodations!
Clean,good location and very helpful host
Great place to stay at! Only complain is that the ac unit may get a little bit loud, but apart from that, everything was ok.
Se encuentra exactamente lo que se ofrece en fotos y recomendaciones. Muy cerca al metro, barrio muy tranquilo . Domenick ofrece mucha privacidad.  Muy buen alojamiento.

Good location for price, train station was a 5 minute walk from the place.
The place was very spacious and clean. 
Only downside was hearing footsteps and the boiler(I think) at night.
My parents stayed at Domenick’s place and had a wonderful stay. Thank you very much!
Very communicative and lovely space!
Great host, great location, so clean, with all required for a very comfortable stay!

name: Ensuite room @ heart of downtown
summary: - Completely renovated two bedroom shared condo - Brand new appliances, furniture, utensils  - En-suite washroom and private bedroom - A well-equipped Kitchen and living room is usually shared with another guest - Steps away from Concordia University, LaSalle College, Guy Métro Station,
space: - Centrally situated in down town - In a completely renovated building since April 2014 - Air conditioned - Tastefully furnished - Private bedroom and washroom - Quietly located on the 3rd floor
description: - Completely renovated two bedroom shared condo - Brand new appliances, furniture, utensils  - En-suite washroom and private bedroom - A well-equipped Kitchen and living room is usually shared with another guest - Steps away from Concordia University, LaSalle College, Guy Métro Station, - Centrally situated in down town - In a completely renovated building since April 2014 - Air conditioned - Tastefully furnished - Private bedroom and washroom - Quietly located on the 3rd floor - wireless Internet - dryer/washer set - fully equipped kitchen - office support within the building, e.g. conference room - lounge - Telephone/e-mail at time of booking and during guests' stay - Available in person at office hour (09:00 - 24:00 weekdays and 16:00 - 22:00 week ends) in the same building - an energetic area full of business and student activities day and night; - adjacent to major shopping (mall, boutiques, pharmacies, supermarkets), banking, dining, and entertaining (cinemas, theaters, museums,
neighborhood_overview: - an energetic area full of business and student activities day and night; - adjacent to major shopping (mall, boutiques, pharmacies, supermarkets), banking, dining, and entertaining (cinemas, theaters, museums, bars) area
notes: - near Montreal General Hospital Hospital, Concordia University - Walking distance to Westmount & Mount Royal, McGill University
transit: - across street from Guy Metro station - steps from Bus 165 (Guy) and 15 (St-Catherine W.) - bicycle lane right in front of the building
access: - wireless Internet - dryer/washer set - fully equipped kitchen - office support within the building, e.g. conference room - lounge
interaction: - Telephone/e-mail at time of booking and during guests' stay - Available in person at office hour (09:00 - 24:00 weekdays and 16:00 - 22:00 week ends) in the same building
house_rules: - No smoking inside the building - No pets inside the building - Keep volume down between 22:00 - 07:00 - wipe clean winter boots before approaching stair - The event or party is held on the ground floor`s tea house

host.host_about: We owned and ran a reputable restaurant for over 20 years as well as having run our airbnb since a few years, so we're no strangers to welcoming guests! We also travel across north America, Europe and Asia to experience different cultures' hospitality.  It's a great pleasure to share the experience, be it in terms of foods, drinks, activities with different locals and new friends.

reviews.comments: Grace and Irwin were great hosts! The apartment was in a super convenient area, plenty if shops and restaurants but also quiet at night.
Very nice host, excellent place! I regard it as a home-like experience. Perfect position in downtown with metro station nearby. I will definitely come back next time i go Montreal.

The apartment is just as it appears in the photos. My room was the smaller one, and had a twin bed. The mattress was hard, but quite comfortable, i slept very well. The rooms works for a small person, but could not accommodate two people. Everything was clean and in good shape, almost like a hotel room. The kitchen has a fridge, so you can leave your food there. It is not a room in someone's apartment, it is a room in a rental flat - something to consider. You have a lot of privacy, but don't get to interact with the hosts much. Grace and Irwin are kind and helpful, provided with everything I needed, and waited for me to arrive although it was quite late. They were quick to respond when I was there and whenever I needed anything. I used the washer and dryer - all worked perfectly.

The neighborhood is great! The metro is across the street, there is a convenience store in front of the apartment, a supermarket 5 minutes away, plenty of restaurants less than 5 minutes away. Very safe. The arts museum is less than 10 minute walk away. You can walk to a lot of places or take the metro when you are tired. Great location, very convenient.

I rented this apartment for one of my IT consultant for about 3 weeks with the intention of him returning a month later for another 2-3 months stay and he loved the place so very much that I had to rebook the same place before he even checked out to make sure that he would get back the same place. He absolutely refused to stay anywhere else. Not only were the accommodations pass satisfactory but Grace, the host, is a doll! She makes sure you're comfortable, warm and the apartment is always clean! Honestly, I can not think of one thing that my consultant complained about, he loved everything, he gave his stay a 10/10.


Thank you

Grace and Irwin were terrific hosts.  I shared a room in an apartment, but the other tenant was quiet and worked long hours, so it worked out.  The apartment was newly renovated, clean and tastefully decorated.  Grace and Irwin were easy to contact, and their son helped me carry my luggage up the stairs and helped me get settled.  All in all, a good downtown condo close to everything you need.
I really enjoyed staying at Grace and Irwin's place. They were wonderful hosts and made me feel at home. The area was quite lively and it was fun being in a very central area with lots to do!

Apartment was exactly as described, location was great and check in was very easy. The hosts replied to request very quickly and answered all questions promptly. Great stay would stay again at this location.
Irwin and Grace were kind and helpful. Room was perfect. Location is great (everything is at walking distance from the apt). Great choice for a journey in Montréal.

Irwin and Grace were very accommodating and helpful. The apartment was in excellent condition with a private bedroom and bathroom, much like a hotel. I felt as though I was staying in a four-star hotel in downtown Montreal without the expenses! The shared kitchen was beautiful, clean, and well-stocked, and a perfect place to prepare breakfast in the morning.

Perfect location to explore Montreal from and 100% as described on the site.
Everything was brand new.

When I need to go back to Montreal I will for sure check if this room is available again.

I really enjoyed staying with Grace and Irwin - they are very friendly and were very helpful throughout my trip. The condo is very nice - newly decorated, neat and has great location for exploring Montreal. I'd definitely like to come back!

I met Grace and Irwin briefly.  Clifton their son was kind enough to take my luggage to the 3rd floor where my room was.  The kitchen area was nice and clean.  My room was small and neat and clean.  It was big enough for my short two day stay.  The 3rd floor had two separate bedrooms that allowed to share the kitchen area.  The neighbor hood was a great location to restaurants, coffee shops, the arts and Jazz Festival.  It was a great and safe location.  I booked on short notice so it worked out great.  Thanks Grace & Irwin!
Melanie Guy

I had the opportunity to stay at Grace and Irwin's condo; this was the first time I use Airb&b services and I was very pleased.  Grace is a wonderful lady, I spend a few minutes with her drinking tea.  I did not feel too well with a bad cold and she made sure I had some of her special delicious jasmine tea.  Their son is a wonderful young man who also invited me for a cup of tea while Grace and Irwin were out.  The place is impeccably clean and comfortable close to the nicest areas of Montreal, on Maisonneuve Rue and St. Catherine Rue just behind the condominium, many many restaurants.  Easy access to the metro and walking distance to downtown Montreal. The place is full of life surrounded by young kids from Concordia University, McGill University and Montreal. Overall a wonderful experience.

I had arrived a little later than I thought which was a good thing, as the room was not quite ready. However, the room was just as described. It was nice, small and the en-suite bathroom was good enough for 1 person stay. Comfortable! And cool after a day's excursion. Grace was very kind and her son was super helpful - taking all my questions with patience! The area was great within public transport and restaurants. Very nice place and very nice people!

ｼﾝﾌﾟﾙ､綺麗､ほぼ文句無し｡本当に綺麗です｡
文句といえばｱﾒﾆﾃｨがちょっと変だったことくらい｡なぜか歯磨き粉ではなく､ﾏｳｽｳｫｯｼｭで､ｺﾝﾃﾞｨｼｮﾅｰがあるのにｼｬﾝﾌﾟｰがなく､ﾎﾞﾃﾞｨｳｫｯｼｭ?だけ｡立地的には観光目的ではやや不便です(美味しいご飯やとかが北部に多いため)｡

ﾎｽﾄは一瞬しか会いませんでしたが､雨降ってたら傘を貸してくれました｡とてもいい感じで親切そうな方でした｡

ちなみに部屋が2つあり､僕が泊まった部屋は写真と少しだけ違いましたが､特に問題はありませんでした｡英文の説明では分かりづらいですが､小さめのｼｬﾜｰ用のｽﾍﾟｰｽが付いてます｡
Grace and Irwin were very great guest. The room was tidy, clean, and ready for my arrival. I would definitely go back! The location was also unbeatable
Very nice and clean place, and Grace and their son are so kind. They help me handle all the issues.

I really enjoy my stay at Grace & Irwin's place. Although I never had a chance to meet them, their son Clayton explained and took care of everything for me during my stay. The place looked new, the room was clean, bathroom towels, shampoo/shower gel/toothpaste provided. The location is very very convenient to subway, bus or walk to the main streets. 

Overall I enjoyed my stay. Thank you.

Grace and Irwin's condo unit was exactly as described. The pictures shown were accurate and like what the other guests had pointed out the unit was conveniently located. Shopping, sightseeing, eating, and drinking were all within walking distance. If you want to venture out further, have no fear access to public transit is literally diagonally across the street. 

Do note though, there are 3 flights of stairs and no elevator. Luckily, their son and an older gentleman gladly helped me with my suitcase.

Une chambre confortable. Vous avez une intimité totale et vous pouvez utiliser toutes choses dans le cuisine. Grace & Irwin sont gentils et polis. L'appartement est situé à côté de la station de métro et le centre d'un quartier anglophone. Pour moi tout été parfait.

Grace and Irwin's apartment is right next to the Guy metro station - super convenient for getting around. The apt is as described, and very clean and tidy. Grace was very kind and helpful to answer all my questions. Great place for one person short stay!
Pleasent experience. The apartment was clean as promised. Excellent location. I recommend it!

Grace was so welcoming, as was her son who did a great job of helping me to get oriented. The apartment is located half a block from Concordia Univ and the Guy-Concordia metro station. The neighborhood is lively and felt quite safe, with many restaurants, cafes, and a market nearby. The apartment is well-maintained and very clean, and I slept well in the comfy bed. I was really glad that my room had a desk and privacy shades that also let in natural light. There's a nicely updated kitchen & dining table in the common area, which was great for saving money on breakfast. I really felt at home for my week-long visit, and having a convenient place to stay made this a more productive trip for me. Thank you so much!
Grace and her family do a nice job.   The rooms are newly renovated and everything is very clean.   we plan to stay with them again.
Great place.
A wonderful experience in Montreal, the host did a good job at all the things! If I come back in the future, I will choose this house again!
Actually my stay here was beyond my epectation , everything is perfect letraly , Grace and her family are so friendly and lovely , you will never regret staying

Thanks a lot!!!...Im grateful for your kindness.....Was a great experience with you!!!.

See you soon!!!
Lorena
Really good place, great location very comfortable.
Great location, easy access to the subway and restaurants

Perfect place to enjoy montreal! Very convenient to access public transportation and a lots of stores and restaurants. On top of this very clean and comfortable place.
Grace & Irwin are so nice.

Grace & Irwin were the most hospitable hosts I've had in all my Airbnb travels (and I've had quite a few of hospitable hosts already!!). The Airbnb unit itself is meticulously cleaned and the location cannot be beat. I would recommend this place to anyone!!! As a bonus, they own the tea shop below the Airbnb, and it's a great place to get a refreshing drink or a delectable meal. (I recommend the General Tao's poutine!!!)

Great location within walking distance of central sites and very close to metro station. Good sized room and access to kitchen facilities if required. Air conditioning a major plus for summer time visits. Hosts were very helpful with recommendations for my stay.

Grace & Irwin were amazing hosts! I had to change my check-in time quite a bit on short notice, but they were very easy to communicate with and arranged a new check-in time without any problems =) 
The room is super clean, quiet, the airconditioning is very convenient and the bathroom has everything that is needed (water pressure really is quite low, as mentioned by the hosts). 
The location was excellent, I was actually able to walk everywhere, including nice restaurants, old town, Mount Royal, bus terminal etc.. I was really surprised that such a quiet room in such a nice house could be so close to all major attractions! Would definetly stay here again and can recommend it to anyone who is travelling alone and needs a safe, nice and accomodating place to stay!

O Irwin e a Grace foram anfitriões bastante amigáveis e prestativos. O quarto é confortável e o local é perto de vários restaurantes e a menos de um quilômetro de um grande shopping. Fiquei muito satisfeito e fica minha recomendação.

Grace and her family are great hosts. Although I arrived quite lately, Grace was waiting for me. The condo is very comfortable and clean with easy access to the subway. I enjoyed my stay here and I highly recommend to choose Grace & Irwin!
This room is exactly as described: super clean, very new and at an affordable price. Location was great as well. If I'm back in Montreal, I know where to stay!

This is a very good place to stay.  The location is terrific--the neighborhood is interesting and the apartment is just a block from the metro.  The apartment is very clean and quiet, and Grace and Irwin were friendly and helpful.  The bedroom is small, but it has a nice closet and a desk and chair--  it was everything I needed for my stay.  The kitchen was great for doing some simple cooking.  I would want to stay there again, if I had the opportunity to come to Montreal.

Great room in a great location. Close to everything that is downtown. Perfect for tourists.

Room is convenient and clean.

Definitely recommend Grace and Irwin's place!
Grace&Irwin and their son are very friendly and welcoming, I really enjoyed living in their place!

Grace and Irwin's flat was a really good choice. Place looks decent enough from the outside, even better inside. They did mention that the water pressure isn't the best, but it still worked fine - not really a big issue for me. It's really good value for money given its location. Walking distance to lots of shops, restaurants, pubs, etc... Unfortunately I didn't get to meet Grace and Irwin but their son was very helpful, even gave a quick history of Montreal and the different tourist spots. I would stay here again definitely. 5 stars

This place is very convenient to stay as it is located downtown. There are many restaurants nearby especially Asian food. Guy-Concordia Station is tight around the corner. The room is clean and has all amenities you need. The host is the most welcoming Airbnb host I have ever had. Highly recommended.
Espaço adequado,clean e ótima localização!Anfitrioes gentis e disponíveis!

I think that the room is perfectly fine for short period (from 1 to 5 days) for the hospitality and position of the flat. On the other hand, I will not suggest this room for long period (for at least 5 days ) since none will take care to clean the room (and the private bathroom).
Great location. Close to the metro station. Very clean. Good communication.

I stayed here for a week and overall had a good stay. I didn't get to talk to Irwin in person (only through messages) but I talked to Grace and their son quite a few times and both of them were so welcoming, friendly, and helpful.
The location is incredible. The apartment is located near the Concordia University Metro station, as well as a bus stop that will get you to a lot of places. The city in general is very walkable and the location really takes advantage of that - there are quite a few restaurants/cafes/grocery stores within a 15 minute walking distance, and the main downtown shopping area is close too. Vieux Montréal is just a short metro ride away.
The apartment itself is very clean and while the kitchen/dining area is small, it's well laid out and fully equipped. While I didn't use it during my stay, there is an in-unit washer/dryer. The room is a nice size, and I liked that there was a private bathroom attached. The bed was pretty hard, which didn't really bother me but is something to keep in mind. Sheets, a towel, a pillow, some hangers in the closet, toilet paper and body wash were all provided. The air con was awesome too, especially since it gets quite hot/humid in the summer.
My biggest negative staying here was the water pressure. They warned me beforehand that the building was old and therefore the water pressure could be low from time to time, but to just wait a few minutes and try again. Typically this wouldn't bother me at all, but there were two days where I couldn't take a shower because there wasn't water, even after waiting 30 or more minutes. When there was water, there was a light stream - sufficient enough to wash hands, but not much else. I hate leaving negative feedback, and maybe I just came on a bad week, but it was something that bothered me enough where I feel it's important to let other guests know. I truly hope they're able to fix the water pressure problem somehow, because a part from that everything was perfect.
整洁干净 生活环境很便利 有好多超市和餐馆 美中不足的是洗澡的水压不是很大 但是不影响正常生活

Grace and Irwin’s place was absolutely perfect—right in the heart of the city, with the metro, restaurants, and grocery stores just a stones throw away. The apartment itself was spotlessly clean, recently refurbished, and very comfortable. Grace was helpful, friendly, and kind her her communication. Would highly recommend and would love to return  on my next visit.

A perfect experience at Grace & Irwin’s place! A very cozy bedroom of enough space for two or even three adults with a spacious and very clean private bathroom inside. Everything in the room is in a good condition. The WIFI connection is fast and stable. Some previous reviews mentioned that there could be some water pressure issue, but it did not bother me at all during my stay since I found I was able to take the bath every day. The shared living room has an open kitchen with a wide choices of cookers. I was told I could cook there and use anything available.  Grace host me during my stay and she is very friendly, accommodating and responsive. She relied to my questions very quickly and made my check-in and check-out very smooth. The place looks very safe, with electronic code-lock for each private room and another two doors to be locked from outside the building.  The location is also perfect! It is in the downtown Montreal and very near to a number of famous and top-rated  restaurants. It is within around one or two minutes walking distance from a metro station so the traffic is quite convenient as well. In a word, this is a perfect place with perfect host! I will choose this place again if I come back to Montreal next time. 总之,不论从房间的硬件设施,整洁程度,安全性,地理位置以及交通便利程度来看,都很完美｡房东人也很好很负责,今后如果可以的话,还会再次入住｡
The place is located steps away from Guy Concordia metro which is great for getting around the city.
very nice place to stay

I chose Grace and Irwin's place in Montreal because I really liked the apartment they showed and described in the Airbnb website, as well as how close it was to the metro station and a lot of places in downtown Montreal. However, even though being close to this service and the location I just described, I had a lot of trouble with other issues during my stay.

My main problems were the water pressure in the apartment was not good since the first week I arrived to the apartment, and this problem was never given a solution to during my whole stay there. There were several times when I got really late to several appointments at my job, had to cancel plans or reschedule my whole day because the water pressure would be so low that I couldn't take a shower without the water stopping every 2 minutes, and sometimes even for 30 minutes, making it impossible for me to take a whole shower in a small amount of time. Several times I had to write the owners to ask for a solution, since this kept being a bother to me and I only kept being told to be patient and try to understand the situation. During my stay in Montreal, this problem only kept getting worse, both in quantity (every time the amount of water coming out of the shower, bathroom and kitchen sink would be even less) and frequency (it kept happening more and more frequently, frist every week, then every 3 days until it was every day) and what got me really disappointed is that I never felt this situation was handled correctly by the owners. It wasn't until my last week in the apartment that the water situation got so bad that it ran out completely and my roommate and me were left with NO water for 2 days and a half, that one of the owners went by and saw the problem by herself. I didn't like that still, there was no soluton to the problem. During these days, I had to buy several bottles and gallons of water and even suscribe to a gym in order for me to take showers and be able to use a bathroom. It was a problem that really changed the whole perception I had of the apartment as well as the owners' abilities to solve conflicts raised during the stay of a visitor. As I mentioned in one point to the owners, this kind of trouble was never described like this neither in person nor in the Airbnb website, and I think it should be mentioned before someone decides to stay in a new place.

Also, I have to mention that I did not feel comfortable being in the apartment  several times because the owners of the building or part of their family would enter in the apartment and make use of the utensils there (e.g.: the kitchen, washer, drier, etc.) while the guest where there. I made me feel as if I had no privacy and I was not paying for a place to be my home for those weeks, but instead felt as if it was not my apartment and I couldn't feel comfortable there.

Besides this, the apartment is really well located in Downtown Montreal and the location of the metro (1 min walk) is a really nice plus for this building.

name: Large Plateau 2br Plateau-Mont-Royal - Mile End
summary: Big, open space apartment in the heart of Plateau-Mont-Royal with 2 bedrooms for 2 (+ couch for 5th person). A few steps away from the mountain and many restaurants, bars, cafés, shops, galleries... Near Mont-Royal subway station and many 24hr buses.
space: I'm subletting my entire apartment while I'm away on vacation (FEB 2018), maximum 5 guests: - 1 master bedroom with queen size bed (max 2 guests) - 1 guest bedroom with full size bed (max 2 guests) - Couch in the large living room * for 1 extra guest - Typical Plateau-Mont-Royal "5 1/2" apt with 2 bedrooms - Large open space area (living room, dining room, full kitchen)  - Bathroom with bath+shower  - Washer - Wi-fi Internet, Netflix  - Balcony - Towels and sheets are provided - There is AC in the living room (not directly in the bedrooms) I'll happily provide more details upon request! (If you have questions about cultural activities, art and dining, I might especially be able to make good suggestions ;) Here are a few great places nearby:  Schwartz, La Banquise, Aux Vivres, Le Quartier général, L'Express, Chez Doval, Brasserie Dieu du ciel, Bily Kun, Plan B, Casa del popolo, Sala Rossa, Divan orange, Salon Daomé, Belmont, Sparrow, Monsieur B, L'Entrepont, Café Névé, Le Réservoir, Laï
description: Big, open space apartment in the heart of Plateau-Mont-Royal with 2 bedrooms for 2 (+ couch for 5th person). A few steps away from the mountain and many restaurants, bars, cafés, shops, galleries... Near Mont-Royal subway station and many 24hr buses. I'm subletting my entire apartment while I'm away on vacation (FEB 2018), maximum 5 guests: - 1 master bedroom with queen size bed (max 2 guests) - 1 guest bedroom with full size bed (max 2 guests) - Couch in the large living room * for 1 extra guest - Typical Plateau-Mont-Royal "5 1/2" apt with 2 bedrooms - Large open space area (living room, dining room, full kitchen)  - Bathroom with bath+shower  - Washer - Wi-fi Internet, Netflix  - Balcony - Towels and sheets are provided - There is AC in the living room (not directly in the bedrooms) I'll happily provide more details upon request! (If you have questions about cultural activities, art and dining, I might especially be able to make good suggestions ;) Here are a few great places nearby
neighborhood_overview: My large Plateau apartment (approx. 1000 sq.ft./ 93 square meters) is located on a quiet residential street, just around the corner from bustling Mont Royal Avenue and at short walking distance from the mountain. Walk a few minutes and you'll also reach St-Denis Str. and St-Laurent Str. (cafés, restaurants, bars, shopping, music venues, theatres).
notes: ***My apartment is located in the Plateau neighbourhood (not Mile end as automatically listed by AirBNB - I cannot change this). However, Mile end is only a 5-10 min walk away. To rent private bedroom only, please refer to my other AirBNB ad: http://www.airbnb.com/rooms/301428
transit: Subway stations Mont Royal and Laurier (orange line) are very nearby, as well as many direct day & night buses to downtown. You'll also find lots of BIXI spaces (public bikes).
access: You'll have access to the entire apartment, minus a few closets and storage areas (where my personal belongings are).
interaction: I won't be around during your stay, as I will myself be travelling with AirBNB in another country ;) But you can always reach me if you have any questions, and I'll make sure neighbours or friends are available at all times to help you out in case of an emergency,
house_rules: Please respect my neighbours and leave the apartment like it was when you arrived ;) Smoking is only permitted outside (balcony). No pets and no parties please. Wifi is provided, but please do not use my personal computer. We encourage you to recycle Maximum 5 guests. ***Check-in is around 2pm and check-out is around noon. It is possible to make different arrangements, but we cannot guarantee it: it depends on the other bookings.

host.host_about:
*** Please contact me about your stay before pressing book. I only accept reservations from users who have completed their AirBNB profile and verifications. ***


"The World is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page." (St. Augustine)

Hi! 
I'm a Montreal freelance writer and journalist (music/film).
Since 2011, I've been welcoming guests from around the world, and it's been a great experience. On many websites, including AirBNB, I offer a private bedroom year-round and also my entire apartment when I'm out of town. 
For 17 years now, I've been living in the same neighborhood, Plateau-Mont-Royal, and I can give you great tips for your trip.
Nice to meet you!
Marie

**

Bonjour!
Je suis une rédactrice et journaliste culturelle (musique et cinéma) basée à Montréal.
Depuis 2011, c'est pour moi un plaisir d'accueillir à la maison des visiteurs du monde entier. Je loue une chambre privée à l'année longue et aussi mon appartement entier lorsque je séjourne à l'extérieur de la ville.
J'habite le quartier du Plateau-Mont-Royal depuis 17 ans et je peux vous proposer de bonnes adresses pour découvrir Montréal.
Au plaisir de faire connaissance!
Marie

reviews.comments: Marie's 2-bedroom apt in the Plateau was perfect for our stay. Great location, both to the Metro and to the Mont-Royal, with everything you needed a short walk away. Although Marie and I missed the chance to actually meet face-to-face due to our schedules, we worked around it and made arrangements for keys, etc.  She left us a great 'cheat sheet' for the apt and what to do in the neighbourhood that was very helpful, as well as an amazing spread of continental goodies (croissants, fruit, coffee and the like). It was very much a hotel-like stay with all the comforts of home. Marie stayed in touch via text/email throughout our visit to ensure everything was in order. Overall a very pleasant experience! Merci Marie!

Marie was very friendly, informative and thoughtful ( she even kindly left us croissants, juice and coffee for our first breakfast). The apartment was very clean and comfortable, with everything that we needed, and it's situated in a really interesting area of Montreal. The whole stay was first rate and we recommend Marie and her apartment as an excellent airbnb option in Montreal. Thank you Marie.

L'appartement est immense et très propre.

L'hôte nous a fourni tous les détails nécessaires à ce qu'on passe un voyage fabuleux.

La communication avec elle a été très efficace et complète.

La situation de l'appartement est extraordinaire.

A great spot to stay in a fun and vibrant neighbourhood! It was really snowy when we were there so we parked our car (found street parking easily) and did all of our exploring on foot. 

The apartment is very cozy and comfortable. Marie was a gracious host. She responded quickly to inquiries and made sure that we had everything we needed.

The best thing about this apartment? The espresso machine. We're going to have to buy one of our own now.
Great appartment with excellente loacation in the Plateau of Montreal. Marie was very kind to leave us many indications to have a very pleasent stay!
Wonderfull host, allways helpfull and easy to reach. The location is perfect and the place was exactly as the pictures are roomy and very clean. Just perfect for our family of four.

Great apartment near it all! Marie was very communicative and left the apartment spotless for our arrival. Two closed bedrooms make it an ideal place to stay for coworkers or friends. It's near a ton of shops, restaurants and bars on Mt Royal and St Laurent. Really enjoyed the stay and hope it's available for rent the next time I'm in MTL. Thanks Marie!
Our family of four stayed with Marie for the second time and it was once again a wonderful time. The apartment and the location are great. Marie is a very caring host. We can truly recommend it.

L'appartement de Marie est très sympa et confortable. On s'y sent vite comme chez soi.
Il est idéalement situé sur le plateau.
Je regrette de ne pas avoir rencontré Marie qui a été adorable dans nos échanges par mail.

Wonderful 6-night stay in Marie's cozy Mont Royal neighborhood apartment during our epic Women's World Cup trip to Canada.  Marie is very responsive and helpful; although we did not meet her, she was very personable by email and text.  The apartment is IDEAL for an active couple or family.  The walkup apartment is close to Parc Mont Royal for a hike or challenging run, and within a short walk of 3 Bixi bike stations (the best way to see Montreal is by bike; we took the Bixi everywhere, day and night0- to Biosphere, Jazz Festival, Stadium de Montreal for World Cup).  Also close to the metro and bus to Airport.  Marie was very attentive in leaving information on the Montreal Jazz Festival.  We enjoyed the festival thoroughly, and were able to get tickets to see John Mayall, a lifelong dream for myself and my spouse.  The apartment was exactly as pictured, kitchen well-equipped (I cooked for us one night) and walkable to very hip area of bars, cafes, and restaurants.  The NetFlix worked great to stream (Canada has a lot more content available than the USA), and Marie's internet was fast.  Our second trip to Montreal, and quite enjoyed staying there. It was a very good value as well. Thanks Marie, you are a wonderful hostess!
Karen & Bill (55-somethings) and Carrie & Amy (our young adult daughters).

Marie was a very welcoming host.  She kept in touch to see that all was ok, and did her best to make our 2 week stay enjoyable.   Her apartment is ideally located, close to supermarkets, pharmacies, cafes, bars, restaurants and yet, it is very quiet.  The living areas are spacious and comfortable.  It is a 10 minute walk to Mont Royal metro station.

Marie was very quick to respond to any questions, and went above and beyond in making our stay comfortable. My wife and I visited Montreal with our 18 month old daughter and the apartment was clean, comfortable and quiet. The location was very convenient with easy walking to several parks, grocery stores and to the Metro. Marie provided us with a map of nearby parks and plug covers for all the outlets. The a/c was necessary during a heat wave, but was able to keep the whole place comfortable. I would highly recommend this apartment and would look to book again for a return trip.

name: Boho Flat in the Chic Center!
summary: Hey there! This newly fully renovated flat is surrounded by the brand name stores, popular cafés, pubs, restaurants and night clubs but still on a very quiet street. Just enjoy! :)
space: This 65 square meter apartment is situated on the ground floor, offering an open plan living. In the bedroom there is a comfortable bed  of 180 cm x 200 cm and a large balcony which includes a small laundry room. The bathroom has a walk in shower. Towels and bed linens are included. All fittings and furnishings are brand new. This is the perfect apartment for a romantic holiday, for business people or a family of three who need peace and quiet but are still in the centre of Istanbul with all its many attractions.  Details:  Balcony  Free internet Wifi Flat screen TV  Home Theatre System Washing machine Dishwasher Large comfortable bed  Walk in shower  Very well equipped kitchen
description: Hey there! This newly fully renovated flat is surrounded by the brand name stores, popular cafés, pubs, restaurants and night clubs but still on a very quiet street. Just enjoy! :) This 65 square meter apartment is situated on the ground floor, offering an open plan living. In the bedroom there is a comfortable bed  of 180 cm x 200 cm and a large balcony which includes a small laundry room. The bathroom has a walk in shower. Towels and bed linens are included. All fittings and furnishings are brand new. This is the perfect apartment for a romantic holiday, for business people or a family of three who need peace and quiet but are still in the centre of Istanbul with all its many attractions.  Details:  Balcony  Free internet Wifi Flat screen TV  Home Theatre System Washing machine Dishwasher Large comfortable bed  Walk in shower  Very well equipped kitchen I'd be more than happy to give you recommendations about where the locals hang out. You can always reach me through my cell phone du
neighborhood_overview: Nisantasi, popular shopping and residential district is considered to be one of Istanbul's most exclusive neighbourhoods. It is a home to the best shops, cafes, art galleries, theatres and convention centers. Swiss Hotel and Istanbul Congress Center are only 5 minutes walking distance  from the apartment. Bosphorus and Dolmabahce Palace is in 10 minutes walking distance as well as main subway lines. Many other cultural attractions like the ferry to the Prince Islands, the tram which'll take you to Istanbul Modern Art Museum, old town (Grand Bazaar, Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque), etc. is 20 minutes walking distance or 5 minutes by bus or taxi. Taksim is 20 minutes walking distance through the park or 7 minutes by bus or taxi. The apartment is only a few steps away from the Macka Park the greenest area in the centre where you can jog, picnic or just sit on the grass and watch the great blue sky meeting the great blue Bosphorus.
transit: If you like walking you will never be bored but there is excellent public transport.
interaction: I'd be more than happy to give you recommendations about where the locals hang out. You can always reach me through my cell phone during your stay.
house_rules: The flat is on a peaceful street. So guests are kindly requested not be loud, specially in the night time. No events or parties allowed.

host.host_about: As a former exchange student I have always been fond of traveling and experiencing different cultures. I am working at one of the biggest art museums in İstanbul: Pera Museum, as a digital and social media supervisor. I'm a cinema addict and very much into documentaries. I do voice overs for commercials and work as a freelance photographer as well.

reviews.comments: I had a very nice experience staying at Irmak's apartment in October 2014. The apartment is decorated with a good taste and meets the expectations (the only surprise was the basement floor which makes it a bit dark and cold but is compensated by a warm atmosphere created by the owner). Irmak is by all means a great, responsive and generous guest, who welcomed me with fresh fruits in the kitchen and a small orientation tour around Nisantasi.

Irmak was a fantastic host, and we thoroughly enjoyed staying in her flat. The apartment is conveniently located in one of Istanbul's chicest residential areas, Nisantasi, in the basement of a nice old building. Prime location for cafes/brunch spots, small bakeries, grocery stores, but also a heaven for luxury shoppers. Having been to Istanbul before, I must admit Nisantasi was a better choice than the very touristy areas around Taksim or Sultanahmet. There were dolmus buses and taxis just round the corner from the street we stayed, which made it easy for us to commute to all the places we wanted to visit. 

The flat itself - exactly what you see in the photos, and more. Clean, super cozy & homey, warm (mind you, we visited Istanbul at he end of December 2014, so the warmth was well needed), with everything necessary made available for our 4-day trip. It was definitely spacious enough for two people, and the way the flat is organised makes it very liveable. It really felt like home, and the flat has a lot of personality: family photos, nice artsy touches here and there, hand-crafted antique furniture, they all make for a vintage-y and boutique-y feel. Bonus points for the nice Christmas tree waiting for us in the living room, which made the whole atmosphere feel even more like holiday. 

Though we haven't met Irmak, she has been a great host and arranged for us to pick up the key from someone. Flexible, very accommodating and willing to share tips and recommendations about restaurants and places to see in Istanbul, Irmak was always available to chat and responded promptly when we had any queries. 
 
Highly recommended place for travellers who enjoy a clean, cosy flat with plenty of personality, in a nice quiet neighbourhood.
nice place

name: Tree House in Rio 2.
summary: Nice house close to the beach and easy transportation. 3 bedrooms short stay: 2 single + bathroom  and 1 with double bed + bathroom.  Casa em S. Conrado, perto da praia e facilidade de transporte: 2 quartos de solteiro e 1 de casal. Curta temporada.
space: House in pleasant São Conrado neighborough, close to the forest and about 300 meters from the beach, with easy transportation by bus and taxi. The house is in a quiet place, surrounded by trees,  so you can sleep well and wake up with birds singing, and it takes about only 15 minutes to Ipanema, or 20 minutes to Copacabana, where you can have every kind of entertainement. Bus stop 150 metres from the house, for virtually any place in Rio. Supermarkets, shopping center, good restaurants and banks nearby.

It's nice to have a coconut water in one of the kiosks by the beach in the morning or a beer at sunset. Beautiful view!!
notes: Smokers are welcome, although others drugs, even soft ones, are forbiden by law. This bedroom has 1 single bed.
transit: Arriving: You have buses and taxis from the airport to my house.  Just contact your hostess and she will give you the directions.. Leaving: You have a bus to the airport, or you can call a taxi by phone. Your hostess will help you.

Balcony under a big tree and brazilian breakfast in the dining room ou the varanda;  the table will be set for you and you help yourself.  Any other details will be discussed when you arrive. Be welcome!!
interaction: You will be welcomed and hosted by Angela, the owner of the house, who will be present all the time while you are here.
house_rules: No pets admited.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Moro no Rio de Janeiro há 24 anos e amo essa cidade ! Sou Engenheira de Alimentos, trabalho na função e há 24anos comecei também a trabalhar com aluguel de temporada ! 
Adoro a praia de Copacabana, adoro passear no Rio de Janeiro, música, cinema e teatro, também gosto de sair tomar um choppe gelado e jogar conversa fora ! 
Estou sempre disposta a fazer novos amigos e sempre conservando os antigo !
Meus apartamentos são feitos para que todos se sintam na sua casa ! 
é isso ! abraços
