name: The Sparrow Room
summary: A colorful studio flat located between Prince Edward and Sham Shui Po.  It is a tiny like a sparrow but it has everything - kitchen, fridge, washing machine, a platform as laundry space, plenty of storage space etc.
space: This tiny studio has everything you need: - kitchen, fridge, washing machine - a platform outside for extra space for example for laundry.  very good sunshine there - plenty of storage space
description: A colorful studio flat located between Prince Edward and Sham Shui Po.  It is a tiny like a sparrow but it has everything - kitchen, fridge, washing machine, a platform as laundry space, plenty of storage space etc. This tiny studio has everything you need: - kitchen, fridge, washing machine - a platform outside for extra space for example for laundry.  very good sunshine there - plenty of storage space The whole room and the platform outside the window. I am normally at the place to tidy up around noon time.  If time suits I will meet my guests downstairs during check-in and bring them to the room.  Otherwise the keys can be found in a password-protected mailbox at the building entrance. The apartment is next to a football court, a not busy district yet buying things having food and traffic is not bad. It is close to the Prince Edward area on one side. Places to go include Fa Yuen Street, the Fish Market, the Flower Market etc. On the other side is Sham Shui Po which is the authentic
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is next to a football court, a not busy district yet buying things having food and traffic is not bad. It is close to the Prince Edward area on one side. Places to go include Fa Yuen Street, the Fish Market, the Flower Market etc. On the other side is Sham Shui Po which is the authentic Hong Kong. Sham Shui Po has no tourist spot but it is a place where locals live. You will have a very understanding of the local culture in this area. Everyday goods are sold cheap in the street. Fresh market. Local food. And night second hand market.
notes: There is no elevator.  Need to walk 4 floors. The calendar is correct.
transit: Walking distance to both Prince Edward MTR station and Sham Shui Po MTR station. Bus E21 to and fro the airport and is just 2 minute walk from the building. Buses and mini-bus downstairs going to places through out Hong Kong.
access: The whole room and the platform outside the window.
interaction: I am normally at the place to tidy up around noon time.  If time suits I will meet my guests downstairs during check-in and bring them to the room.  Otherwise the keys can be found in a password-protected mailbox at the building entrance.
house_rules: You should know.

host.host_about:
Sometimes this is a deal.

Sometimes this is friendship.

Sometimes this is a disaster.

This is life.

Welcome to Hong Kong.

reviews.comments:
My third day in morning in HongKong, it was heavy rain by typhoon. I actually wanted to stay in Central area to see the night view and to go other place for sightseeing. But things is not going well as you think!! I asked over 20 hosts from the morning, but the only one host gave me a certain answer i can stay in safe! 
Yes, that was the Vintage style of dormitory shared room for girl. As you see the room has a fantastic vintage colour in it and the bed was so cleaned and the fan and air-condition worked very well in humid HongKong summer weather! 
The host steve, he is a very kind and gentle for the guest! 
The toilet is a very small and tiny space, but you should experience how HongKong people use their space well. I was so impressed for that too :)

Also with a very happy price, you will have sweet dream indeed!!!

The house is really close to the PrinceEdward station by walk 10 minutes and there is a public football court as well. Safe place and 7 eleven convenience store is just around corner! 

I really recommend a guest house when you guys to travel. This is what I experienced in HongKong :)

Awesome experience. Clean and cosy room. Easy to locate and near MTR. 

Appreciate steve's effort to clean the room before arrival. Thanks!!

Regards

Jess poon
Steve是一个很负责的房东 住客也很好 下次再来
Steve人超级好的!房间虽然小,可是东西很齐全｡室友也很好｡下次去香港还是会找Steve!这次时间太短没办法跟Steve好好聊聊~期待下次见面吧!

住的地方的地理位置簡直棒呆!想去哪裡都非常方便!房間整潔,空調給力｡在旅行的最後一天,我､兩個室友､Steve和Steve介紹的三個帥哥靚仔男神去香港的一些小地方玩(具體還是要自己體會的)!很愉快!總的來說,這個地方,這個房間,這個包租公(說的就是Steve!)值得選擇啦~

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 草雞仔
房东虽然没有见到,但是给了很详细的地址给我,让我能顺利找到,这也是一次很有趣的寻钥匙之旅,房子里面挺好的,床也很舒服,就是厕所小了点,其他都挺不错的,下次有机会想住一下男女混合宿舍,感觉很好玩哦,而且,房租又不会,赞一个!
Room was really clean, toilet is tad small but otherwise well worth the price. Location is great, walkable to Mongkok and Sham shui po. Will come again if I am visiting Hong Kong next time.

Although only stayed in Steve's place for one night but it was a pleasant place to stay at... Convenient and not too far away from the metro station.. Quite neighborhood and u can feel the authentic authentic HK lifestyle...
房東回覆的效率超好,有問必達唷!房間也乾淨,大部分旅客需要的日常所需,都有提供,下次來香港,一定會再回來住｡

First of all, to be honest the host was not helpful at all.
I didn't get the chance to meet Steve and it was my first trip to HK by myself. I got lost from the MTR to the dorm in the evening and walked around for an hour.
The room has not been cleaned and untidy at the time I checked in, and don't let me start with the bathroom :s

Overall, the stay was not really pleasant for me.
Maybe I will be luckier next time.
Steve 人好好 有求必应!房间虽然小 但什么都有 床铺很干净 说得也很舒服很安心!下次还会来!

This place is fantastic,it's not far from the subway.The room is not very spacious but have everthing you need.Very cozy to stay.And  Steve can respond to your questions very quickly,he is very helpful.
很不错的地方,推荐大家去,比较干净,离地铁也不远,个人认为从太子A口出比较好找｡而且房东很好讲话,给出的指示也比较明确｡下次去香港还会去这家的｡

第一次自己一个人旅行,感觉很好,体验很棒｡首先必须给Steve赞一个,虽然没有见到他本人,但一直有联系,有问必答,也让朋友过来解决一些不懂的问题｡第二,房间很干净床很舒服室友很nice,空间虽小(香港是个寸土寸金的地方啊)但物品齐全冰箱也有｡第三,地点不错,很安静,距离旺角也就一个地铁站,附近例如像麦当劳,711都有,但是没有发现可以购物的商场,我主要逛景点没有时间在附近转转｡从地铁出来十分钟内就可以走到｡第四,刚开始的时候已经买了很多东西很重,然后要去找位置花了一些时间,不过好刺激好兴奋,尤其是拿到钥匙的时候太有成就感了｡最后就是安全的问题,本人女,所以没去之前就很担心会不会有类似劫财劫色之类的事情但是房主很有耐心地和我聊,而且附近也很安全｡下次一定会再住这里｡

I landed in Hong Kong a day early unexpectedly due to some visa confusion so I had to book a place for a night and Steve was very helpful and swift with getting back to my request and questions. 

The listing is very accurate: 0.5 bathroom, very little space in general. so no one should be complaining if they've booked this place after reading that. 

However, my experience here was very unpleasant due to the other guest with whom I was sharing the dorm. She didn't speak English well, but that was not a big deal at first. I woke up the next day to our door knocking so I opened it and it's a dude, apparently the boyfriend of the other guest. He walked in with food and the two were eating on the bed and talking. After their meal, they started cuddling. Initially I didn't really care, but as I needed to get ready, clean up and check out, things were getting a little annoying and uncomfortable. As mentioned above, the bathroom is really REALLY tiny; you can't take a shower and get dressed in there because there's absolutely no space for that. I somehow managed to take shower and get dressed in and outside of the 0.5 bathroom with extreme discomfort and difficulty. It's 15 minutes before my check-out time so I tell the other guest that I'll be back to grab something to eat and drink real quick and that I'll be back in 10 minutes. She says "okay see you." I come back after 10 minutes and they are having sex. It's just really rude that she was using this "FEMALE DORM" as her private hotel room. 

Although Steve was very very helpful and understanding, I think there's still room for improvement in managing the space more efficiently and considerably.

This was a great space. The host was really friendly and responsive. When I locked myself out, he came right away to help out. The place is located in a great local area--not touristy at all--with wholesale fabric and clothing markets and shops all around. It's also a quick walk to City University (20 min). I fell in love with The Sparrow Room and will miss it!

Check in was straight forward, Steve came to welcome me and help me settle in. Room was clean, facilities were basic, location was within walking distance of an MTR. Room felt secure, sliding gate and main door. Small living space as advertised, fine for a single traveler on a budget, would book again under the same circumstances, no complaints.
Small but complete in every detail

This cozy studio is conveniently located for your Hong Kong trip. Host is very good with communication, answering several texts and calls throughout the week and right when I arrived. Directions he provides are streamlined and accurate. 
Amenities such as kitchen appliances, drawers, makeshift hangers, extra sheets, etc. are included and stored/located economically within the small space.   
Located a block off main road and several blocks from markets or mtr so nightly noise is kept to a minimum. I was there for 5 nights and had no trouble with neighbors, they were nice and respectful. 
Couldn't recommend sparrow room enough for your stay in Hong Kong.

This a neat place, which definitely falls into the "not for everyone" category.
Pluses: the apartment itself is clean. It's not *that* small, certainly not by Hong Kong standards. It's got nice colors and a certain charm. And the apartment is very well thought out; lots of things you'd need (laundry line, hot pot, etc) and very little that you don't need. And the Sham Shui Po area is hopping. It's got a very "old Hong Kong" feel. HK as a whole has gotten rich, and kinda soft; this feels like the old HK where people are still really hustling to improve their lives. 
Minuses:
First, the bed/mattress was super hard. OMG it was hard. I've slept on carpeted floors that were softer. A new mattress will make this place much better. Second, while the apartment itself is very clean, the building is dirty. 
Finally, I'd say the Sham Shui Po area is also not for everyone. I really liked staying there, but I'm a city guy and I know how to take care of myself. HK as a whole is super safe, and can feel kind of sanitized at times. This neighborhood still has an edge to it - which I liked, but again, not for everyone.

This is a good apartment as long as you know that there are good and bad points. The good points: it's only a few blocks from a major subway/metro line. The neighborhood has a lot of character. It's definitely one of the poorer parts of the city, but still very safe. I enjoyed living here. As far as the downsides, the apartment is very small and a little dark, it's a walk-up (good exercise!), the building is very old (and it shows) but the room is nice. The wifi signal is good (however sometimes in the evening it was very very slow). Check in is very easy and Steve was easy to reach by text.  Overall a good experience for a budget traveler.

First of all, the location is so good. It's only less than 10 minutes to go to "Prince Edward" or "Shum Shui Po" from the hotel so can go to the central for almost 30 minutes. However, the building was old traditional one so there are cockroaches in hotel so don't reccommend to those who hate them. Actually, when I arrived at the hotel, I had felt so scary but after one month, I didn't feel so. In last, the host was helpful and gave me quick response and helping. If you would like to stay house with cheap price, reccommend his hotel.
Steve is an awesome and very kind and attentive host. I would recommend his place to my friends anytime they want a local and friendly feel on their travels.

"Sparrow Room" is an awesome little studio where I enjoyed my stay for three months during my internship in Hong Kong. Steve is an outstanding host, easy-going but also responsible. The apartment is not small by HK standard, it's a normal size studio for one person. Can be okay for two people for a short stay. It has everything you need, most importantly a good washing machine and dehumidifier - two things essential for Hong Kong! I've experienced no problems with electricity or water heater, Aircon also works as should. Some things like toilet and crane were recently repaired and are pleasure to use.
The area (SSP) is amazing. It's the area where working class people and migrants settle, thus it is cheap, resourceful and any conversation on the street brings you genuine knowledge of HK culture. A true immersion if you wanted that kind of experience. Check-in and checkout were extremely straightforward and fast. 
Among minuses, the shower room is small. It was okay for me though. Dehumidifier helped a lot if apartment get humid. 
I totally recommend the host and the place.

name: Sunrise 4 @ Savoy, TST MTR Exit B2
summary: We provide affordable and spacious rooms at Savoy Mansion, Tsim Sha Tsui. All rooms are newly renovated, clean, stylish, simple and elegant. Rooms are equipped with AC, 24 hour hot/cold water and free wi-fi. Come enjoy your stay with us!
space: Sunrise in Cozy Room is good for a single person travelling with minimal or no luggage! This room is small and has no window! Features a single bed (36 inches or 90 cms), plus everything that other rooms have! Sunrise in Cozy Room is located at Savoy Mansion, opposite Carnarvon Plaza.  Airbnb does not allow to reveal exact address before the room is booked so you will have to do some research on your own to find out the exact location of apartment building! Tsim Sha Tsui MTR (Metro) Station (Exit B2) is on a 2-minute walk. My other listings at Savoy Room 1: https//wwwairbnbcom/rooms/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Room 2: https//wwwairbnbcom/rooms/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Room 3: https//wwwairbnbcom/rooms/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
description: We provide affordable and spacious rooms at Savoy Mansion, Tsim Sha Tsui. All rooms are newly renovated, clean, stylish, simple and elegant. Rooms are equipped with AC, 24 hour hot/cold water and free wi-fi. Come enjoy your stay with us! Sunrise in Cozy Room is good for a single person travelling with minimal or no luggage! This room is small and has no window! Features a single bed (36 inches or 90 cms), plus everything that other rooms have! Sunrise in Cozy Room is located at Savoy Mansion, opposite Carnarvon Plaza.  Airbnb does not allow to reveal exact address before the room is booked so you will have to do some research on your own to find out the exact location of apartment building! Tsim Sha Tsui MTR (Metro) Station (Exit B2) is on a 2-minute walk. My other listings at Savoy Room 1: https//wwwairbnbcom/rooms/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Room 2: https//wwwairbnbcom/rooms/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Room 3: https//wwwairbnbcom/rooms/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) 24 hours hot shower, Air-conditioned F
neighborhood_overview: Centrally located (2-minute walk to MTR (exit B2)) in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Apartment features easy access to the city’s attractions (Kowloon Park, Kowloon Mosque, The One shopping mall, K11 shopping mall) and many areas of interest such as the famous Victoria Harbor, Avenue of Stars, Clock Tower and Various Shopping Centers just to name a few.
notes: Check in time: 2.30 pm to 11 pm.  Check out time: 12 noon No smoking and no pets, please!
transit: Tsim Sha Tsui MTR subway station is only a 2-minute walk away. Airport bus stop is only a 3-4 minute walk away.
access: 24 hours hot shower, Air-conditioned Flat TV Free Wi-Fi Comfort Towel & Linen Free body wash & shampoo Daily housekeeping service
interaction: For meals guests can find a wide array of international cuisines in Tsim Sha Tsui as well as incredibly tasty local options. There are a lot of local and asian cuisines at Hau Fook Street which is at the foot of apartment building!
house_rules: Please keep clean!

host.host_about:
Hi everyone!

My name is Mike and I am an expatriate living in Hong Kong. I am a fun loving and easy going person who loves to read, play badminton and travel. I have been fortunate to have traveled to several cities in US, Europe, Australia and Asia. Personally I love making new friends, engaging in diversity and learning about new cultures. I am honored to live in such a multi-cultural, vibrant and enjoyable city and I am extremely excited to have the opportunity to host guests from all over the world.

So come down - have a great trip and I look forward to being your host!

All my listings on airbnb :

Nathan Road (Tsim Sha Tsui MTR metro station Exit B1)

https://airbnb.com/rooms/2952012
https://airbnb.com/rooms/3014888
https://airbnb.com/rooms/3023328
https://airbnb.com/rooms/3023503
https://airbnb.com/rooms/3023684

Carnarvon Road (Tsim Sha Tsui MTR metro station Exit B2)

https://airbnb.com/rooms/3617391
https://airbnb.com/rooms/3612299
https://airbnb.com/rooms/3606840
https://airbnb.com/rooms/3631518

address.street: Kowloon, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Mike was very friendly and welcoming. Since there is no concierge he waited for my arrival and explained everything thoroughly. I felt very safe in this place with all the locks and cameras in place. The room is modern and clean. The bed was very comfortable. If you have a big luggage you'll only have room to open it on the bed. The location is great, very close to the HK Museum of History (recommended!). The MTR entrance being so close is also convenient. Had a good stay here for the 7 nights.

The rooms are in an old building but you'll be surprised once you get to the area. The rooms are truly cozy and comfy, perfect if you'll be out for most of the stay. I loved the beds! Only problem was we had to wait about an hour for the newly vacated rooms to be cleaned when we got there because the cleaning lady was late. Aside from that, perfect location and modern rooms.

Me and my mom needed a place to stay for 1 night in Hong Kong. To tell you frankly, I booked the place very late. It was down to the last hours before our flight but luckily Mike (the host) was very accommodating. He answered my inquiries and responded to my requests quickly even if it was wee hours.

Mike gave us instructions on how to get to his place and met us at the bus stop. His place contains information about Hong Kong, from where to go and how to get around l, and it had discount cards for tourists (however, we were not able to use that).

The place was cozy indeed, just as advertised. It was clean, quiet and safe. It is located near public transportation stations (MTR, bus and ferry) and shopping stalls. Mike let us leave our luggage before and after check-in, so that we can roam around freely.

Wish we could've stay longer, but we were scheduled for a cruise. I'm glad to have chosen this place.

It was great to meet Mike thanks to his very warm welcome. Mike was friendly and very accommodating. Mike introduced us to the area, provided us tips for dining and places to visit. We were very happy with the location. I and my partner like to walk and the place where we stayed it was centre of everything and we didn't have to use any transportation. The place was very safe same as its surroundings. The room was very clean and well looked after (everyday cleaning service). We are happy to recommend Mike’s accommodation to everybody and we wouldn't hesitate to use his service again.
I must say, it has got to be one of the best beds ive ever slept on to. Not only is location superb, the owner, Mike, is an awesome host ...or tour guide :)

Mike is an awesome guy and extended a very warm welcome to our stay in Hong Kong. He was responsive and easy to co-ordinate with for check in. The room is very clean, and although a bit small, has dozens of thoughtful touches that maximize use of the space. My wife and I comfortably stayed here for the second leg of our trip and we would do so again in an instant.

The landlord is very good! Who  is  very patient and warm. We were late, But  he had been waiting for us  about  half an hour.I was very grateful to him. The apartment is really awesome, although it was  small, but it was very clean.
Very clean and nice. The host Mike was very friendly. And when we got problem, Mike always can reply us very quickly.

Mike was a fantastic host. Very easy to deal with, always quick to respond, and very on top of things. When I first arrived, the staff had forgotten to leave a key for me, but Mike was able to get to the room within 5-10 minutes and get that to me. I would definitely love to deal with him again in the future.

The location is extremely convenient and central. TST is mega crowded, but from the top floor of the building where the room is, it isn't very noisy at all.

The room is indeed very clean and modern, but very compact. I had no problems with the size, but I can see it being tedious if you are in the room more than just sleeping each night or have a huge suitcase. The two things I didn't like about the room are that there is no window, although I can see this being an advantage for those who want to sleep late, and the water boiler only holds enough hot water for about a 3-5 minute shower. You can heat up water for another shower within 15 minutes, but realistically it is a bit inconvenient to take two showers, so I ended up taking one very economical shower instead each night.

That being said, I would recommend this room because it is very clean and convenient, has a great host, and the price is very fair for the surrounding area.

This room is a traditional Hong Kong apartment. There is enough room for two people as long as only one person opens their bag at a time. The apartment is in an amazing location with lots to do around the area and only a 10 minute walk to the water. If you are planning not to spend a lot of time in the apartment then this place is definitely the place for you! The host is amazing and provides you with detailed directions to the apartment as well as lots of information on what to do in Hong Kong

This is the most easiest and quickest experience I've had with a host. Our previous reservation (with another host ) were cancelled last minute and we needed to check in same day. As soon as we booked with Mike he contacted us and send us detailed picture messages how to get into the place. It's a very clean HK size accommodation. Thank you Mike we will definitely stay with you when in HK again.

The booking process is very quick. Mike had responded right away after I've booked. All necessary information are sent before travel. The map was clear and the place was very easy to find. Just less than 5mins walk from the MTR. Mike was there to meet me when I arrive :) The room is small (as expected). It's like this in HKG ;) great for 2 person or one without any large suitcase or baggage. The room I stayed is no-window but inside there is a ventilators. The room is very clean. Have towel, shampoo, soap, hair dryer, TV, air con, hot water (work well) and free wifi in the room. Somebody come to change the towel and clean everyday. The mansion is safe and no need to wait for the elevator like any another mansion. Good price for a private room with bathroom ! I enjoyed my stay and really recommend this place if you are looking for something affordable, safe and clean in TST area :) :) I will surely come back to stay there.

Mike is so nice and responds quickly all the time, and he is very warm-hearted and provides you with all the details. The room is really clean and cozy, Although it is a  bit small,  it has everything you need.The location is extremely convenient and central,you can walk to MTR within 5 mins.

    I would strongly  recommend this room because it is very clean, and the price is very fair.

Mike is a great hospitable guy,very warm and helpful. He sent me all the instructions needed on (Hidden by Airbnb) to reach his place. The room was as described, but I felt a bit too small for me and it's without windows so moved to another place of his and was perfect. Very close to the MTR, clean and practical. He did a nice gesture and left some tea and cups for the morning. Everything functions perfectly in the room.
Excellent location. Apartment had everything for our needs and Mike was the perfect host. If visiting Hongkong again I would certainly be looking to book this apartment.
This place is new so is very clean. However, if you are a plus size, this place is not for you as it's minute.
Great place in the middle of everthing in TST
very good
Friendly host given detailed explanation and helpful . Comfortable room and convenient location with no regrets.
Mike's place is awesome. Has everything you need for a pleasant, convenient stay. Definitely staying there again the next time I'm in town. Highly, highly recommend.

위치는 정말 최고!!
시설은 참 괜찮다.
다만 생수라던지 칫솔 치약등의 비치가 조금 아쉽다...
房东很细心,讲房子地图还有门锁操作都发给我,而且比上次住的房好,舒适整洁,晚上也没有噪音!下次还会入住!

I had a great stay at Savoy - Mike was one of the most helpful hosts I have ever met! He was very clear and communicative - I received very detailed instructions for how to check in, and when I mentioned that I wanted an additional blanket, he went out of his way to make sure I was comfortable. 

The room is small, but it's very comfortable (great twin bed) and surprisingly quiet (you can hear the murmur of street noise). The room was very clean and secure. The location is very central in Tsim Sha Tsui with plenty of entertainment and food nearby. Highly recommend!

Within a few minutes of my request, Mike responded and indicated that he would host. I chose him after my intended host  emergency and appeared unable to host. Mike was patient even as I was dealing with AirBnB formalities which made me lose valuable time very close to my trip. Mike's location is in the very heart of TST.  The place is compact, which I would expect in a dense city like Hong Kong, but very functional and convenient. It is less than 2 minutes to Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) station.  Location makes the place both easy to reach from airport and other places. It is real easy to get around from TST and lots of shopping around. Mike provided guidance to get around as well, when needed.

Mike was very helpful. He gives clear instructions and help in finding the room and helping you arrive. The room is as advertised, it was clean and in a convenient area. The only minor problem was that there was no outlet converter to charge my laptop and phone, and occasionally the aircon would leak. I would stay in the room again.

It was a smooth checking process and Mike was really nice to allow me to drop my luggage at the room before the checking time. The space is packed but works for a traveler who just need a place to sleep. Room is quiet and clean and location is really convenient
Host very nice and easy to contact with him.

name: Relax in Taksim
summary: Located in the heart of Taksim within a walking distance from lively Istiklal Street, where you can find houses many cafés, restaurants and shopping malls. Taksim metro, which provides easy access to many other popular districts of the city.
space: Modernly decorated apartments at Balance Hotel Taksim feature flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and a seating area.Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view and garden view from the room.
description: Located in the heart of Taksim within a walking distance from lively Istiklal Street, where you can find houses many cafés, restaurants and shopping malls. Taksim metro, which provides easy access to many other popular districts of the city. Modernly decorated apartments at Balance Hotel Taksim feature flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and a seating area.Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view and garden view from the room. Daily breakfast is available at a surcharge. There are several restaurants and cafés with international and local cuisine at the lively streets of Istiklal Avenue. providing room service. Car hire and shuttle service are also available upon request. Free WiFi is also offered in all areas. Istanbul Ataturk Airport is located 19 km from the accommodation.. Taksim Metro Stop is just a few steps away, allowing easy access to many sites of the city including historical Sultanahmet district. Me
neighborhood_overview: Taksim Metro Stop is just a few steps away, allowing easy access to many sites of the city including historical Sultanahmet district.
notes: Beyoglu is highly rated by guests for: galleries, beer, street musicians We speak your language!
transit: Metro,tramway,ship,bus station
access: Daily breakfast is available at a surcharge. There are several restaurants and cafés with international and local cuisine at the lively streets of Istiklal Avenue.
interaction: providing room service. Car hire and shuttle service are also available upon request. Free WiFi is also offered in all areas. Istanbul Ataturk Airport is located 19 km from the accommodation..
house_rules: Your own home

reviews.comments:
Very good host, very nice place exactly as in photographs.
Although the neighborhood isn't the best for families or ladies.. but the room is secure and 2 minute walking distance from the central road which ALWAYS have police presence.
We do suggest the place and we will probably visit again.

Очень хорошая комната. Очень понравились хозяева и администратор! Очень дружелюбные и ответственные и на стадии переписки и в период нашего пребывания. Всегда, горячая и холодная вода, кондиционер, тихая, не шумная улочка. Чистая ванная и туалет. Кровать, белье, полотенца - все в полном порядке. Очень хорошее, качественное предложение в своем классе! Рекоммендую.

Everyone at the Balance Hotel is extremely friendly and helpful. The room is as described, clean and tidy and comfortable although it is starting to get a bit rough round the edges from normal wear and tear. The location is convenient for Istiklal.  The neighborhood is off the main streets and could be a little intimidating for females alone. I was waiting for my daughter in a car outside when I was forced to move further down the street to allow another vehicle to pass. As soon as I stopped a very intimidating character knocked on the window and told me to move in a very menacing manner. I was not in anybody's parking space or blocking anything. It was a warning that I was not welcome there. My younger daughter in the back of the car was very scared. For groups of guys and adults no issues if you know about it but groups of girls or families with young children may find it uncomfortable.
The host was very nice and went out of his way to help. location close to Istiklal st. accurate room discription.

Die Adresse war falsch. Da steht beyoglu, taksim. Ist aber nicht. Eine Ruine Straße. Voller azı.
Aber die Gebäude war ok und sauber. 
Auf jeden Fall für das Geld
Хозяева очень прекрасные люди, жильё на высшем уровне, всем советую.

The stay in Serdars beautiful apartment was for me an my friends a great experience. Serdar was helpfully an available every time. The apartment was really clean and is in an great area of Istanbul. For our next trip we'll book it again! Perfect!

Serdar Bey'in yaklaşımı ve konukseverliği bir harika. Otelin konumu, temizliği harika. Fotoğraflardakiler ile karşılaştıklarıkız tutarlı ve doğru. Herkese tavsiye ederim. Bizler için güzel bir anımoldu. Teşekkür ederiz.

Serdar abi kesinlikle çok içten, canayakın ve misafirperver. Bizleri çok sıcak karşıladı. Bir sıkıntı yaşamadık ama sıkıntı olsa yardımcı olacağını hissettirdi. Checkout yapacarken biraz geç çıktık ama hiç dert etmedi tolerans gösterdi. Odalar görsellerde görüldüğü gibiydi belki biraz daha temiz olabilirdi fakat fiyatının çok çok üzerinde bir performans diyebiliriz. Tarlabaşı, kalmak için ilk başta çok güvenli gelmese de otelin içi dışından çok farklı ayrıca konumu çok merkezi. Tekrar tercih edilebilir :)

Perfect location ! Everything was next to us. The apartment was very clean and exactly like the pictures. The staff were very nice and friendly :) A big thank you to the manager Mr Saeed and all the staff. Istanbul is my second home and I will definitely be staying at Mr serdars apartment again :) ! PS: I loved how Mr serdar was at the apartment when we arrived to make sure everything was fine. Great experience overall.

Said was very helpful with our arrival. First day he was very kind to introduce us with neighbourhood and show us how to use metro and to tell us which is the best ways to sightseeing. Apartmant was clean and like in the pictures.

I've been in Istanbul with three friends and we've all stayed at Serdar&Saeed. They're both really nice people, very friendly and hospitable. Our room was clean and was serviced a few time during our stay. The communication was top.

Serdar Bey çok nazik, ilgili ve dürüst bir insan. Kesinlikle hiç bir problem yaşamadık. Evi ve yeri çok güzel. 

Mr. Sedar is very kind, carying and honest person. We certainly had no problems. The house and the location is very good.

Hosts are very warm and polite , pick up Us up in the very late evening ,was waiting for us , apartment is clean , in old area of taxim , very close to walking street . Every day clean flat very well . The important point about host is their responsibility about guests and not only care about money .

Serdar et son équipe était au RDV, un très bon accueil nous a été réservé à notre arriver. M Ahmed était très disponible pour nous fournir tout ce dont nous avons besoins notamment mettre à notre disposition un fer à repasser et sa table en plus d'un séchoir à linge.  Le service de chambre était assez correcte, nettoyage et changement des draps et serviettes.
Un petit bémol, la kitchenette est trop petite et étroite, manque un peu d’ustensile de cuisine.
A part ça, nous avons très bien apprécier notre séjour chez Serdar qui nous à très bien accueilli dans son Hotel. Je recommanderai assez bien ce lieu .
Great stay, the place was close to istiklal caddesi
This place is more of a hotel, not a private flat. Great location, close to cafes, bars, and restaurants. Adnan, the receptionist, is incredibly warm and helpful and made our stay really pleasant.
Helpfuly and very close to istiklal
Gayet güzeldi
It was a nice cozy clean apartment with pleasant helping people, Thank you Serdar and Khalid Regards from all of us :)
Also die Unterkunft war wie beschrieben es gab gar keine probleme der besitzer war sehr freundlich und hat uns in einigen anderen punkten geholfen also kanns wirklich nur empfehlen

Serdar en zijn vrouw zijn hele lieve mensen, ze hebben ons met alles geholpen. Zelfde geldt voor de manager Abdul. Erg bedankt. 
Als je voor een mooie prijs dichtbij taksim wilt verblijven dan zit je hier goed.

Cet Air bnb est un appart hôtel, il convient parfaitement à des couples ou des petites familles. Il n'y a pas toute les facilités énuméré par l'hôte comme pas de machine a laver ni de service de laundry, faible connexion wifi, très petite cuisine pas très pratique pour une grande famille. Ce type de bien est plus adapté aux couples et petite famille.
Cependant c'est un hôtel très bien situé proche des transports et des restaurants et boutiques.
Everything was nice and the communication with Serdar was very easy :)
地理位置不错,房东很热情
gooddddddd
Her şey çok güzeldi...Serdar Bey çok iyi bir ev sahibi...Konum Taksim'e çok yakin...
Very nice location to stay in , also the host is very friendly and supportive, I recommend it for a great value compared to the price

Serdar was a very nice and considearate host. He warmly welcomed us at the location when we arrived with his wife and staff. They were all very helpful. He also went out of his way to help me when my car got towed by the police, he gave me a ride to the station and eased the process for me as I didn't speak Turkish.

The apartment was nice on the inside, despite not having a space for a table or a sittig space, but in a lively place like that I only need the place to sleep at night. Although the area was old, the location is very close to everything you need, Istiklal street, Taksim, and public transportation.

Recommended if you need a place to sleep at at the heart of the city.
It was a great experience and I loved the place
good place, good location, nearby to cafes, restaurants, supermarket and good place to stay...
It is more like a hotel than an apartment, everything was very nice :-)
Serdar's place was very nice and clean. Close to the main Square Taksim but yet in quiet neighbourhood. I highly recommend it.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié la localisation du logement qui est à proximité de la place Taksim. L'appartement était très propre et nous avons eu rapidement les réponses à nos messages quand nous avions des questions.
Je recommande.

Serdar's lille lejlighed ligger super godt i forhold til alle attraktioner. Roligt kvarter midt i Istanbuls pulserende storby liv. Serdar og Mohammad har været yderst hjælpsomme med alt. Bare kom afsted

Serdar and the manager, Muhammad, were awesome hosts. Their communication was super quick and they made great recommendations on how to get around.  The location is amazing if you want to avoid the tourist area yet be within 5 min walk to the local party scene. I highly recommend doing Pub Crawl Istanbul which takes place in the area and gets you into the hot spots with no hassles at the front door.

The location was superb as you can reach the main city and sight seeing areas within 20-30 minutes supported by walking distance and efficient public transport plus amenities surround the around ie supermarket and restaurants. You won’t regret

It was great a place in a great location. Clean rooms, clean beds and sheets. And Serdar is an amazing person! Helpful! Friendly! Supportive! Serdar provided all the things we needed. The location is close to taksim square, İstiklal caddesi and public transportation. It has lots of supermarkets, restaurants, cafes all around. Great experience! Definitely recommended!

This place is more of a hotel so don't expect a full apartment. It's actually a big hotel room with a mini kitchen. The room is as shown in the picture. If you don't need a full kitchen then it's a good place. However the location is tough to get to and between old residential area. However Serdar was very nice and good host when we told him we need a full kitchen he allowed us to switch to a full apartment he had close by. Very close to taqsim square and very big.
Basic accommodation ,a short walk away from Itzikal Ave in Taksim. Serdar and Salah were friendly and helpful and tried to make our stay as comfortable as they could.

Это не отель/комната, это ужасные апартаменты в самой грязной и небезопасной части Стамбула, где проживают наркоманы, беженцы и бомжи. От площади Таксима и метро два километра пешком без тротуара, вокруг грязь и мусорные свалки. Окна выходят на развалины старых домов, комната грязная, затхлый запах в помещении. Приехали, посмотрели, забрали вещи и переехали в другой отель - HOMELIKE HOTEL. Заплатили 100% за 1,5 месяца до начала поездки, не провели в отеле/комнате ни дня и денег нам не вернули. Информация со стороны сайта AIRBNB по отелю/комнате не проверяется.
Good... but its not what you see in the photo.
good appartements
Super accueil, personnel agréable,

Everything was very good .
Thank you so much :)
Really enjoyed! Very clean! Great thanks!
Le stanze sono molto carine e la posizione è davvero perfetta! Nel cuore di una zona bellissima ma in una via molto silenziosa!
Bon accueil. Quartier vivant et pittoresque. Logement conforme au descriptif

The apartment was great same us the picture with same beds ..and the host “ Kreem “ was very helpfull and he helps us by arranging an airport shuttle ..the only downside was the neighborhood it was very unsafe for my family..

you have tourist visiting you beautiful country, stop scamming them!!! Be real with the description of your property. I have pictures of the property and the so called view of the surroundings of the property taken from the window!! When the tourist actually fall in to your trap and want to leave, at least have the curtesy to call a cab for them. I would not recommend this dump to my worst enemy. Istanbul has beautiful properties surrounding taksim and istiklal.

Bon rapport qualité /prix
Quartier populaire,un peu bruyant  à cause d une boite de nuit à proximité .Difficile à trouver la première fois car le nom de l appart/hôtel n était spécifié :Balance
Close to Taksim Square. Fabulous restaurants close by with a true Turkish flavour used by locals and not just tourists.
Perfect place&location to stay, it is too close to main places to see and easy transport to anywhere in istanbul. Thanks to serdar.
Die Wohnung ist relativ groß und auch sehr gut gelegen allerdings ist das Bad wirklich gewöhnungsbedürftig. Auf jeden Fall Latschen mitnehmen ;)
The location was great, couldnot be better that this

The neighborhood is a bit noisy and poor. On the other hand, the place was safe. There is a TV, we listened to music to start the day. There is WiFi but it doesn’t work in the inner room. The apartment was large enough for four person. There is a SOK (cheaper) and a nonstop shop nearby, so you can by elementary food, water there and there is a fridge as well in the outer room, it wasn’t noisy at all. We got clean towels, there was cleaning every 3rd day. İstiklal street is 7-10 minutes walk.
Very good as always
Good place close to Takseem, lively place even at late night. Need some renovation for path room and will be perfect place
Hi everyone all not bad just place not good
Great place right next to the main street to catch buses to the old city. Very convenient. Will stay here again when I come back.
Le logement a des points positifs tel que la proximite du boulevard istiqlal et des points negatifs tel que le quartier  mais on a fini par s'abituer et passé un bon séjour

Room was big and beautiful although the washroom and the kitchen was a little bit dirty. 
WiFi connection was weak in the room so we need to go to the ground floor to catch the WiFi.
Good location, helpful staffs,  overall we had a nice stay. Thank you.

Although some wrote about the place being unsafe but myself and my mother stayed there for 6 days and had no issues at all. Plus the double glaze windows really help u to have a good sleep!
In just 10 meters we could easily get taxi, istikbal st was just the other side of the road. The place has clean bathroom, sheets, comfortable beds.
Serdar is very responsive. If you get any questions/issues he is there to help u.

We really enjoyed our stay with Serdar! 

He was extremely helpful and available when we needed him throughout the week. Taksim is not the area it once was, however the apartment is right next to the main high street as well as several "local" streets full of restaurants and bars. 
The room is in a hotel which is very safe and which was cleaned for us during the week...this was a nice bonus! 

All in all Serdar was very welcoming and friendly and we would recommend this hotel for a group of friends/ small family! 
Thanks Serdar!

This is a nice small hotel, value for money. The rooms are good, but the area is a bit dusty. Very silent at night and very close to everything. This is real Istanbul in the not so rich part.
The host Serdar is very helpful and his english is very good. He found all the missing bits for the kirtchen, except for some more chairs (only one in the rooms). We can recommend this.
Central location close to bus stops and restaurants and shops.
The place is the same as the picture. Good location and friendly host.

The apartment was very nice, there is nothing to complain about except of the cleanliness, the location would have been great if it were not the red light milleu. It was very loud, the first night there was a shoot. the area is called Tarlabasi

ev tertemizdi. evin konumu eğlence hayatına çok yakın . 5dk da nevizade bölgesine ,Galatasaray lisesinin oraya İstiklal caddesine çıkılabiliniyor. yataklar rahattı. evin içi iyi dekore edilmiş. otel odasından çok konforluydu. kombi ,klima, tv buzdolabı , ocak, kettle basit mutfak gereçleri bulunmaktaydı. asansor vardı. wi fi iyi (Website hidden by Airbnb) aile olarak kaldık memnun ayrıldık.

The house was clean and the communications were very clear and good. check in and check out were also done in a good way. They were very supportive and nice. we enjoyed our stay there.

however, there can be some noises in the neighborhood at night or early morning. otherwise, it is a perfect place to stay and spend your holiday in Istanbul and the house is very close to Taksim square and many small restaurants and supermarkets.
Serdar Bey, cok iyi bir ev sahibi. Cok ilgili ve sicak kanli
Amazing place and amazing stay. Can’t recommend it enough. When we return we will definitely look to stay here again. Friendly, comfortable, and good value for money. Thank you for having us.
İstiklale çok yakın, akşam uyumaya gelmek için güzel bir yer. Serdar Bey de oldukça ilgili. Tavsiye ederim.
Not as expected
Had a very good time, amazing location near istiklal everything os accessible at any timeand serdar is very helpful with everything. Totaly recommand and for sure will come.back
