host.host_about:
I like multi-kulti. Like to host guest. Started with I stay bul. came across  to airbnb. 
Searching for a Recommended Airbnb flat? We might have one of the 10 Best Places To Stay On Airbnb In Istanbul, If you write Airbnb in Istanbul there are many options here in Istanbul, it is not so easy to choose the perfect place to stay here in istanbul. Incredible Airbnb's in Istanbul experience will be excellent with Istaybul. Apartment and Area to Stay in Istanbul should include Galata area. If you ask What are the best neighborhoods to stay in Istanbul? the answer should include Istaybul Flats. Anyone used Airbnb for Istanbul? Here are the some comments written for istaybul flats around Galata. Airbnb in Istanbul, sure it is a good experience. Most of the people here say Our Flat In Istanbul Found Through Airbnb It Was Awesome.

reviews.comments: Ati was a great host. He responded quickly to all of our questions, requests, and concerns. On numerous occasions I texted him and he responded within minutes. In regards to the flat, there were definitely pros and cons. Pros: great view, elevator, air conditioning, full size fridge and fully stocked kitchen ideal for eating in. Cons: The flat is not great for tall people... the kitchen and back bedroom both have fairly low sloped ceilings. The hot water was unpredictable but I didn't bring this to Ati's attention so I'm sure he would fix it. There was a strong chemical odor almost like a hair salon that seemed to come and go. Also there seemed to be a mold/mildew problem in the bathroom. I know this is common in old buildings but with the humidity it was particularly bothersome. Overall I had a great time staying here. In my experience with Istanbul flats this was a normal experience. I would also mention that the flat is smaller than the photos make it look. Luckily the balcony is nice ;) In regards to the neighborhood, it's a fantastic location especially if you plan on doing touristy stuff but want to also be close to Taksim. It's a 5 minute walk uphill to Taksim and a 10 minute walk downhill to get the Tram which can take you to all of the sites like Sultan Ahmet, Top Kapi, and the Bazaars. You can also easily walk to the Kabatas ferry station. I felt totally safe in the neighborhood. There is a lot of construction so it's not the most beautiful street in the city but it's convenience makes it worth it. Overall I would recommend this flat. Like I said, any problems that were brought to Ati's attention were dealt with promptly so that was great. Thanks so much!
The flat  is nice located with a beautiful view to the Bosporus/ sea of marmara. Always  again.

Ati’s apartment is in a great location in New Town. A bus goes straight from the airport to Taksim Sqaure and the apartment is a couple of blocks from Taksim square and only a tad furthur in the opposite direction to the T1 tram that is easy to maneuver. It connects New Town to Old Town and makes it really easy (and cheap!) to get around. The place also has a fantastic balcony with a lovely view. While Ati was a responsive communicator, we did have an issue with meeting up to get the house keys. Something came up and he was unable to meet the first person in our party to arrive. This made it very difficult to access the apartment since she told him that her phone would not work in Istanbul beforehand. The neighbors who had the keys didn't seem well informed that we were coming and there is a trick to opening the door that is not very intuitive. After a long day of traveling, it is notable that this process could have been much smoother. The only other issue that we had was with the hot water. During our stay, the hot water was very unreliable and alternated between ice cold and scalding hot, when it worked at all. Ati was responsive, came to take a look, but couldn't seem to get repairmen out to fix the problem(it seems the hot water heater failed). The water problem was a bit out of Ati's control. He was very apologetic about the meet up. He bought us a beer, stayed in contact and let us leave our bags past check out time on the day we had to leave since we had a late flight. He also suggested a great place for us to eat. Other than the 2 issues, we had a lovely stay and found the apartment to be a perfect fit for the three of us!

Very nice place, just a few minutes walk from Taksim. The house was very clean and comfortable and the view amazing. Ati gave us the keys and explained the few things you need to know about the place. Very good experience.
Wir wurden freundlich empfangen. Die Wohnung hat eine wunderbare Lage, alles funktionierte gut.
Although i never met Ati personally he has been really helpful during the whole stay on the phone. The flat is fine, the view is really nice. The terrace also adds a lot to the experience.

We had had a very nice week in Istanbul, also due to the nice and very central flat. When we had a question, or any problem Ati, and Özgür, a very nice guy, that Ati send us, solved it immediately.
Anytime we would come again.
Thank You!

This accomodation was perfect for us which make feel us come to again. Ati gave us spare keys and let us keep our luggage after checking out. The accomodation was warm and had great view, big space for three people, plus, his response was very prompt. 
We had lovely time in his accomodation except that we had to go upside with heavy luggage to get to his house.

Квартира соответствует фото. Реально 5 мин от Таксима.
Встреча/вписка - все четко, без сложностей. С горячей водой, бельем и т.п. проблем не было. Рекомендую.
Ati is a great host! Takes good care of us, picked us up at the Havatas drop off place and brought us with luggage to the apartment. Fast message response!

At first I was kind of annoyed because Ati's friend wasn't punctual and I (as a woman) had to wait alone in the dark street while it was raining. So I didn't feel comfortable. But when he came the host was very nice and explained everything. He even gave me his telephone numbe for any kind of questions. But unfortunately he didn't bring two sets of key as it was agreed beforehand.
About the apartment: It is very nice, clean and comfortable. But a high table with normal chairs is missing to have a decent dinner. This apartment is clearly more suitable in summer times. There is a nice balcony and a barbecue. In winter it's a bit too cold although we turned all heaters on. And unfortunately it is not possible to heat the rooms and the water at the same time. When we wanted to take a shower it took more time to find the right water temperature than to shower actually...
On our departure day we could leave our baggage in a room next to the apartment and pick it up in the evening.
The location was great, close to Taksim and the tram. The flat has a low ceiling but a great kitchen and an amazing view of the Bosphorus. The balcony was an excellent touch.

Ati turned to be a responsible host ready to help or give advice anytime we need, making our stay truly comfortable. 
The flat itself is perfectly located - only 5 min walk to Taksim from where you may easily get to any location by metro, bus or funicular. Still to reach many of must-visit places like İstiklal Avenue or Galata tower you won't have to use public transport. There are also late-hours shops near the flat so we could buy some products mostly any time we need.  The place is firmly recommended to stay.

Our journey was perfect. The flat is cozy and with an awesome view. Breakfast on the balcony is a good way to start the day.
Location is even better than what i thought, and the communications with Ati was easy, he is a nice host.

Nice apartment under the roof in a calm location, with a balcony and a view. It is well located (close to Taksim) for public tranports and for going out. Ati (the host) reacts quickly when contacted.

Drawbacks: as the bedroom is under the roof, we had a lot of noise because of pidgeons walking and cooing in the morning. Also the WiFi didn't work during several days.

I would recommend this nice flat except if you're tall (because of the roof), if you have a shallow sleep in the morning or if you need a reliable internet connection.

Ati's flat is really really good. Complete in the Center of Istanbul. You can reach everything easily. The flat itself has everything you need. Even WiFi was offered from Ati. So for everyone who wanna go to Istanbul... This is the flat you should take! ;o) Thanks a lot! Was a good experience.

The discription was ok. It was a bit small, but ok for 3 persons.
Top location, close to public transportation, stores, restaurants, cafe's.
 owner was very handful and kind. gave us some good tips to get to know Istanbul better.

Hi all,

We had a wonderful time visiting Istanbul, and one of the reasons was Ati's appartment. It is super close to Taksim square, which is perfect for planning all the public transport connections needed to reach all interesting places...

Ati himself was very helpful all the time. For example, we had little problems to connect to the WIFI in the house and he fixed it as soon as he could. Or the last day of our journey, when we needed to leave the luggage for a couple of hours while our last quick visit to the city before leaving, he allowed us to keep it in the flat….

We absolutely recommend this place!

Thank you for everything…

Staying in this apartment is one of the best decisions we made for our Turkey trip. Ati was very responsive  before the trip and stay accessible on (Hidden by Airbnb) throughout. He welcomed us at the apartment and made sure we know where everything we need is and made sure we know we can ask him anything during our stay. 
The apartment is good and true to description. Amazing view to wake up in the morning and only ten minutes walk from taksim square and close to underground and nightlife. 
WiFi was available but couldn't vouched for it cuz we were using our sim card. Hot water and heater works and you get simple cooking equipments which was good. I did hear the pigeons in the morning and night time as someone mentioned but I wasn't bothered even I am a light sleeper. 
Overall a lovely experience, one thing to be careful though,  one night I was quite drunk and since the gate at the ground floor of the building was quite heavy, I hurt my finger and the cut was quite deep ... But it was more me than anyone's fault so just be careful lol. 
Pick this place you won't regret!
Great location, great view, decent and safe neighborhood.  Ati is very helpful, the shower is hot, the wifi (upon request) works allright.  If you stay here you will walk a lot.

It was below the tourist area in the new city, not the old historical center. It was on a steep hill that a driver has to back out of up the street. There are many stairs to get down to some local restaurants. BUT it was real and not plastic or removed from the way of life of many citizens. I felt very safe and people were super friendly in the neighborhood. There was an elevator and the bed was really comfortable. The ceiling was low in the bedroom  and kitchen so one has to bend and being 6 feet I would hit my head. It was cold at night and heat was not on. I could barely get into the shower because the door was stuck. No internet and no response from Ati when I emailed and called him. Communication was a problem both with owner and internet. I missed some important correspondence.
Well situated, nice view and comfortable as mentioned. We can always choose  here for our next travel to Istanbul.
Brilliant apartment. Great location and good size for two people

탁심광장에서 아주 가까운 곳. 걸어서 10분거리에 있고 탁심광장에서 찾기 쉬운 위치에 있어서 편리했습니다. 언덕을 내려가는길이라 갈때는 괜찮았는데 큰 트렁크를 가지고 있어서 다시 나올때는 조금 힘들었습니다. 그래두 다시 이스탄불에 오게된다면 꼭 이곳에 머물고 싶습니다. 아티의 집은 너무너무 훌륭한 뷰를 가지고 있어 마음이 평화로운 시간을 보냈습니다. 집도 깨끗하고 침대도 편안했으며 너무 멋진 작은 테라스에서 아름다운 신혼여행의 밤을 보냈습니다. 아티도 너무 친절해서 좋았습니다

The apartment is nice and cosy - we were very happy with it ! The bedroom and kitchen have a sloping ceiling which is a bit difficult to not bump in to - but it I still think it was perfectly comfortable. The balcony is lovely to sit in and enjoy a meal or some drinks in the evening with a nice view of the sea. The bathroom shower cabinet is broken and doesn't shut - hope Ati fixes this soon ! Some reviewers have complained about the wifi but Ati had sent me the passwords beforehand and it worked well. Communication with Ati was a bit slow but didn't pose much of a problem. There is a steep hill to reach the apartment (as in most of Istanbul) but this can be easily avoided by taking two sets of stairs which was a great relief ! It took barely 7 mins to walk to Taksim square (which has a lot of shops/cafes/bars/restaurants and the metro) and has a few mini supermarkets 2-3 mins away which have all the essentials. The only thing that wasn't that easy was that we were reaching the airport at 9am but the apartment was only ready at 2pm as Ati had guests before. He did allow us to come in and leave our bags and take the keys at 1pm while the cleaning lady was there which was very helpful but I wish I had known this before making the booking as I may have tried booking a place with an earlier check in time. As the time is not on the description page - I suggest you check with Ati what time you can check in before booking if you are planning to come in early ! All in all, we really liked the apartment - and I would definitely choose this place for my next stay in Istanbul !

We booked an Air Bnb with Ati but he had some sort of crisis with his cleaning lady (she had to go to the hospital in the morning?), so when we arrived at the Air Bnb it wasn't clean or ready. We were told to come back in 20 minutes and the place would be clean and ready, but when we returned a few hours later, the bed was unmade and there were no clean towels or linens to be found anywhere in the house. We booked a hotel and left the apartment as we found it because it was not up to the basic standards of hospitality that we were promised. Ati issued a full refund for the Air Bnb without conflict.
It was all in order. No complaints from our side.

le logement vaut par sa vue incroyable sur les maisons accrochées à la colline et le  Bosphore . C'est encore plus joli la nuit avec le ballet des bateaux éclairés de toutes tailles. On ne se lasse pas. La terrasse est vraiment le point fort de l'appartement même si les chaises sont un peu branlantes. La situation est vraiment intéressante, au coeur d'Istanbul et calme, tout près de Taksim et de Cihangir : il faut juste monter, la pente des rues est raide, mais c'est partout le cas dans ce coin et cela fait le charme de la ville. Il faut juste ne pas être allergique aux escaliers et prendre son souffle.
Pour l'arrivée , c'est la femme de ménage qui nous a rejoint pour nettoyer l'appartement vers 15h , nous avons déposer nos bagages, profiter de la terrasse puis sommes partis découvrir la ville. En rentrant tout était propre, l'équipement est minimal mais suffisant.
La climatisation marche très bien. La porte de la douche n'est toujours pas réparée- cf les avis précédents - mais c'est gérable et super pression , agréable...
bas de plafond pour chambre et cuisine, très grand s'abstenir...
Pour résumer un appartement dont la situation est vraiment agréable, le quartier est tranquille et voisinage sympathique....

Appartement très convenable, il y a tout ce qu'il faut, la terrasse est vraiment sympa et avec une belle vue. Seul petit défaut il est sous les toits et bas de plafond mais ça n'est pas vraiment gênant.
Hôte agréable, tout s'est bien passé, était bien propre et nous nous sommes retrouvés à l'horaire prévu.

We had a great time staying here. Convenient location and awesome balcony view. Just the usual stuff about the low roofs in the bedroom and kitchen but not a worry if you're not bothered by that stuff. Ati left the key for us and some water in the fridge which was much appreciated.

Really nice apartment, shiny and clean. And a beautiful view from the terrace makes it perfect. Also conveniently located, near place Taksim and Istikal street. Ati is a friendly host, he was really helpful upon arrival and during all our stay, and it was also very nice sharing Turkish coffee with him!

L'appartement est sympa, bien équipé, avec une terrasse qui offre une belle vue sur le Bosphore. Il est bien situé à deux pas de la place Taksim ou l'on trouve facilement le métro pour se déplacer. La navette de l'aéroport n'est pas loin non plus. Bref, bon appartement pour découvrir Istanbul même si on a eu du mal à le trouver !

We spent a full week at the Bosphorus apartment and it was great! The location is perfect (near Taksim and Cianghir young & trendy area), the view amazing, and Ati was a very kind host. He helped us understand the city better, gave us some good addresses, checked in on us several times and offered to take us out or meet up with him to get a feel of Istanbul nights. The apartment is well furnished with an elevator in the building and air conditioning. Tall people, be careful as the roof is a bit low in some parts of the flat. Otherwise, don't hesitate, the view is unique!
Central location. Decent apartment as pictured. Great balcony with views of the Bosphorus.

Being four of us and having only one fan and an aircon that was in the hallway it did make it hard to sleep because it was so hot. 
The location is great and the host was very quick to respond to messages etc. Unfortunately we didn't get to meet him but met his brother

Very easy communication with Ati. Great location of the place, beautiful view. We find the entire experience very pleasant!
Ilya&Martine

Wir haben uns in der Wohnung sehr wohl gefühlt und wir können sie auf jeden Fall empfehlen. Ein absoluter Highlight war es Morgens und Abends vom Balkon aus auf den Bosporus zu blicken. 
Ati haben wir nicht kennengelernt, aber was die Wohnung betrifft war alles in Ordnung. 
Die Lage ist auch super. 5 min zum Taksim und ca. 10 min bis zur Strassenbahn. 

Thank you Ati :)

Ati was a very helpful host, although we did not meet in person, he was easy to contact and responded quickly. Flexible check in/out times were a bonus. 
Apartment was even better than expected (photos do not do it enough justice)! Terrace is lovely in the evenings with the sun setting and a beautiful view of the Bosphorus and Cihangir. The apartment was clean and had everything you could need...hairdryer, towels, washing-up supplies, water in the fridge etc. 

The area of town was great for us, lots of quirky bars and restaurants towards Kabatas, Karakoy and Taksim all within 10 minutes walk. Street is quiet and felt quite safe.

Thanks Ati!
Location is fantastic - about 5 minutes walk to Istiklal and Taksim square and around 30 minutes to Galata bridge. It was clean and exactly as photographed.

The apartment has a spacious private terrace with a big table, BBQ and a great view to the Bosphorus' exit to the Marmara Sea. It was clean and equipped with everything we needed like hair dryer, iron and washing machine (except for some small unimportant issues). The photographs represent the apartment precisely. Easy access to Taksim square, and, so, from and to both airports and metro, also the Fındıklı tram station is just 5 minutes walk and Kabataş is 10–15 minutes walk, so the ferries are nearby. There are lots of small shops and cafes in the neighbourhood, and also supermarkets if you wish. The bedroom is quite small and has low ceiling (as seen in the pictures) because of the topmost floor, but don't you just sleep horizontally there? =)
Ati, the host, was very friendly, but came to our appointment a bit late. I hope it was just a mere accident because of our plane's late arrival. Flexible check-in and check-out times are a nice bonus.
Thanks Ati! =)

Ati is super friendly and a very good host. His apartment was nice and clean and has an amazing view. Also the neighborhood is just right, since you have nice cafés, restaurants and just everything you need around you. Also going and coming to the AirPort is easy. Thanks Ati!

Ati is a nice person, though we didn't meet himself, he sent his friend to meet us at the house front door and provided the help we needed during the stay. The location is quite good, several minutes walk to see shore, tram station and Taksim Square. The apartment is clean and spacious for 2 of us, view is good from the balcony. It's a good choice in Istanbul. thanks a lot, Ati.

Thanks to Ati we had an amazing time in Istanbul. The flat was perfectly situated and the view from the balcony was just great! Ati provided us with all the information we needed and even showed us around in Istanbul. We were really lucky to have such a great host and I can only recommend staying at this accommodation! Anytime I visit Istanbul again, I would definitely book the same apartment.

Small hint: If you are arriving from Austria and you want to make Ati's day/week/month brighter, just take some "Mozartkugeln" with you :).
Ati was a wonderful host and was very helpful getting us moved in and out.

Atilim всегда на связи. Мы рано приехали и он нашел возможность нас заселить раньше чем мы договоривались. После нас никто не планировал заселяться и хозяин без проблем дал возможность остаться до вечера и потом просто захлопнуть дверь (у нас был поздний выезд). От Таксим рядом, но я рекомендую заранее уточнить адрес и найти его на схеме (карте). Потому что мы первый раз долго искали и местные нам помогали.

Host had organised check in and out clearly, he was at work so never met him. location is very close to taksim. although had no idea that area is pretty hilly.

One thing like to point out is the pigeon noise above bedroom roof. kept us awake from early morning - not ideal. So we slept in the living room instead on sofa bed which was fine.

Great location, just next to the lively Istiklal area. Ati was very easy to communicate with. Apartment was clean and well maintained - it had anything you might need even for a longer stay (incl. umbrellas !).

Eravamo in 4 con una bambina di 8 anni.Siamo arrivati la sera tardi e stava nevicando. ATilim era presente e ci ha dato tutte le informazioni del caso. L'appartamento è uguale e alle foto e in una posizione molto centrale e comoda a raggiungere ogni destinazione. eSperienza da rifare.

Atilim was a perfect host, he was very helpful at arrival and helped us to find the place. 
The flat is very nicely located and fits three people easily. Everthing was very nice.

The place was central near Taksim square and Istiklal street. The apartment was cute in a quite area and good neighborhood. the view from the balcony was impressive, and you can see Bosphorus. I am really satisied of the place and I will consider it for next visits in Istanbul. The house was also clean and well equipped for everything one needs.
Kommunikation stimmt. Gute Ratschläge.

Very good information from the host! Not only about practical stuff but also recommendations for restaurants, cafes and bars. The photos and information in the ad are correct. The apartment is very close to Taksim and Cihangir where there are lots of thing to see and places to explore.
It was however hard to sleep in the bedroom since there are doves (?) living on the roof above it and they were loud. We used the bedsofa in the living room instead.

The apartment was great - very clean, loved the view off the balcony! The shower door was broken but it wasn't a problem for us. We had an issue with the keys not working when we arrived but Atilim came quickly and was able to sort it out within an hour or so, he also showed us the main street a bit and gave us good information on where to eat/drink/go out. There was an explosion in the city (very rare) and he immediately contacted us to make sure we were OK and to advise us not to go near that area. Would definitely recommend the apartment. Thanks!
Top location! Would highly recommend.

Emme tavanneet majoittajaa vaan soitin hänelle läheltä asuntoa ja avaimet olivat kuulemma mailboxissa mutta sen löytämiseen meni aikaa ja oven löytämiseen koska hän sanoi vääriä numeroita. akadulla oleva mies auttoi meitä!! Kaikki meni lopulta hyvin ja wifi toimi hyvin sekä tuli lämmintä vettä. Asunnon keittiö haisi todella pahalta kokoajan ja linnut katolla alkoivat häiritsemään aamuyöstä joka yö todella kova meteli joka yö niistä. Suihkun ovi ei toiminut myöskään edes valmiiksi joten aina märkänä koko wc suihkun jälkeen. Ilmastointia emme käyttäneet kertaakaan.

Atilim is the most friendly and correct host we could have wished for. He received us at 10 o'clock in the evening with a big smile and led us the same evening with pleasure to his favorite places in the beautiful city of Istanbul. We look back at a great evening with him. He gave us good tips and advice for a perfect stay in this beautiful city.

The flat was great and had the perfect location for me, really close to Taksim square. Atilim is a really nice and kind person that will help you if you need! I wanted to stay one more day and he found another flat for me. I highly recommand this airbnb :)

Atilim was a great host. The communication was just fine. The apartment is very nice located. The view from the balcony is amazing and you can chill there in the sun. 
The noise of the pigeons and seaguls on the roof is very annoying, so it is not the best place for people with a light sleep.
This apartment is great value for money, is in a good location and has a lovely view from the balcony. Atilim was also flexible with our check in time.

The view from the balcony definitely met our expectations and we enjoyed some wonderful hours out there. The neighbour hood was fine but we did have a hard time finding the apartment. The price of the apartment was awesome but the washing machine didn't work and the apartment smelled funny. Another plus. though, was the AC since we visited Istanbul during a very hot week in June. Also, Atilim sent us a detailed list of recommendations in the area that was very helpful.

The apartment was v nicr. close to taskim square on a quiet street. I was able go to the market and cook in the kitchen. sitting on the balcony at night was really lovely. 
Atilim was so helpful. He helped he find a taxi at short notice. He liaised with my  dentist when I was running late for my apoinment. He sent someone over to do my laundry when I couldn't get the washing machine to work. I can't begin to thank Atilim enough. He is kind, thoughtful.

A nice place with an amazing side view of the Bosphorus. It is situated a short walk away from Taksim square. There's a steep slope which should be ok with most travelers but is not convenient for some old people or those having cardiac problems. The design of the apartment is such that the person or people staying in the bedroom will have complete privacy and feel far from the person or people staying in the living room. Atilim was kind and professional. There was a problem with the washing machine so he asked the cleaning lady to wash my clothes somewhere and hang them to dry in the apartment the same day! I complained about the AC (it was a very hot weekend) so he came with the technician to check it up.

Le logement au dernier étage (5eme) accessible en ascenseur est très bien situé à quelques minutes de marche de la place Taksim dans une petite rue en pente très calme.
Un espace très bien pour 2 personnes, grande chambre sans rangement, cuisine sympa et petit salon avec sofa et TV. Le plus est bien sur la terrasse avec une belle vue sur la ville et le bosphore. Lieu idéal pour le petit dejeuner et prendre l'apéro le soir au coucher de soleil.
Un plus serait un rideau plus épais dans le salon pour bien stopper le soleil car il y fait très chaud (le climatiseur est un peu leger pour la surface de l'appartement) et un rideau de douche dans la salle de bain serai idéal. 
Je conseille vraiment cet appartement, je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Alilim mais il a toujours répondu rapidement à mes demandes par sms ou message. 
Je reviendrai à Istanbul et surrement dans cet appartement !
We did not see Atilim but we had a great stay at his place. The appartment is perfectly located in Taksim district and the balcony is just great.

English feedback here. По Русски в конце. Good choice for the money. Great host. Location is great, just few blocks away from Taksim square and subway. The only one I didn't like there that part o the apartment part  and specifically bedroom and kitchen has a really low ceiling, and I'm a tall guy and this was a problem. But at the same time l used a living for sleep and it was fine. For me it was nice the place has a nice terrace. 
Отличная квартира за эти деньги. Хороший хост. В нескольких минутах ходьбы от метро и Taksim squre. Единственно что не понравилось это то что в части квартиры, в спальне и кухни низкий потолок. Но я спал в гостиной и это не было проблемой. Главно плюс это террасах с хорошим видом.
It was very easy organising access to the apartment and Atilim was very helpful. The apartment is spectacular! I don't think you could ask for a better view. Very easy access to Taksim
Seaview rocks.

We spent a week in Istanbul and stayed in Atilims apartment, witch was a very good choice. The apartment waS spotless clean and exactly as promised. Because we stayed for a week, Atilim offered us an extra visit from his cleaninglady. The balcony is big and with a fantastic view.
Should we ever come to Istanbul again, we will certainly stay there again.
THANK YOU, ATILIM

The apartment is small but has everything you need there for a pleasant stay. The only thing that might be a problem is the fact there are lots of pigeons living in the roof, which often sounded like there were people in the house. If you have some good earplugs then you'll be fine here. Atilim was great with communication and willingness to help, and everything was thoroughly clean.

Anyone who loves coziness and warmth will enjoy this apartment.  It is small but not claustrophobic and the location is FANTASTIC!  Ati was very casual about check-in and check-out and was always available if I needed advice.  The only disappointment was that the listing promises a Bosphorus View from the balcony; what you get is a slice of the Marmara Sea.  Otherwise, exactly what I expected and wonderful!

Tolle Lage des Appartments direkt unterhalb des Mehdan Platzes in Taksim
Alles wie beschrieben - für diesen Preis nicht zu schlagen !!!
optimal für 2 Leute - geht aber auch ohne Probleme mit 3 Erwachsenen oder 2 Kindern 
Die Tauben auf dem Dach können störend sein
Die Heizung läuft etwas zu laut nachts - geht aber wenn mann sowieso müde ist !
Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder wenn wir in Istanbul was suchen !!

It was a pleasure to stay in Ati's appartment. The flat is very central and closed to Taksim square. Internet connexion works very well and, above all, the view is stunning. Don't hesitate to stay here ! It's not expensive and perfect for a short stay in the city.

Die wohnung von Atilim ist sehr gut gelegen. Man ist in kurzer zeit beim Taksim Platz und dann an der Istikal street, wo alle wichtigen Geschäfte sind. Im moment kann man auch die madame tusson ausstellung bewundern. Die strassenbahn ist auch nur 5 minuten entfernt. Mit dieser sind sie in kurzer zeit beim gewürzmarkt, der blauen mosche, hagia sofia und dem grand bazar.
Man hat von der wohnung einen schönen ausblick auf das Marmara Meer. Die wohnung hat von morgens bis abends sonne. Die wohnung ist super für 2 personen. Ich kann die wohnung nur empfehlen. Ich habe die wohnung im märz wieder gebucht.

Eve ulaşım çok rahat. Giriş-çıkış kolay. Ev iyi ısınıyor. Sıcak su var her zaman. Yatak çok rahat. Evin terası güzel, manzarası güzel. Yemek yapacak kap kacak mevcut. Ev sahibi Atılım ile iletişim kurmak rahat ve her konuda yardımcı oluyor kendisi.

Die Lage ist top, man ist nahe an viele Sehenswürdigkeiten. Preislich fand ich es auch ganz gut. 
Daher würde ich es aufjedenfall weiter empfehlen

We had a good stay in the appartment of Atilim. It has a great location, right near subway and trams and gives you a great view form the terrace. Atilim was very helpful in giving directions to get to the place, even with our plane arriving late (1 at night). 
Only minor point is that there are some birds on the roof in the bedroom making some noise, which can be a bit irritating at some point.
Thank you for everything Atilim! Perfect location, perfect host! Apart is small but absolutely cozy! Amazing view from balcony. Highly recommendation!

I spent a week here and was happy for it.  Comfortable though basic apartment with a gorgeous view.  

One note: the apartment is on the top floor of the building.  There's considerable bird activity on the tile roof - if you're a light sleeper they may wake you in the night.

Ich war schon das 2. Mal bei Atilim in der Wohnung. Ich fühle mich hier zu Hause. Du kannst in hier nach den Einkäufen auf der Terrasse abschalten und die Aussicht auf den Bosporus geniessen. Ich kenne Istanbul sehr gut, da ich schon über 20 Mal in dieser wunderbaren Stadt war. Sie ist immer wieder eine Reise wert. Diese Wohnung ist sehr gut gelegen. Wenn man nicht nach oben laufen will, nimmt man die Metro von Kabatas nach Taksim und spaziert von da nach unten. Überall findest du Einkaufsläden um etwas mit in die Wohnung zu nehmen. Du hast die so viele Möglichkeiten von dieser Wohnung aus. Sie liegt sehr gut und man kann alles in kürzester Zeit erreichen. 
Alles in allem buchen Sie diese Wohnung - klein fein und alles was man braucht - ich denke Sie werden nicht enttäuscht sein. Die Tauben können am Morgen nerven, aber man gewöhnt sich daran. Etwas gibt es überall.
Auf jeden Fall wünsche ich wunderbare Tage in Istanbul. Diese Stadt ist immer eine Reise wert. Für mich auf jeden Fall.
Atılım war sehr zuvorkommend die Wohnung ist super,sehr Sauber und zentral gelegen. Empfehle ich weiter
Perfect place to stay in Istanbul ! Close to public transports, restaurants and bars.

This flat is perfect for a visit to Istanbul if you want to be in the Beyoglu area. It's within walking distance to Istiklal and Chihangir and the tram stop that will take you into Karakoy, Eminonu, and Sultanahmet. The living room and patio are sunny and have great views. It's on a quiet street, but the pigeons are quite loud on the roof.
Nice, well situated place with great location and view. Excellent value. Many thanks!

Отличное расположение, уютно и отличный балкон с видом на Босфор. Для того, чтобы ночевать просто супер! Из минусов: голуби на крыше, небольшие трудности при регулировании температуры воды ( видимо из-за бойлера), холодильник не холодит на полную.

The flat is clean and nice. We absolutely fell in love with the balcony and the charming view to Istanbul and Bosphorus. Sometimes it was little bit noisy because of gulls scratching the rooftop by their paws. But that wasn't really disturbing. We were pleased to name Atilim's flat our home for these three days.

Very good view, comfortable apartment. You can hear birds on the roof, but it is a minor flaw. 
Atilim is a great host, always ready to help. Had a great time at his place.

Birds nest right on top of the bedroom. They make so much noise. At all times. Day and night. Dont be able to sleep.

As a traveler will not recomend it to another traveler.

Great location and excellent view. 
The birds on the roof can make it very noisey in the bedroom though. But otherwise excellent.

Atilim's apartment is lovely! It has everything you might need for your stay! The Bosphoru view is amazing! The location is perfect.
Highly recommended. :)
Die Lage der Wohnung war top und auch der Balkon mit einer wundervollen Aussicht. Einziger Nachteil sind die Tauben und Möwen, diese waren wirklich unglaublich laut am Morgen.
位置距离电车和码头以及地铁非常近,交通很方便｡阳台景色不错,房东非常热情,能及时提供详细的信息｡

Perfect location, amazing view. Minuses - not that many towels and too warm or too cold water in the shower, but manageable. I'm sure Atilim will take care of that in the future. Overall a very good place to stay.

Ev özellikle temizliği ve konumuyla çok çok iyidi. İnternet de birçok evle karşılaştırıldığında oldukça hızlıydı. Güvercinler sabahları biraz rahatsız ediyor bu gerçek ancak yine de çok tavsiye edeceğim bir mekan.

This place was cozy and nice, well located and ideal for 1 or 2 people that want to go to the Uni or enjoy Taksim nightlife, because both places are really near. If I have to come back to the University, I'd probably book here again.

El apartamento está muy bien localizado en la zona cercana a Taksim, de modo que la vida nocturna está asegurada. Lo mismo si se quiere tener acceso a la Universidad. Además. está muy bien conectado por metro con cualquier punto de la ciudad. Atilim es un excelente anfitrión, y es muy fácil coordinar detalles con él. Recomiendo el apartamento y sin dudas lo volveré a rentar en próximos viajes.
Nice host
Decent location. The AC is not great however it keeps the apartment cool enough to fall asleep at night

It has been a pleasure to have been welcomed Ati. He is the best host ever, his person conveys the whole essence of Turkey: kindness, hospitality, simplicity and great doses of sympathy and sense of humor. His apartament is not extravagant but is comfortable, full-equipped, centric, clean and has amazing views.

Очень хорошее расположение, всё необходимое есть, даже лишнее. .В предыдущих отзывах писали о проблемах с голубями. Когда мы заехали - в комнатах было жарко и мы, кроме кондиционера, включили вентилятор. Шум от вентилятора напоминал полёт в самолёте и ни одного голубя не было слышно. Вентилятор ставили в кухне - рекомендую для желающих остановиться в этом месте.

The location is perfect and the view from the terrace is very enjoyable. The host is helpful and you can always relay on him. He is very friendly also and add personal touch in every accommodation. I strongly recommend the place! :)

I had a great time staying at this airbnb. Perfect location. 3 minutes walk to Taksim Square. In a quiet neighbourhood which can be hard to find in Taksim! Oh, I also did a couple loads of laundry! Thanks!

Хороший район - рядом транспорт (прямая линия до Галата бридж), недалеко до паромов, есть локальный и сетевой супермаркет, рядом с Таксим с кафе и магазинами, лифт в подъезде, подъезд закрывается. 
Квартира небольшая, низкие потолки - но это не мешает особо. Спать в спальне невозможно - очень громкие птицы - то есть минус одна комната и спальное место. Диван раскладывается в другой комнате, но он расшатаный, не супер комфортно спать, но хоть тихо.
С двух сторон террасы - соседи. Их видно. Вид с террасы хороший. 
Не работает холодильник (в жаркую погоду!) - вернее, работает слегка морозилка, но ее не хватает, если вы хотите купить свежую рыбу или мясо. 
Горячая вода есть, но плохо регулируется - либо слишком горячая, либо холодная. 
Вся кухонная утварь есть, в принципе. Мангал тоже есть, можно пользоваться. Это хорошо. 
Мы уезжали вечером, а следующие жильцы заселялись в этот же день. Но хозяин квартиры разрешил оставить сумки до отъезда в отдельном помещении. За что ему спасибо.
В целом, квартира ничего, но хуже ожидаемого.
problem with birds on bedroom roof made it hard to sleep but everything else was good, excellent communication and easy check in and flexible on check out which was much appreciated

God lokation og udsigt! Vi var der i 6 dage og nød at sidde på balkonen og se ud over Taxim.
Det skal nævnes at køleskabet ikke virker særligt godt. Fryseren holder tingene kolde, men fryser ikke. Vand trykket i bruseren er ustabilt. Det varme vand er også ret ustabilt. Det kommer og gå og er svært at indstille.
På taget over soveværelset bor en del store fugle, hvilket larmer ret meget om natten.  Vi måtte flytte ind i stuen på sofaen for at få sovet. Flere gange troede vi at nogen havde brudt ind i lejligheden, så meget larmede det. 
Kan alligevel godt anbefale stedet, trods kritikpunkterne.
I left my heart in this marvellous terrace. If you read this and still have some doubts, come.
Good location and nice view of the balcony, helpful host!
A central spot in Taksim, with nice view.Public transport is a short walk from the apartment although walking to Istiklal is a very good idea.Broblem with the birds at night ,made noise on the roof
Nice apartment, perfect location!
Harika.

Très bon séjour. L’appartement est propre, pratique. La vue sur le Bosphore et Istanbul est très belle. Il convient très bien pour 4 personnes.

L’hôte n’a pu être present, mais il est très réactif, quasiment dans la minute à la moindre de question (nous avons discuté par whatapps). Il nous a conseillé des adresses, donné des informations...

Le seul point gênant peut être le bruit que font les oiseaux, leurs nids étant très proche de la fenêtre. Mais c’est normal en prenant un logement sous les toits!

Good location, great terrace and view, clean and basic, good value! 
(Remember to bring earplugs for sleeping since there's noise from the birds on the roof - but it wasn't a big issue for us.)

Great flat with an amazing view. Perfect location. The host was helpful and thoughtful, gave us loads of very good tips about the neighborhood. Definitely would love to come again and stay in the same place

The apartment is perfectly located and has a great roof terace. Only drawback were the astonishingly loud birds in the morning. However, with earplugs it was ok and everything else was good. So we recommend and would stay again!

-Le plus important à savoir: il faut vraiment aimer les pigeons et les mouettes pour se sentir bien dans cette appartement!!!

-Il est impossible de dormir dans la chambre
=>l'appartement est sous les toits et impossible de dormir dans la chambre à cause du bruit des oiseaux! 
=> le matelas est comme une courbe de Gauss

-Il est très difficile de se doucher (eau trop chaude ou trop froide) => urgent de changer le kombi
-les draps étaient vraiment très vieux
-il est temps de faire un peu de peinture => les murs sont tellement sales!!!

Pour conclure, je ne conseillerai pas cet appartement même à mon pire ennemi!
Everything was fine, as always. This was my third time in this apartment, and I will book again for the next one. Atilim is a great host.

This was such a perfect spot for exploring Istanbul! Walking distance to most of what we wanted, otherwise a short walk to the Taksim metro. The view is beautiful and the place is simple but satisfied our needs. Definitely recommend! The birds weren’t even that bad ;)
Great value in a great location. The patio and view were great for evening drinks. Would definitely stay here again.

The house was fine and the position it’s good if you have to be around Taksim square you just have to go up and down for few back streets.
The host wasn’t there when we arrived but this is fine because we did a bit of late. The house was clean but full of ants everywhere the bed it’s a bit uncomfortable because on the right side you fall down. 
For the price i paid was a good solution for few days in Istanbul but for the same price if you book in advance you can find better places considering my personal experience there.
However loved İstanbul and the people in Istanbul I wish you’ll love it too

We had a really pleasant stay at the apartment, close to all important sights (by walking or train) of European side of Istanbul. Inmidst of beautiful Beyoglu.

Everything needed was provided, but the only reason for giving four instead of five stars are the loud pigeons on the roof of the bedroom. Even with ear plugs it was unpleasant.

The host is very hostile and took us to a very authentic Turkish restaurant and invited us to drink the famous Raki.

Thank you for the stay!
All was good, just for long stay guests better to leave more towels. I recommend this place. I enjoyed my stay.

Da mein bevorzugtes Apartment in Istanbul nicht frei war, 
wählte ich dieses. Und es war eine gute Wahl.
Das Apartment ist sehr schön und sauber, 
die Einteilung ist zweckmäßig und gut durchdacht,
die Aussicht auf den Bosporus vom Balkon ist grandios,
auch das gegenüberliegende Häusermeer ist faszinierend.
Die Lage ist perfekt. Ich habe meine Ausflüge meistens mit der Tramway
in Findikli begonnen. Zurückgekehrt bin ich mit der Metro oder dem
Füniküler nach Taksim, so vermied ich den steilen Hang. 
Die Gegend ist sicher, nachts ist es ruhig, denn es sind keine Lokale in
unmittelbarer Nähe.
Der Krach der Tauben war für mich kein Problem, denn ich habe
einen guten und tiefen Schlaf.
Atilim war sehr hilfsbereit, Probleme wurden sofort gelöst.

Clean apartment with a beautiful view in Taksim, which is a lively and central area of Istanbul. The apartment is a five minute walk from a metro station that will take you anywhere in the city. There’s also an airport bus near there as well. Communication, check-in - everything went smoothly. I couldn’t have asked for a better experience in Istanbul. Will definitely stay again!
The location of the flat is perfect, everything there thats needed, but not much space for eating together. Bathroom and kitchen could have been cleaner. The communicationwas perfect!

En deçà des attentes même si la localisation est extraordinaire. 
Problème de prise dangereuse, de mur à peindre dans le séjour et de serviette qui ne correspondent pas au nombre des personnes.
